b07ULLA8z4Ov5ZyCCgCJMQ.text: We started at the Nacho Daddy's in Henderson and ended up at this location because the one in Henderson had a weird vide to it. We ordered the mango and peach margaritas and were delicious ! The nachos were also amazing! Will be coming back to this location.

FDO4fiQ32-uh2MoW3hVzWg.text: My wife and I were walking around Fremont Street and we were looking for a good happy hour place. Several places online recommend Nacho Daddy so we decided to check it out.   We ordered a few house margaritas from the happy hour menu as well as some nachos and chicken tacos. It's always annoying when places advertise their happy hour menu to get you in the door and then the servers seem so displeased with you for ordering from said menu. After we placed our order, we barely saw the bartender for the rest of the time we were there. It took us about twenty minutes to flag her down and get the check when we wanted to leave. We were forced to hang around even longer because she "mistakenly" didn't charge us the happy hour prices for our drinks. She made sure to make several other customers drinks before fixing our receipt. If you aren't going to treat all of your customers well, you should just get rid of happy hour.  The house margaritas were unsurprisingly mostly simple syrup. The chicken tacos and nachos were fine but not particularly memorable. While I liked the bar setup and the country music playing through the speakers, the food and the service make this place somewhere I would not recommend.

Pz8dXtJqtcBQsbCimDBzZA.text: The food was so good. Food came out quickly too. The staff was very kind and helpful and our server Sabrina attended us immediately. The manager Jovanny was very sweet and would come by to check up on us every little while. Our drinks were delicious as well, Natasha made us some really good margaritas.

40OwJyV8AGiog2kwnJHODA.text: Visiting family in Las Vegas last week. My son wanted to try this restaurant. I like the fact if you going to have to wait for a table they will text when it's ready. The place is loud but isn't everything on Fremont. My husband and I ordered the Super Nachos,my son ordered the tacos and his wife order the fajitas while my grandson ordered the burger. Our waiter was friendly and food came out in a reasonable amount of time. Everything was good. The only issue was they turned down the lights for the evening and where we were sitting we could see what we were eating. Jokingly my husband turned on his light on his phone. Other than that the restaurant was good.

E1u1vTKS30-3ARAIhSLx8g.text: In a word: amazing. Smothered burrito was great, service was super even though I saw our waitress grab her purse and leave during our meal without explanation. The other staff covered this without missing a beat.  Awesome 80s and 90s music videos playing.

MkJgYkOQoZIQVRdc3dgwEg.text: Very busy and hip atmosphere. Fun but a bit cramped. Located in downtown it's surrounded by lots of fun things to do.  The food was good enough, but the 4 cheese nachos were a waste of money, over half the nachos had no cheese on them. The traditional huevos rabcheros were a let down too, flavor was mediocre.  We didn't get napkins or forks until about a minute before the main dishes came out. So appetizers were messy LoL!  The tortilla soup was excellent and service and house drinks were good. The grilled hot wings were phenomenal. We do intend to go back and give it another try.  There were other dishes that people seemed to love. We want to try the filet mignon nachos and it was good enough. Closer to 3.5 stars for this visit. Will update after the next trip.

gb5Y5ZkIIQRO6cYdzKR8tg.text: Went here because we wanted a fun environment that had some vegetarian options.  My wife really wanted to some great Nachos.  This is more of a bar but it's nice and modern.  It is a bit loud.  We went around 9:30pm so it was not that crowded.  We had the Supreme Tostada Nachos and the Vegetarian Cheese Enchilada (less cheese substitute with black beans).  The food was great.  Was the best nachos I have had in a long time.  They were loaded with toppings.  The best part about the Nachos was that it had the right amount to Cheese.  Most places overload the nachos with cheese.  The Enchilada's were better than average, nothing to write home about.   Nacho Daddy downtown would have received a five star review if it was not for our waitress.  She was rude and inattentive.  Mind you, the restaurant was almost empty.  I ordered a beer before I placed our dinner order.  The beer arrived after we started eating dinner.  She never came back to our table after that.  We had to track down our waitress for the check.  I will be back the next time I am in Vegas.

mDs1h0xcsHCP_FhlgCZjIA.text: Stumbled across this little jewel walking around Fremont Street in downtown Vegas. Love me some nachos so I want gonna pass it by without a try and so glad I did! Great experience right from the beginning. We sat at the bar and Natasha greeted us immediately upon sitting down. We told her we had never been before and she gave us the entire run down of the menu including her favorites and the favorites or the regulars. We ordered several of her suggestions including Daddy's Margarita and Michelada, the filet mignon nachos and the crab and lobster nachos! Everything was awesome. Food came out fast and hot. Natasha kept our drinks full the entire time and checked back with us regularly. Hope you guys bring one of these to Orlando! And some bartenders like Natasha!

PNOGFTsSBTZVZR30FRLevw.text: After visiting First Friday for the time, my friends and I wanted to try a delicious restaurant close by. This eatery is located right off of Fremont street. Upon arrival we were told that the wait would be thirty minutes but it was more like 15.   With your yelp check in you receive a yummy free house margarita.   We all order some type of nachos and they were all good. My favorite was the delicious queso dip. My daddy wings were a little small and too breaded for my taste but the nachos were delicious.  I recommend sticking to Nachos or something on the menu with a star by it.

-dqC9ihHxVq5H6VqRHYO0w.text: Decided to eat at Nacho Daddy during St. Patty Day's weekend because Cheffini's hot dog cart was not there. My friends and I ended up taking up some seats at the bar. If we wanted a table, it would've been a 30+ minute wait.   If you have the Yelp app on your phone, be sure to check in! You get a check offer for a free house margarita!   My friends and I decided to share the Supreme Tostada Nachos that pretty much had everything and we also shared the Mexican corn. As for drinks, I had their house margarita while my friends got a white peach margarita and blood orange margarita.   The nachos were very delicious. The flavor of everything blended together very well. The corn was okay. I've had better elsewhere. As for the drinks, to be completely honest, they all tasted pretty much the same to me. They all tasted like sweet and sour mixed with tequila. I couldn't really distinctly tasted the difference much. There were fruity flavors to them but the flavor was really light.   The only thing is that Nacho Daddy is a little bit on the pricey side. $17.50 for a plate of nachos with everything? Yowza. The margaritas run about $11-12 per. Granted, you're on Fremont street where it's mostly tourist so it's pretty much standard.   End point: pretty good food. Mediocre drinks.

uPf91yhvUqUV6QMeU84y1w.text: If you go to a place called Nacho Daddy, you deserve what you get, don't you think? After all, who's your daddy anyway? Dining options were rather slim when we were strolling between the Fremont Street Experience and the Mob Museum. We noticed too late that Tony Gemignani opened one of his pizzerias, Pizza Rock, smack in the middle of the area, and we were already in shock over the sight of the Heart Attack Grill where they let people weighing at least 350 lbs eat for free. We were grateful we didn't meet that threshold. By comparison, Nacho Daddy seemed like a downright demure dining destination in the middle of downtown Las Vegas. It's really just as much a bar as it is a place to eat although the menu is pretty robust with not only nachos but also breakfasts, burgers, wraps and other Mexican dishes. Jamie W. was hungrier than I was and ordered the $13.50 Vegan Burrito, which was a flour tortilla stuffed mostly with wild rice with bits of Cajun-spiced tofu, black beans, vegan cheese, diced peppers and onions, mushrooms, fire-roasted corn, avocado salsita and pico de gallo (photo: bit.ly/1ZiHHn2). It was quite a pile in there, but it wasn't overly flavorful for all the ingredients. I just went with the $9.95 Flour Quesadilla which was just a flour tortilla with mozzarella cheese melted inside accompanied by a mini-scoop of sour cream and pico de gallo (photo: bit.ly/1RZtC8F). It was alright though something I could have made on a dorm hot plate a hundred years ago. We noticed the place start to fill up with regulars mostly around the bar, but I have to give props to the manager whom I think was the one serving us since the younger server was keeping busy entertaining the bar patrons. FOOD - 3 stars...middling Mexican food maybe more satisfying after a stint at the bar AMBIANCE - 3 stars...nothing special, kinda Tex-Mex in feel SERVICE - 4 stars...for the unexpectedly efficient server TOTAL - - 3 stars...now who's your nacho daddy now?

grJsITFmAtLz0OuEEjD31A.text: Not our first Tim to Fremont st, but first time to Nacho Daddy. Found it with a little research before our trip, and did not disappoint. The service was friendly and fast the food and margaritas were excellent. My wife had the street tacos, which I was allowed to have one of the three on her plate, very tasty. I'm a big fan of heuvos rancheros, and where we live it's not easy to find and if you do not very good. What can say is they didn't disappoint, traditional with salsa, guacamole, and the bean made to perfection. When go back it might be hard not to order them again.

3-fIzGM1eAvc8jpWCnBI1g.text: Our party of 6 went here Saturday night. For some reason our waitress forgot to put our order in and left the restaurant. After about 20 minutes waiting for our drinks another waiter went to check as our waitress was no where to be found. They were clearly looking for our order and then made our drinks very quickly. Obviously our food also had been forgotten as that took around 45 minutes. Poor poor service, if you recognize you made a mistake don't try and hide it, acknowledge it by offering a free drink or take a meal charge off the bill. Hiding it and hoping we don't mind you forgetting our order isn't acceptable!

f216vlyoeu4r8P8L2aqEZA.text: The food was really good, decently priced, also have vegan options or can modify for healthier options (quinoa for rice). The drinks were nice and good price options for groups. Fun atmosphere. They had this weird scorpion shot you can take. But the service was VERY slow.

Q1X6IZRGYmL5xk3Vi5nf1A.text: After flying down Fremont St. on Slotzilla zipline we needed to eat! Nacho Daddy was a short walk back from the end of Fremont and could seat 8 of us right away. We started with the Mexican street corn, which I've had in Mexico, and it was pretty good but not the same as in Mexico. I had the pork tamale and seafood enchilada combo. I was really happy with both of my dishes. Our friends split the filet fajitas and they really liked them too. They have scorpion shots for those who are brave enough lol. Our waiter was great too, fast service and checked on us appropriately. All in all a great dining experience here.

YK7QVwsOTE-NG0y1GnPtYw.text: Nacho daddy was amazing! We split the nachos and it was the perfect amount of food for lunch for 2. Our server was super friendly and pleasant, and the food arrived quickly. Would definitely go back!

xFgonQ4ClhabwI1VwXG6wA.text: Was in the area and stopped by after seeing the good reviews. Was NOT disappointed! The food was awesome and I even got a free margarita for checking in on yelp!

SA4aNppAV9JEbm5rzo0LTw.text: Have been here twice and both times I've been satisfied with the food and the service. Both times Anya was my bartender and took my food order. Great ambience, comfortable setting, interesting menu items. Had the enchilada nachos, and the shrimp starter plate, enjoyed both. Will be back.

4ljLQVIImFuxOJreF7iK3w.text: Great service great food would definitely come back here anytime. Food is incredible I hope to be back before I go to so cal

Hrkv-Buri2xpGlS1CwAwnA.text: We ordered Mexi-Cobb Salad and Buffalo Nacho. My husband and I are very satisfied.   We will come back.

PKnVRp6PHxgcTvFVt9h2VA.text: After a long night of walking, we looked for places to get last minute food, because of course after having a night of drinking, you'll need food too. Although they were nice enough to seat us after arriving 10 mins before closing time (2am), they were giving dirty looks, specially by the host, who apparently was not happy to serve prior to closing (which I do understand, but nonetheless, his attitude should have been adjusted, as he is serving costumers). I walked in with a drink from another place, and he rudely told me to take my drink "out". I was with a group of friends, and I was not going to hand him my drink (since I had just bought it). The way he wanted to take my drink was not polite at all. He was not a good server. (Bald headed guy). Nevertheless., I will not return to this place only based on costumer service.

wOVHtCs6OCKrOoRxP-HiVQ.text: Excellent open air bar near Fremont! Reminds me a lot of Austin and the food is excellent.

md4PIsEqYCYcs8mQeeUUGw.text: Food was good and fairly priced. I'm gluten & dairy free and they made it super easy to order since their regular menu showed what was gluten free and/or vegan. Just be careful that you state you want gluten free chips with your salsa or guacamole. My friend forgot to specify and I had a reaction (luckily it's just an intolerance for me).

lEeIW7OzqcrmgzE6tLyC-w.text: Say yes to the nachos. They are incredible! The food isn't super healthy but it is delicious.

f2-J3rT1EcQ21-pHNEaJ3w.text: These guys don't play around when it comes to nachos and beer. I got the bbq chicken nachos and they nailed it! Giant plate of shredded chicken with dank BBQ sauce, beans, queso, and solid chips. Really enjoyed the giant mug of ice cold IPA to wet my whistle in between bites of nacho goodness. Overall would recommend to others.

b7iSb_rYim2rb8OxMD2mgA.text: Really enjoyed this restaurant. We went during happy hour and had the shredded nachos and Bangkok street tacos. The tacos were amazing. They donate a free meal to a child for every meal purchased. This is a must eat.

HR5r2JUDjuwGm64llkrt1w.text: Super yummy! Just off the main drag, so worth it. Great happy hour $5 specials. Service at the bar was great and they were very friendly and attentive. Give this place a shot while you are visiting Fremont Street

QmExg8NqYf4O4QJjVBdvqQ.text: Great drinks great bar. Jovanny is the shit! Good times here! The scorpions shots are an added plus. Excellent margjeritas! Worth the walk to the end of the strip.

tYWU_RH2Q4-Zk-kKjlgv8A.text: I LOVE THIS PLACE!!!!!! Brought my bestfriend for her graduation with our family and it is amazing!!!!! RICO IS AMAZING!!!!!! He is the most amazing server ever. He is so friendly. He is so funny! He knew exactly what I needed BEFORE I EVEN ASKED FOR IT!!!!! WHAT STAR DID YOU COME FROM SWEET ANGEL?!???!!!! YOU DESERVE A RAISE!!!!! You, my dear Rico Friend, deserve a Medal of Honor. Thank you for your service, friend. You are paving waves in this industry. Rico, you are the best staff member here. I appreciate you ooodles.

dHOO-k5RSMr6A2cY19xG7w.text: I've been here so many times and never wrote anything. It's always been good and always been great for service.  Except the last time.  We came here with a large group last weekend and wanted to wait the 40 mins the hostess told us. 40 mins passed, nothing. 50 mins, nothing. Hour and 10 mins, nothing. I asked her if it'd be much longer as we were all starving. She kept lying saying, "they're almost gone" "they have boxes" "they're paying for their food". After 1 1/2 hours, they finally sat us at a table that had been empty the entire time. Even the table behind that was empty.   I get they probably didn't have the wait staff...on a Saturday. But that's why I kindly asked her to be honest with me because we would have rather gone elsewhere for quick food. She just kept stringing us along. That shit was not cool and extremely bad business.   It really pissed everyone off to where we didn't even enjoy anything at that point.   Horrible hostess. Horrible customer service. I usually refer so many people here to eat. No more.

ThHB0TZqMd2G7eNReGIZQQ.text: Second time here and how cool is the scorpion shot!!!Rico served us again.... what a great guy always so attentive!!! Not to mention arrived here 45 minutes before closed time and he was so so friendly with us!!! Thank You Rico

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shot!!!

C62Cu4yQ36dh7y1j55z_aQ.text: Jovanny was amazing thanks nacho daddy!!

-GqSpMk_lpwP4pEV4m4keA.text: If you love nachos you will love nacho daddy. This is our first stop every time we come to town! We have had many different nachos and all of them have been great. The pomegranate margarita is the best too! Most of the time we go there twice in one visit but this time we only went once. Until next time ND!

XPZ3RJkdujF3n4tMy5s3cg.text: Disappointed tonight, wait was over 45 minutes even though half the tables were open. When we asked the hostess about the open tables she said they were for large parties.........but the 2 hours we were there zero large parties came in. However over 8 groups of people walked away when they heard 30-40 minute wait times. All that lost revenue and empty tables.....? Makes zero business sense. We are loyal customers and have eaten at one of the 3 locations over a dozen times in the last year. Sadly this location will not be on that list in the future. Tip go to the one at Planet Hollywood. They are more organized and have friendlier staff. Food good, service disappointing.

rIdbZ1OyKvF7o2o8CTrXPQ.text: This place was great for our super late night dinner. Our server, Rico, was awesome and so friendly. We ordered the poke nachos and burrito bowl. The chicken in the burrito bowl was delicious. The ahi tuna and wonton chips were great and surprisingly filling.

zS_SmCJ9zqHbtW4kKPIYxg.text: While visiting Fremont st looking for something to eat, the name caught our attention and we are so glad it did. Great atmosphere, friendly staff and delicious food.  For starters we got the triple dip...guac, salsa, and queso dip that I just wanted to drink out of the bowl and fresh, warm chips! Then the filet mignon chimichanga, perfect! Go eat there whichever location you are closest to!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Triple dip
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chimichanga
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_pmBtBXYoeowl0MVw210GA.text: I was shopping around yelp for Mexican restaurants when I found nacho daddy. I saw some of the reviews talked about a free marg for a check in, so I was sold. All you have to do is show them that you checked in and you get a free margarita on the rocks! It was served in a Ball jar and was one of the best margs I've had.   Had a waiter named Rico. He was super cool. Very attentive and helpful.   I wasn't very hungry, so I just ordered the trio of guac, queso, and salsa. The queso was sooo good. I also am a baby when it comes to spice and I could eat the medium salsa just fine. Guac is ok and kinda bland, but if you mix it with the cheese its great.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Q_g7c1vt8eAQcfDNi24qqA.text: Nacho Daddy caught our group's eye from the very first moment we saw it, unfortunately for the weekend we were in Vegas we didn't get a chance to visit. However, on our drive back home we made sure to stop in Vegas, specifically at Nacho Daddy because we knew we couldn't pass up a chance to eat here.   Nacho Daddy did not disappoint, there was such a wide variety of options to choose from. I got the enchilada nachos and they did not disappoint. The portion was HUGE and the flavor was incredible.   As for the location itself, the servers were extremely attentive and made sure we always had water. In addition, there's TV located all around playing either sports or music videos. We were seated next to a music video tv and my friends and I had a lot of fun guessing the name of the songs/artists since the videos were older.   From the food to the atmosphere, it was an incredibly fun and worthwhile experience. I would come back to Nacho Daddy in a heartbeat.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enchilada Nacho
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enchilada Nacho

_7BEFsdE_AelK1IUrrayyw.text: having a great time. Place looks amazing. inside/outside is awesome. waiter was super helpful and knowledgeable. Jovanny knew pretty much everything, we asked tons of questions. good food and good drinks.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Jovanny hooked it up! Good drink!

By9kgQpQ9aUVl_SJ1MQlxA.text: This place is bomb! Lol  It's located a 1 min walk from the busy Fremont  street so super convientent. We ordered the Vegan Loaded Nachos & Vegan flamin' Chick'n fajitas & Vegan Chocolate Cake.   Everything was delicious!!!!!!  Bonus: check in on Yelp for a free house margarita. It was expertly made - the best margarita I've had.   It was Monday night but the place was packed. Our server was super nice and attentive.  Nacho Daddy we are 100% going to visit you the next time we are in town!

e0cEI4qOWpSJG05yYNiUwg.text: This is a great chain! They have a vegan menu with lots of choices including chocolate cake.  The margaritas are good. Overall great location! I would recommend this restaurant and location.

hfuy9MBsAGQEmVISaV_i4g.text: I've been to Nacho Daddy for a business lunch and after being a little hammered after two many cocktails on Fremont. Who doesn't love Nachos any time??  Their drink selection is great. I recently enjoyed their Moscow mule, and I've had almost all of their nachos. Bomb. Amazing. Delish. What I love most about them is that if you purchase one of their entrees, they partner with the local food bank Three Square and donate a meal. I could stuff my face all day on the regular so imagine how much I can eat knowing that I'm giving back?!   Their scorpion shot is a must. I've done it twice now and I'm still alive. I dare you!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nacho

PKCcwpKROF4wHfidFEiQdA.text: A tale of two daddies...   Vegan Daddy: Wow! They have an entire page of vegan options, which includes queso, sour cream, all types of fake meat, the works! If you are vegan (or can't handle dairy), these are gonna be your favorite nachos ever. I got the loaded vegan nachos and I was in heaven. Probably the best food I had the entire time I was in Vegas.  Regular Daddy: Everything seemed pretty good, but I live in Texas so like you don't impress me much with nachos, queso, burritos. I think everyone enjoyed their food enough, and they got huuuuuge portions!   Overall, the service was ok. They handled a group of ten surprisingly well, and with the Yelp Check-In most people got their first margarita free.

6V1nlEj256jYoKaCGsjW1A.text: Our first time here and Jovany was a fantastic server. He informed us about the "check in to receive a free house marg" here on Yelp which saved us a hearty sum off our bill. The marg is so fresh tasting and soooo good. We ordered the Vegas knight's nachos with filet fajita mix and cheese and a chicken chimichanga. Definitely going to stop back every time we're in town!! Wowowowow

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Golden Knights Nacho and Chimichanga
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Super fresh tasting house marg!

EnIqTcAsb-zpInXAm-dCaA.text: We have eaten here twice for lunch and the food is always delicious!  The grilled Mexican corn off the cob was delicious and has probably become one of my new favorite appetizers! Seeing as this place is called Nacho Daddy we obviously have tried nachos each time we have been here and have been impressed both times! The portions are perfect for two people to share when you are looking to not over eat and the ingredients seem to be very fresh and the flavors have been great!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled Mexican Corn off the Cob
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster and Crab Enchiladas
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Tinga Nachos

mj_2F7AQTaY80eKiQYgQqA.text: Ignore the somewhat silly name, this is solid and legit Mexican food. The menu has an amazing array of options, including breakfast all day and vegan/vegetarian dishes galore. Everyone will be able to find something to order. The margaritas were also very tasty!   This was a great place to get grub after hanging out downtown. We went during an off hour so I don't know how busy it gets, but service was very fast and they have a ton of seats. Spare yourself from the White Castle next door and come here.

MHDgX4fHhuu5kWWjG7E1WQ.text: Whose your daddy?! Nacho Daddy! We walked over not expecting a dim, bar like atmosphere of a restaurant. Our server was super friendly! He seemed like he was the only waiter but he worked the room well. Hubby and I ordered chips and salsa, the naked grilled wings with BBQ sauce, and the trio street tacos: crab and lobster, shrimp, and the pork.  Pretty much everything was spicy - so we kept drinking water. The waiter couldn't refill our drinks fast enough - not his fault, but the food was delicious!!! I highly recommend the lobster & crab and the shrimp street taco. I wasn't expecting it to be so good, but it was. Our check arrived and it was less than $25- not bad at all.   Loved the atmosphere and vibe, the food, service and prices - I definitely recommend visiting if you are in the area!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Street tacos: lobster &amp; crab, shrimp, and pork

TkiY4HUU2meOHeyhhEbSuQ.text: Decent place. Kind of annoying all of the Golden Knights crap all over the place. Oh well. Nachos are fine.

NuCcnsNwVRQrJT-PrjESeg.text: Awesome nachos! I came here yesterday at the bar top, but today we had Dean as our server and he was great and made today that much better. Ask if Dean is working next time you come in

R41gTQ4GhgPQk2RLSlN9Hg.text: First time here and it did not disappoint. Had the best nachos ever!!! TINGA nachos with all the fixings, plenty of meat, plenty of beans fresh cheese, onions, it was on point. You can definitely share this as it was a huge portion. I even took the left overs back to our hotel and the bartender was super sweet and gave us fresh tortilla chips for my leftovers. This will my my to go spot on my future visits to Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DA76GDVO1GmqBlm2eRV7Rw.text: Awesome food, drinks, and customer service. I'll def be going back whenever I am in Vegas

IM0gIFT6_aESmjDSY0_Bng.text: If ever taking in the Fremont Experience,  venture down to Nacho Daddy... you won't be disappointed.  We were initially told the wait was 45 minutes, but got a text in 5 minutes letting us know that our seats were ready. Checking in on Yelp gets you a free regular margarita.  The wife wanted a fancier margarita,  so our server applied the cost of the free margarita to the one my wife wanted. Mark was our server,  who was great and very attentive. With a place called Nacho Daddy, how can you not try the nachos? We opted for ther filet mignon nachos which were super good. You get a healthy sized portion so it's nice and filling with lots of toppings.  We also tried the spicy grilled wings which were crazy hot and delicious. They were fire,  so if you like them hot definitely try those bad boys out.  They had multiple TVs so you can catch sporting events while you eat.  Overall we had an awesome experience,  and we will definitely come back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy grilled wings,  which were crazy hot and delicious
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos which were bomb
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Round 1 for me and the wife

ZXC-SoM1TrIKRmKITCtrrg.text: Nachos are one of my favorite foods and this spot has it ALL! So many different options to chose from. We ordered the Fiesta and it was awesome. Honestly their motto, "never a dry chip", is True. They load it all on! I also heard the thai chicken is to die for. I can't wait to be back and hope the franchise comes to California!

V2vYTbxqqJZXdly1DWToZw.text: Nacho daddy is a great choice any time of day but I love that this location stays open late for vegan party goers like myself. The vegan menu is large and plentiful everything I've tried is delicious Tex-mex style. Highly recommend the vegan chicken tacos, and the fajitas

kdtyxZK0LtlzWmbm8MFjqA.text: Really glad I saw this out of the corner of my eye. We ate the filet mignon nachos. They are piled are piled high with toppings, and seemed very fresh.   We sat outside, which was nice since it was dark out.   Took away a star because the hostess at the stand was not very personable, the service is SLOW, and there could have been a few more chips.

qh9XbSGrcj70LiUOtekRJQ.text: I was here 2018 new year i liked the nachos and this time again we did, veg one was so good than chicken. I would suggest get veg nachos.

jcl2FpCee5_ubKVXOramAQ.text: Good location... the service is pretty quick. Our server was very friendly. She didn't bother us too much. The chicken nachos were absolutely delicious. The chicken was juicy and flavorful. There was lots of meat and cheese. The guacamole was good on top... I should have ordered more guacamole. My only problem was the pitcher of strawberry margarita... it barely had alcohol in it but was super thick with strawberry flavoring... spend the extra money on additional tequila or just don't bother with the margaritas

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margaritas need more alcohol and less strawberry flavoring
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great atmosphere

hyk_j6kfyIntvu_ks1R7Kg.text: Started with house magaritas and queso which is a combo to be reckoned with. Rico was our server he made a few suggestions but we had our minds set. Wife ordered quesadilla and daughter ordered enchiladas and I had american tacos.  My wife and daughter ended up swapping entrees after their first bites. I wasn't too particular for the seasoning on my beef tacos kinda reminded me of taco bells beef.  I decided to finish my daughters quesadilla and tackle the tacos later. Overall experience was great the chips were homemade and were awesome with the queso and the side of refried beans served with our entrees. Our server was attentive to our wants and needs and offered great hospitable customer service.

0IbQiIOboAtVLIbMatBFDA.text: I have been waiting for the past hour and a half for my nacho that I ordered. I'm not sure if the bartender (Taeilor), who laughed at a guest for their drink order, forgot about it or not. The nacho themselves are great and well worth it, but the service is far from it. If you have all the time in the world to push back, this is your place; nevertheless, I hope this doesn't happen to you. I want this place to be great, but we have been forgotten, set aside, and felt like "we were lucky to be here." Again, I'm hoping this is an incident that's just got carried away....

BZ9uVdwPxn3-N2UYHjiTtw.text: Wonderful staff and service when we were there. Prices were pretty expensive for what I considered non authentic Mexican food but the portions were large. Food was surprisingly good!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

W74cQA1EGNSrAucr_a-HmA.text: Great place!!! Dean was awesome and helped us out with everything. 1000 precent recommend it!!!

MtxeE4WA1P8S56IFoSDEZw.text: Who would have thought nachos can taste this great!  I've had them at hotels and various other restaurants and they can't compete with nacho daddy. You can taste the use of high quality ingredients and they don't skimp on the portions either.  Very well worth the wait and great value for your buck. Tried the nachos of the month with the daddy margarita! Absolutely a great pair. Margarita was perfect and I'm not a usual margarita person. Not too strong, you can actually taste something besides the alcohol. And also tried the scorpion shot! It was great something not offered in other places in Vegas, that i know of yet. I like to chew the scorpion, unique texture for sure and you get extra tequila flavor when chewing. The tequila used in the shot is so smooth I would definitely get it again.  This is a must try spot for drinks and specially nachos!

ouMu8onbXx4Et7DRGWL4UA.text: It's great food, it's just too expensive. You can get anything made into nachos.. it's just too expensive. They would have more business if they lowered their prices. Don't people understand simple economics? You will get return customers if you lower the price.  Again.. if I haven't made myself clear, I would go more often if the prices were lower.

ZEOkX4V4kcGH1WXXlOrj9Q.text: I came just for the margaritas because I heard they were the best in town not impressed they had items on the menu that they didn't have anymore the bar tender didn't have enough margarita glasses so I had to get mines in the mason jar my enchilada nachos where cold and when I asked for queso and them to be heated the server never came back! Cool location might give another try

HxFm4InrJei_marsLjEdbQ.text: We had happy hour specials yesterday! Omg the vegan options and the margaritas were amazing! Super great staff also Sabrina was the best waitress!

UhCGV78mhSQ9WIdwU4ltHw.text: Aerrick was the bomb, full of energy and fast with a smile. Food was delicious, Margarita were made very well, I will come back next time I am in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy

Y2kBI5vfxqTrEm9v-iJHHA.text: Had Lunch here w/ my fiance for my bday. Awe-some service, good vibe and great food. The employees were very polite & accommodating. Not sure why the other rating are bad all I can say is experience them for yourself!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

AtbZygEtizmfqjcW2XAmug.text: note: this review is in regards to the Nacho Daddy stand at Life is Beautiful 2015. Friendly attractive man serving nachos is really fundamental to good timez. Wish I could call him my nacho daddy. At the very end of the second night we came back to again exchange cold hard cash for hot crispy chips, we were told, "sorry, we're only have free chips and salsa now." How dare they.  Chips are quality. salsa is fresh and a little hot. vegan nacho options = ***** (5 stars, not a 5 letter word). That never happens.   BUT they don't have beans? I don't eat meat but friend ordered gringo nachos and chicken nachos and both times said the meat was rubbery. no star for meat/lack of beans   so **** overall. but high fives all around.

qekJRrkHtBUPlrHc6MBTwQ.text: The Mexican street corn was DELICIOUS!! The nachos were also great. Highly recommend this restaurant!!

07A43LJ27o3t1ObyshBjeA.text: When I go to Vegas this place is on my list good food good service right off Fremont Street no $50.00 buffers for me and they keep my cheese dip warm with a little tea light candle

zEbZXlG5ugKOhPbngE5Hlg.text: This was a great place to have a plate of nachos. The helping was so large that two of us couldn't finish it - we were stuffed. Every bite had toppings on it. I would definitely go back again. You get a free margarita with a yelp check in when you order an entree.

tkMSTgog3VN8yfTd5LnFWg.text: Ariel, was a terrific bartender. Not only did she know her craft she was very friendly and kind. Also gave information on way to go. Love Ariel!!!

llX5lmRpdghfD6h5CHzKLg.text: Omg. Soooo good. Had the Thai nachos. With Pacifico?! Can't get any better! Ariel gave us great food recommendations. Great place!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Tc-ky08ba3Zxt6Q2FLqLvQ.text: Yuuuuummm!!!! The chicken Nachos were soooo... good! The Mexican Candy Margarita was good. I checked in and got my free house margarita and that too was good.  The nachos tho! Oh my! Yuuummm!! If you're into ceviche... bomb! Thank you!!!

zdgFgTK3jwnztrCyaYbyvQ.text: What a cute place, one step off the beaten path but oh so worth it.  On this super hot day the staff was great!  They gave our kiddo a coloring may and some mustaches which we of course wore!   Nice waitress and suggested the Guava Margarita and its was spot on yum!   Food was good too, I'm from NM and struggle to find ground beef in Mexican joints but your enchiladas were fantastic! Oh and I totally want to come back for the cute t-shirt that said Buenos Nachos!  Funny!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Playing with our Mustaches at Nacho Daddy!

lLlocjSs0GWbXIEEi7yF5Q.text: My wife loves Nachos! So of course when we stayed on Fremont st. We had to check this place out. Fast, friendly service. Good drinks and the Huevos Rancheros and Enchilada Nachos were awesome! Definitely coming back.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Buried under that heaping pile of delicious salsa is an even more delicious pile of huevos rancheros!
