2IjWWHASgOTAopXEAR7aog.text: I have been going to Nacho Daddy for a few years now and have never been disappointed!  The downtown location is smaller and more noisy than the Summerlin location, but it's a fun atmosphere and easy to find if you're down on Fremont Street.  They offer a good selection of margaritas, from sweet to classic flavors.  I always go with Daddy's margarita and it is probably my favorite margarita I've discovered in town!  Very refreshing and flavorful!  Of course, they specialize in nachos but they also offer other classic Mexican food plates from fajitas to enchiladas and tacos.  I have tried quite a few of the nacho plates and my favorite is the Thai chicken nacho!!  It's packed with flavor and has just the right amount of spiciness to it!  Our waiter Dean was very attentive and polite.  We came in on Friday night for National Margarita Day and the Golden Knights game so the place was very busy. Dean still managed all of his tables with great service while training a new waiter, props to him!  You will not be disappointed if you choose to come here for dinner or just to have a margarita at the bar.  This will definitely not be my last time returning to Nacho Daddy!

ml2ME9sNNH52R9c3RJz6Qg.text: The margaritas are good, but where they really get you is those chips and salsa   Rica is a great server. Friendly, prompt, and helpful (even at 2:15am).  I got the Thai Chicken Nachos, which was an amazing recommendation. Not too spicy, but it did have green chips that I wasn't a fan of.  I will say that the portions are big, so keep that in mind when ordering.

wqmMuTOHiJJtjifupBFviA.text: Excellent salsa. Seriously the best salsa. Also, the salsa is wicked awesome on the enchilada nachos! Wash it down with a Union Jack IPA. This is the best Nacho Daddy I've been to. Ask for Rico. He's the man.

MNdYjq_B-sHiOwMkLXQJMw.text: Best nachos in town the chicken tinga are my favorite great environment and good drinks

LWXcTDmqMSApnlP5QCC8bw.text: I hate to give a negative review, because the staff was super-friendly and accommodating. However, when you go out to eat, the goal is, you know, to EAT. And when you go to a place called NACHO Daddy, you kinda expect the nachos to be great. Unfortunately, their nachos were average at best.  As any nacho aficionado will tell you, great nachos start with great chips. Nacho Daddy advertises home made chips, but they sure didn't taste home made, or if they were home made, they need a new recipe. The chips were dry, flavorless, lacking in salt, overly thick, just meh chips. The next aspect of great nachos is that after assembling all the ingredients, the whole thing needs to be baked in a HOT oven, preferably on a cast iron platter, so the cheese melts everywhere, causing the chips to become burned around the edges and stick together in a gooey mess. When it first arrives on your table, it should be too hot to touch and you should have to use a fork to pull a chunk of nachos off the hot platter onto your plate, causing hot steam to be released.  Unfortunately, Nacho Daddy doesn't seem to get any of this. It looked like they piled some chips on a serving plate, then covered the chips with some type of crappy yellow cheese, I guess Cheeze Whiz, then added the other ingredients on top, skipping the step where you're supposed to bake the whole thing in the oven to melt it all together. It wasn't served particularly hot, the cheese wasn't really melted, nor was it good-quality cheese. Great nachos use cheddar, not some yellow fake cheese squeezed out of a bottle. The rest of the ingredients were just OK. The ground beef was acceptable, but the guac was nothing special, tasted like it came out of a jar. The portion size was fairly large, enough for two people, but really for $18.50, considering the low-quality ingredients and the mediocre preparation, it was kind of a ripoff.  There are so many great Mexican restaurants in Vegas, so there's no reason to go to Nacho Daddy for half-baked nachos, pun intended. I do want to end this overall negative review on a positive note by reiterating that the staff was amazing. Both the girl who seated us and the gentleman who waited on us were extremely friendly and polite. I wish I could have been more enthusiastic about the food.

9DNXVgGrB0TR3A98abZBYg.text: Nacchooooo Dadddyyyyyyy!!! Love eating here! The food is just amazing! I ordered Nacho Average Burger Nacho (with no onions) and I devour it every time! Food is amazingly fresh, service is really fast and staff is very friendly. The wait to get seated could take a while even when it seems there's not a lot of people, I opt to sit at the bar and order since I also get a full menu. Prices are reasonable and food is very filling! Margaritas are a must! Cheers!

O1_leDa5llUQufzT4sP03A.text: So yummy!!! Came here a little over a year ago and am hoping to swing by on my next trip. It was super packed but the service was very quick and the servers were extremely attentive. The lobster nachos were soooo freaking good! I love nachos, and I love lobster but I wasn't sure if I'd enjoy the combination so I was pleasantly surprised!! I couldn't stop eating them haha we also got the 4 cheese nachos which were simple and yummy. Everything on their menu looked so good so I think we're gonna come back and explore their other options!

H0GinSQXhY4AiItLkvereA.text: While I had to say that our service was pretty outstanding, I was really underwhelmed by my meal here, which is a bummer.   Tip- check in on Yelp to get a free house margarita. It's smaller than the one you'd get it you'd order it on your own, but c'mon, it's free.  We were sat at a table by the bar and our waiter began his magic. Taking drink orders. Convincing my friend to do that $20 scorpion shot, which she said she enjoyed. None for me, please and thank you. I got my free margarita and an Iced tea- the marg was amazing, the iced tea was not.  I ordered the triple dipper for the table. The guacamole was a little tough to dip into. The queso I thought was out of this world, and the salsa was alright. Spicy for being a ild salsa and we were able to get free refills of the chips because I think I ate an entire basket of myself.  Note- my advice after eating here is to get the nachos. Whatever kind. I'd see them pass by me and I'd think, "dammit, I should have ordered that!" Every freaking time. There wasn't one that looked bad, so that was my error.  I actually got their seafood enchilada combo. The refried beans to me were too runny. The rice was dry and the enchiladas had no real flavor to them. I took a few bites and smooshed everything around to make it seem like I ate more than I did. I didn't want to be one of those, "please return this and order me something else, please" people. So I ate what I could before my stomach revolted agains me and called it again.  I'd give this place another chance, but I know now what to order and what to stay clear of. With name like, "nacho daddy" there shouldn't be anything else on the menu BUT nachos. Live and learn, Andy. Live and learn.  But if nothing else, I learned that I love their margaritas. Especially the strawberry flavored ones.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LjiE_1MzcQDSiElQD6CELg.text: First of all...great marketing on the name ND! Catchy and definitely brings in curious customers.  On our first visit to Old Vegas, my niece and nephew recommended that we "experience" ND for the nachos. I'm not a huge Mexican food fan due to my restricted diet. But fear not, there's burgers! Yea! And All Day Breakfast!  We shared the mound of nacho. It was great- super crunchy! I got the bacon burger, it was done perfect! Juicy and the bacon was an added crunchy goodness! The taco....an absolute must have, must share....if you feel generous! Ohhhh and the margaritas...a MUST have!  ...I do love my margaritas!!! We'll be back, Daddy!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The juiciest, most flavorful filet soft taco ever!! Kudos ND!
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Don&#39;t judge... It&#39;s my birthday weekend! I&#39;m a lightweight! But these were soooo good!
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yikes! Spicy goodness, my tummy will hate me for...soon!

Yo9CFRIQduRe05h-YlPlnA.text: Nachos are perhaps my favorite food on this earth and this place does not disappoint. Ever.  Came in around 8pm on a Monday night and our party of 2 waited less than 5 minutes for a table. Place was pretty full for a Monday night, but - it's Vegas so every night is Saturday night!  Our server Rico was excellent. Friendly but not overbearing. The vibe is very chill, but solid as are the margs. Checked in on Yelp and got a free house margagrita!  Make sure this is on your to do list if you're in the Fremont Street area! If you like Mexican, fresh food, solid service and a good vibe this is your spot.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bar area
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My free house margarita from Yelp check in
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta nachos

GUY2BSnGSXGtWNSIMHpr2Q.text: My husband ate his entire nacho plate, which was probably a mistake because he was bloated and sleepy the rest of the night. I got the seafood enchilada (delicious) and fish taco combo? The fish taco was way too spicy and the tortilla was doughy and undercooked. But I would order the seafood enchiladas again in a heartbeat.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Swag box.

dSyldpiBZKG6U0x9tsA-Zg.text: Pros:  excellent menu options; excellent drink options; food is solid and interesting; and an excellent hostess who was totally on point and was rocking her job like a pro.  Cons: pseudo shady location (derelicts sleeping on the sidewalk near the front door does not a good first impression make) close to Fremont; oppressively loud music (if you're trying to attract the outdoor audience, maybe figure out a separate volume section for indoor and outdoor); the free margarita for checking in the first time should actually taste like a margarita and not just sour mix with salt on the rim; the server station is covered in dirt/dust that obviously doesn't get cleaned up terribly often (finger spots in the dust with dust on top suggests such); dirty attire on the service staff; and an overly crowded seating arrangement to accommodate a small dining area.   There's worse places to go. But there's also better.

gBdwDcgeyKvwUEE6CtFMTw.text: Service was so slow and it was not busy at all. Served our food and never asked if it was ok, good or that the order was correct.  Then cabbage shreds were placed on top of my Vegan Fajita bowl.  It ruined it!!! No where in the menu does it state cabbage topping, it states cilantro!!!  Like WTF?  25 minutes later, our server dropped the bill again without saying anything. Unbelievable and terrible service. I went to the restroom and one of the servers was in there on her phone, going on and on. Come on, it's a restroom. Customers do not want to know your business.

fO3438zJE2p7jWpYsNI2aw.text: I loved it and absolutely the best service!!! The scorpion shot is a must plus you get to keep the shot glass! Don't worry it doesn't bite

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Up close
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shot

h5SNWS_Rt1ixdGe_wGmJ2g.text: Everything here was soo bomb! Worth the price, the services was great! The drinks where just strong enough! I really cant wait to go back

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy shrimp nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Blood orange margarita!

iUr9KIxJieQScS2n_jgKhg.text: This was our last stop before leaving Vegas. It was such an awesome find from Yelp. The House Margherita was good the food was excellent and very large portions. I had the chicken nachos which I loved my husband had the taco and enchiladas combo. He truly loved the taco but the enchiladas needed  more sauce. Also, my husband had a Scorpion Shot...which he enjoyed. We will be back for some more NACHOS for sure...

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chick&#39;n Nacho

U2Xuxn3e-JNILlGSnMiIBw.text: Bryson is so polite, well groomed, well mannered and all about great customer service. Such a great asset to their team. Thank you Bryson for showing what REAL CUSTOMER SERVICE is ... we had a great time at Nacho Daddy and we will be back soon

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

6FgfaXBehfAxdbq30W-0Aw.text: This is for 04/30 Tuesday! They have Taco special three Street Tacos for $5.00! Beef, Chicken and Ground  Beef..! And they 2 for 1 Tequila shots on Tuesday! And they new Nacho of the Month now! And this month is Chimichurri Steak Nachos and you get Jalapeno Margarita for $10.00! I ordered all their specials..! They sure give you a lot of food..! The service was always good! Taco Tuesday is a must for Vegas trip, for us..'

x0GyVRAUGg7ybSMEzbGISw.text: Some of the best food in Vegas.  We ordered the buffalo wings with blue cheese, (suppppper yummy!) The lobster nachos, and the shrimp!   The white peach margarita is super yummy and not too sweet!   The staff is nice and the environment is super fun and lively :)

vsojk8_Ic1Gd0Vn6fPJh4g.text: Despite being a Vegas local, tonight was my first time here. I'll be honest, I wasn't too impressed. I travel a lot for business so I'm always experiencing restaurants and tonight they just missed the mark for me. I ordered the fajita bowl and paid an extra $4 to upgrade from chicken to steak. Unfortunately, there were only a couple pieces of filet, which I found to be unfair as there is an extra charge and also just unfair in general, disappointed there. When I went to take a bite, I got a big bite of warm food and a part that was ice cold, had to send my food back. Initially when I got my food, it came with a side of rice, which I mixed into my bowl. When the new bowl came back out, no side of rice but they put the rice in themselves and it was a very small amount.  Beans have a cinnamon/sweet undertone that I wasn't a huge fan of.  Maybe tonight was an off night...  Bartenders were kind, offered me a free drink but I'm not looking for handouts, just a great food and atmosphere experience, but I did appreciate the offer for sure.   I didn't eat more than a few bites of my new bowl, took it to go because I just wasn't a fan, my boyfriend said he would eat it as we don't like food to go to waste.  Then to end my experience, they charged me double for the bowl.   I don't think I'll be back :/

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Charged twice

4PuxSdZaf-k7jAXs-KxLag.text: Great food,great service,great atmosphere! Great selection! Wings Where GOOD AND THE Nachos Where huge! Kids eat free on Mondays!

qOgmdIod18iHnEz7AlW9Ng.text: Great food and service!   You can tell this is actually a chef making food because of the flavors.  Gotta try and they have happy hour 3-6 and decent prices!

LTlKtAyN1wNRe-13XuFCCg.text: This place is just ok.  Pretty typical food, really nothing special.  It's located off the normal path but not far from Fremont Street Experience.  I had the Thai Chicken Nachos (sorry no picture) and they were very bland, I would have thought there would have been more "kabow" to them.  Hubby had the cheese enchiladas and they were average.  Service was meh, it wasn't busy.  There were four employees just standing over on one side of the restaurant playing on their cell phones while Hubby and I were ignored on more than one occasion. Expect to be charged for every little thing.  Nachos didn't come with salsa, I was charged $2 they didn't come with jalapenos so I asked for pickled and was charged $1.50.  Hubby was charged $1.50 for a side of two corn tortillas.  I know the profit margin on Mexican food, there is no need for all of the minuscule charges.  We won't be back, plenty of other good places on or near Freemont with good food.  Keep Yelpin Y'all!

tcGvE8WKehl5aNYSchZE3Q.text: I can't say I hate it but I can say I probably won't ever go back.  The service wasn't too bad until we tried to pay. It's like they didn't want to take our money.  The drinks were good as was the queso dip. The food came out in a decent amount of time.  BUT  The nachos were horrible. The meat on them was not even seasoned. That was disappointing, bad nachos at a place called Nacho Daddy? The shrimp taco could have been great if the shrimp wasn't undercooked or so greasy. You couldn't even pick it up without it falling everywhere.

IGq-XQhPlH4fkvWYLGxXfw.text: Good nachos and good margaritas. Great deals for HH. Not sure I would come here otherwise. The HH food offerings are cheap and tasty. Definately not authentic or high quality. The place has a "fast food" feel to it. Good for a quick late night meal.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho&#34;s Supreme

DMRVLpV48DEllyeXXLQBeA.text: First off I must say the staff here is amazing! Nice, friendly, and fun to talk with. The queso dip and the nacho dishes are all must haves!  Now for my 2 big gripes about the place.   First, the worst margaritas in Vegas. They are so incredibly sweet, it's actually undrinkable. I can't believe they claim they are voted the best in town and I am shocked they haven't changed the recipe after the feedback I've heard from other people that have had them.   Secondly, it seems they always have the giant front roll up door open even on extremely hot days. If your going there between may and August, be ready to sweat! Not the best environment for enjoying a nice lunch or dinner.   If you stick with the ice cold beer they offer and go either at night, or in the fall/winter, you will have a 5 star experience!

7o_-6OQ-f46vcDR-yJ-Ezg.text: We went to Nacho daddy solely for the name. I ASSUMED theyd have every type of nacho you could think of. I was wrong. The nachos were honestly just a fully loaded taco bell nacho plate. But the wings were AMAZING i will say that!

gRPRT1wBkbvoO6xGp0krSg.text: I really enjoyed the food & vibe at nacho daddy's. Food was good Loren ,Angie & staff are top notch!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho Daddy- super daddy tacos &amp; a bacon breakfast  burrito.

dS_J88TV_RXYVp6D4j10FA.text: This place is great!!!  Loved the food and loved our server Luis!!  We were visiting from Phoenix and wanted some good Mexican food.  We just happened upon nacho daddy...and could not be happier with the experience!!!thanks Luis!!!! And thanks to the manager who treated us to t-shirts!!

lVVPX0C-vXdNMB69h_S2Nw.text: Nacho has the best flat iron steak, but it's the people who work here that keeps us coming back for more! Thank you Courtney for being an awesome bartender and keeping on top of the service!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. At the bar with the boys for lunch!

vrtc4AB5rnXqnbdASqpz3A.text: Found a menu in our hotel room & decided to try it out since they deliver.  Food was good, much better than going to a fast food joint ..more like something you would make at home.  Loved how they went the extra mile since there are no vending machines & gave us ice water.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

s6CQXQ5ZuxLUJ5jRTxu-hA.text: I always stop in late night on my break and the bartender Gee is awesome. Always remembers to give me my indi card hook up for being in the industry. She's fast, accurate and doesn't forget a thing. This place has amazing food for down-towners. Kudos!!!!!

JLBJJ4UUuJ38SnlWvZ8HhQ.text: Came to Nacho Daddy for the scorpion shot. Ended up getting food and it was so good. The nacho starter plates are HUGE and the queso burrito was so good.  Our server was pretty awesome.

-n4kQN7EGJY46JkgWh8mOA.text: We were 2 people and we ordered 2 nachos and a michilada picture. Both nachos were pretty good and more than filling. I really liked the michilada but it was bit spicy for my friend.

xtc_klkjRcobwvjqLB-LQQ.text: Very good food, good service and nice place all around. I got the BBQ nachos and really liked them. However, it's kind of expensive (as is most of the food in Vegas, I found!)- I never thought I would spend $15 on nachos. Still, it was very good food for the downtown area. We ran into quite a bit of bad food on our trip, this place being the big exception.

-s0dSJk_yl-_x8cvb6HI0Q.text: On the outside it looks like a dingy party bar, but the food here is amazing. We got breakfast here and it was ridiculously good. Also, all day breakfast is a huge plus in my book. The coffee was pricier than some places, but it was amazing and you get your own French press. I want to come back and try their drinks, because they sounded amazing.

-ZSDQo24qR5SZ1E7mDWPSQ.text: Here tonight with sis and fam visiting from U.K. Had Fiesta and Supreme Nachos. Food and service were excellent! Convenient location and fast serving. Next time in LV, will come here again for all things nacho....

lPJig0sBg3889uI0OGvJuA.text: I had the Thai chicken nachos and they were seriously phenomenal!!! Soooo much flavor and and little bit of a kick too! Really good!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. OMG sooooooooo good Thai chicken nachos are seriously amazing

AzpxZJuiTgKzB84EJ5Tozw.text: Yummo! There's a vegan section on the menu - not just a couple of options. The portions are large - plenty of food for my husband's healthy appetite. The omnivores we dined with were pleased as well. One requested non-spicy chicken tacos. Everything else has a kick. This is perfectly located right off of the Fremont Street Experience in downtown Las Vegas. This place will be on our lunch spot list every time we go to Vegas.

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Tex-Mex Burrito
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Nachos

vjeC5IMLm9L9w74enpXhLA.text: Neat little joint, fresh food, incredible service, BLAH BLAH BLAH  Yeah yeah, you get the point.  Come here for one of their special margaritas. When it says they are hand crafted, I absolutely shit you not they are COMPLETELY TOTALLY ABSOLUTELY ONE HUNDRED PERCENT HAND FREAKING CRAFTED. Total love and care go into each special glass, in addition to decent mixed-drink tequila and house-made mixers. And they are super delicious! Totally worth the price you pay. Even the simple house margarita blows all others out of the water, by far.  Our bartender was a god among men. He never EVER stopped working -- from fulfilling table orders, to bussing areas, to restocking and cleaning the bar area, to serving our awesome drinks. Just a stud.  Yes, btw, I did the Scorpion Shot for a discounted t-shirt. LOL and managed to crack myself up scaring a few out-of-towners in the process.  OOT: Did you do that scorpion thing? me: I sure did! I think I've got a good two, maybe three hours before the venom kicks in though, so I feel great!

jeX45U4oSlz8FwIL6x3l9w.text: Food and service were great.  Our server Chris was amazingly friendly.   Try the skinny margarita and the Thai nachos.  Will come back next time we visit.  The scorpion shots were like a mezcal larva, but slightly more robust.

9zgEzTQ-Rsc0u9Axt1Wl_A.text: Perfect lunch spot. Split an order of fiesta nachos with my friend and it was just the right amount. The free margarita was strong af so if u wanna good strong drink for free this is your place. Fast friendly service. Just an all around great spot

1mGhTP76QFSXFEHdrGqq6w.text: Took around 10-15 minutes to get noticed after being seated however our waiter apologized and was kind enough to upgrade our drinks. I had the Nacho's Supreme with beef they were on point! My husband got the crab Nacho's and my mom ordered the chicken fiesta Nacho's. So glad we came here we will definitely be back next time we are in Vegas!!!

jqbwvtDlGam0McBwuycFqw.text: The corn, fajitas, nachos fiesta and naked wings are amazing   Services was great as well

Dma5dTpOcnCeSuSCu4W0BA.text: The food is great and the service is not bad. A place to add to our list for future visits. Will definitely come back.  FIESTA NACHO and TORTILLA SOUP....just one one... A-M-A-Z-I-N-G!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. FIESTA NACHO...so good the plate is empty. Never have we left a nacho plate like this, and we love nachos. The picture says it all.

KZgZ1B19lWRXNkBH_y63Lw.text: Really enjoyed the food here, but the shrimp nachos skimped on shrimp, we will be back tho just wont order the shrimp nachos again! My hubby had the seafood enchiladas which were real good and I had the street avocado and fish tacos and we also had the churro sundae which was also the bomb!!

CchR8lOlypsejX52oU8xKQ.text: What the hell is a place that specializes in Nachos.  You have to experience it to believe it.  I had the Thai Nachos with spinach chips and they were healthy and good.  Others had cheeseburger Nachos plus everyone had many different kinds, all of which were delicious.  Use your Yelp ap and you get a free Margurita with the order of Nachos.   I, a local would, would bring guests there anytime we are downtown.  It's a full meal. Prices are not bad.

yaNxOrGypTuMVDSsHrLjPg.text: Great food servers did a wonderful job well at least mine did great... we had the super nachos and boy they definitely where super and I got a burger it was great !!! I would say this is one of the best restaurants I've been to down here on Fremont street! I Recommend if you like nice price drinks and great food go here

kS1XaYk1KVOoiBAeMaXPSQ.text: Great place to hang out with friends. Friendly service. Large selection of margaritas. Known for the margaritas and nachos. Ordered the sloppy Joe nachos and is enough for 2. It's really good and they sure do not skimp in the meat. There seemed to be more meat than nachos though. Because the meat is in the saltier side, the fish can use more chips to balance the flavors.  Worth trying. It's a bit off of the main street... nice place to go with friends to share nachos and enjoy alcohol. Our server was really friendly to us even though we only ordered one item and one alcohol.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sloppy Joe nachos.
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Extensive menu. Lots to choose from.

6q0uuosIZiG6l5LUfmJ2fg.text: The apps...ceviche and Mexican corn was delicious. We enjoyed the crab & lobster nachos. It was enough for 2 to split. There was plenty of crab & lobster on it. The service was good too. Especially, enjoyed the 80's music playing. The only negative is the fly we kept having to shoo off

K6EcxhFonQ_fbwszK3z7dw.text: Great food, drinks, and service. We had a great meal while visiting the Fremont area with a group of five.

QuwZqIX29l5ZKEDCZLNWZg.text: Bartender was very nice and friendly. Tasty house margarita. Only ordered the flaming shrimp appetizer (ok, flavor good, shrimp little rubbery) and the filet mignon nachos (decent size, just not enough meat) Overall taste was fine, but not worth going out of my way for. Probably a great place for cool drinks and a little nosh. But, as a tourist, not really worth seeking out.

ulQ4m_9FZSH4aR78_wb-ZA.text: If you have a mild to acute obsession with nachos, this place is your heaven. Just a few steps away from the hustle and bustle of Fremont, this place is worth going off the beaten path (but really, it's very close to the action!!!).   Upon entering we sat ourselves and were promptly given menus and served waters. We ordered a small white queso which is served atop a small candle to keep the cheesiness smooth. Brilliant!   Their menu is extensive, but why order anything but nachos? We went for the potato nachos and the filet mignon nachos. The potato nachos are served on actual potato chips- I was expecting potato chunks on chips but oh well...what I got was okay. The filet mignon nacho plate was insane. It was way too much for one person, so order wisely! The steak was delicious as were all the other trimmings.   Service during the meal was great. We never felt neglected and our water glasses were kept full the entire meal.   I would definitely come back here to try more menu items as well as drinks, and will recommend it to friends heading downtown.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Potato nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. White Queso served over a candle so it doesn&#39;t get thick!

f7viv4fhQSrXo7M3mHOKDA.text: We went here on our last night in Vegas while checking out the Fremont Street vibe and it was amazing. Our server Zeke set us up and took great care of us. We started with an order of the traditional nachos and later ordered a mixed fajita plate. They come to your table and set it on fire for you and I was all about it. He even prepped us so we could instagram it! Loved the food/vibe/service.

d3erHOGD8mqky09duFgUpw.text: The food was SUPER TASTY and surprisingly inexpensive. The environment is a loud, party atmosphere, so don't head here if you're looking for a quiet meal. It's super fun though and I highly recommend it!

yCnt-Dd_Yb-FYgP2mmmbAw.text: The fajitas were great. Perfect late night dinner. Service was good! The food really hit the spot. Wasn't expecting the food to be so delicious. We will come back.

kmyeeicMqqfMIQbmGGW82g.text: Great food and great service! The house margarita is delicious! We had the nachos, the shrimp, the daddy's wings, and the quesadilla and YUM to EVERYTHING!!!! I will definitely be back again!!!!!

xzLoxi0s-UJN1yngeYGGMw.text: Food was delicious. Huge portions. We shared the tostada nachos. Excellent! We sat at the bar. Justin, the bartender, was very personable and attentative!!

YfX0ncnknIUXTI3H4Qn7Fg.text: On point! Service, drinks, and food! Definitely coming back. Hopefully Ariel is working again she's great!

S30hwwvEL6Yt1zGihZmU2A.text: The ABSOLUTE BEST Nacho Supreme I've ever had. This place was amazing. Great tacos,...Fiesta Chicken was awesome as well The service was "next to no other" , our server, Brittany was charming, super friendly and was a top-notch waiter! We will definitely be revisiting Nacho Daddy again any time we return to Vegas area!!

zqG0-bv7aHw_-hbSzpC40g.text: I went in yesterday and placed a take out order and I obviously was in a rush so I didn't check all 3 of my orders which had ingredients missing or had ingredients I specifically asked not to have. I called the store location just to notify them to check the orders next time and they kindly offered to refund me for the entire bill. Besides the food still being good the workers were absolutely polite and generous and for that they get 5 stars!

CYPNnAgiXUiE9B_bhEJQdQ.text: Any menu that has street corn gets 4 stars in my book. The food is always good and the service is decent. The prices are a little high but the portions are HUGE!!! So overall it all works out. :)  BTW: If you don't like tomato soup.. don't get the tortilla soup. It was tomato soup with chicken in it. I would not reccomend that. The buffalo chicken queso is AMAZING!

f8_ftLulk7Up_urZs1tg2Q.text: If I could give a zero I would, sitting here still waiting on the check. Their food is terrible and it turns into the Goonies ship as you wait for the check. Go to Taco Bell at least you know  can eat and poop yourself in less time than it takes to get your food here

4mlCQOFB_EeYGmLl69A3DA.text: Bartender Griffin is awesome if you go to the Fremont location make sure you get him he is awesome and full of energy...

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

IaTUN4PfohdtLW7HUdN5SA.text: Jay. He I introduced himself as the manager... We showed up at 1:59 on 9/21/15 and he refused us service. There were several people still at the bar, as well as, ordering food. He informed us the kitchen was closed and refused to serve us.   I would love to try this place, but due to the horrible management I honestly will NOT return.

Qg_1NwH7RczlnotNDOTOIA.text: Nacho Daddy downtown is the best place to eat the staff was very friendly and courteous and the food was bodacious good tacos the bloody Mary's were oof the hook good stuff I Wil tell all my friends about this great place to eat at!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

p280C75txR05cDE3o8vgbg.text: Had a great experience!!! Guistina was really nice she was our waiter!! make sure that you guys come a take your scorpion shot!!!!!!

UodoHVwq57Ai05FHEi9rPQ.text: Tequila!!! What do you want they have it especially my favorite Casa Azule. And the nachos, you won't complain.

KpL5auyAMJ-tMDYebhC-jg.text: My girlfriend raved about this place and was very adamant that we eat here.  There was a long wait outside, which was kind of the hostesses fault.  Unsure why, maybe lack of staffing on NASCAR weekend. It is a very fun atmosphere and quite a few patrons surrounding the round bar looked like they were having a load of fun! Our waiter was excellent, he gave totally great service and was fun to talk with.  We ordered margaritas, because why wouldn't we? They were just average, nothing to write home about.  We decided to split one of there nacho plates.  I am not saying they weren't good, but when your name is Nacho Daddy I expect them to fulfill the name.  Ours had very little stuff on top and something seemed not right with the cheese.  Any how, it was cheap and I believe more of a 20's crowd would absolutely love it.

i7NFAID89Se4-Qlt6gE4Ew.text: The manager kali was so profesional when helping us. She took very good care of us very impressed with the managarment staff at this  location. She really cared about our experience. Dean the server is excellent very nice guy.

fZ1y6lfr6UFsc--a5V4glw.text: This place gets four stars because:  1. VEGAN OPTIONS- nachos, tacos, burritos, salads on point.  * I believe they use daiya cheese which is not my fave but acceptable :)  2. Great Service- I came in with my boyfriend expecting only him and I to be eating, I received a call that four other people were coming to eat with us. On the very busy night we went the waitress finagled us a table! This was highly appreciated.  3. Waitress(es) took chips and salsa off of our bill due to the business and semi-slow service, again much appreciated  4. The only thing that irked me was the lack of space! Nacho Daddy needs to expand that location.   All in all I had a great time

YhWFKK57tjQ1GfNOtUyebg.text: This place. Guys.....this place.  Nachos. Beer. Suns beating the Kings(currently) and of course, the two and only, Grifstina power couple behind the bar. You can't beat it.  We got the Thai chicken nachos and you really have to.....Thai.....these! (Get it?!)  Seriously though, it's a great spot with great food, great beer and atmosphere to match. Wander off Fremont and stop in.

z07sp507u88uLOWOSLCrkQ.text: I understand why Nacho Daddy was voted for best margaritas, their spicy blood orange margarita was not only amazing but it's something you can't get anywhere else! Amazing team, Alex was awesome at taking care of us and super friendly! She recommended the Thai chicken nachos and they were delicious. We will be back to see her and her margaritas! Thanks nacho daddy for a great experience down town.

HKh0OhtjS4L4oIMlqvLSKA.text: Great customer service...  Bridget is awesome, funny, if you can dish it out... Be ready to take it...

Gp4J8gLuvodoq5LvZCLigA.text: The atmosphere is amazing here the food was delicious but what blew my mind was the fantastic customer service I got from our waiter it was my 21st birthday and jovanny was super friendly, amazing, and just a great server over all I will definitely be back

fl8jFDdhNgrWVpC9UE88Cw.text: We ordered the supreme tostada nachos, which was good, and enough for two people to eat. We also ordered the house margarita. If you like sweet margaritas don't get the house margarita, get the fruity one.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nachos

z9g1XKgfclKKgAOssyUGnA.text: Nacho Daddy gets 5 stars for a dedicated vegan menu and fantastic margaritas. For anyone that doesn't eat dairy, their vegan queso is delicious! The price is right and the portions are absolutely massive. You could very easily split an entree and still take home leftovers. Recommend!

f9jjRvUyja6iiVMwxJy0Mg.text: Checked this place out while exploring downtown and hit the jackpot!  Service by Mikey was excellent.  Street tacos were delicious,  and my Thai basil Margarita was perfect. I will be back!

x9R9L-l-OXNGgiOXEsr8Wg.text: Cool restaurant to have a meal at 1am. Stopped in to have a few more drinks and a quick meal. My wife and I were surprised that the food as actually really good with a distinct style.  Service was friendly and fast. Atmosphere was inviting and relaxed. It was just what we needed to take a break from the Fremont st experience crowd.

CWK9Ng3T8DtopZv1nmjWUA.text: K, this is a tough review. Showed up at halftime of mnf. First the food was not bad tho we just had apps. The staff was nice and friendly. They even turned the sound of the game on for us. So having a decent time. But then, she came in like a wrecking ball. An off duty nacho daddy bartender with fire red hair that was a 1 person megaphone! Annoying, loud, obnoxious. Almost put her finger in my beer and musta thought we were all there for her cause she was at the top of her lungs the whole damn time. We moved to the other side of the bar and what do ya know-she followed us. We could not escape. She was gonna blow our eardrums out and with only 2 min left in the game we had to sit there and take it. Then, to our rescue, one of the bartenders seeing our despair called firey red to the other side of the bar. But she only made it halfway before she found someone else to scream at. We woulda enjoyed it much more as the staff girls were nice and lots of tv's. But lil red ryder blew our time to hell. Since she works there we prob wont go back as i assume thats her watering hole to. Wont discourage anyone from going, but when you get to the corner of 4th & fremont, and you here a loud obnoxious sound coming from nacho daddys, keep walking cause someones getting their firetruck on and wailing away

99qzGgOhthml8tcOJaE11A.text: We were in Nacho Daddy the other day. We had a great time. Very impressed with Anya's knowledge of tequilas, I'm  not very familiar with different kinds of tequila, Anya suggested her favorite, Don Julio 1942. I never thought I'd  be a tequila drinker!!! Thanks Anya,  next time we are in town  we'll visit.

ocCCn4Cg7U3fcyt73cnQ5A.text: Fantastic margaritas. Great service; Courtney is the bomb. Apparently I have to write more.  I like going to Vegas. They have tequila on tap, that's just amazing. They're just around the corner from Fremont street and well worth it..

n3_p1hQJ_pnMGx3uWrRDJA.text: Dean is the best! He is a respectful and accommodating server! Best bartender goes to Kimmie! This staff is five stars and food is SOOO good!

wmljcMGDzI8sYwo6KvaU1A.text: Love the pulled pork nachos.  So glad they now have a lunch portion that is a little cheaper.  We also had a blast with the mixer coke machine.  Now all of your weird tastes can be fulfilled.  Bonus.  We sat next to Tony Hsieh on our last outing.

SHWALuXLkfbBBrFYxbWeLQ.text: Way too much cheese in the burritos. Cheese also not melted.  Tortillas borderline stale.    They also have hamburgers on the menu...which was the first red flag.  Do yourself a favor and stay away.

_SDOF96WXGfi3-emabrNZg.text: Nachos were great as they should be for the name of the restaurant. Margaritas were well made. The reason for three stars is because of the price for the value of the food and our dumb server.

TSduUaLRPqU2vUAcLonSKQ.text: Happy hour Monday-Saturday 3-6. The Mexican corn is to die for. And specialty margaritas are a MUST have. The spicy cucumber margarita is my favorite!!! Courtney is the BEST!!!!

DZ7R44bH1TrVhzgwD9wHYg.text: Food was so good & service was friendly and great. The pork taco was super delicious. Nice tequila selection as well!!

JpJHYdRccL69PLTV8b_gtw.text: This was by far the shittiest service in vegas! (And I live here) so that says a lot! We literally had to go up to the bar ourselves after waiting about 10 minutes for the beer we asked for twice! Also the bartender seemed to have a terrible attitude and often ignored us, that is why we left to a table hoping for better service.. The food was mediocre.. I still left a tip just to be courteous but on my way home was regretting it! Will definitely NEVER be back!!! If I could leave a smaller rating I would! The only people who were attentive were the blonde with "sancha" on her name tag, and the guy with the cool mustache who helped us out more than our server. Not sure if he was a cook or waiter.

oxr9Ap9ZHWCwYNnQJIs87g.text: Good food and good service. Justina and Debbie we the stars of the night. The street tacos were great, the filet mignon nachos were awesome,  and some of the best fish tacos I have ever had.

AaKnhadoJfU9gToanBf28w.text: This place was absolutely terrible! The hostess/lady behind the bar was super rude. There was a small room with about 4 parties of people eating so I was told there would be a 20 minute wait (even though there was a whole section behind the bar that was completely empty). My name was supposedly put on a list. So my family and I walked around the corner to see downtown Vegas for 15 minutes and came back. My name was never put on any list, but they said they would seat us shortly (even though now the whole place was empty). While we were waiting to be seated, I asked if they had any change for the meters outside the restaurant and was told no. Insert side eye here....you are working in a restaurant on a street with meter parking and you don't have a single quarter in this whole place for patrons. Needless to say we just walked out. RUDE. We went to another Nacho Daddy outside of the city and it was fabulous. My advice: DON'T BOTHER GOING TO THIS LOCATION.

T0twqdWT5WjyPqHCZe65nQ.text: If I could give this please more starts I easily would. My friends and I went here as suggested our friend who lives in Vegas and let me tell you I will always listen to him for his food recommendations. This place was so yummy and had a cool vibe to it. Very clean and our server Eva was awesome. Very personable and knew the menu well. We all got nachos myself the ones with the pulled BBQ pork and white cheddar and cilantro. My mouth is watering just thinking about them. I definitely recommend them. My husband got the hamburger nachos and those were very yummy. One of our friends got the tacos and man oh man was the tortilla delish. House made by the chef himself and the best thing we had ever tried. We tried asking for the recipe but they wouldn't share their secret recipe. Although Eva told us they were in the process of creating a cook book and to look for it in May! Man I can't wait til May so I can be one of the firsts in line to purchase all the yummy dishes. Thank you Nacho Daddy and Eva we had a wonderful time.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Soooo yummy! pulled BBQ pork with white cheddar cheese and cilantro. So yummy

neJ-pKpCKHqK-P6qLUszSg.text: Recommended to me by many.  It didn't let me down. The carne asada tacos were fantastic.  The guacamole is great.  Great service.  Small mix up with my to go order but when I called about it they went above and beyond.  I will return when back in Vegas.

GvWBm5-ebOKMpTN7h9uY5g.text: Love this place!!great place to hang out with friends and watch a game or catch up at lunch.Service is great and menu has something for everyone. love the nacho plates!

3Us1a0AD2eNFR0jFVqrTXA.text: I really love their bbq sauce. Warning, its really sweet but if you like that, then go for it. My friend had the Mexican street burger and said it was amazing. It had carrots on it, which she thought was weird, but once she had a bite, she was hooked. I had the pulled pork nachos (I think that's what they're called) and the bbq sauce made it amazing. I love sweet bbq sauce. This is basically a review of their bbq sauce. Sorry about that. Also, their portions are pretty big so that's a definite plus.  The restaurant itself was nice. There were a lot of tables and tvs showing sports so anyone who likes that should definitely go. I don't particularly care but there was a crowd there watching something last night so other sports fans must like coming there. The prices were pretty good. I didn't see much over $12 except for like shrimp and seafood related dishes. All in all, a good deal.

WRz58h4VB9nadcyar4LGvQ.text: The food was good. Service was good as well. Music is good, but not so loud that conversations are not impossible. They have a great selection of brews. Dress casual. It is very close to Freemont street so it is very accessible. Good time and good price. I would recommend this to folks.

WVwrbrOyCvo7p0JQl9nXhQ.text: Had a great time with Courtney the bartender! And the food is Awesome!  Don't miss this place down town.  Can't miss this place!  Love it

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Having a ball with the best bartender. COURTNEY.

ImXvieUWvcHToLVCqZA15A.text: Sorry, don't know what all the hype was about. I love nachos but there better be a pony in it for me to call you daddy.   We got something that was fine and very yummy. Where you're not sure if it's that good or if you're that drunk. Either way it does the trick for sure and I'll give it to them that they're BIG.   I guess I just find nachos hard to elevate. I love em the way they are. Kudos to them all if they are not trying to be anything more than a nacho stop meets watering hole. That's right on.   And hey! There's vegetarian and vegan nachos (I like this). There's also margaritas and scorpion shots (I like this a lot) and more alcohol so you can have a lot of fun here. Go with an obnoxious group. It's not hipster!   I'd definitely take a brood of children here, they'd demolish the plates. Me not so much. I stopped in the middle, at the cold part. But I do eat slow and I love downtown and nachos and I stumble in here enough to really enjoy and anticipate any inconsistency. It's sooo good drunk.   Sad to see so many bad service reviews since our guy was super great. He kept the jalapenos coming. And they were chill about the add ons...been accommodating so far.

TrMNBEDUbumvAkd8JA_2Jw.text: After numerous attempts to find a late night dinner spot on a Wednesday night downtown, I stumbled into ND. Mark was super friendly and made our experience a double thumbs up!  I got the street tacos and damn.. They hit the spot! I got the chicken breast, filet mignon and gringo. The filet was my favorite :)  The margaritas (white peach and Thai basil) paired perfectly with our meals..  Would definitely come again!

5rYiiUGfHzhox9Q65SzGDw.text: Lots of great options! Unique nachos...good margaritas. I had the tamales. Portion size was appropriate, not huge and wasteful. Could get avacado on the side for $2  Kayla was exceptional, putting up with my smart alick father-in-law. Get here.

When they bought the nachos back out there still wasn't much seafood on it at all..as a result me and my wife will never be back.. NEVER

zddjOyWukXDHyu5BrDGFyQ.text: I live just a couple of blocks down from nacho daddy so I have eaten here multiple times. Last night my friend and I decided to go here for dinner. Food and especially derived were excellent and I am excited to say that I will be going back.

AYcRk1mgV4Iu-pZFFxvqDw.text: Excellent Mexican food right off of Fremont street. They have an impressive selection of vegan options, which means extra points in my book. The cheese dip was amazing! It had peppers, onions, and jalapenos and was served over a candle to keep it warm. I then poured for the fried avocado tacos. They were delicious, but I wish they were bigger or came with rice and /or beans. My only complaint is that the the server messed up our check (I needed it split for work reimbursement but wanted both checks on the same card... He then recombined the checks instead of just running them separately). I would still go again because it was pretty darn good!

aGKOpPd5iPSR5v8xKBjCbg.text: Back at our favorite place!! this time with my little girl I know she'll love it as much as we do!!!

UhENAlz-715P9y_rikoSRw.text: I love this place! They have something for everyone. If your vegan you have the plenty of options! The food is tasty and the staff is awesome. Priced a little high but worth it!

SmDkQ_IealpJ0sHhX_b2Hg.text: First of all, the food was AMAZING!!!  But the service was the worse I've had!  I'm not a complainer by any means, but this waitress  was terrible.  Our food didn't come together, 1 person in our party of 6 didn't even get their plate at all.  She said she was going to take it off the bill, then proceeded to have her co worker come over and have us pay for it.  It was a cluster fuck.  No one apologized or owned up to anything.  I forgot to mention, the rest of the service our original waitress was hiding out from us, bizarre!!!     But let me tell you, the food is well worth to come back to.  Every time we'll be in downtown Vegas, we will definitely be here to dine!  Hands down, my brothers Loco Moco nachos were the best!  And don't forget to try the Mexican corn as an appetizer.  Prices were good for the quality of food you get!  A must try

aDwe82bLbqk3Wmg_YMdQww.text: Fun place to go with really good nachos. We tried 2 different type of nachos here and grilled shrimp tacos. Everything was good. If you are adventurous take the scorpion shots. We got tiny scorpions. You just throw it back like an oyster shot.

fIIJXzOvqjZ8_glqA7Mz8w.text: I came here with friends for my bachelorette party. The food was so good that we came back twice in one weekend. The nachos are amazing. I tried both the fiesta nachos and the supreme tostada nachos (my fave). Also, the micheladas and margaritas are delicious. Good food, good service. Also, they had a really good selection of vegan food which was surprising. Don't hesitate to try this place. You'll love it. I'll definitely be back next time I'm in Vegas!

hT3eP_ln_UkPrJuDm1Dv-w.text: I recently vacationed here in  vegas and was nervous about being able to find  good vegan food options so i googled locations and came across this AMAZING PLACE they have.several vegan menu options and not only was the service great but the food surpassed my expectations i loved it i will definatley eat here again next time i am back in vegas.

rNWfUqRpZmWly1ArRIypSg.text: My wife and I went in for breakfast. Ended up having nachos the bartender  recommended.  I had the chicken, my wife had Thai chicken.  Both were excellent. Great atmosphere, Great Staff (Rico was amazing), Great food, Great location (located less than 1 minute off Fremont street experience..4th street)   I found this place on Yelp and am very impressed.  We will definitely return!  Favorite part besides the food: We are here for National Finals Rodeo and absolutely love that they make us feel like home. They are playing country music and playing the rodeo replay on TV.  Dont worry... if your not a fan they still play other stuff also.  Did I mention...GREAT ATMOSPHERE! LOVE IT HERE

CN53zvkjMrhuWuvqdTYjhg.text: So I put in an order to go @ 6:06pm. I was told it would take 10 to 15 minutes but I am still here waiting over 50 minutes later. We still only waited about 20 minutes for a group of six.  I had the lobster crab nachos and they were the best nachos I've ever had.  If you're not into spice ask for no jalapenos.  I also had the margarita with jalapeno and cucumbers and it was fantastic.  Can't say anything negative.  Great service, great food, and everyone in the group thought their food and drinks were great.

ka877KNZmbVwXNacK6R8lQ.text: Back here again. With another friend who haven't try this place and wanted mexican food. So we got here and got to be seated in the same table as last time. I ordered my same drink Coke soda, but instead get the spicy grilled wings we got the triple dip it comes with queso, salsa & gaucamole. The slasa was hot tasting but it really wasn't all that hot. The quseo was runny cheese but flavorful but I dont like the gaucamole so my bf and friends ate it.  Our waitress was nice got our drinks and friendly with us. I wanted to get different nachos this time. So I got the chicken enchilada nachos. I love enchiladas so I wanted to try as nachos again it comes avocado I don't like avocados so I got extra sour cream. My bf got supreme tostada nachos. I really like my chicken enchilada nachos the refried beans, cheese, red sauce and jalapenos really great. My boyfriend like his supreme toastda nachos.   Another great time being here at Nacho Daddy. Nice place to chill, drink, & eat nachos. Will recommend this place to people who will be in Vegas near Fremont Street.

vSdt7jKc6Nh7F-6aEUlIoA.text: I enjoyed my lunch so much at the strip location that when my friends wanted to eat at the downtown location for dinner, I was all for it. The Strawberry Margarita was delicious. I had the Thai Chicken Bowl. It was the perfect portion and very tasty.

0cpTHI1ajkIJi6d815gPVw.text: Definitely a yummy place for quick eats. I grabbed the barbacoa pork street tacos. Now I rarely eat pork but by all means we're these tacos worth it. You can get chicken or shrimp or steak too.   They specialize in the nachos duh- and I did see plenty a plate towering with dem nachos. However idk if I want a plate of cholesterol with a side of high blood pressure and diabetes. They surely looked good and definitely smelled good.   The staff is very personable and service was quick. Not bad for a full restaurant and a Sat night.   There's also several margaritas and tequilas to choose from. I eyed out getting either a guava margarita or a blood orange or the Thai basil one. But I copped out and got a Moscow mule as I was craving some ginger beer. It was good as well.   So yes I would def recommend this place and yes I def can see me coming back. Nacho Daddy be my daddy.

Also tried their beer flight....honestly the beers were terrible....skip the beer lol. Price wasn't too friendly...some stuff are way overpriced, some are ok.Our server was attentive, the host doesn't look like she gives a sh*t about her job, she was busy ignoring people and eating on her host station. Overall will come back for more nachos when i'm back in vegas....

y8v0x1e8raDtHvYhYC1TIQ.text: Oh man do they have a good brunch and don't think I'm weird but our entire group would swear they had the absolute best water we drank our entire trip. Pitchers of water at the ready and always quick to check on us and answer any questions.  Queso dip was delicious, we cleaned the bowls. The flaming shrimp fajitas (while not flamed table side) were really good. Our group also really enjoyed the huevos rancheros. It was honestly one of the better Mexican meals I've had in a long time. Reasonably priced and delicious, they knocked it out of the park for sure. I would definitely return.

5B5esv98jC0Pk54e0t0B3g.text: "Not Today Daddy..."  My Vegan babe and I met downtown last night for dinner (per her high recommendation). The nachos are massive and shareable, the vegan queso was okay but warm vs hot. Grilled Mexican corn off the cob by far my favorite appetizer (cotija cheese, cilantro, garlic mayo & fresh lime) yumm yumm yumm!! VItA3CoiqbyxVwDoHsvnJg.text: I will never ever return to this establishment.  Several weeks ago my sister-in-law contacted Nacho Daddy to make a reservation for my wedding reception on Monday May 6th at 8pm. We had scheduled this event for 30 people, we pre-ordered appetizers, & we had a full confirmation email from Mark. Upon arrival the hostess explained she knew nothing of our reservation-it wasn't in the books. We requested to speak to the manager, the assistant general manager came out. He explained, without being apologetic, that Mark (who is also the owner) is responsible for catering and he doesn't work directly in that particular location. Basically the excuse was lack of communication between staff. We showed the assistant general manager the confirmation email and he shrugged his shoulders and said there was nothing he could really do other than ask our group of 30 to wait an hour plus to be sat.  THIS WAS FOR MY WEDDING.

nzV9GRt40rZ0Xy1Uz2EFOQ.text: While visiting Vegas, we decided to explore off the strip and headed here to get lunch before bar hopping around Fremont Street. We decided to split the supreme tostada nachos and cali burrito. The supreme nachos were great, they had a lot going on! I'm glad a side of chips came with the cali burrito because there weren't enough nachos to scoop up all the good stuff. The burrito exceeded my expectations. I love a good burrito. My hesitation with cali burritos is the soggy fries that usually go in it, but this cali burrito had the perfect crispiest garlic parmesan fries in it. My only complaint is that my half was too small and I wanted more! The service wasn't great. It wasn't busy and we were trying to flag down a server for beer for a while. Once we finally got his attention, it took a while for the beers to come. We didn't get our drinks until we were almost done with the food. Still 5 stars from me though because the food was bomb.

ajjiZUNiPMqlNo433rULww.text: Hands down, this is my favorite restaurant in downtown Las Vegas. I originally became a fan when I stumbled upon them thanks to Uber Eats back in the summer of 2017. I was new in town and on a cleanse/diet looking for tasty vegan meals. Their Vegan Flaming Chick'n Fajitas and Vegan Chocolate Cake were so delicious that for a while I ordered them multiple more times via Uber Eats. One day I just had to go in person and see what this place was all about! I ended up trying and loving more on their menu. I love their drink selection too. Amongst my absolute favorites on the menu thus far are the Thai Chicken Nachos, Flaming Fajitas, Vegan Flaming Chick'n Fajitas, Vegan Crispy Avocado Street Taco, Vegan Chocolate Cake, House Margarita and the Mexican Candy Margarita! These are all mouth watering options!  I love sitting at their bar, as Ariel is a fantastic bartender. They have an eclectic concept, appeal and style. Seating is available indoor and outdoor. There is a large front window which is usually opened with stools so sitting inside with an outside connection is possible. Food service is superb, it's brought in a friendly and timely manner. The staff is attentive and courteous. I just love the vibe here! I've become a regular at a restaurant for the first time! I honestly do recommend them to any one - any day, even the whole family!   Enjoy!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

wAvvfLQ0lpJQDmTFCb35Lw.text: Rico at the downtown Nacho Daddy Location is fabulous! Very welcoming and down to earth with a sense of humor. Made our visit lovely. Like we are at home. This is our favorite nacho daddy location. We are from Kentucky and visit Vegas often. We always make plans to visit here! Thank you Rico for an awesome nacho daddy experience!

Zlxsi-_Q4jp_izhJ4_nlRQ.text: After strolling around Fremont on a rainy day, we were ready to dry off and get a bite to eat. At the suggestion of our friend and local Las Vegas guide, we headed over to Nacho Daddy. I honestly think that had she not suggested it, I never would have noticed it. Not only is it off a side street near Fremont but it's also not flashy like many Vegas restaurants and we almost walked by it.  The inside is simple but what the restaurant lacks in decor, it seems to make up in quality of food. Everyone was pleased with their dishes, from quesadillas to burritos to nachos.  While I was tempted to order the nachos, I knew that I could never finish a plate of nachos on my own. It's too bad that they don't offer half orders of the nachos. Instead, I chose the chicken quesadilla. It was one of the best quesadillas that I've ever had. It was filled with gooey cheese and juicy shredded chicken and served with a side of sour cream, guacamole and pice de gallo. Had I not been on vacation, I would have been content to eat half and take the rest to go but instead I forced myself to finish the quesadilla and was pleasantly stuffed for quite awhile.   Two of my friends shared the Fiesta Nacho and managed to clear the plate between the two of them. These nacho plates are definitely something to share with a friend though, unless you're a super heavy eater. Another friend ordered the vegan burrito and I was impressed that a Mexican restaurant offered several vegan options.   Compared to places on the Strip, prices at Nacho Daddy are very reasonable. My quesadilla cost about $12 with tax and tip, which isn't much different than what I pay in San Diego. The nacho plates ranged from $7.50 for cheese nachos to $16ish for nachos with meat and lots of toppings.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Quesadilla...yum!

4kesE69Mf51BiCxQO9Un6A.text: I was invited to hangout with my new friends from Hakkusan for some drinks and cocktails.  I have been to this restaurant several times and every time it was always a good experience. The staff is amazing, friendly and always attentive.  The hostesses were quick to get us seated with menus and drink orders all in one swoop!  Even the managers who knew a few members of the group complained we were "too quiet", and encouraged us with a nice round of tequila!  I think it did the trick, conversations were turning up in volume and all of us with smiles.  The food order was placed and did not take long to arrive. All orders came out at the same time.  The food is Mexican food remixed. Everything is fresh, the flavors are inventive and delicious and the menu features something for every taste.  I definitely recommend this place for couples, singles, and groups.  Enjoy a friendly atmosphere and some great food and don't forget a tequila shot with the scorpion  in it!  :)

dmiAqb3Hb_qJwlk0EQbAfA.text: This is a great place highly recommend going here, great food and drinks. They also play great music the customer service is amazing. The waiter Dean is amazing, perfect customer service, made sure everything was great at our table

cOoVFCPaqr6tEfg4CHwRRw.text: The setting: 9:30pm, Monday, Christmas Day, 2018.   Fam: We're hungry!   Me: Ooh, it's going to be hard to find a non-casino restaurant open at this hour on Christmas...  Fam: That doesn't change the fact that we're hungry.  Me: Well, I found this place nearby that's dedicated to nachos. Y'all want some nachos?  Fam:  :-0   Uh, fuck YEAH!  Boom. Nachos for Christmas dinner. Not just any nachos, but damn good nachos. Nachos supreme, cheeseburger nachos, thai nachos, and vegan "chicken" nachos? Double-fuck-yeah!    This spot is owned by a few former Zappos employees, and while it borders on cheesy (in the figurative sense), the (literal) cheesy goodness overcomes all of that business. The nachos here are seriously tasty. Each portion is sized for one very hungry man or two moderately hungry people not my size. Eminently shareable, these platters are a crowd pleaser. Easy to order a few different styles and throw down on a table full of goodness.   They have numerous non-nacho options, like burritos and enchiladas and such, but why bother? Come here for the nachos. Or the surprisingly robust vegan menu. Usually vegan items are an after-thought, but any vegan would be very happy with the selection here.   They have a check in offer for a free house marg with purchase of an entree, which is cool, but the main specialty marg is where it's at. They also have corny "scorpion shots" and merch so you can boast about eating a scorpion. But we didn't go there.   5-star nachos, excellent service, fun atmosphere... if the whole thing weren't so cheese-ball this place would get a full 5-stars from me. I mean, it's a half-block off the Fremont Experience so they're obviously playing to that crowd. So good on them for that.

PGnts3ZvWVNHUMV9kXbzrw.text: Located near Fremont Street, Nacho Daddy is a good way to get away from the madness. I stopped by here on a whim for a weekday lunch and was glad I did! They have plenty of healthy options, which can easily be evened out with their delicious queso. (I can never say "no" to queso!) Anyway, the tacos are HUGE and come on homemade thick tortillas that are to die for. We ordered 2 and couldn't finish them. My entree was the kale salad and it was also delicious! Lots of different flavors mingle to create a healthy and fresh lunch.  Don't forget to check in on Yelp to get your free house marg. It was pretty good!

w3Ut4pWOLcOfvtYezHXD4g.text: Great food. Great vegan options. Friendly staff. Rico was our server and he did a fantastic job. He was attentive and friendly and I definitely will be back!

i_--ROTLnm9fpRfnV9GXJQ.text: Nacho Daddy is amazing! We devoured two nachos and wanted more for the taking. It's good. And you're right by the best bars in DT. Definitely recommend this place. Rico was the best and very courtesy!

E1ygC5XtprPP2L_UcK6A1g.text: It's a bit small and cozy in the dining area, but we still waited to go in. There are so many places to eat and we normally wouldn't have chosen a place like this. The front area had a few party animals in the outdoor seating area/line - which is expected in Downtown - and this surprisingly didn't deter me from taking my toddler into eat. The food pics online lived up to my expectations! We had a single order of the fajitas with lettuce boats and it was delicious! Definitely recommend the chicken fajitas. We ordered the Trio as an appetizer so the single order of fajitas was enough for two people. My father raved all night about how tasty the dish was, and that he didn't eat it with tortillas (he is borderline diabetic and steers clear of extra carbs). There is a big vegan menu to choose from. The Daddy's Mule was as expected, the pinot grigio was nice and crisp and cold, and the other folks in my group loved their enchiladas and burrito. Every dish was larger than we anticipated. Will return again.

t2AmUPBglIKrgfnORAM03Q.text: Went to Nacho Daddy to watch the first World Series game. It was exciting to see that it wasn't too busy since sometimes it can be. We walked in and sat at the bar (party of 2). Bartender was friendly and got us menus right away. We ordered 1 house margarita (free when you order an entree and check in with yelp) and a dos XX lager. Margarita was delicious and the beer perfectly cold. It's been awhile since I've had beer that cold from a draft selection. We weren't in a real hurry to eat so we finished our 1st round. We were ready for 2nd but the bartender (Anya) kept walking by and not offering us another round. Personally I believe it's the bartenders job to look up smile and check to see who needs more drinks. I had to yell out to get her attention to finally get a refill. We ended up ordering the chicken tinga nachos which were brought out in a timely manner and were delicious. We stayed for a few more rounds. Anya (bartender) seemed to get back into the groove and was much better towards the end.

ieVHCgwBxpD7gr0oXMdzog.text: My family of four came at midnight and eat there due to the vegan menu and unfortunately they didn't allow us to sit outside on the empty tables even though they closed at 3 am. Although it close at 3 am the gentleman told us "we close when we close" and didn't try to accommodate us while we where waiting. One serve initially told us when we got there 10 minute wait, a few minutes after another serve me told us 30. I was so eager to come here looking at the menu in advance but it was not a good experience at all.

qZCzUE1aIruZZF7NO2jmdg.text: Great Nachos and Good Happy Hour $5 margaritas!! Good atmosphere! Pretty good seevice great place to hang out!

HI_Fdc1H5Cv17eKvVMQQHw.text: Great atmosphere ,great food,nice waiters Nice size portions Aerrick was our waiter and he was great the supreme tostada nacho and wings where bomb

3bHiBKDs_bHA7QxI4x8Nuw.text: A solid foodie find amidst the downtown craziness. We enjoyed their huge margaritas although we couldn't really taste the tequila. The server was super helpful and friendly and assisted us with navigating both the booze and food me menus. I had a seafood combo plate and the lobster enchilada was amazing; the fish taco very good. My husband had a plate of nachos with pork and it was yummy. The portions were plentiful without being too big.

_fx259edDERH0I9vV1ZRmQ.text: Amazing margaritas, tacos and nachos. Yelp won't let me post this review unless I wrote a long enough review so I guess I'll keep typing...

MY0JQ0m1BvxY687-AKXNXA.text: Calling all nacho enthusiasts, obviously you get nachos here. Nachos, big enough to share with a friend or two. Good margaritas, and endless chips and salsa. I've ate here with a friend while she had her pup with her, they did not mind as we sat outside in the front patio. it was a cool spot, cool neon sign you cant miss in the cut. we had lunch on the little front outdoor seating area, good for people watching, and boy is there people watching to be seen on ANY given day or hour... Reasonable service, staff was friendly, attentive. I went on another occasion at night before 90s night at oddfellows just around the corner to grab a bite before drinking and sat inside, it was cool too, we had bottomless chips and salsa and huge margaritas.

1Q3sHu6Hozxs_kzjBXsXLw.text: Wife is vegan and we usually have trouble finding places we can both enjoy food together at. This place is awesome, great service and a whole entire page of vegan options. Made our afternoon, if your close I would highly recommend you checkout.

E4koYVmcbwFupA1L8JiFsw.text: Many places just pile nachos on top of each other and put a lot of dressing and sides on it and call it a nacho. Usually when you get finished with the first layer, you are left with a mountain of chips.   This was not the case at Nacho Daddy's, as the portions were huge! Everyone shared their plates and took from each other and was a great experience.   The service was fast and friendly. They were extremely polite.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

xiyE6ONkyVarBCMIpXEvqw.text: Our favorite place to get margaritas when visiting Vegas!  This was our first time eating here and the food is great too!  Rico was a fantastic server and took great care of us.  Be sure to stop in if you are in the area!

AQ4vdYLKqGdSChFWs8TuSg.text: Okay, so I'm feeling generous today with my five stars. But seriously the folks here really deserve it!   It's been a month since eating here, I know I'm a bit late.   We were in Vegas for my sons 21st Birthday. We headed down Fremont St with a different restaurant in mind. Little did we know we couldn't take drinks in. So we killed time at the arcade while sucking back our frozen Mia Tias, hello brain freeze! Meanwhile the damn place closed! What the fuck, right? Well, no! Me being the women I am, I'm now buzzed, hungry, irritated, and well, every other emotion women feel the need to have all at once. So we head back down the street when this well lit sign was pretty much calling my name!   Hello, Nacho Daddy's! Instantly the music caught my attention. (I love when I know every song and I can sing to it) the staff was so welcoming. The bathrooms were super clean. The menus looked delicious!!!!   DUDE THE FUCKEN FOOD WAS AMAZING! Like lick your plate amazing! We tried several different nachos and drinks. Hands down one of the BEST places to eat in Vegas! #foodporn #noregerts

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ex6wZbKEmdU0tDnDyK6qIw.text: Hella good. I think out of all the restaurants we visited in Las Vegas, this was my favorite. It didn't hurt that I love nachos beyond beyond. But we came here for happy hour and truly enjoyed the drinks ($5) and the nachos. For $25 we ate happily and left with a slight buzz. Thank you. I will return!

HjgF5mIkEg8M0wYSQcecsw.text: Trying this place out for the first time for some vegan nachos. It was ok, I'm not a big fan of daiya cheese if that's what was used. Should consider using almond or cashed cheese. Food was alright, but nothing I'd go back for. House margarita was all syrup.  Service was great however, went on a Thursday night around midnight and our server Aerrick was awesome.   3 stars for food 5 stars for service

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Nachos

9hVryGfwYHln7HG6jypgNQ.text: Great and quick service! Love this place! Green nachos and house margaritas are the best!

W4XQC8SC5AuhLz6Vvshnjg.text: Vegan Mexican Food HEAVEN! This place was a diamond in the rough! I'll come back here as much as possible when in Vegas. They have a full page of vegan options. Everything from queso to chimichangas! They are most popular for their nachos but I ate the queso dip and the "Chicken" chimichanga! So good!   Also-free house margarita was yummy!

D13gnYMg07UWIV5UK58-sg.text: Wow amazing food I barely scraped the plate on how big the portions are. They're queso dip omg sooo good. dqHuK7YKV5WQiVXiK61ebg.text: Great authentic Nachos and yummy Margaritas. Good price and our server Rico was lovely. Precious the hostess was super friendly as well.

qB6jdzbyQjEWuL0BLvoKyQ.text: Great food but it is a little busy and unorganized! Be prepared to stay for awhile waiting on your food but it is worth it!!

1V9PfJeSgNmOMbIyE5q0ug.text: Food and drinks were as awesomical as reviews and our server Mikey recommended - get in here you won't be disappointed!

A8KWlMdqMK3wPUcdswmhXw.text: Good tacos - I had the vegan avocado tacos and they were good. Service at the bar was friendly and quick. Nice yelp check in offer as well.

wh1QkVPXEN1KRAIpyYRCAA.text: Yum!! Nachos are delicious! Devoured our order in no time! Nachos are large enough to share. Laid back vibe.

fxwsXEXcIC8MSnGbdDBLOw.text: I LOVE NACHO DADDY.  I am a nacho fanatic.  I went to the one on the old strip its just off to the side a bit but has a huge sign you can't miss it.  This was a dream come True.  The waiter was SO NICE and fun and happy and was very accommodating.   I got the filet nachos and they were AMAZING.  If I go back to Vegas I will definitely stay on the old strip just so I can go back to nacho daddy.  Also their margaritas were to die for!   Seriously if one of the restaurant managers reads this please give the waiter that was there on the 19th of May at around 5 or 6pm, male, about 5'5 and very short trimmed hair a pat on the back or a nice bonus cause that guy is a great waiter.

qBP1nTA_DBPb2LDfcDPUNw.text: I was super excited to go to the famous Nacho Daddy especially after hearing nothing but good things from friends that have been here a few times. As we walk up to the door I hear music, people talking and laughing I immediately perk up thinking this place is going to be fun and amazing.... we walk past the hostess stand which is outside of the door, we look around I see a few bartenders, servers  and Busboys yet not one bothered to say Hi or  acknowledge us. I finally walk up to the bar and asked if I could sit anywhere? She looked shocked that the hostess wasn't out side and the then was nice enough to give us menus and found a good table for us. The waiter was nice informed us of the drink specials. I decided to get a Daddy's Michelada and OMG it was like unicorns and rainbows Amazing!!! And it's the main reason they are getting 3 stars... for the appraiser we ordered Queso Dip although the presentation was good the actual Queso was very bland no flavor at all and overall disappointing. Finally for my Entree I ordered the Smothered Burrito with chicken and the green sauce it was okay. It was a little bland. The only thing that saved my Burrito was the sauce it was drenched in. The chicken on it's own was dry. Now I didn't go in thinking it was going to be authentic Mexican food but I did expect for the food to have some flavor and it didn't. I also did have the Guacamole and Pico with chips and that was really good. I might come back to give it another chance but it definitely won't be any time soon. Unless I'm in the mood for a Daddy's Michelada.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

nl-KvmmI4JVW7gbejnzi0w.text: I have to say Ric is a great server! He and I talked about tequila and photography and food! He turned me on to Casa Noble Tequila and I love tequila and hadn't heard of it yet. Absolutely smooth and amazing tequila and can't wait to find it and have it again! Now for the food, we had ceviche which was a little bland but good, guacamole and chips, and enchiladas (cheese and beef) It was a great experience! Will definitely go again and recommend this location to all I know.

Vdmf0c-sbI0MbV0F2BupzA.text: The Scorpion Shots w/1800 are the best...mix it with some Roberto's later on and you'll have a sick hangover the next day...if your a constant "throw-upper" eating Robertos almost 1 hour later will get rid of that lol! This is the best place to drink, the staff are friendly as hell, the food was soooo bomb. I will definitely be back next weekend
