V0_-MsmyQLIbCCdJxV5isQ.text: This place has decent food but the speed of service is mind boggling. Came in for a quick bite with some friends. Drink order was taken after about 10 min. Drinks came almost 25 min later, food order taken 15 min after that. That's 40 min to order food. Food came 30 min later. check was dropped off and then we waited 20 min for someone to pick it up and run a card. Eventually we had to go to the bartender to run it. About to leave now, we have been here over 2 hours?  This is the 3rd bad experience I have had here, Never again.

Rya1GJXml8Fa8Ys85Dt9uQ.text: Confession: I was not 100% sober when we visited.  So the food was AMAZING - which I think is True, but might not be.  My soggy nachos leftovers the next morning were still pretty good.  It was close, open late, and had nachos which at 2 am (5 am my time) was just what the dr. ordered.  I got the vegan nachos and we had drinks.  THEY HAVE VEGAN NACHOS!!! They have other vegan stuff too, but since becoming a vegan I haven't had decent nachos, and this place had them.  4 stars, 5 if you are slightly buzzed.

xwEitNkmxZ8QdZ0Tk-dz6A.text: The perfect brunch place in Las Vegas..!! Good food, great ambience, amazing service.

eq5PPUZabKOblMJLFAWJFA.text: Such a fun place! Good food. Very tasty. The tequila shot with the scorpion was a great time

lawTQ7sGayxKAxhoaYYWLg.text: Everything we tried was incredible. We had the crab/lobster nachos, chips/salsa, enchiladas, chicken tacos. House margs were ok, sour and way too sweet. The wait was really long, about an hour. I think you can make reservations so I would recommend trying that. Service was ok, at the end of the night we waited about half hour for our checks, and then another half hour before everything was paid and done. No wonder the wait is long!!

AJXqtqjci88IJ_F7A3Bgng.text: Here is a restraint you can enjoy every time you go. Best Mexican food in Vegas. The toco's are the best. They have two locations and are equally as good. I go there every time I'm in Vegas.

6thOdfwIO1r0umKQMrNxJA.text: I ordered using the Yelp app. The order was for take out. The food was ready quickly as I only had to walk from my hotel half a block away. I didn't dine in but the place looked cozy. Not particularly spacious, but not too small.   Got the Supreme nachos. The toppings were tasty and what you'd expect on bay supreme Nacho. The green sauce provided in a cup was as good as the authentic stuff from the local taco truck in my hometown. I split the portion with my wife as a small meal to hold us over for dinner. The portion was plenty to split between two people.  All in all, not a bad place for a quick bite, or something on the cheaper side in the area.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Take out box and bag with guac, green sauce, and sour cream.

4awMCUjO1IBMIOOy0bXozA.text: Went to Nacho Daddy after multiple people recommended it to us. The place is a dimly lit restaurant located on the edge of Fremont, but I wouldn't necessarily classify it as a hole in the wall. I appreciated that it's a pretty unassuming spot. We ordered two Nachos and ate family style, the Nacho Average Burger Nacho and Filet Mignon Nacho. Wow, these nachos are absolutely loaded! We all had our favorite, but mine was the Filet Mignon Nacho. It sounds like a pretty simple substitute for standard nachos, just replacing ground beef with filet mignon and dousing beans, cheese, sour cream, guac, and pico de gallo on top, but that substitute made all the difference. It's the perfect late night snack after hours of crazy shenanigans.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ejwWdgimwAQQZms9IrSazw.text: I wanted to come here after seeing their full vegan menu &  I was blown away at how good the food was, maybe the best food I've had. I ordered the queso salsa dip which tasted like real cheese, chimichanga with the most delicious vegan "chicken" I'm sure would fool any meat eater. Had the vegan chocolate cake which was a good size & it was so decadent. I will definitely come here anytime I go to Vegas & start campaigning to get one in my home town! (BTW Nacho Daddy if you're listening, Portland Or consistently ranks among top 5 vegan friendliest cities in the world so you'd make out like a bandit just sayin.)

J7k71EEFrLE1X1RdK-YS1A.text: Got lunch here on a business trip in Vegas. They had some vegetarian options which is always appreciated. I got the quesadilla with "chicken" and it was filling, fresh, and delicious. I ate at the bar and the waitress/bartender was personable and efficient. Excellent location right off Fremont St, within walking distance from the hotels.

zaaWIZCYxFKttwwyJnrW7w.text: Nothing too much to write on just wanted to stop in and do the scorpion shot. The bartender was very polite and courteous

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

vj0Yf_jD6bpySg7F7F6Vxg.text: Fantastic vegan menu for a Mexican food joint. My husband and I were pretty impressed and we wish we had known about this two days ago. Everything was closed late Monday and we ended up with a sad veg subway sandwich. This place is soooo damn good I will be sure the make a trip every time I visit.  We ordered the loaded nachos and the spicy burrito to share. Hot damn it was so full of flavor, I almost felt like I was cheating. The nachos were the star of the show for sure. The burrito was a fatty and my half was able to stand up on its own. Solid burrito test.  Vegan friends, I highly recommend.   I didn't get anything to drink, but the margarita menu looked incredible.

jPPYO_tsTBRybBXw4q7tcg.text: Filet mignon nachos are amazing! The free house margarita with the yelp check in was really great too

ClhonuMvzkcXeiNlIo9-XA.text: Deciding to come here was an easy compromise for the meateater BF and me. This place gets automatic points from me for having a vegan menu! The Vegan Nacho was a MOUNTAIN of ingredients including grilled peppers, onions, corn, salsa and pinto beans. There was veggie patty crumbles that I'm pretty indifferent about however the amount of mushrooms seemed to be minimal compared to the ratio of other ingredients. I also wish it had more guacamole but that's more of a personal preference. I was impressed with the amount of cheddar and mozzarella Daiya. Jalapeno chips were stacked pretty high and I was happy to see that the ingredients weren't just piled on top of the chips but layered within the dish. $15 may seem pricey for a plate of nachos but this place makes a genuine effort to make the price worth it. bit.ly/1Ic9mRg The meateater BF had the Buffalo Hot Nacho which he devoured. I think that means he liked it. Service was friendly and the atmosphere is casual. I appreciated that this place wasn't overly cranking the AC like most places do. I understand that Vegas weather is hot but it's inconvenient to have to carry a light sweater just to stay warm indoors. Overall, I'm a fan! I predict that we'll be back to check out other items on the vegan menu :)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Nacho

GaGTwtUL6SJgue7PIMrt_g.text: Food was good! Drinks weren't that strong, but it is a nice spot to stop at for some quick food and drinks if your in the downtown Vegas area.

A570NrkewKvf9A0yKx_OHA.text: Fun place, great food, awesome employees  (especially Evan!)!  The Happy hour is amazing! We'll definitely be back!

JBZxEGr6elJC5kVLGiDdcg.text: An Oasis in the midst of the mundane.    Fabulous margaritas with a great variety of food offerings.  The Thai Chicken Bowl is amazing.   Jovanny's service was outstanding.  Three visits in 3 days with no disappointments.  A great escape.

JikxyD1yxn5cZk3Tiwi1wA.text: Fiesta Nachos were amazing! Great environment to swing in off of Freemont Street and enjoy a meal. Our waitress Alex provided great service, all-around great dining experience and will always make this a stop when I come downtown.

VWGeCy8q-uqJG3T63_N5mA.text: Got the filet mignon nachos and they were delicious! Enough for the two of us as our meal!  Good margaritas too!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. House marg for free with yelp checkin!

GNj2TzAgqn0cekdNpgm4tA.text: Just off of Fremont Street. Very good service, some ridiculously good food and portions. A must see and shall return. Lots of televisions, as well for viewing your favorite games!

DXa89OLJGYeJ3TfCh1uMOA.text: Yum.  Stopped for a quick brunch and was not disappointed.  Whoever said breakfast margaritas were bad?

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

I0mBDWeaRik-ldP2Brzifg.text: Just got back from first visit to Nacho Daddy in down town Las Vegas it will not be the last. Great friendly bartender and best nachos I have ever had. Shared the filet mignon nachos  . They were outstanding, perfect balance of ingredients and all on the best chips. Would recommend this to any nacho lover. Can hardly wait to go back to try more menu items.

anQkN8Z14Qo8uNy_21zBqg.text: Best nachos ever! Only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because the service was not good! Great food and atmosphere tho!

tZG7SulVOS8fkf37o7jl2A.text: Awesome chips and salsa and queso! Received a free house margarita, too, for checking in with Yelp (and they don't chince you on the tequila). Big, high-def TVs for your sports viewing pleasure.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Newest Newlyweds!

7jB6jcsvg79ylGZeSgmikA.text: I frequent this establishment often as well as bring out of town people here to eat and I have never been treated with such disrespect from the hostess before this day. We were told to put our name on the list and we world receive a text message when the table was ready, no problem. This is when the problem starts, we were seating at the bar right next to the hostess booth and we noticed that she was seating people that came in after us. We asked was the table ready and she rudely replied that we should have checked our text and responded, she then rolled her eyes and continued to seat the other people. I wouldn't have been offended but does it ever occur that sometimes these cell phones don't work properly and besides that we were sitting in her face. I caught her doing something to the iPad and when I looked at my phone that is when I saw the message which is a coincidence or did she neglect to follow through because we weren't a priority. I noticed after being seated she would walk pass our table looking as though she had a problem with us. Mark our server was great and the food was good. Very disappointed in in the initial treatment of entering the restaurant and the treatment of the hostess. Her name started with an A.  I gave three stars because our server was great and made up for rudeness of the hostess.

V-mT57g77VLge3ThmobyFw.text: A great happy hr with drinks and several tacos, nachos, etc at great prices. Sometimes the service can be better..but usually pretty good unless packed.

G-PMuqvgqn1fnZUHP2DUJg.text: This is my first time here I've only been here for few years and never experienced a place like this good service and friendly staff .

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

skdcUgHfL1ppyfkIHhMtcg.text: nacho daddy has amazing nachos!! and they have an entire vegan menu, and that vegan food doesn't even taste vegan it's soooo good!!!

myIn_5iu0fZy2rljA4fPMg.text: Was super stoked to come here but honestly the service was shit. Literally from everyone. Runners spilling food on our guests. Wine taking over 20 minutes to get to the table. The blonde bartender being so rude when I asked for something when my server was busy. The restaurant was not even half full. Erica was the only good part she was great and patient and kept a smile on her face after runners and bussers messed up food and drink orders. Some of the orders were wrong. Chips and salsa didn't come out before the food so we had to cancel. Blah blah I could go on and on.Bad experience.   Erica gets 5 stars. Restaurant gets none :(

XyDmSdWT4IMofBkDf80prw.text: I ordered 3 michiladas and a filet mignon nachos. The drinks were very refreshing and well mixed. The nachos had great flavors and chewable steak. The service was great and friendly. We got our food fast especially when I've got 2 hangry sisters.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Michiladas

vXf0KtMd4bkOepfE3TZPVA.text: Loved the atmosphere and house margaritas! So many Gluten Free options! Generous portions and very shareable.

7Ay7U46UHZ-4LvGq6lnb4Q.text: Great food & even better service!!!!! Eric was cheerful & started our day with laughs!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing huevos rancheros &amp; filet mignon omelet!! Eric &amp; Kaya are the BEST!!! Love this place will definitely be back!

KysBPv5Uz0BYgE9EhLg8yg.text: Great breakfast.  A little dark inside for a morning breakfast but well worth it.  The pancake topped with churro pieces and presented in a skillet was fantastic.  Very unique and delicious No syrup needed.  Also the coffee was fantastic for some reason, best coffee I had in a long time.

En8jKL8hdR5D26Uc_Rf6Tg.text: Awesome food,  fun location,  great staff and great drinks.  The nacho proportion was massive,  so the wife and I shared.  I also asked for one of the shrimp tacos, which was very good as well.. The margarita had a house made sweet and sour to it which was mellow and didnt have the bitter bite,  which I loves.  The staff was friendly and the place was very clean. Would go back.

TIMzVqKoLh40ObK94GOeoA.text: Nacho Daddy lives up to its name! We ordered the Cadillac margarita and Thai nachos!! Neither let us down!!! Totally different take on nachos and was superb surprise!!!

MS2DzNOvzWETnrLnpHoWiA.text: Great food and atmosphere. Best lobster and crab nachos I've ever had along with the triple dip and daddy michelada, soo good! Service was good, I have no complaints.

aNalMK2sonmvtx6bc6uFxg.text: Great atmosphere, lots of variety on the menu. This place is also great for vegans and vegetarians. Service was on point. Got a free margarita with the yelp check in!

j5EZMGcMTkKHOlOPB7_tBw.text: I've been meaning to try this place for a long time. Was out late and decided on the enchilada nachos with green sauce.it was surprisingly good. More than enough for r

j8yzqRxfuCWWGPQH3WMDTg.text: These guys are great! Very service oriented, good is fantastic the flour tortillas have some crack in them I'm sure of it! The roast pork is crazy good the nachos are awesome and the daddy margaritas live up to the reputation of being the best in town! Also my girlfriend wants me to mention the wait staff is the best

G3W7J6AiAYq2HQh---QGgA.text: Ate here twice during our recent weekend in Vegas.  With a large party you were able to accommodate us. Always excellent food and service.  This will be a regular stop for us always when in Vegas. PS: the chicken tacos are amazing!!

WqW9ejljIVhLiGcxQZWMnw.text: Jovany is the best waiter ever! So attentive, definitely ask for him when you come! Food and atmosphere was awesome!

yX1Gq3hYf85Qg-CkFUr4Jw.text: Great service and food.  One nacho plate could feed two. Must try the ceviche its awesome! The house margaritas are on point!

Mw5RphsNWnvNbGNKJ93WsA.text: Wow.   I'm from Texas and was skeptical about nachos in Las Vegas but I was blown away   We got the special and a margarita and both were as good as any I've had back home.  Just off the downtown strip.  Cool place

RayBLToKbsySWMSR7Y6NQQ.text: G is a kick ass mixologist. And her name is awesome and unique never heard it before . Very friendly and accommodating. Nachos were great all staff was great .

R7PG08gTJAfHHLXCWUu5-A.text: We randomly found this place while exploring Vegas. It's close to the Fremont Street Experience and was a quick walk from our hotel. No wait time was a plus and our server was quite good. I had the 4 cheese nachos with added beans and lettuce. Probably the best nachos I've ever had. Decent prices and delicious food.

kv_kTFNyt472tbAzx7ybfg.text: Shoooooot all I can remember about this place is having too much fun while I was there. The entire staff was a delight and were very friendly to my group and I. The service was really great and the food was very tasty. Definitely will try to come back whenever I go back to Vegas with my friends.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shoots !!!!

hPn7sdJQM5Y37bJJ3uce4Q.text: Opens early for the early morning drinkers! $3 bottomless chips n salsa... great food! Great price! Great atmosphere!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bomb

DORuJ6JZe-J2QNlcM6b4zQ.text: Came in for lunch with my wife for the first time and sat at the bar. The Carnitas Nachos were so delicious, the white peach margaritas were even better,  but it was the service that made our day.  Our bartender Tara was amazing. She could have kept us entertained for hours. My wife and I had one of the best lunch dates we've had in a long time! Thank you Tara and Nacho Daddy!! We'll be back for sure. You rock!!!

OD59Qa8qTtEwCDboop0SDQ.text: The food is good here but they don't pay attention to certain details.  The queso is to die for though!

MY9QdbrI_Ul2o2DJTLxSzw.text: Good food. Friendly staff. We had an attentive waitress so there were no long wait times. Normal to loud environment but not obnoxious in any way. Very laid back. A good place to have a drink and hang out for a bit. We recommend trying it out.

qTV2kXlUfUXI0PCRm_81nA.text: Great nachos! Margaritas are yummy! We loved the churro sundae, ended up ordering a second round of churros. Staff was very helpful and attentive. Thank you Perla and Jose.

W2QcvxgTyI_7G7MuMJSslQ.text: My son and I ate here and enjoyed it! Good food,good service and nice atmosphere. I can't wait for my next trip to Vegas so I can go there again

PBMReodux_EtOPX6kENKIw.text: I had the breakfast tacos and they were phenomenal!!! The Salsa was definitely a great choice. The house margarita was stout!!!

PlzG6LnbLghrty1olxRTyA.text: As far as Nachos go, this is as good as it gets. I loved the diverse, unique flavors and options they have. Nacho Daddy is a perfect place to eat anytime of day whether it's a hungover lunch, dinner, or late night munchies. The place has cool aesthetic. I'd say it's the best place to eat if you're downtown.

Qdl7RJCk34YQSKeDITUZAQ.text: Great food, a little expensive for nachos but they were good so I didn't mind paying.  We went to downtown location which was nice. Waitress and good and attentive she checked on us many times and made sure we were taken care of.

TR6Qr1QOHBc1Ktttg37u_g.text: I encourage you to sit at the bar ! Look for Tara at the bar she so funny,! & extremely helpful w suggestions on both food & drinks. Chips & guac we're a must! YUM ! I had the chicken philly & it was very tasty (too hungry to take a pic, sorry!) :D they also have great happy hour specials. 5 stars for fresh food and amazing customer service !

M5xdMpQnGaJf06zijIgA8A.text: My friends and I came with a rather large group, but our waiter was very accommodating and helped us all out by seating everyone within each other's area so it helped socializing amongst our friends a lot easier.  We ordered 3 pitchers of margarita and 4-5 nachos to share with our table of about 7-8 girls. The seafood nachos were a little spicy, but it was SO BOMB. It might be my favorite one from all of the nachos that we ordered. There's something about the sauce with the lobster that just satisfied my nacho cravings. Another one of my favorites was the pulled pork nachos... love that they don't skimp on the meat!   I typically don't love Mexican food, but I'm digging this place!

OvuxrkjZE5wM_j8u51Fkxw.text: Holy guacamole on my filet mignon nachos! Hands down best nachos I've ever had.  Prices are super responsible. Huge portions of food and the toppings are evenly spread to all chips.  Ain't no body want a stale dry chip at the end, and Nacho daddy makes sure you don't.  The Thai chicken bowl was good but I wish it didn't have cheese. Changes the flavors way too much.

hKE0FtxCRJYM5S8ZcyO6Tw.text: I didn't eat much here, but what I had was pretty tasty. They make a really good margarita.... I expected it to be all booze and no flavor....I was wrong. It had a light and pleasant flavor. They weren't super strong, but that was ok. The chips with all the salsas, guac, and queso was a good order....all of the dips were tasty and fresh. I would give this place another try in the future.

0KX0VaEIneph9uoNYhGezA.text: Had the vegan chikn nachos. Big portions! Sad that it was so big that I couldn't possibly even eat it all. The marinated vegan chikn was very flavorful! It was a nice experience while in Vegas.

ceSum9XnID9bk6AMPR8uGA.text: I personally did not have a bad experience but I did witness the host, manager and one of the waiters handle a situation poorly. A customer complained about a server and all of the staff huddled into a corner talking about the situation and what occurred. Sadly, we could hear and witness what took place and felt appalled by the staff's behavior. They moved the customers to a different table (I would have left), but they were inclined to stay. Customer service is one of the most difficult jobs on the planet, so I understand, but take your personal views, complaints and opinions off the front end.

apnRwmA2wQ1yGKUd-o57bg.text: I love the pulled pork nachos.  Chicken Quesadilla is just so-so but the nachos are to die for.   Honey BBQ Wings were also on-par with others I have had before.

Aa7Gk5Sf-8HaXl0rB0zN8g.text: Even though downtown is known for being crazy (and obnoxious), a group of us went down there and ended up at Nacho Daddy.  Allie was our bartender and she was AMAZING!!!   She recommended drinks we'd never had and made them so good that we ordered several rounds!!!  We loved the food too!   We left full, tipsy and happy.  Definitely coming back to this location.

Oj2ynoSRn4iq1L6MrSrD_A.text: This place was packed when we got there and we had a table of 15. They couldn't seat us all together, but we didn't mind. The wait was an hour and 45 minutes, but ended up being less than an hour. Several people had put their name in for tables, but then weren't there when their table was called - awesome for us! The margaritas were great and if you check in with the Yelp App you get a free one with an entree purchase! They were very fresh! We ordered the bottomless chips (chips were still warm) and salsa. We ended up getting all the sauces, but I steered clear of the hot bc of the amount of sliced jalapenos in it. If you're in to heat you might like it. The medium had enough kick for me. Someone also ordered the lobster and crab nachos. I'm not a seafood fan, but they were good! Their queso is awesome! I ended up getting the Signature Soft tacos - one pork and one chicken. I could only eat one! Tortillas were fresh too. Huge portions, but extremely delicious and decent prices too for Vegas and really anywhere. Other people got enchiladas and loved them. Someone else in our group got fajitas and they lit them on fire at the table - super cool. Overall awesome experience and excellent food. I would definitely go back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Signature tacos. One chicken and one pork. AWESOME.
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

6xdlLJllkMTVyl1qObjCaw.text: Came into Nacho Daddy after a full day of playing in the snow up at Mount Charleston. Had the street tacos with lobster and crab and a skinny margarita. Friends shared Vegas Golden Knights nachos with margaritas of their own. SO DELICIOUS. Zeke, our waiter, and Giovanni the manager were so friendly and on top of service.  Definitely will be back!

V9jqzVnUm-bxO3LxGa8mSQ.text: Amazing! Shared the Nachos of the Month with my husband and it was perfectly portioned for two. Delicious food, excellent service. Our server Rico was fantastic!! Great recommendations and he made our night a joy.

-Qwv-2qqMdb36Ck3PMM80Q.text: Pretty good. We were visiting from out of town so finding a place that had vegan options was great! They had a whole page of Vegan options, I ended up eating the "Chicken" Vegan nachos, they were pretty good. The only complaint I have is the host wasn't very helpful, we asked about seating and she told us there would be a 20 minute wait, however there were open seats outside so I asked if we could sit outside and she said "oh yeah I guess hang on"

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margaritas for two yes please!

pBKP49DFmgq8Hc_sjtKhwA.text: Great food, awesome beers, good music and a great staff.   There is an impressive menu, we got the Golden Knight nachos and they did not disappoint.  One nacho order is enough to share between two people with an appetizer and a flight of beers.  One of the best atmosphere places we've been since we've been in town.  Worth tracking down if you are in the area.

vBmeHaWjstourlDcXMJYUw.text: Honestly, the strawberry margarita was bomb af (don't ask for it blended, or you'll catch some attitude), and the 2 bites I had of nachos were aight, but the service here is TRAAAAASH. Specifically the girl with the buzz cut and tattoos (See blended margarita attitude, complete with eye rolls and snap backs). No ones trying to pay to be disrespected. Also, they play AWFUL music with every screen playing the music video. I'm will to cut a little slack to the staff because who could be a good person in those conditions.

6mf5IVrY38SiMo0Vzyp4IQ.text: Wowzers! Nacho Daddy's is right next to the Fremont Experience in downtown Vegas. We came here because it was so close to the D Hotel.   It doesn't look like a whole lot, but don't let that stop you! We got here in time for happy hour. The strawberry margaritas are HUGE! Yum!  Then, off the Happy Hour menu we got the chicken street tacos, chimichangas, and Nacho Everyday Burger Nachos. All wonderful - full of flavor! Then Chris (the manager) twisted my arm to try the Fried Ice Cream Nachos! Chris - you are EVIL! That stuff is to die for! I'm on a sugar coma! :)  But one of best parts of dinner? ALEX, our waitress! She patiently explained everything, gave us suggestions on menu items, brought everything pronto, checked to make sure we were happy with everything- and then let us take her picture (even though she's camera-shy)! What a gem!  Great place. We may be back for breakfast!

S0yEdhsxv8Yiaa9EEt9ARQ.text: Oh holy hell! How is it even possible for nachos to be so incredibly good?!?! I'm a taco girl, not a nacho girl! This was a pivotal moment of change... Lobster Nachos. Those two words will make new forever look at nachos on a many differently and open to try them all one by one. I will wear my shirt proudly in memory of the 2nd best map in Vegas. (Sorry, that Wagyu steak at Hex was just incredible  and 8 times the cost!)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

QPMrZ6l9JWyVJ5454gpaIw.text: Okay, it's near Fremont Street, it's a sports bar and it's a tad divey and it was perfect.  Watched Hockey and football while enjoying a pile of nachos.  They have a varied menu but how could I not do nachos at a restaurant with a name like this. Our server was great and our team was winning...

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Seasoned Beef Nachos

M_UUWPqm8J4jOczXgf5hnQ.text: I've had their food a couple of times. Both were just okay. Had the enchilada nachos and I was absolutely in awe of how flavorless it was. Huge portion for the price. The only reason I ate what I could was b/c of the money spent. I've also ordered their soft tacos and had the same experience with unseasoned meat. Other than that, the staff has always been great. Maybe this place is just not my cup of tea.

Y5qVJznJkrRUWk4thFI0GQ.text: Love it! Great Atmosphere! Awesome Nachos and Rico our server was awesome! The margaritas are amazing and the nachos are mouth watering. I would recommend this place to anyone that's in the downtown area.

_jbUb55zE-nRNP2er89hdw.text: The food was delicious- large portions and homemade flour tortillas were the highlight. I also had coffee and was impressed by the French press service. Will be back.

O0IHVzC7fL3CLr2frBGDBA.text: A fun mixed spot to go for the unadulterated nacho junky. Evaluated somewhat steep BUT you get heaps and heaps of value for the cash. Stores of delightful, bright fixings. In the event that you like...love nachos, you have committed a major error bypassing this fun spot. Laid back and well disposed administration - get a few nachos - you will be satisfied.

HUok0MmgilUrf2aKsmJmpw.text: Great food without all the glam. It was our first night out of the strip and we Fremont St. and it was a blast. We decided to stop in for a few apps and the BBQ pork nachos are amazing as well as the spicy wings. The ceviche was what you would expect from a place like this but that was out bad. N

g9U9TeZvGF_d3eSGN683vQ.text: I have been to Nacho Daddy previously,  but first time to this location. Being from Vegas I'm accustomed to the many homeless that roam around Fremont.  However, I was taken aback by the number of homeless sleeping on the sidewalk outside the restaurant not 20 ft from the door. That can be pretty unnerving for people. Other than that the food was really good and we only waited about 10 minutes for our table.

ENYpSEJdCwm0pFby3BRmdA.text: I have been to this location a couple of times and usually the service and the food are all A+...however, today it was a little different..we arrived at the restaurant a little after 9:30pm on a Monday night...it took about 5 mns to get seated...no problem...we finally get our table and within 5 minutes, our drinks and food have been ordered....again, no problem...  After about 20 minutes, the food arrives....still no problem...the food was good, reasonably priced and well seasoned...BUT once our food was delivered, no one came to check on us, offer refills, or anything at all...until the check came...and then we had to wait another 20 mns for them to pick up the bill...they weren't even busy..I would have given 5 stars if it wasn't for the lackluster customer service...maybe next time will be better

E4EuKj9Td45xdCwE4cMvaQ.text: First time coming here, and it was fantastic!! Huge portions, fresh ingredients, and fabulous service. Thanks to Rico, and the rest of the staff. We will definitely come back!!

GVzAfx5yh1IZ1zuh91tpOA.text: Vegan and gluten free? No problem! I got this beautiful cheesy dish special ordered but they have vegan and gluten free stuff on the menu, and are so accommodating. Thank you Nacho Daddy for being progressive about people's dietary needs. Tailor behind the bar took care of me and she is a dream :) I just found my new favorite spot!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

pch4_T8nOfpeNnAhLkph_Q.text: The food was really good and fresh. I had the American tacos and the medium salsa with chips.

OEXcz8CGHzUdFu4vqRsXfQ.text: Fun atmosphere with really tasty nachos to share and incredible service. Don't forget to check in for a free margarita!

dKZEaoRKRepsHgDCpc3jQw.text: The service is amazing. Zeke was awesome and the manager Giovani was great and made sure everything was always fun. Thanks guys for a great experience.

zo8Ta3x86iBgU41D26BJJg.text: Walked around downtown close to midnight I was amazed at all the restaurants that were closed the only thing that was open was crap hole in the wall pizza, tacos, burritos yuck. So I came to yelp and found this wonderful establishment- it literally was walking distance from Fremont Street.  I will tell you walking up to this location and walking in it looks like a dump, but man oh man was I wrong. Arrived and was seated right away. Service was good nothing magnificent but the food OMG.  Lord was it good. Great flavor and so many selections. I for sure will come back here hands down. Do yourself a favor and don't eat that crap on free mint walk a few steps to nacho daddy!! Only one bad thing. Safe the calories,The free check in margarita suck.

UWMSAlVuOLeyMb473WG-DA.text: Large plates or very good quality.  Had cheese and toppings right to the end.  No dry nachos at the end.  Good place for a small group of people.  Nice variety on the menu.

ejZds3pQui2xSFhDpI46Bw.text: Went into Nacho Daddys, around 12am, was definitely craving some nachos. Upon checking in, I received a free house margarita! Thanks Yelp! So for my Nachos, I ordered the Cheese Nachos, plus added some pulled chicken, and bbq sauce. The Nachos were so good, I really picked some good ingredients, to compliment each other. I liked how the tortilla chips stayed crunchy, they never got soggy, so that was a plus. Stop by if your , around Fremont street.

51aou1T6PkTBw30V-x0EeQ.text: Amazing food!  Make sure you use the Check-in on Yelp for a free Margarita.  You will want another! The margarita choices are great.  The food was amazing.  The portions are huge.  My sister and I shared the nachos and got salsa and chips on the side simply for more chips WITHOUT cheese and yummy goodness.  We used them as a second layer.  Oh, the TEQUILA choices!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mother of all Tequila menus! I vow to keep MY clothes on.  You are welcome, Las Vegas skinny heifers!!

tezhrZOFI7UpEfLLjgPSuQ.text: We arrived around 2:05 on a Sunday afternoon. We waited in the front next to the sign for someone to help us. After 10 minutes, we were finally approached. We were told they are not accepting customers to be seated until 2:25pm because the "kitchen was backed up" and was trying to catch up on orders, however when we asked if we could sit at the bar, it was ok...Didn't really make sense but nonetheless, we found some seats available at the bar. I was already somewhat annoyed by waiting around but was so hungry at this point, I just wanted to order some food. There was only one bartender on staff at the time, and after another 7 minutes of waiting, the bartender apologized and said she'll be right with us. Nice gesture, however it would have been nice to have some menus to take advantage of the time we were waiting.  Finally, we got some menus, ordered some drinks (they have a free margarita with yelp check in) and ordered grilled wings and nachos for appetizers. The margarita was on the sweet side. Some of the wings were extra charred. I must admit, they do have several nacho options that all sounded great! We got the crab and lobster nachos. Flavors were there, but wish there was more to each bite. That being said, we would order this again. We ordered the baja seafood combo (fish taco and the lobster and crab enchilada with beans and rice), and the signature Taco-enchilada combo. Both of these dishes were extremely filling. Tortilla for the taco's were delicious and the enchilada was really good too. Prices weren't too bad either considering you're eating in downtown Vegas right next to Fremont St. At this point, we were stuffed and couldn't order dessert. Overall, the food wasn't too bad however our experience dropped this rating to a 3.

xQ3dvBMD-UWGnbpEjAhDpQ.text: Have only gone here for take out pickup but the ladies at the host stand are always helpful and smiley. The food is your pretty typical American Fare.

QtWfUxm-Nvkq9GhN-oqSFg.text: If you want Vegas with a twist you have to go to Nacho Daddy's. I always felt like I was an aficionado of nachos until I came here. They have so many variations of nachos that you can literally eat there for three weeks straight and still be happy. Expect a short wait but there is so much to do in downtown Vegas that you will stay entertained. The margaritas are good in the beers are cold. I love this restaurant

yoeUtW5VRpqu4eNsvVNAaA.text: I was hoping this would be my new hang out spot but the customer service is appalling.  Drink order right away. Food order 25 min later and taken after three other groups who arrived after me. Had to ask for napkins. Then when my food came I had to ask for a fork!  I waited on a for so long my food got cold, because I was sitting near the open bar door.  The server was more concerned about the hockey game on tv than her customers!  I should have taken a pic of that. Her standing with her back to the customers. Watching tv.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Got my food. 2 min no fork!!!!

R325GQih7DbnZC5cqdTYJg.text: Not bad. Nachos look huge, so I didn't get to order since there were only two of us. We had the guac and chips to share as a starter. I was a tad unimpressed by the fish tacos. Maybe I should've gotten them grilled instead of beer battered. My version just felt very, very greasy that it was difficult to push myself to eat it.

ijm15uO-Z4wVOOvhwwnlnw.text: Nice vegetarian options located on the old strip. The team was accommodating when we got cold outside and wanted to sit inside. It was pretty busy but our food came out quickly.

QxtTYf-PSxiLBcvvw-RmxA.text: We didn't want to eat at the restaurants in the hotels on Fremont... off  I find good breakfast downtown and that we did. Wonderful staff, amazing food and fun location. Had the chilequiles and steak omelette- both fantastic. We will be back before the end of our trip and next time we're in Vegas

V79DUPmr2yfJJ7jrgiyPPg.text: Amazing food, huge portions! Our waiter was fast and friendly! Highly recommended! Very cool layout!

0cARrS6g13GYIvY0ZA0Z0A.text: Hostess took care of me for a to go order, nachos where very good but I think they are a pinch over priced. But it's Vegas.

JmrPpvpuJwUngr8e8WNq-w.text: I loved this place. I had amazing Nachos and a free margarita for checking in on yelp!

d_EIL_TW1IDEuZwnxyPP0w.text: Immediate service. Fantastic queso. very friendly and also quite attractive server.  Great price. Highly recommended!

fFmPiptvJOaE9Rpe1QcnPA.text: Dang!!!! Stopped in after all the crazy of Fremont for something fun to snack on. Ordered the Spicy Shrimp Nachos and wow really delish.  Some bites definitely had some serious "heat" and though we've never had spinach tortilla chips they were yummy.  Mark, our server, was super friendly and attentive.  Will be back for the scorpion shooters!

fiFgFhj9y6A-ZXBgQRDedw.text: Good location right off of Fremont St. Friendly and helpful staff with a good bar setup. The food was fresh and well prepared, you really can't go wrong with this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nacho

MV3-6WEtnZYp9M--oQ0Tvg.text: Great nachos and great server Aerrick ... went for lunch and got seated right away. Variety on the menu and the drinks are good too! Walkable from Fremont street experience!

O3CTVFQiuvIgFPxeuDoTrw.text: The service was amazing!!! Our server was Alex and she was amazing. She was very attentive and always replaced my margaritas. The house margaritas are amazing. BUT they are STINGY when it comes to meats with your meal. I ordered ceviche and It had only 3 small shrimps. My friend ordered a tostada and it had lots or cheese but only 4 shrimp. It was very disappointing. The taste was yummy but the portions are ridiculous for the price. I would definitely go back to have margaritas but for the food go some where else.

n4XIYWgdVG6BVmsj726h8g.text: I came here on a Friday night during March madness to meet some friends and sat at the bar.  Service was good even though it was crowded.  My friend and I had never been here before and the waitress recommended the Fiesta Nachos as one of the popular dishes.  I thought they were just okay.  The chips could have been hotter in my opinion.  Considering this place specializes in nachos I guess I was expecting to be blown away.  I don't see myself coming back here unless it's another invite type situation.

otcj9QQOQ6QoYRKFtMEGBA.text: Amazing nachos!!!! Obviously. Fiesta nachos with not beans?? Done and done. Our server Jovanny was AMAZING!!!  ps- try the scorpion shot if you're feeling sassy

LXrbpzFJlRh2r9c_sAdYsQ.text: Wait was unexpected but its worth it!! Fun atmosphere and clean restroom!! Helpful happy staff. Thanks Mark and Jess!!!

iNh6ls76XSYZLcBfbqUb6A.text: Definitely a good place to get a meal. It's close enough to walk to Fremont St., but not right in the midst of the crazy. Great selection of food and drinks. Our server was top notch and the food came out quick. It was tasty and we walked away filled. My wife got the burger with the mango salsa. That salsa is delicious.

Gov_XqaFbTldfrrtZ1ssIw.text: I really enjoyed this place. It was one of the better restaurant's in the Fremont touristy area. I ordered the enchilada nachos which tasted like they sound. The portion size was just right or maybe more. The decor inside was hip and modern. I will definitely be back the next time I'm in town.   Oh and don't forget to check in for your free margarita which was great too.

yhgbxgMN5P_rGA9hT2O50Q.text: Make sure you have a reservation at 6. because they will have all 15 tables open and still tell you it's an hour wait. Host was an absolute rude girl . would not go back to this place just because of her. She stated everyone must be 21 and older at 6 p.m. at night ridiculous

nC6vcgWXUK_GIm0vvb1hYw.text: Two friends and I were passing through Vegas and we found a place that spoke our language. Nachos.   I have to say that after a serious summer long quest to find the best nachos, my search is over. It just happened to take going to another country to be this impressed. Nacho Daddy has an insanely good menu, out of the box combinations that will ring bells, great atmosphere and impeccable staff. Our server Luis made our night. He made us feel welcome, offered great suggestions on what to get to eat, as well as what to do while we were in Vegas. He was hilarious, personable, engaged in conversation and you could tell he was a very passionate person. It was so refreshing to have such a kind and accommodating server.  This place is a little nacho heaven.

2lVC932skPJcNsi74rRCKQ.text: We love this place!! It's a go to every time we visit Fremont Street! Best. Nachos. Ever.

RTKeXt32HV3poqO2JACiMQ.text: Food was great! 3 dip appetizer was delicious.  Order street tacos and tortilla soup which were delicious. I drank the skinny margarita but had to get have them remake due to they put soda water in it but was not listed in the ingredients on menu.

EpAviEg9nIvVgCQbxLkqYA.text: Enchilada nachos-delish! Great food, awesome service, and affordable. Did not disappoint this nacho lovin girl.

1ofz_xs-U1KnfMGPiRmL2A.text: Aerric was our waiter. Cool guy, great food, highly recommend. Been to Vegas a few times and make it a point to come here. Also get a free margarita for a yelp check in

Re3tU91S6TrWt7f2cZv2bA.text: Really nice food and the margarita were tasty! Portion sizes are big.  Service was outstanding  We just ordered the chips and fajita (for one) between us.. was plenty for us.  Anyway.. I would defo return here!!

c6YqRrj5QdQaMbNd5iST9A.text: Great place in the downtown side of Vegas. Had the filet minon tacos and they were awesome. They also have scorpion shots which I did not try but looked like a fun time if you're brave enough.

-3E0DQ7bXiuSLc17cjImEg.text: Food was awful ! Service just as bad .... then the bartender ,Anya, decided to eat on her break by our table , all the while opening her mouth full of chewed food to show her friends at the bar. Yummy!! Thanks for sharing Anya !!! All in all a complete waste of money!!!

8cafxABT7dRjEQT_we82bg.text: Great find while in Freemont! Filet Mignon Nachos are bomb! Our server Jovanny is was great, attentive, fast, checked on us often. Great service, great staff, great food! We will be back!

wenK6dmRjFbYwX2jR19a2g.text: The place is cute but the food was ok not horrible but not great either. I was hoping it was going to be better i suppose i had the lobster nachos and they were ok not the best and i had a scorpion shot which was pretty dope.

DleoC9NNdNukUqbimYfd4A.text: This is the second time I have has lunch at this establishment.  Location is north of the strip (is actually in the old downtown section) so traffic actually moves and parking is pretty accessible. This makes any foray to this area much easier and and quicker.  Both times I've been here, I've parked within 100' of the restaurant's entrance.  Nacho Daddy is a pretty cool themed fusion nacho bar.  Portions are decent sized and reasonably priced.  Menu has variety that should appeal to most anyone's palette subject to Mexican type food.  The service was fast, personable and delivered with a smile. I am giving it a four star because the interior's seating is comprised of bar, high stool/table seating, or table seating that is in close proximity to each other, noise off hard surfaces is difficult if one has a hearing impairment.

6Tcm3tYauAxV0i_5n8MZEg.text: These nachos are legit.. Our fav has been the Thai Chicken Nachos.. The Lobster Nachos are also yum.. Amazing queso too.. Service is a bit all over but they are always busy.. The food makes up for the wait.. Downtown location had better service!

ftMcEPbfQ93tzU_DNvtRQQ.text: Dope love it it's great great vegan food right by where we live everyone is nice....................................

yv2Gj5G6jn_HiKOxdJA1mg.text: We weren't sure what to eat downtown but saw some reviews and decided to try here. It looked like a hole in the wall but it was a hidden gem! Our server Kayla D. was the sweetest and she gave excellent service! My boyfriend and I were very happy with the supreme nachos! A little pricey but so worth it! Wings are good as well! Will definitely be back once we come back in town.

RmZk1D5vDndr3sCWFI5J1g.text: I love Nacho Daddy!  Been counting the days to get back in for some amazing nachos and margaritas!  Always delicious and I am already recommending it to friends for when they come to Vegas!  Our server Alex check on us several times and made sure everything was to our liking as well as offering recommendations as to what we might like.  Another wonderful visit!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

z64MOIOD_aZ754-fRqpiDg.text: I absolutely love Nacho Daddy's food; however, the service at this specific location was HORRENDOUS! The hostess made us wait 35 minutes, after telling us we had a 20 minute wait - the same table that was open when we got there was open 35 minutes later. It was not reserved and we had to ask to be seated at that table. We waited another 10 minutes for a waitress. We then ordered our drinks - it took 15 minutes to get 5 waters. The waitress brought 2 waters, then 1 more, then the other 2. The table was filthy and we had to wait more time to get it cleaned. Mind you, during this time frame the restaurant was not busy - there were open tables everywhere. We finally ordered and waited an hour and 10 minutes for our food, while the two tables surrounding us were seated and ordered after we did, receiving their food 20 minutes before we did. The two people at the table next to us were visibly upset that the waitress (same waitress as ours), forgot their coffee and a refill of chips for at least 15 minutes. After speaking up about our food not being served on a timely manner, the waitress was seemingly annoyed and very rude, stating, "I put the order in, there's nothing I can do," and walked away. Once we received our food she said, "See, it came." I'm absolutely appalled at the service, disrespect, and idiocy that we encountered. I will not be returning here, and neither will the other 4 people with me. This was a birthday celebration, a lunch that took over 2 hours to complete, and it ruined the happiness surrounding our birthday girl. Nacho Daddy can do better - get it together.

cwmjNEGWsJSFIhywz9GUiA.text: The food was excellent. I had the pork street tacos that were packed with meat. I sampled my friends nachos and all three were great. Everyone liked the food with no complaints on that front at all. The service on the other hand was slow and we didn't see our waiter very often. It didn't appear the restaurant was that busy either.

VixZLTozpna-3jFrkmOkLA.text: Really awesome Nachos! Service was good as well! Can't believe I didn't snap photos! Will return to this place next time were in Vegas!

wGJMU9BIJuxi-EAVdwVs7g.text: So I ordered the kale chicken and egg scramble with quinoa salad. It was amazing. Super fresh and filling and I will defiantly be back. I just love ordering healthy food and it actually tastes good.   Side note I ordered it through Uber eats. Usually food like eggs are only good in the restaurant when you order them and get it hot. But this was still good Luke warm.

DdALQCsj3_a-mRRL_zotwg.text: Where to begin besides WOW! The food here was amazing and there was so much I couldn't finish my nachos. My husband is vegan and tried their beer battered avocado taco. He was beyond happy. I had the bbq pork nachos. There were delicious. The service was superb. Our waiter was friendly and answered all of our questions. Everyone needs to try the vegan nacho cheese. It is unbelievable and I'm not vegan, I couldn't get enough. There is something there for everyone morning, noon or night. We are so glad we tried this location.

6yLQe5q8qi7pTa66Wu2CeA.text: Went here with my hubby and friends tonight. It was the best food I've had since I've been in Vegas! Our server Nico was awesome. Ordered our food, it came out in less than 10 min! We had the fiesta nachos and the enchilada nachos. They were  both flavorful and amazing! And their margaritas are so good. We will definitely be back next time we come to vegas

Gg4mRYTZPzsMyJiXYQrDig.text: Vegan, in town on my honeymoon. I've been craving vegan nachos since I went vegan in 2017. This is the BEST vegan Mexican place to eat. Ever. Trying to conceive my husband to go back everyday day that we're in town.

1qbmkvF6h1RwCA3S2iQbow.text: The evening before we came in and were treated to the best food we have had in Vegas with MJ, Ruban and Jaylon. Not only was the service fantastic they each offered great advise on the menu and were personable . This is the only place we have visited twice and more than likely will be back once more. We came back a second time and we're happy to see Jaylon, Mark and our server Rebecca . Happy hour specials were something to write home about . The breakfast burrito made my boyfriend cry tears of joy

I also got the triple dip. The salsa taste like water tomato paste, and the chips were WAY over salted. The queso was super good though. If food tasted better I wouldn't mind the price at all. But I feel like I wasted calories on a less than mediocre meal

50kO1sbd3HK-SlLZNp36lw.text: Food is good but the service sucks! Definitely need to teach the staff to be more attentive to the customers. The hostess are not at all worried about getting people in and seating them. Had to ask a couple times to get a table.

vqV_D29B0PNvz6AEughzMg.text: First time trying this place and I am glad I did! Plus I checked in on yelp and got a FREE margarita They have delicious food and drinks! Giovanni our waiter was awesome...he was friendly and attentive. The wait time was just right!

vtpOCMfwIiwLZ5RvX5g_7A.text: Our waiter Jovany is super amazing... great service and made our experience exceptional!!!  Thanks Jovy!!!

KUA0sf7oX-kh_HbvusXBVQ.text: Jovany is the dopest waiter ever and this spot rocks!!! The margaritas are second to none and the scorpion shot will put you on your ass!!!

J3SOrCL03ViAZ1gftIiPIA.text: I was a little wary of this place because the bad reviews it got were so bad. But I decided to try it and I was not disappointed. We checked in via yelp and got a free house margarita. Now usually house margaritas are pretty pathetic. But this margarita was one of the best ones I've had. So delicious and perfectly made.  I ordered the filet mignon nachos and my partner ordered the tostada nachos. Giant, heaping plates of food were put in front of us, and I was taken aback at how much was on the plate. But it was good. All the ingredients were perfectly proportioned and spread out nicely across the plate, so you got a little bit of everything with one bite. I had no complaints at all about what I ordered.  The service was good as well. If our server was busy, the manager came by and checked on us. All in all, it was a good experience.

PwTR24b1VCQNd3eMEqiKow.text: I came to this place twice and so far, it always was a good experience with them. I've got the bbq chicken nacho, it was bomb with a huge portion. Although the wait line could be long during the weekend but their servers always so nice & attentive. Definitely will be back !

6wRxm8B9oHeGpNir_TSOGg.text: Awesome spot !! Cool vibe , easy service with smile and the food was delicious !!  I had a business lunch and we walked over to Nacho in the blistering heat , but it was worth it! I ordered the fajita salad and it was just the right size and price ! The chicken was plenty and the tortilla bowl was fresh , which is huge .  Slot of places use stale "bowls" too often and it ruins the taste of the salad .  I was impressed all around and our waitress Ally was great! I would definitely go back to the DTLV location that we patronized today!!

ZtJXf3prb-FAy8CwaQ2XVg.text: Great atmosphere! The margaritas were amazing and good sized. We had chips, salsa & guacamole, all were super good and authentic. The Vegan loaded nachos were also outstanding. For someone never finding good vegan cheese, this was a treat for me! Definitely would recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

QhbeVi9gCpfkb3AzrHGj7g.text: Festive, fun, and decent food, this visit to Nacho Daddy's was ok. The location on the strip is much better when it comes to staff, service, location, ambience. The bartender, Anya, was not very helpful, didn't seem to have time to make recommendations, never came by to ask if we wanted more margaritas, and was just generally indifferent. We had sloppy joe nachos, street tacos, and house margs. It was a disappointing experience compared to the strip location. The only redeeming part of the evening here was that the margaritas and food were good. They didn't even offer scorpions in he tequila shots.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bar area

dFFSzE9p8qr2B7qmqYtOlw.text: Good portions.  Good location. Not lots of seating but adequate.  Friendly server.  Lots of selection.  I would recommend it to others.

mMteumqANgZqF2Oibq96vw.text: Last night in Vegas, and we ended up back on Fremont.  We saw Nacho Daddy and I am glad I did!  We started off with some queso dip and Mexican corn.  The queso dip set up was too cute.  They had it on top of a candle to keep the cheese warm. The corn was good also.  I ordered the filet Mignon nachos and hubby got the chicken burrito.  The burrito must've been good because there wasn't any left over.  My nachos....can we say delish! The portions there are huge!  I couldn't even finish half of it.  The steak was moist and tender, it was just good .  I'm so glad that this was our last stop on vacation! Oh and I forgot to mention the free house margarita  It was small but it definitely packed a punch!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Nachos

4_yUqfuQILYtUbd_WhDyhQ.text: It been here before and the food's pretty good but the service was just OK. On this particular occasion When they brought the my food are they gave it to the couple sitting next to me and after they sat with it, looked at it or whatever they did because I didnt notice, they offered it to me. thoI don't wanna waste the food so I took it But the managers  offer was this measly $4 off the bill. Everyone was very apologetic but you can see what they will willingly do about it. I doubt very seriously if the couple and I were reversed if it would have gone that way.

fAbqFL2ZgonThfCZSpnD_Q.text: Nacho Daddy was a good respite after walking around Fremont street on an empty stomach. They have variations on all sorts of nachos and if you consider nachos as a family meal, this place is heaven. We had the fiesta nachos and Thai chicken nachos. I wasn't a fan of the Thai chicken but it was a good attempt and I liked the flavors. The fiesta nachos were your standard plate of nachos with Mexican toppings. This isn't a place for a fancy date (not that Fremont street is the first choice in taking your SO for a fancy date), but it's great to have a beer, eat good nachos, and watch the game.  It's somewhat loud, but the service staff is nice and accomodating.

vlTqBQubmamz62IsugIxWg.text: Do yourself a favor order the Cali burrito now ! It's worth  every penny. I'm eating it now . It is amazing!!  It's not a traditional burrito it's something completely different , try something new and different in a burrito it's comes with chips and salsa.

IaUbL1cj0y6WgmMCptntkg.text: This place is bomb! Really good margaritas and micheladas and our server Giovanny is always attentive and great of vibes .

LTcBVG1WSxeHitukazlBIA.text: Nice atmosphere; very nice waiter and good food. Mikey our waiter was awesome and made our visit even more enjoyable; very friendly, gracious and professional. We'll definitely be back again. Only reason I did. It give it a 5 start is that the portions are a bit small for the price. Similar places give you more for less money. Still recommend it for good food and atmosphere just off the noise of Fremont street...

PLYRC1RzkiSPSl7-FOkvRw.text: I was trying to give this place 3.5 stars, but it looks like the option is only 3 or 4.  Nacho Daddy is located in the heart of Downtown, Las Vegas, just a couple blocks down from where I work. I've tried several of their dishes and have never walked away with that "wow" factor. Their nachos are very satisfying, and they come with a heap load of toppings to ensure that every chip has some kind of yumminess on it. The BBQ nachos are the best, in my opinion.   I've tried their filet beef street tacos. The beef is cut into very small pieces, and then topped with a sprinkle of onions and cilantro. The food is then placed on two mini corn tortillas. The tacos do the job, don't get me wrong, but the meat was a bit overcooked to my liking, and I had to add a bit of hot sauce to keep the tacos moist. Again, not a terrible meal.     My favorite thing on the menu is their fish tacos. This is definitely a dish I would go back for!! The fish is slathered in herbs and spices and then thrown on the grill for good measure. The well flavored filet is then topped with cabbage and a little salsa, but the best part is the thick handmade tortilla it comes on. Everything works together well, and two of these babies will definitely leave you with a smile.   The service at Nacho Daddy is okay, and the environment is relaxing with a nod to the famous 90's bands playing on the TVs. All in all, I'll be back.

Ofm7-vmC1xtOKg9fQGMeZA.text: Quite possibly the best Mexican food I've ever had.  Flavorful, good portions and the drink menu was outstanding too.  I'll definitely be back on my future trips.

VnIN2ni09kSMJguuQ3_2Lg.text: Nacho Daddy is exactly what I expected from the name and location: Overpriced pseudo-Mexican food.   I dined here with 3 other adults and one baby on a Sunday evening. The dining area was pretty busy, we were told to seat ourselves at the only available table and a server came over fairly quickly to inquire if a highchair was needed (it was).   We started out by ordering drinks, I had a moscow mule which was served in a silver mug (I should dock Nacho Daddy one star just for that BS). For an appetizer, we got the triple dip which is queso dip, guacamole and salsa. The guacamole was chunky and looked great but lacked seasoning, and queso dip came with sliced jalapenos in it however no heat could be detected by anyone in our group, which became the standard for our evening.   My husband got a combo which was a 1/2 a sandwich and a bowl of the ghost pepper chili. My brother in law had the ghost pepper chili nachos. Both commented on the lack of heat in their meals. The shrimp bowl I had was fine, as was the quesadilla that my sister in law had. Nothing was exceptional though.   For me there are too many good places to dine downtown for me to go back to a place that was 'just okay' anytime soon. Sorry Nacho Daddy, you just didn't do it for me.

5KXWeQpe3Ikm6ifbpgTHBA.text: I love the food here. You have to order the cheeseburger Nachos, they are amazing.   It's a great little set up in down town last Vegas. Great place for a drink & food.

pK2iRksDb1P70Zkm2usvAw.text: We had an excellent meal with friendly, efficient service.  I would recommend Nacho Daddy in downtown Las Vegas to everyone.

m-nYPLiXQfxaOyf7b_GL6Q.text: Stopped here for lunch. Had chips and salsa, not overly impressed. Hot salsa was not hot, medium was very mild. However...ordered the tacos (American beef for me, Signature pork for my husband) and they were AMAZING! We were very impressed and will definitely be back again. Drinks were cold and served quickly. Great Mexican food at Fremont St.  **Update**   We never eat two meals at the same place while on vacation but we loved Nacho Daddy so much that we went back for dinner. We ordered tacos and nachos. Again, loved every bite. Go to this place. You won't be disappointed.

0NvppTizrIuLZp7a01thrA.text: Food was amazing! We had the breakfast taco, the chicken chimichanga, and the 4 cheese nachos - all delicious!!!! Highly recommend the breakfast taco! Tara was our bartender and she made us some delicious margaritas and was very informative - awesome experience all around!!!

Xwfl2XEIP0u0vE8Ek21jRg.text: I had come to Fremont st just to do the usual walk & watch all the crazies. The group all started getting hungry so I quickly yelped something with a vegan option. This place looked like it had some great options. I was the only vegan in the group & got the vegan spicy burrito with cheese & quac & it was amazing! My carnivore bf even agreed! We also got the chimi (pork & beef) which were huge! I recommend sharing! But they we very good everyone agreed. We had someone get the Mexican corn & breakfast burrito which was awesome too. We had a group of 8 & eveykne found something they loved. I would def recommend for ppl to go there especially if they have a large group with diff tastes. I really appreciated the nice sized vegan menu they had. The cucumber jalapenos marg was very spicy but interesting!

I have to say the free check-in margaritas were amazing.  I definitely wasn't expecting it to taste so good. (I'm also not a margarita person; drank too many one time oops!)   They also flame the fajitas in front of you which is cool.   I think Mark was our server that night and he was super attentive and friendly, coming to check on us several times.   Pretty chill / casual environment. Not overly loud, but a good amount of people in the restaurant. They also have a bar area.   Would definitely come back for the margaritas.  And maybe their breakfast food next time.

uWaQpv4mSikoidoIDfKYdA.text: We've visited Downtown Vegas so may times, but never stopped at Nacho Daddy for whatever reason.  Big regret! This place serves up some great tasting nachos!  We also ordered the Mexican grilled corn, that was tasty too! We ordered the supreme nachos with seasoned ground beef, Pico de Gallo, guacamole, cheese, and homemade chips.  The chips were so light and airy, almost like flour tortilla chips. Large portion, fed the 2 of us no problem.  Bonus was the free house margarita when you check in on Yelp!  They gave us the option of upgrading to a specialty margarita and give us $8 credit (for each drink) if we wanted.  We stuck with the original House margarita, you're also given the choice of on the rocks or frozen. When in the mood for some nachos, we'll definitely be back,

3dRG_e5pQg3tXPMzfs5veg.text: Hello i went to nacho daddy on friday the 5th for lunch. When i left, my server picked his own tip from my cc. I didn't want to leave one because of how awful the service was. We waited 15 minutes before we were even offered a table. We were looked at by servers walking around but never once acknowledged us until 15 minutes later! Then we both were without drinks for periods of time while they walked on by. I get busy but not bad service. For the server to commit fraud and charge my cc for his tip is completely absurd. I highly recommend cash only as apparently the servers consider your credit card theres to charge whatever they want for tips regardless if you're okay with it or not. FRAUD WARNING!!

tsK96CjC2HGRDzj-ULumiA.text: TL;DR + Killer mexican grub, great portions, delicious drinks, good atmosphere, great service - Seating area can be a tad cramped, maybe a wait YMMV  Orale!!!  As if the name wasn't enough...this place is no joke.  Visiting LV and some friends and I were deciding on dinner.  Tossup between here and somewhere else. Glad we chose Nacho Daddy.  Service: Seated promptly, served quickly.  Mark was our server and he was incredible.  Great recommendations on margarita flavors, food options, checked back often enough to make sure we had all we need but was never overbearing.  Food: Food was great.  Friends had vegetarian nachos, a HUGE burrito that looked like a baby swaddled in a blanket smothered in sauce, and I opted for the street tacos.  Started with chips and queso.  Queso warmed at the table via candle and that was a nice touch as who the hell likes cold queso?  Other restaurants, step it up! I'm tired of slamming my chips and queso because you serve me lukewarm cheese that turns to Lake Placid before I'm even halfway through the chips.  Lock it up, ya'll!!  Portions, needless to say, were huge.  Street tacos were *la bomba*.  Nachos looked to be delicious and although the burrito was massive, my friend finished it, so plus on not having to lug a to-go box around.  Bevs: Got two pitchers of margaritas, the mango and blood orange.  Both had equal portions of flavor and booze.  For sure thought we'd get shorted on the tequila, but after the first pitcher I knew that was a lie.  Overall this place is a huge win.  Will definitely make it point to come back next time I'm in LV.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Street tacos !
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Keep the queso warm! This needs to be a standard everywhere

34S0SOTPtE96k35y6m2Jvg.text: Just arriving into Vegas my family decided it was time to eat. We've looked around for something different, and came across Nacho Daddy. Based on other patron reviews we figured to give it a try.  We were not disappointed!  We were greeted as soon as we walked in and offered a table immediately.  Our server came over to our table just as we sat down and had a super awesome attitude. Grabbed our beverages quickly and took our order without delay.  Once we did get our food we were surprised by the amount of the serving! It keep me full for most of he day. My son ordered the Nachos with cheese and jalapeno and to be honest, he ate every single last nacho on his dish. He was in heaven. I had the bbq pork and it was surely on point, the bbq sauce and pork were perfect. My wife ordered a chicken chimmey changa and it was massive. With the size of that order the chicken was perfect and the crispyness of the changa was perfect.  Overall I would tell anyone who wanted to try our something more then your average run of the mill eatery to give this place a try. It was welcoming to my family and the food was delicious.

Mi_fk8CGHoBACXXCouB0bg.text: Way overrated. I ordered some mignon nachos. Tasted more like sweet chili. Wasn't very happy especially when I got the bill.

ySFrM4kuEMJhfyyOFZ6zCQ.text: Came here on the night of St Patricks Day after going around Fremont for a while. When we had arrived around 12ish 1am, the hostess told us it was about a 45 minute wait for a table but seeing there was room at the bar, we sat at the bar immediately. As with most places in downtown, the establishment is kind of old and dirty and it being a bar, it was kinda dark too.  The bartender tended to us almost immediately after we sat down, giving us food menu and asked us for drinks. We had ordered some margaritas as well as use the check in offer for a free house margarita. We ordered 2 items of food to share as well.   Supreme Tostada Nacho - seasoned ground beef, cheese blend, yellow queso, refried beans, pico de gallo, fried jalapenos, lettuce, avocado lime salsita, sour cream & guacamole on top of house made corn chips - despite the price of the nachos, it is probably one of the better if not best nachos ive had. Granted i don't normally get nachos but with the few places i have, this is much better. Lots of toppings. Ground beef seasoned well. If anything, there was more toppings than chips. After the first initial chips, we started having to fish for chips. By the end, we asked for some forks to help eat. Lol   Grilled Mexican Corn on the Cob - basted in seasoning, cojita cheese, cilantro, garlic mayo and fresh lime - small pieces of corn. Maybe 1/3 the size of a normal corn. 2 per order. Expected more. Flavor wise was pretty decent. Would have been nice to have more cheese.   I personally ordered the Blood Orange Margarita whereas a friend ordered the White Peach version and another had the free House Margarita with yelp check in. Apparently mine was the strongest? but since i drank mine first, the other ones didn't taste much different. LOL except sweet :3 I'm a fan of blood orange drinks, be it alcohol or non-alcoholic (San Pellegrino).   Service was pretty good. Got immediate attention as soon as we sat down. Got waters. Got drinks. Food came pretty fast. Pretty attentive staff. Not bad besides the location.

MSXQ4G9nND9U3fSKziLe3w.text: The food here was amazing! The Quesadilla was my favorite. They have large portions and we definitely ordered more than we could eat but I just couldn't choose from all of the good options. They have a full page of vegan items to choose from and are located right off of Freemont. If you're looking for good vegan food this is the spot. The peach margarita is good too.

I could not stop eating them. I also had a blood orange margarita and it was delicious! Be sure to take advantage of the free margarita with Yelp check in. Thanks fellow Yelpers for the tip! I will definitely come back to this place the next time I'm in Vegas.

P8XcApq_7GIOwDcNSh6vrw.text: We always come here when we stay downtown all you can drink Bloody Mary's, their cornflake French toast was off the hook. Great food

JYPJMwa9yl-_a8q4xcb-7Q.text: Woooooow Brycen and rico where so helpful and they gave us full description on our entree and perfect service they literally made our experience so amazing !! Im sooo happy ima come back!!

dphIQ5hFdKbEDELwBDTOvg.text: The free margarita with check in was a wonderful treat before receiving our entree, the supreme nachos.  These nachos provide an amazing flavorful experience, the mixture of jalapeno, guacamole, and cheese provide the perfect combination. The service is quick and the servers are kind and helpful!

_aP4ommH1baWNMY-68Yrvw.text: Service: The customer service is excellent. Everyone is very nice. Dalvik was serving our food, while Sara was our waitress. Both were very helpful in my decisions to pick my food.  Food: margaritas were great. White peach is way better than the house original.  The appetizer ordered was the extreme tostada nacho. They were great. Real tortilla chips. Ground beef. And cheese. Great cheese. And it comfortably fed four hungover people. (Big plus on that) I ordered the chorizo breakfast burrito. The chorizo was mild and not what I find in a Mexican supermarket.  My girlfriend ordered the green enchilada. She loved it. The sauce was the most notable. The refried beans however, should have came from a different can. The rice was good. A little crunchy but the enchiladas made her forget.  The big day burrito was fucking good, said my friend. He ate it all.  The big daddy bowl was excellent.   My opinion, if you were raised in America with parents making Mexican food, you'll love it here; it's great Americanized Mexican food. If you're an immigrant, you might want to stick to the hole in the wall down the street.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

JUSRFm-_sm04gWFHSeru4A.text: Food was fantastic.  The vegan menu is surprisingly decent in size and options. Recommend anything with the vegan chickn. Service from our  waiter Luis was also great.

8NZ7fpN8gGb9RkWeRc-lHQ.text: Ok...  so lets preface this review by saying we rolled in here at 2 am, completely annihilated.  We didn't order any drinks.  We were WAY past that point.  We did, however, need sustenance.  So the 4 of us split some wings and a plate of nachos.  Both were hits.  Service was grate, they were well accustomed to our kind and we're funny and didn't get annoyed with the drunken antics.  We sat outside so I can't really speak much to the inside except the bathrooms.  They could have been a bit cleaner but at 2am on a saturday in Vegas, beggars can't be choosers and I was just happy they were functional. The guys actually wanted to come back the next night for drunk food, it was solid.  If you happen to be downtown late at night, you should stop in.

HxY0smzaMY84lAQyR7XXZQ.text: I went a few times after my initial review and I'm glad to say I gave it another chance. As always the staff is friendly and very attentive, the atmosphere is casual. I'm in love with the enchilada nachos (green sauce) and the frozen margaritas  I find myself craving their food ALL THE TIME! My best friend is in love with this place & I'm glad she dragged me along once more to give it another try. Super cool how you check in on yelp and get a house margarita for free! Love it!

hQvQC7Caq_gHUBQJj5USCg.text: I have eaten several times and always have received awesome service and food that is incredible.. Highly recommend this place.. Taco Tue? 3 for $5.. All are good but pork is my favorite!!

DIwQUGgKteXC3-6iW5LVCA.text: Yummy nachos and G was very nice and on top of it!! Always a good time when we come here!

4WAI8JnoHUtdySF3cW57_Q.text: I wish I could echo all the good reviews but unfortunately can't.  We had the filet mignon nachos and they were meh at best. First, the filet was overcooked and tough.   Secondly, there was so much beans they overpowered the other toppings and made the chips soggy. And although our waitress asked for extra cheese there was hardly any and it was all dropped in one spot, so basically on like three chips.   Third the toppings are only on one layer. For this price point, and considering nachos are the main schtick, you'd think they could sprinkle and melt some cheese on the bottom layer.   The guacamole and ranchero sauce were good and so was the service, but overall I left feeling like I had just had poorly assembled, overpriced bar food and not a specialty dish of a restaurant with a main focus on nachos.

YnsgrNJJwxtu1z-lFzf-Hw.text: This place is awesome! What a friendly atmosphere. Highly recommend this place. Second visit in as many days.   The staff was extremely friendly food was great.  Kadene is great!!!  Bring all your friends for a delicious meal

We had house margaritas, fillet mignon nachos, lobster &crab nachos and their AMAZING queso dip(seriously freaking amazing). Food was great as it always is, but I do feel this location doesn't focus on customer service, felt it was more get in get out. This space is also a lot smaller than Summerlin ,which causes it to be a bit overwhelming when trying to enter and exit because there are such large crowds around the entrance .

k2fl-5n1x5C8R38geR_T8Q.text: This place is great it's right off Fremont and centrally located. All the staff is super friendly. When I was in they were super busy but still had great service. I will definitely be back for happy hour. I had their chicken burrito and it was great. They also only charge a dollar to add guacamole and I'm pretty sure that you can't find that anywhere anymore especially not in Vegas. They have a deal if you check in on yelp then they give you a margarita with the purchase of an entree, they even do it on to go orders. The only downside is my food was ready before my margarita. I will be back again.

oJ1XI4j71AFdLpPpZnsrDA.text: Saw this from Fremont street and decided to come in! After reading reviews I definitely agree!  Everything that came out of the kitchen looked great! Me and my boyfriend ate one of their famous nacho dishes and it's True, there wasn't a dry chip!   Our server, Erica, was attentive and sweet, making sure everything came out how we liked!  Check in and get a free house margarita! It was a little sweet but my boyfriend doesn't even like tequila and he basically chugged it!  Great spot and not too expensive!
