nkRRoTyWFp76siQd9hxcSw.text: Great scorpion shots, a completely new drink that is a must . Yes a tequila or your favorite liquor shot with a real scorpion inside .. must try it .!

5khOj86kfKgylt9Jel79NQ.text: This was one of the biggest food let downs I've had in a while. I was really excited about trying their Nachos, expecting something unique that would set them apart from typical Nachos at any other bar/grille.   They were certainly short handed, because we ordered our drinks and then after what seemed like forever, we had to find our server to make our order.  I ordered the Enchilada Nachos, my wife ordered the Vegan Nachos, my daughter ordered the chicken fingers.   It was alright. I kept thinking that I could have done far better myself. Maybe I just ordered the wrong item, but my wife absolutely hated her Vegan Nachos. So I tasted one of hers and the cheese tasted horrible. She almost asked them to take it back, but we couldn't find our server for so long that she ended up forcing down half of it by the time he came back around and it didn't seem right.  My daughter's chicken fingers were very good! At least they got that right.  So, if you're looking for nachos that make you say, 'meh', get the Enchilada Nachos. If you are starving and long for cheese that tastes like melted plastic, get the Vegan Nachos.  But if for some reason you find yourself in this average restaurant and you aren't the 'risk-taking' type, ask for the kid's menu and order the chicken strips. They are called 'pull my finger'.

SBmGp6-mcOtvzPQzdgIIJA.text: Stopped here after getting in from a late flight to Vegas.  The staff was friendly.  We ordered the wings, cheesy nachos and the filet street tacos.  Food was great but I would have liked to try something else from the large menu options.  The nachos were simple, I wish I would have gotten one with meat on them.  Tacos with filet were yummy.  The waiter gave me a free shot for my birthday.  If you are adventurous..try the scorpian shot!  I was too chicken but it looked interesting!

e7_u3jrHC_5OKTGQN7nitA.text: The Five Stars is for the service by recieved by Ric.  He was awesome through the entire meal.  We were greeted inside and it was a beautiful day out despite the wind so we opted for the patio seating.  He said no problem and immediately noticed the table needing to be wiped be cause of rain and dust in the air recently.  He quickly got a rag and took care of the issue with out us requesting.   Good eye Ric.    He took our drink order promptly and brought them out at the same pace.  We were not in a rush by any means but ussually we like to get service going quickly because of the kids and there short attention span.  Ric followed up for our order when he could. There was another group asking him what seemed like 1000 questions but like I said I understood the circumstances.  We were just enjoying the weather andthe kids were coloring because Ric was ontop of it and brought us the color pages and crayons.    We began to inquire about food options at Nacho Daddy regarding portions and veggie options and he informed us they had an entire page dedicated to Vegan eating.  Sweet! Mom said.  This was our first meal of the day even though it was 5 in the afternoon.  So Ric quickly brought us a great bucket of chips, two salsas, and cheese dip like queso fundido type thing.  All were very good. Salsa tasted fresh and homemade with a little bit of heat.  Cheese dip was good also.  Mom went with the Black Bean Burger and could not decide between garlic or sweet potato fries, Ric quickly responded with I can split between both if you like.  Awesome job again my friend.  I went for the BBQ Pulled Pork Nachos, which had very good flavor and a huge portion.  My one issue with this dish is that it tasted like the pork had been sitting in the hotwell all day so the meat was very tough and chewy.  My jaw bones seriously hurt after finishing this dish.  I am not one to complain but that issue did not stop me from killing the entire plate.  I give the dish a 3.5 star out of 5 because of the chewyness. Mom had no issues with her burger and fires she had no trouble crushing this dish either.    Overall great first experience.  Ric made it 5 stars.  He is possibly one of the best in all of DTLV.  We had to speak to the manager to let her know about how great Ric was.  We will be back to visit Ric soon.  The food was also good enough to come back and explore the menu further.  Thanks for the good time.

qjObOjWi2wubWkhcZPEHaw.text: Nacho Daddy's is amazing! We were on Fremont street late at night, and we needed food. We had seen the name the night before, and thought it sounded good, so we decided to go there. Best place we ate during our whole trip! I ordered the BBQ Pork Nachos and the portion was HUGE. Delicious!! My sister ordered the cheese enchiladas and it was very tasty. I had the Daddy's Margarita. For $10, it had more alcohol in it than the huge drinks on the strip!   Very very delicious, and I will make sure to eat here every time I come to Vegas on vacation.

Took dad on Father's day last year...he made sure to keep telling us..."I'm nacho daddy!"  Little on the pricy side fyi...

QY0OOMtzP3yun0eNL4o-8w.text: I only come here for the vegan food. Worth it every time. The vegan chick'n nachos are too bomb. Don't forget to order a margarita, they're huge and delicious!

aYnWV78If12IVyR3cobwBg.text: We decided to go to Nacho Daddy because it's super close to the hotel we were staying at on Fremont Street, and the photos posted here on Yelp looked great. We paid $50 before the tip for two entrees, a 24oz mug of beer, and a margarita. While it's a bit pricey compared to a standard Mexican restaurant, it's very understandable once you see the portions. They don't skimp on anything here! I ordered the four cheese nachos and they were the best nachos I've ever had, and I don't think that was the shots talking ;) There wasn't a dry chip on my plate and the chips were strong enough to hold all the cheese and jalapenos. My boyfriend ordered enchiladas and it came with refried beans and Mexican rice, also looked great. The peach margarita was perfect. We went for my birthday and our server offered me a free shot, which K9 looked like straight tequila; it would have been $7 if it wasn't comped. I made a reservation on OpenTable, where their site redirected me to, and it looks like I made it for 9pm instead of 6pm, when we went. The hostess didn't ask if we had reservations because it was slow enough, but it started to pick up when we left around 7pm. Our server was great at making sure we had everything and we're happy with how our food was. I've never been to the one on the strip but I'd definitely recommend the downtown/Fremont location.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cute sign over what looked like the server station
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Four cheese nachos, enchiladas, and peach margarita
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Peach margarita and what *was* a birthday shot

56Lyri6kq-FN4GcSVTb1DQ.text: Located right off busy Fremont Street, Nacho Daddy gives the feel of a dive bar right off an otherwise crowded street party. You may have to wait a few minutes for a table, or if you're like us, score a couple seats at the open bar. Bartender is attentive and gave great service. We had the nachos supreme (I mean, c'mon, who goes to 'Nacho' Daddy but doesn't have nachos??). They were PHENOMENAL. I'd go back just for those. The margaritas were great, made fresh, not premixed. Grab one to go when you're ready to head out!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho Supreme..mmmm...

fyPJLk16NkStt2oRDT9FLA.text: Amazing!!  Had our first lunch in Vegas here. It's about a 15min walk from our hotel the Monte Carlo. We ordered the enchilada nachos and the buffalo chicken nachos. Both very good, but the enchilada one was amazing. Consist of Green salsa with pulled chicken refried beans and of course cheese. We ate it so fast I didn't even take a picture.  The buffalo nachos needed more queso blanco, I had to order a side of it because it felt like I was just eating chips covered in buffalo sauce.  The strawberry margarita was very tasty. I def recommend.   The next day we wanted to come here again but wanted to give other restaurants the opportunity. Now I regret leaving Vegas without visiting this place twice. Back in Texas we are searching for something similar.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Best strawberry margarita

hoAr1HkJsHDbViyPjHdxgg.text: seriously i have never seen a scorpion shot until Nacho daddy it caught my eye and became the topic of the awkward dinner we were hosting lol how about some scorpion shots

KkiTy3xK6A6bFAMlKUV6sA.text: Downtown Las Vegas has plenty new, unique, and tasty restaurants. I wouldn't go so far to say that this is one of them.   Shabby, not chic, Nacho Daddy's a restaurant that feels and appears rundown. Music videos from the early to mid-2000's serenade diners as they crunch down onto their exotic nachos.   Kale Salad ($6.95): What a way to make someone feel like a heifer digging in the grass for the "good stuff." This is an enormous bowl filled with kale and sparse toppings of avocado slices, chunks of grilled corn, and cherry tomatoes. Too much kale and not enough toppings. The dressing, which was an oily citric concoction, didn't add flavor.   Filet Mignon Carne Asada Nachos ($16.95): We paid 16 bucks for some bland-ass  nachos. Though they were loaded with guacamole, pico de gallo, refried beans, cilantro, and "filet mignon,"  these were disappointingly flavorless.   The carne asada nachos here don't even stack up to what my neighborhood Roberto's offers, or any kind nachos offered elsewhere. Not worth the trip, the cash, the calories, and waking up to the feeling of regret caused by the previous evening's dinner.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Carne Asada Nachos

OASYineanbemNxMcEHkM8w.text: Krystal was our bartender today. She was very nice and made me a michelada that I greatly needed. The Golden Knight Nachos are delicious- nice place to chill out near Fremont Street. Well definitely stop by again.

3eAXcnX0oSLgy18JsCZdCQ.text: 3.5 stars for the food (good, not GREAT) but we had good drinks and good service so I rounded up. The location is just around the corner from Freemont Street craziness so I liked getting out of there for awhile, too. This location is much smaller than the one by Planet Hollywood (in case you wanted to roll in with a big group).

xXwbds-gs7oqd_PMblrrXQ.text: Love, love LOVE nacho daddy! I am a huge fan of nachos and Nacho daddy is one of the best. I have had several nacho options and my favorite ones were with ground beef, instead of chicken. The nachos are loaded, like they should be. Perfect chip to toping ratio. I love the cheese they use and the sauces are delicious. I have come here many options and each time it does not disappoint, very consistent food. I even ordered the nachos to-go and they were just as good. Would highly recommend! The menu has so many options, as well as vegan friendly options.

f62kX4f-ffC8NwETRorvcw.text: Great prices, great vegan menu, great nachos!  Can't wait to go back and try the Pad Thai Nachos!

9MiYfgGmyg2lTmbnyvhk0Q.text: Delicious food! Great service! Definitely recommend checking this place out. We got the Filet mignon nachos and fire shrimp tacos and both were amazing! We checked in on yelp and received free margaritas!

BZk92WWaJpri9CyRXRfXtA.text: My wife and I had the Fire Shirmp tacos and Filet Mignon nachos. Both were excellent and would highly suggest going here for a date night.

FqxQIljw76HLjcFfzkm8Dg.text: Amazing place from food to service and staff as well as overall atmosphere. Nacho selection are second to none with a wide variety for all varieties of taste buds. Drinks are great and very well priced as well. General manager seemed to be the major reason for the success and great service of this place. He is respected and loved by staff from what I saw and his interaction with them and the customers show his extreme passion for what he does. Definitely recommend this place to anyone that has the opportunity to visit. I will be back!

2TNu_3qrUAXi4QXSiORE_A.text: Great food in a fun environment..  Had the Vegas Night Nachos and our server Rico was was awesome!

lsdLDo3XGn6ztIj0l6C_cQ.text: Wow what a difference from the other nacho daddy near the Elara, came here on Sunday for the Veterans day parade and had the worst service ever, ordered a beer and it took 7 min to arrive, next ordered chips and salsa along with a breaker taco, the taco arrived but no chips and salsa. Alas, the taco was missing the bacon as well, must have left it back in the kitchen with the chips. Cancelled the chips order and had them bring a slice of bacon for the taco. Server never once checked on us through the entire meal, had to get order corrected from other servers loading by. Aside from the service, food tasted good, probably won't come here again.

dxW8RnANfdqCAT58FogdYA.text: Was in town from Los Angeles and needed a place to grab a Dope vegan meal before we hit the road back... and my oh my did the vegan Quesadilla hit perfect! The house margarita was a plus

6N_qIzt1h0eT1xTZqqIXuA.text: Really spectacular happy hour!  It's not a vast happy hour menu but the drinks have a good pour and the nachos are tasty!  Bar staff is on point.

m9r8hyJa6FYvhupkS7FtzQ.text: Short review this time because hubby and I just stopped in for appetizers.  They do have a 'free house margarita' when you check in with Yelp; however, it's only with the purchase of an entree.  We started with the unlimited chips and salsa, and asked for both the mild and medium salsa, which was not a problem  We also ordered the chips and queso, which is a white queso, with pico and jalapenos (on the side please).  Hubby ordered a regular margarita with salt and I opted for a frozen without salt.  They're served in these little mason jar things and were surprisingly yummy (and you could taste the booze).  We had originally planned on ordering an entree to split; however, by the time we put a dent in the chips, salsa and queso, we were full!  Next time, nachos or bust!  When we told our waitress Perla M. that we were too full to order an entree, she explained the free margaritas with yelp check-in required an entree purchase.  Completely understandable (and still a very generous offer) and we said 'hey, no worries, we understand' and she said she'd try to 'help us out'.  She returned a few minutes later and said she was able to get our drinks comped for us!  That was completely unnecessary but very much appreciated!  We will definitely return when we're back in town and I highly recommend everyone give them a shot - if for nothing else, the customer service was amazing!

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bottomless chips and salsa ($3) (mild and medium) and chips and queso ($8).

ePzKjkyId8kgLfaBK1zhxQ.text: Fun spot with great food and service. Jovanny went above and beyond to look out for us. Whole page of vegan options to go along with bomb nachos and Mexican grill choices.

NAt47xmqtAhAuH25npQ7zw.text: Don't show your free margarita coupon. They'll hate you for it. They'll go talk to the food runners, they'll clean on the other side of the bar, they'll clean glasses but they will not return to take your order. They won't return to ask how the food is. They won't return to ask if you need anything. They won't return to ask if you need the check.   It was like a broken boomerang you throw out that never comes back. Much like myself and this business.   Maybe work at a "bar" downtown not a restaurant if you hate your job giving out drinks and food so much.

z425DE9GXlBZpsRIMCv-dA.text: Visited this restaurant for a quick bite around lunchtime. The restaurant has a lot of televisions, which is perfect because it's March madness. I ended up ordering a pineapple mint margarita, which was amazing. For food we ordered trio of white queso, salsa, guacamole. The white queso is really Siri and this also is really in; however, in the guacamole could've used a little bit north. Additionally the waiter was a bit overworked, there was a long delay for my margarita. It was sitting at the bar for 20 minutes before another waiter brought it to our table. I would definitely recommend visiting this restaurant if you like nachos.

v2h2-pG0WkEFqjTpU8N9tg.text: I wish we had one of these in Denver!!! Nachos were great! I had a peach margarita which was so delish. I could have had a lot more of those, they're dangerous! Service was good, prices were fair. The only thing I was upset about was that we didn't have time to go back and try other menu options.

au3kALcc7pdRmLJRwkwfuw.text: Where so I begin. We choose outside seating And we didn't get any attention/service or drink orders for 20 minutes after we asked. Our server was less than enthusiastic.  Took additional 10 min to get drinks. Finally food came and one order was wrong had sour cream when it was requested no sour cream. Our server was just like "I told them" and walked off. NRckIt2RlwQFFETeFPTXaw.text: Visited this place on St Patrick's Day, looking to try it for the 1st time. I was with a party of 6 and asked the hostess for the wait time. We were told about 1 hour which was fine with us. About 50 mins later we checked on our place in line. With an attitude the hostess said, oh theres another party so it'll be at least 30mins.   There was no mention of another party when we were initially added to the list. I understand that things are busy but the nonchalant, oh well attitude of the hostess was not ok. You only get 1 chance at a 1st impression. I will not say that I will never try Nacho Daddy but I guarantee that I will never be back at this location.

O1QREYfV8BQhAD11CWZZog.text: Great food! Amazing fast service! Rico was our server and he gave us such great service! Greeted us very quickly, was friendly, and knowledgeable. I like that they have quite a large vegan menu and options. I am a local and always love coming here. 5 stars for sure!!

0VPdRRJ6M2QZfkUE8YAyzw.text: Came here for my birthday dinner - food was great! Portion sizes are generous, I split my order with my husband and still had leftovers. They even brought out dessert nachos with a candle - love it! Would definetly recommend.

E3afdPAqjLK-S3gzhnY3sw.text: I felt compelled to login into my yelp account to give a well deserved 5-star review.  A member of our party needed food badly and ordered before the rest of us. Unfortunately, there was a mix up and those who ordered later somehow got their food first. The waitress and manager were extremely apologetic and remedied the situation by providing our party with chips, salsa and a round of shots! How great are they? The food was fantastic (pulled pork nachos, ceviche, chilaquiles and shrimp tacos.) We also enjoyed a pitcher of their house margarita which was delicious. If I could give this place 17 stars I would. Thank you for the hospitality Nacho Daddy!

pP7_KMv5OU_3KiEiQFDW2g.text: This is by far the best mexican grill we have ever been to, authentic and almost like a hole in the wall kinda thing but it is not, we thought they only serve nachos LOL! The place is nice, clean and cozy, full bar, awesome food and awesome service!! Ask for Jovany, really cool dude. All kinds of different nachos, but get the lobster tacos, filet mignon tacos and their queso dip!! Double thumbs up!

qop2MYtxoErBsdQS52aB2A.text: They get 5 Stars just for the Lobster and Crab Nachos. Establishment is nothing special but service was 4 star so I left pleased.

xqohvPkXuO9wOV6H8HQ4pQ.text: We were sightseeing in the Fremont area with friends and decided to eat dinner there.  We found Nacho Daddy's. Being from Texas we are sometimes a little hesitant having 'Mexican' food away from home.  Our waiter was amazing.  He explained the menu items we had questions about.  We began with an order of quesadillas and child and queso.  He even brought us an extra order.  The queso was blanco so that was a bit of a surprise but still good.  He brought my friend and I a Birthday shot of tequila since we mentioned we were in Vegas celebrating our birthdays.  Everyone enjoyed their dinner.  This is a must go to place if you are in the area.

g_nJ02z0_QBF9fsottGFKg.text: Downtown off Fremont street, great hours to go after a long day - night of partying!  It's a dark divey type of vibe, low lighting.   The service was great! Prices were high, but food was nicely done. Caution: everything has a kick to it, spices are great for those of you that can tolerate a burning in your mouth type of sensation. I was happy that the pork wasn't so spicy.  And the fried ice cream with the churro chips now have a special place in my heart.

wI3jaV5Ad1x95wBo012bFQ.text: Pretty decent for americanized mexican food but I expected a place with nacho in their name to do a much better job with nachos. We left satisfied and the service was good but nobody in the group was anxious to return.

cTBwyZGeSrOi1ExuviVK2g.text: Catchy name for a place, so I had it on my list to try during this visit. Plus I like Mexican food in all forms, so hanging out here should be easy.   Turned out to be a good place to grab a solo lunch. I came in around 12:00 pm on a Monday and was just about the only customer in the place (save for the woman on her laptop at the bar, I really was it). Surprising, so I was instantly concerned the food must be bad. Or you'd need to be liquored up with a bunch of tequila to be happy here, which wasn't on the menu for me. Fortunately, the food did not disappoint but more on that in a moment.   Let's talk 'bout yo daddy...  Nacho Daddy is larger inside than it appears from outside. There is a spacious wraparound bar and a separate dining area with plenty of seating. There is also outdoor seating with umbrellas, although they had to take them down while I was there due to excessive winds.   Server Nicole was down to earth and cordial. She was training a new guy and he seemed to be catching on quick. The manager came over to say hello to me, his sole customer. : ) Nice touch.   Oh and the food. I had the chicken taco and can honestly say, it was one of the best taco's I've ever had. They mix some kind of pesto sauce into the taco that complements it very well.  I commented upon this just before leaving and they weren't sure what it was, but were glad I liked it. Well now, I'm glad too.   The manager's cool. The staff nice. The food excellent. The environment very comfortable. I'm not sure why it was empty both before I arrived and after I left. Maybe it's just a quiet Monday. I'll bet the place lights up at night.   Definitely worth a visit if you're downtown. Lots of options on the menu. And if you like tequila, this is your place.

QYOg1qy80U7D4C84gvM9eQ.text: Awesome spot for margaritas and nachos (and beer). Good location and great food.  Sit at the bar for awesome service from  Jovanny.  Super attentive and quick. Definitely a great place to hang out and get your fill of tequila and nachos!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Excellent daddy&#39;s margarita now that we&#39;re back in town!!

RaL21Tyn_HDGTRbaT8pTDA.text: Wow, they make one of the best margaritas I've ever had. Strong and refreshing, and also free with a purchase of an entree with check-in (although our server wasn't strict about it)! I ordered a second one after finishing the free one and it was much stronger than the first, although that might've just been due to a different bartender making it.   There was a 20-25 min wait when we came here around 5pm on a Saturday, so we opted to sit at the bar instead, which also has the full menu available. We got the filet mignon nachos and the surf and turf taco combo. The nachos came with a lot, probably enough to share between 3-4 people. There was a good amount of toppings but the filet mignon was overcooked and dry. The tacos were a good size for an entree and had freshly made flour tortillas that are very similar to Singaporean/Malaysian roti bread instead of the traditional texture. Loved the flakiness of it!   Fun atmosphere and they played a lot of 90s/early 2000s music, which was cool.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Surf &amp; Turf Taco Combo
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Nacho
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. House margarita, free with check in!

esxKG5GDJCYC7rM0suN8iQ.text: I met friends here while I was in town . First let me say this; I'm not a huge fan of Tex mex style food or even Mexican for that matter so I was skeptical.  I was pleasantly surprised by the flavors and presentation. If you're here, get the Nachos -it's what they are known for .  I don't eat nachos because i don't eat cheese but they actually had vegan cheese so i ordered the Chinga chicken nachos hold the beans, sour cream and sub vegan cheese.  It was massive. Enough for 4 people with some left over. And only like 13 bucks.  Lots of tender shredded chicken and other toppings so your chips do get soggy .   Margarita on point abd you get a free house marg if you check in !   Pros good food /drinks and great service  Cons: very loud . You can't hear the people at your table .

3j9J-AGQR5KjAelyN-r5uQ.text: Nacho Daddy has the bigger location on the Strip by Harmon. It also has a downtown location. It's hard to say which is the better one. Let's just say they're both good. The drinks and food are the same at both so I like either of these.   It has a few differences in the atmosphere. It's not as big as the other location. This means it's much more crowded and harder to find a seat. It's better to bring a smaller group. They have about the exact same menu as the other place. If you check in you get a free margarita. Just that is enough to get me here, but I have been happy with my food too. It has all kinds of choices for those with dietary restrictions. There's many choices for vegetarians. I like the burrito. It's very dense. They pack a lot into it. It has so much to choose from. The vegetarian tacos aren't too big but they are good for a late night meal. It comes in three tacos with a side of beans. It's about $10, which isn't more expensive at most places for this kind of item. They use vegan cheese, which melts like the real thing.   It has so many good items to choose from. Be sure to get the nachos. These make a terrific group platter, and yes they have vegetarian versions.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita And The Vegan Tacos

UEfLXLA0BbgVsA_qf89xeA.text: Hands down, Nacho Daddy is the BEST Mexican restaurant in Vegas.  We stopped in for some late night eats Friday night after having a great time in downtown Vegas at the Fremont Street Experience.  Nacho Daddy is easy to find, and is near SlotZilla.  We ordered a couple of items to share (lobster tacos and fiesta nachos) and Daddy's Margaritas.  Everything was SO YUMMY!  Our food was served hot and fresh.  Both the lobster tacos and the fiesta nachos were so good, and loaded.  They definitely do not skimp at Nacho Daddy.  And let's not forget about Daddy's Margaritas...WOW!  They are served in huge glasses and are perfectly sour...DELISH!  This place gets crazy packed on the weekend, but well worth the wait. On that note, Dear Nacho Daddy, I LOVE U, and can't wait to see you again...lol! Love, Michelle

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

iT0kzzfmrsjYVnu57X89Rw.text: Ok from the outside one might walk by the side street from the Fremont experience and see a sketchy place from the outside but once you get in you get great music, windows wide open and great menu.   We wanted some vegan/vegetarian options and they had an entire page dedicated to vegan Mexican dishes.   I had the vegan nachos and my wife had the vegan quesadilla that she raves and ranted about.  My kiddo had the bbq wings that he devoured.   The service was fun, polite and super prompt.  I also walked in and checked in with the yelp app and got a free house margarita with an entree order so, score for me!!  So don't let the exterior fool you and enjoy the great fare and inexpensive drink options (especially during happy hour)  Enjoy yourself folks!!

6YYxbZxJmLiY3IkArftCbQ.text: Last Saturday, the Mrs. and I decided to take an impromptu overnight trip to Vegas. After checking in at the El Cortez, we made our way over to Nacho Daddy in the 93 degree heat.   We arrived close to 1 p.m. and the place was busy. Being that Nacho Daddy is in a major tourist area, I expected the crowd. We waited about 10 minutes to be seated, which wasn't bad. Sabrina arrived to take our order and asked us if we wanted to start out with a Margarita. After all, when in Vegas, right? I ordered the Cadillac Margarita and the wife ordered Daddy's Margarita. Both were really good and the size of the Margarita's are very generous.   I think building a restaurant concept around nachos is a great idea because nachos are sharable and are a very social food. Nacho Daddy does a great job in taking nachos to another level. On the menu, Nacho Daddy lists their nachos under "Traditional Tastes", however, in my view, many of the nachos listed are far from traditional. We decided to go for the gold and ordered the Supreme Tostada Nacho.   The Supreme Tostada Nacho was piled high with seasoned ground beef, cheese blend, yellow queso, refried beans, pico de gallo, fried jalapenos, lettuce, avocado lime salsita, sour cream and guacamole on top of house-made chips. It was a feats for the eyes and the stomach. Two people could easily destroy them....and we did.   There are also other things on the menu like tacos and fajitas. Several people around us ordered the fajitas and they smelled incredible. The menu also has several Gluten Free options as well. A full bar is offered is for those of you who aren't into Margaritas(If you aren't then that ain't right.).

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nacho and what was left of my Cadillac Margarita.

pHtC4Ui9HTWQQ8wmPEO98Q.text: Delicious!! I'm so glad I tried this place. I ordered vegan nachos and they did not disappoint. Chips were crispy, cheese was actually melted, ingredients were fresh, and the spicy had a perfect spice to it. It was a bit pricey. I guess the experience?? Whatever. uTST5aO4sbmS8N9Pnyo9Lg.text: We had an awesome brunch at Nacho Daddy!  The bottomless mimosas were stellar: we tried them all and my favorites were classic and pineapple, and strawberry was great for those who had a super sweet tooth. We did have a bit of a wait as we went during a busy time and they were running low on glasses.  My enchiladas rancheros were great and very filling.

4TjOt4Qf-CL12f4ZCUVFZQ.text: Best vegan option in downtown Vegas. Chick'n tacos w/ vegan sour cream are to die for. F@#k the rest, this is the best.

xFwOD5uYkPr-FILn4IOQrg.text: We had no idea where to go and the pictures on yelp of the food looked good so we walked over and asked the host in the front to text us when a table was ready. Maybe 10-15 min  High TV screens and bar-like seating surround the joint, and should you have a large party of say 8-16, there's 2 large, long tables in the back.   Our server was so sweet despite how hectic it was in there. The margarita's are definitely worth it, I finished 2! And if you can't finish it--ask for a 2-go cup.   I got the Nacho's and I almost finished all of it. It has a hint of spice to it, but incredible flavors and toppings... the chips are crispy and what's inside is fresh. I like mine with extra sour cream!   Over all, whatever you get on the menu is going to be good, and the food will come out quickly. There's a ton of servers in the place and it's not that large too--you'll love this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Story
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummy!!
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nachos! 10/10

rKOSn7qQumFLwfEWKmLSog.text: Our 3rd time visiting nacho daddy and it did not disappoint! An error with a large group in the restaurant resulted in an extra scorpion shot which our waiter generously offered to us. It was... an experience! Food was delicious as were the drinks!   We split the filet mignon nachos and it was plenty for 2 people.

PdFuD3Kv4hKOhsIKXpbm9A.text: Based on the star rating and reviews, I expected more.   First, the service was meh. Maybe because they're on the end of Fremont and expect everyone coming in later at night to be a drunken mess. Maybe because the bartender just didn't care? Who knows. What I do know is that we sat at the bar top and the bartender was more focused on speaking to everyone that worked there rather then us.   The food tasted great but made both of us feel sick after. Not to the point of getting sick, but the uncomfortable feeling in your stomach when your body tells you that was you consumed was a poor choice. If it was just me, I wouldn't have given it a second thought but it was both of us and we shared food.    My experience clearly wasn't the best. I most likely won't come back obviously there is something about this place that people really enjoy. Could have been a one off that our time here wasn't great. Best to try it for yourself and see what you think.

zjOZN-A3uaXVLFH46fK3SA.text: Service was terrific. Great environment and orders were cooked to perfection. Awesome drinks.  Jovanny our waiter couldn't have been better. We had the combo fajitas, chicken quesadilla, and fajita burrito. They were all cooked to our liking.  Will definitely come again!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Fajitas*

mF2oPB_xSL8t68jpNO7dlA.text: My wife an I are in vegas this weekend for our anniversary and last night 8/24 @9pm we decided to take a walk down Fremont... I was craving food and my wife recommended this place... We get there and are greeted by a host she asked for our information and wrote all down on a napkin (red flag #1).... Told us it was going to be 10 minutes so we can get seated...im over here thinking sweet....  Now this is where you find out why this place is getting one star... 4 huge parties of 5 came up and her Manager (big tall bald Caucasian man) comes out... Doesnt even look to see if there were people waiting for a table at the host podium and starts seating the groups down.... (Red flag #2)  This is where it gets good... The waitress now comes out with a tablet and is checking people in... And is seating them inside Now my wife is irritated so she asks the hostess if she remebered we were here  The hostess asked for our information again and entered it into the tablet... When asked why bigger parties were being sat before us she stated that it was because they needed to sit a bigger tables.... And other parties of two were trying to be seated and were quoted 30-45 minutes... Well maybe that's because your "bigger parties" just filled the stables we couldve sat at...  So we gave it a little longer to give them the benefit of the doubt   The Manager then comes back out not looking at the tablet once again and is seating people left and right.... By this time I am completely over this place and my wife and I left..... The worst communication between managment and staff...no customer service better yet a lack there of... If we wouldve been sat we wouldve been in and out of there.... But this location rather seat larger parties to make more money as opposed to seating small ones...  And to put the cherry on top to this beautiful 1 star rating.... We then get a text at 10:40pm that our table was ready.... We both laughed it off and went about our night

sgUQ-3AemEzng0qS0Zn0BA.text: Yes. Yes. Yes. Good, strong Margarita. Yes.   Great guacamole, salsa, & queso. Amazing fajitas....Honestly some of the BEST Mexican food I have had in awhile.   The dining area is a bit "rustic-industrial" and LOUD with great music...however if you want a quiet "comfortable" dinner....this probably isn't your place.  I thought it was a bit pricey...but you get what you pay for....so don't expect cheap food & Margaritas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita. Yes.

0sUOd-TitfV59MTyZrXYXQ.text: Nacho Daddy is a nice casual place for great food and drinks of the stop of old Las Vegas. I'll being going back to Vegas for sure and be coming back! I first used Yelp to find someplace to eat,a review I read,if you do a review you get a free Margarita! What Free?? I'll get on that. It was the best free drink since bing in Las Vegas! So make sure you show your sever the code for a Free drink! I went with a Raspberry,has fresh Berry's In the drink!             My friend an I shared a meal Flit Mignon Fajitas,very yummy! I asked for lettuce to wrap up in other then the flour tortillas. The lettuce gave it the right amount of crunch and was very tasty!

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Fajitas* close up

wSuv-oF3XiZNzG94zo2mgA.text: Yum yum yum!!   My friend and I stumbled across this place while walking around Fremont Street the other night. He is a carnivore well I am a vegetarian and I remember seeing something about this place having vegetarian options so we decided to check it out. Let me tell you, I was impressed!  I should also say that I'm usually pretty picky when it comes to Mexican food but this place satisfied me. We each got margaritas, he got the daddy margarita (regular margarita) and I got the blood orange margarita which was absolutely fantastic and very strong so beware!   We also ordered some queso as an appetizer which was good but nothing special,I would say better than velveeta but not necessary to get again. The pico de Gallo and guac were on point though - and that's coming from a Texas girl.   I absolutely love the fact that they have a whole page dedicated to just vegan options. Trust me when I say that means a lot when I am able to eat a good amount of food at the same restaurant as my friends. I ordered the vegan chicken quesadilla which was phenomenal and tasted great even reheated the next day. It came with vegan cheese and seasoned chicken inside as well as vegan sour cream,guac, and pico. The cheese tasted like they used follow your heart cheese - for those that are picky (like me).   For those of you who are brave and have a strong stomach they also have something called a scorpion shot... yes it is exactly what it sounds like. It is a shot of tequila with a whole scorpion it it. No thank you. Personally I'd rather spend $21 on a margarita or two but my friend did it and it was kind of a fun little novelty thing. They also give you a souvenir shot glass if you do the scorpion shot.   Overall Ill definitely be back! The people were very nice, the service was quick, and the food was great!

Tq5lm_mQZS_97iRq7I7uJg.text: I got the Las Vegas Golden Knights Nachos which features filet mignon and both liquid and grated cheese.   The Nachos were so good. Previously, I had a bad experience with the pico de Gallo here. Don't even risk it, it had old tomatoes so the pico de Gallo tasted like a grainy salsa. It was so horrible.   However, the dish without salsa/pico de gallo is really good. My SO got a lime peach margarita which came out quickly. The service was great and the food was a nice snack.   The nachos are pretty big so plan on sharing two dishes (one nachos and one entree) between two people. Two entrees and a nachos to share is way too much food.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegas Golden Knights Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bar

lLGMbrSiUbr30KfeTA7wMg.text: Great service and amazing food. Britney was amazing start to do finish. Very attentive And catered to our every need. We needed specific accommodations do to food allergies and the manager Debbi  was so helpful to ensure everything came out correct. Thank you!

3Jst5ENUUnCtALg1WVzT5A.text: I like this place they give good amount of portion on food. Not your authentic Mexican place but food is still pretty good. I would good back again.

Ud1N9giYoz77_CzjR57V5Q.text: Decent food but any place with two $ signs and paper napkins I just can't get behind.  For that much money I want cloth.  Sorry.     I did enjoy the mason jars and attentive bartender.  A little on the pricy side for what it is but overall it's a nice atmosphere.  Wish them the best of luck and I appreciate them being in downtown.

Rq81p2eiIyZtzWWlJL4R5w.text: First time at Nacho Daddy!! It did not disappoint!!  Had an amazing lunch with great service!  Stop in and say hello to Elicia!!!  I can understand why she's so passionate about the food and company! I'd recommend the fish tacos!!!  My lunch date raved about the fajitas!  Megan makes a mean margarita!

RR2-vNrmRCVBZSHqwLLCew.text: I originally wrote a brief review of this restaurant indicating that it was merely average and Yelp removed it from their site because it lacked specific details.  Well, here's the specifics.  The margarita I ordered was not bad nor was it great, i.e., it was merely an average, ordinary margarita.  The grilled fish tacos were bland which constitutes neither bad nor great, i.e., they were average.  Finally, the beans and rice were as average as you would expect from a chain restaurant.  There was nothing distinctly favorable relative to the flavor of the margarita, the fish tacos, the beans, or the rice.  This place isn't bad.  This place isn't great.  IT IS MERELY AVERAGE!

61UbwHt7kdOJuQChhAdqug.text: The food was excellent!!  Shrimp tacos were out of this world! The service was excellent too!  Will go back next time we are in Vegas!

ZM7SLqxwZbGTMYu0-MfWrQ.text: A great place for some food and brews. I make an effort to get here more than once a week. The food is excellent, the beer list is awesome and the margaritas are the best in town. When you can't choose a drink, count on one of the friendly bartenders to lead you to the right drink.  Just a great place to watch a game, listen to music, live music or comedy. It's never dull no matter what day of the week you stop in. Oh and by the way, the breakfast line up is up to par.   Have a blast insisting one of your friends do the real tequila shot with the scorpion.   I just love this place! Food, entertainment, service, and drinks!

bKl2VlVnzvlooqH6TQ6Heg.text: Slow service. Food is okay but totally oblivious if you sit outside. Happy hour specials are ok but we ordered 20 minutes before it ended and it was well after before we received it despite they were not busy at all.

QHzZ9LjLBAv2EadfyQNK4A.text: Holy crap this place is good!  We just came in for some nachos and beers.   Turns out it was happy hour (3pm-6pm).  So we added a few more Mexican drafts and we got the ceviche as well.   G (one of the bar tenders) recommended to add the grilled corn on the cob to our ceviche.   G was on point and the ceviche with grilled corn on the cob was !  For those of you who can't see  the emojis IT WAS FIRE!   If you come to Nacho Daddy get ceviche add grilled corn on the cob.   We'll be back

OtwTm9wfKp5-Tv_b9_PAbg.text: The addition of Nacho Daddy downtown will offer another great place to watch sports and enjoy great food 24x7.  They could have the best coffee menu options downtown as well.

96qXvukr7re7e6pnRrVInQ.text: 10/10 would recommend this place to anyone in Vegas! The food is great, drinks are great, and the service is even better! Love it!

ZQZfcM7S4tVELcKk5yQAew.text: Tried this place at life is beautiful and since I'm vegetarian I got the vegetarian nachos and they were the worst I've ever had! All the ingredients were dry I had to eat the chips separate and the dried ingredients would keep falling off the chips. I mean at least melt the cheese or get some real salsa. And for $10! What a ripoff.

CkEOfLO0BXlp971e-xcaFw.text: Went for lunch and the service was super fast. The food was filling and the flavors were great. We ordered a burritto and the Super Tostda Nachos. The nachos were great, toppings on every chip the way nachos should be.   I am definitely going to add this place to the list of places to lunch downtown.

QsCQdH2MEELkJeA9PhF38g.text: This was my first time to Nacho Daddy and I was pretty excited about it since I've seen them around town and my friend said they had pretty good nachos. We were also in the mood to have some margaritas so we figured perfect! We ordered our fiesta nachos and the nacho burger nachos or something like that, both of which were super yummy. We had a super nice server named Luis who gave us great service and sold us on not getting individual margaritas. He said we'd be better getting the pitchers cause we could get 4-5 margaritas each for less price so we were like done! Took 2 pitches between 5 of us. When he came out pouring the first pitcher it only filled up 4 of them just over half way. He had to use some of the second pitcher to fill ours more but then stopped half way through the second he realized we were clearly being shorted. He left with the still half pitcher and came back with it filled back up. In the end we all only had 1-1.5 drinks each. One of my friends asked for a manger and explained to him the situation and just felt like we were a little shorted and we were really nice about letting him know. Honestly we probably could've gone without even mentioning it and leaving barely satisfied with the situation but we decided let's just let him know. The first thing out of his mouth when we explained to him he said so you only had 1 1/2 drinks each? That's hard to believe. Ok no big deal. We just elaborated and he seriously did not care AT ALL about it. He was like well I sent you out a whole new pitcher and we were like well you took the half filled pitcher back first and just filled it with ice. After the shortest discussion ever he literally said ok well have a good night. I work in a customer service industry as a manager and it's our job to, even if there's not much we can do, to make sure the customer is happy. I'm not exactly sure how he was trained as manager or if customer service is of ANY important to Nacho Daddy but that was my first experience with the company and it's left a sour taste in all of our mouths because of it. The managers name was Rob apparently and I can't express the extent of how he just could not be bothered with us and in no way were we "those" kind of customers. We just wanted to let him know and he gave two shits about it. I don't know if any of us will come back, who knows. But total douche of a manager and that sucks cause other than our experience with him...everything wasn't too bad.

ekjrKVo9XXgBKXxirAblyA.text: Second time I've been here with friends and we had to sit at the bar because there was no where else to sit. The food is good, the service is good....but this is the second time at the bar that we've ordered something that we never got but we were charged for it on our bill!

uMWKRFnjrueKS_ScbVEaAw.text: Nacho Daddy downtown on 4th St is really cute. Loved the decor and the servers were very nice if not a bit slow.  I ordered the steak burrito with red and green enchilada sauce on the side. The presentation was nice but the burrito was just okay.  The enchilada sauces were tasty though!! I might go back to try something else as I always like to give places a second chance.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak burrito

jGJFqZqSvNaGklHGzH3xrw.text: My wife had the shrimp Nachos and I had the pulled pork. Large portions and both were very good. We both had a margarita they were decent about what I expected. The bartenders were very helpful and knowledgeable. We definitely will stop by here again when we are in town.

O9GADvVXJ_g1jKShZh40rw.text: The vegan nachoes were so, so, so good. The service was a little gruff, but not rude.

oYO-1tKDDZfEI79oyIDrYA.text: Every thing was great, service, food, prices everything was excellent.   I will definitely be back!  They made my 3rd wedding anniversary a perfect time!

jWbVkAZ2F1BauYK7VzKxnw.text: I LOVE nachos and these are hands down the best nachos I have ever had! I went here after running a marathon and all I wanted was nachos. I was blown away! EVERYONE should go here!

KJlW_bp5vvO8T42c36bcUw.text: Wow! Nacho daddy was so delicious, with me being vegan and my boyfriend a omnivore, there was so many options for both, also tried the margarita and it was so darn good..good environment and great customer service!!!

ubXTPWDUkh_1GxypIWEjsA.text: Great food!! Love, love, love the nachos! Just beware of the checkin offer! It's not a "free" margarita, it's $0.99! Still a good deal but not free. I would come back again!

RENcd9WrJmA1bHK5nHl4Vw.text: Atmosphere was good--not too crowded but food was still on point (I tend to base the wait on how good the food is). Ordered the fiesta Nachos and they were huge--good to split with another person. Check-in on Yelp to get a free house Marg.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Appetizer and nacho menu

DE_vSP9QQFZInZJsulJCOw.text: The service at this restaurant is terrible. They wouldn't seat us at a table because there was only two of us. We sat at the bar facing the street, and the hostess came back and said I'll have to find you a server if you don't sit at the bar. We sat for 15 minutes without any service. If I could give it zero stars, I would. The menu wasn't that impressive!

Uw981O3E362xMvTlaV4_1w.text: Food was delicious!!! I ordered the loco moco nachos, cooked amazing! Their chips and dips was also really good

W2ZXZymFFqalVWswfxtJlg.text: Great place for food and drinks, Wings are hot and so good but I recommend the grilled ones even one their own they are spicy. Margarita was like being in mexico!  Service impeccable Justin is attentive but not in your face, definitely knows customer service. ( we own a restaurant and he is top notch) If your in Vegas on Freemont  street its to the left on 4 th street.

4acdlet0has-kXGGySV0iw.text: Great nachos and house margarita was spot on, not too sweet and perfect amount of tartness.

3lX9UH8mXxsvQR4wqh87Qg.text: Oh Mr Nacho Daddy, you please me every time.  Friendly staff, good food and good libations.  If your feeling darning a must try is the scorpion shot.  I took mine with the scorpion on top and chewed it first, yeah I was feeling crazy.  I found the scorpion salty and earthy tasting, lol.  Sure it's just a gimmick, but its fun, especially when they announce it and start ringing the bell.  Fun atmosphere.  I'm not a tequila expert, but they have so many different types it's amazing, if your into tequila this place is a must stop.  Always a favorite when I'm downtown.      Everything comes down to the right combination.  You have to have the right food, beverages and most importantly service. I'd like to add a shout out to Tara, she made the whole experience.  Great service and funny.  I'd love to share what we joked about, but we need to keep this pg people.   Awesome service Thanks Tara.

irMzxjrEF2CWKubnSr_fuw.text: Everything took WAY too long to get. Group of 11 seated at the outdoor table. Waited 40 min to get our DRINKS!!!! Then had to wait for FOOD still. We were not drunk or obnoxious. Giving no reason to have issue with our group. Just eventually HANGRY from the terrible service. Someone from group voiced their dissatisfaction to manager, and requested them to make it right for the group. He compd only her two drinks. I guess he did not care about the rest of the group that ALL had to wait so long.

VdT0hY7UU81P4q0RdnHkoQ.text: Great drink specials! I love the wide variety of vegan and vegetarian options. The Moscow Mules are pretty nice. Went there twice during my 5 day stay in Vegas.

kOQW8eiK69gPK0_9KLBdZQ.text: Good nachos, terrible service. My friends and I came in famished after a night of partying and were able to be seated right away. Our server was really friendly and energetic; no issues there. The problem was the service times! We started out with drinks that took a bit of time to get to the table. We then placed our orders and waited FORTY MINUTES for our food. Our server came over at about the 30 minute mark and said it would be out shortly. After 40 minutes I would expect some acknowledgement that the wait time was insane and maybe a comp'd serving of chips and salsa since they aren't supplied for free.   The Nacho Average Burger Nachos were tasty with melty nacho cheese, ground beef, thin crispy chips, bacon, red onion, lettuce and tomatoes. They let us know that the portion would be enough for 2 but because I love to eat, I finished it all on my own. They serve breakfast all day but my sister's breakfast burrito was sad. When you think breakfast burrito, you expect something massive. Hers was small, and filled mostly with eggs. She had to dig around for the bacon and they forgot the avocado that she added. It was a disappointing dish for her, but everyone else was pleased. I'm not sure if the 40 minute wait time was a one-off thing but I hope they adjust that soon.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho Average Burger Nacho

hC9KLpFRtPHycrELNeXrog.text: I love this spot! Been here twice, once for a late night dinner/snack and the other for "brunch". I've only eaten the nachos, and they're amazing. Definitely a 2 person portion if you want to make it a meal! The filet mignon nachos with a Bloody Mary totally constitutes brunch, right?! Also, lots of room and not much of a wait, great for 2ppl or your entire squad.  I definitely need to come back for a margi and chilaquiles!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bloody Mary was delicious!

Y3pSi5XEcm7qdEhYZsAOeQ.text: Food was pretty good Very filling The waiter suggested some drinks that were NOT good at all but he was willing to take them off of our bill because we didn't like them Other then the poor suggestions he was great

XN3HLsbwZQDYTuEwE42RAQ.text: Nacho daddy's was SOOOO good! Loved the food, staff, environment and location! Pineapple mint margarita and chicken tinga nachos are to die for! The staff is amazing everyone is so sweet and welcoming.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

9-h9gEoQtFLDrZ2jl12qZg.text: We heard good things about Nacho Daddy so we had to try. Ordered the 3 Enchiladas and they were fantastic. It was loud in the restaurant but not too loud to be able to enjoy a conversation. Will definitely be back!

TAQv_kOZ2ZjPkfDJJ2qDYg.text: Food was absolutely delicious. Chicken nachos were amazing. Meat was seasoned to perfection and so juicy. Portions are huge! So glad we checked it out. I will be returning.

5V1ILidxBD7sx273SoPeqQ.text: We stopped by here for the nachos night one- got a enchilada nacho plate which we shared and then my friend got a super yummy mule and I got the beer flight. We were both so satisfied and full (but not gross feeling full upon leaving) we even came back the next morning for breakfast burritos and the churro pancake!   The atmosphere is so cute and the wait staff is really sweet.

XH1SvHPQXgbEekbtvxzTLw.text: Not the nachos you'd expect. With that great of a name I  was was expecting nachos full of all the yummy stuff. I've been a Nacho Daddy at least three times and I'm really sad to say it hasn't gotten any better

MzpDchwsJPeunuFTvnW2rg.text: I love this place! Great selection and staff. Come here every time I'm in vegas and wish there was one where I live.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing place

C4yX33_g_ZVmS1wG18ZN1Q.text: The owner of this location should be embarrassed.  As a frequent customer of the Eastern location until it closed, it was night and day.    Walking in on a Saturday evening we figured it would be busy.   There were seats open at the bar so we snagged them up.   I wish we didn't.  The service around the bar was absolutely horrid.  First off it took them ten minutes to acknowledge our existence to take our drink order. Since we already knew what we wanted to share, we put in our order right away before she left.  That was the last we saw of our original waitress.  45 minutes later our food comes out.  It was delivered by another waiter and he asked if we needed anything else.  I politely asked for hot sauce as well as our plates and napkins.   Did we see him again?  No.  Was our waitress in sight? No.  So we are sitting there with our drinks empty for the last 25 minutes without regular place settings to eat.  My friend actually went back to the kitchen to see if we could get any assistance. He got their attention.  As we started to eat our so called Nachos, it was abundantly clear they were inedible.  The flavor was way off.  The entire bottom of the plate was water.  I would like to refer to these plate of nachos as nacho soup.  As if those weren't bad enough, the fajita sandwich tasted as if it was made the day before and sitting under heat lamps.  Was I in the twilight zone?  I just want to also mention we did not see our waitress during this entire time.    Eventually we were able to flag down another person to pay our bill.  We wanted to get out of there and never look back.  Just a disappointing experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bar
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme tostada nachos aka Nacho Soup.  Disappointing.

mUJvWO9MNi7TwRnF8Kaqaw.text: They raised their prices a huge amount. A chicken burrito used to be $9.95 and now the same exact chicken burrito costs $15. When I asked about the price increase I was told that "they were originally trying to be a fast-food-type place, but now they are trying to make it more upscale." In other words, the same food now costs 50% more for the same exact experience.  That being said, I still go there from time-to-time because they are still a good place to watch football games.

1wlVHrgwwmce05cjCf8yhg.text: Why is the service sooo bad right now?!  Food is always decent, but come on. 4 tables, been here for 20 min, still haven't ordered. Cool guys.   Ok, the new waiter came in and prompted an edit. This guy is great, but the first girl... Wooowwwww

GMPdWTgUMFh0m4sAUe2HZA.text: This is one of those times that I wish there were more stars to add.  Elicia M, you are an expert in your field and one of several reasons why I'm really looking forward to returning.   Been to this location three times now and every single time was amazing.  Food and service were always top notch and I cannot say enough about how attentive and pleasant Elicia is.   What an incredible experience!

JwPpAoRWAUluMaT4S4DKqQ.text: We had the BBQ pork nachos. Yummy! They pride themselves by saying "never a dry chip!" That was our experience. We would definitely come back. They also are community service minded and help with children's hunger. Glad to hear it!

i1_fAUWOCvW0CssgI7Mjhw.text: Best Margaritas...made strong the way I like em...even squeezed extra lime juice in mine...mmmmm...thank you sir ;-)

muVj6ApopZMwMd1hFGGhOg.text: This was my second visit a few months apart.  Was ignored when I walked in, Bartender just looked at me.  I should have left.  Waited another 5 minutes to be seated, took a long time for the waitress to come back...only a few tables were occupied.  Ordered nacho's they were cold and not very good.  I will not return.  Mid week slow night = crappy service and bad food.

GHhAtYAu3kXQ2Q5Ue20jog.text: I'm a fan of the henderson location. It's the first time I've had the food here. The huevos ranchero is definitely bettern than the nacho daddy bowl. It was pretty good after a night of libations.

46OnYwmWvZYKWBe6lWYJVQ.text: This is the second time I have been into this particular location, the first time back 2014. I noticed a nice sign voted best restaurant. Walked in just like the first time, sitting ourselves then waiting 10 minutes to get drinks and some chips. Finally we order and wait another 30 plus minutes for our food and waiting on drinks. The waiter was all over the place as if maybe he was busy but there were plenty of other waiters to help. I have been to the Henderson location and that one is amazing. I will never recommend this site to anyone. This PLACE BLOWS  such a waste of my money...  I am next to another couple where his wife just finished her meal and the waiter JUST brought out her husbands food and the waiter JON SPENT more time behind on his tables. This place is a joke.... A year ago I have them the benefit of the doubt... A year later same result.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Waited 30 plus minutes for cheese and bacon bites.... Damn shame

bZ2AC1NUYHLo-0_8w6SrHQ.text: This place opens at 8:00 am. The bartender asked if we would like the bloody marry bar and my husband said sure... Oh wait it was not set up yet. I took her (Alex) over 15 minutes to bring us our drinks - did I tell you we were the only one at the bar. Guess I need to stick to the one closer to my house and not the tourist one downtown. Won't be back.

IAlcA1rnLD0WZJ9cpWz4Zg.text: This place was cool, right off the old strip. I ordered the spinach artichoke nachos and they were out of this world. Green chips, Alfredo cheese sauce with artichokes and spinach. My friends daughter ordered hamburger nachos. This olace was very creative but mostly for happy hour or 21 over. Not family orientated.

07Hix0VkznMMCMid6HmTUw.text: Thought we'd give this place a try. Upon entering there was hardly anybody here. We took a seat at the bar. Sat for 30 minutes as 3 different servers/bartenders walked past us several times before we were asked if we would like to order. We finally ordered didn't wait too long for food but once again had to wait another 15 minutes just to get salsa for out tacos. Food was nothing special. Ordered the ceviche which had maybe 4 shrimp in it, found a peice of hair on my chips. Also ordered the filet mignon street tacos which were ok. Will not ever go back and would not recommend this place.

dbx6csMadk4MG6UR6k9Nfw.text: I honestly have to say that this restaurant is terrible.  I ordered the BBQ Nachos which looked good at the table, but lacked taste and the chips were stale and lacked freshness.  Then we ordered the Chicken and Shrimp Fajitas to share, again the presentation looked good, but once you tasted the meal it lacked so much flavor.  The additional plate with the rice and beans were horrible.  The rice had no flavor and was crunchy and the refried beans seemed like they were cooked and re-cooked which makes them dry up and taste bad.  I would not recommend this restaurant for a Downtown Las Vegas meal.

k86K_sVZGSdPkzkmG43nQg.text: Worse service ever! They weren't super busy at the time we went but it was a good 5 minutes before we were acknowledged them another 5 before we were seated (they needed to clear tables that looked like they have been dirty for some time). It took a while before we were offered drinks and even longer before someone took our order. When our food finally arrived to the table, the waiter spilled red enchilada sauce all over my boyfriend's White Sox baseball hat. Another waitress witnessed this but instead of helping us out she told another waiter working on the other side of the restaurant who then proceeded to give us water to clean off his hat. We were ready for our check and couldn't find our waitress or anyone to bring it to us. Did not like our experience here at all and probably will not recommend or return.

cMgc9vcA7ODTmZTQ-dGESw.text: I'm giving 5 stars solemnly just because of my server Sarah. Don't get me wrong the food was excusing and the environment and overall look of the restaurant was nice but Sarah made it an outstanding experience, she was helpful, friendly and always had a welcoming genuine smile and went the extra mile to makes sure my visit was great full. I will definitely will be visiting Nacho Daddy over at downtown again.

_kTyj7Cu_rKq6ngWz8Cmyg.text: The food here was really good. I had the breakfast nachos... Basically nachos with salsbury steak and eggs on top. The chips and salsa were good too. They have a large variety of menu options to choose from. I was going to give 3 stars because of the service, but went with 4 because of the food

oC5YN_rNnDKzdmm6g2GbrQ.text: Best margaritas in Vegas.  Amazing food too.  It's not just nachos.  Authentic mexican cuisone.

G980n4xM6sWlz2v7qLItxA.text: the service sucked.... being young i feel that some waitress don't expect tips from a young group of people but we all work in a service field and know what its like. it took over 30 mins just to order had enchilada nachos they were ok but the filet migon nachos were fantastic and i would recommend i would go here again but definitely a different location.

ljutT0qiE1RfZfDmUaL23w.text: Kayla was the best server ever she was funny attentive and made us great suggestions! She gets 1 million stars! The place is fun lot so great if you have an ugly date;) lol the salsa is insane no baby ass hot salsa here 10 points for griffindor! The chips and salsa are bottomless which makes this the best place to eat on the downtown strip HANDS DOWN! I really appreciated my waitress making sure to ask if I would like water because it's so easy to forget out here! Thanks for keeping it real nacho daddy your the sh*t!

_cXbrLIvxGh-1lRlbnka4A.text: I can't believe I just ate one of the best Mexican meals I've ever had before.  I had the Baja Seafood Combo.  The taco was on a freshly cooked soft corn tortilla with a huge portion of avocado.  Served with rice and beans on a hot skillet plate.  It surpassed my expectations considerably.

uA17DepXroaFvZkABVH00A.text: Erica ... oh Erica! The Best bartender I have ever had by far out long Las Vegas... She has rocked my world and rocked my experience I will never find a better place for a happy hour or a meal let alone a drink this girl is phenomenal. Must go just to see her Erica.!!!

fboxfWdtRi6WukSkAruJaA.text: First time visiting this establishment and I would definitely recommend. Food was awesome and our waiter was fabulous. I would say this is a must visit place if you love Mexican style foods.

OTvHH43RxIBlpuWF1zL4Cw.text: Our server was super friendly and informative. Made great suggestions and checked in on us frequently. The food was great. Seasoned well and perfect portions. I got the hot buffalo mini nachos and they were fabulous. I also got the happy hour chimichanga and they were pretty tasty as well. I only deduct a star because my drink michilada was not very chilled. Will definitely come back.

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hot buffalo mini nachos, guac and chips, and happy hour chimichangas. So good.

lBT3zLComwdJdAhUoP3WfQ.text: This is place is chill and bomb. Staff was friendly and the menu is pretty straightforward. We had margaritas and michelada's (like a bloody mary, but with beer for my lil gringos that don't know what that is.) Margarita was great, micheladas were a solid B minus. Ambience was relaxed and all of the food was hot and tasty. See the pics for more. Def coming back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Our micheladas and margaritas.

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Naked buffalo wings. Probably my favorite thing we had! Super flavorful!

WMopdgnLTVizCcRqBmuIRg.text: We were screwing around on Fremont Street and needed to eat.  After contemplating all that was around, we somehow stumbled into Nacho Daddy!  Talk about divey ... everything you want when you're in the City of Sin!  I think our bartender/waitress was Brianne and she was cool.  I ended up with the ceviche which was really good.  I honestly do not recall what I had to drink, most likely some sort of skinny margarita or something.  I did try my friend's nachos and they were good.  The chips stayed crispy .. probably the best nachos I have had in a long time.  This is on my list of "must haves" next time I'm in Vegas.

Kr9sIliIuduaW0iLGJz2hg.text: Good place to eat. The sea food is amazing! Our waiter Jovanny was very attentive & provided good service. Go to him !

LSM33-MyFHk5ArRRy3ocFw.text: The nachos were good, the bartender Taeilor was better. She made the best bloody Mary I have ever had.

c3ARpa_8QKOun-_ok4uaYw.text: G was our server and she was absolutely amazing, will defiantly be back for the great food and great service

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Best bartender ever

isTUB6CamXI1uF6oTV_PnA.text: Good food, the enchiladas were small taking into account their price. Near of one of the best Vegas's street

Vn4fxE09GOPgdj5ZWAbpZw.text: Fish tacos (grilled) were pretty darn good! Rice and beans, meh. But who really eats those anyway. The bartender looked like she made a great drink. I didn't have any but she didn't skimp on the pours. Plus she was adorable with her sassy haircut and plentiful tattoos.

DHrnnAwNz3UnxKDgiPnleA.text: Great nachos.  Friendly service.  We will definitely come back again.  The surrounding area is not the best but it is good once you are there.

Ul0IqFiX8lMmn1u33lNNsQ.text: Very good service and food. Our server was very attentive. We had a large group and he offered to split the checks without us asking. The food is a little pricey but is very good quality and large portions. Good place to celebrate a special occasion.

vgYHuWTfYO5Qe39G81KJMw.text: Oh man. Oh man. Oh man. I ate too much.  Chips and salsa, superb. Guacamole was amazing as well. My main dish was the breakfast taco, and it was INCREDIBLE. Love their tortilla. One thing about Mexican food that is a make or break situation is the rice, and if I could, I would come back just to get a bucket of it. The service was also great. If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. Next time in Vegas I'm definitely coming back here.

INQWGn5ZHuoUutk6VLiioA.text: I came for cinco de mayo no happy hour what so ever and then a waitress drops a salsa on the ground and it gets all over my hair dress and legs and on the entire side of my arm and they legit didn't comp any of my food but a damn michelada that was only 8 bucks they are so pathetic I just can't believe what horrible service I encountered and they tell me a manager will be at my table which no manager ever arrived never coming here again

6eUyC1qEujU5RaNpfoin8Q.text: Ok let me start off by saying I was a demanding customer , I wanted the clipper game on and before we even ordered something I was asking everybody wearing a " nacho daddy " shirt to put the clipper game on . And of course they did swiftly with complete professionalism.. our server was Aerrick yes Aerrick with a "A" he was absolutely fun, awesome, knowledgeable . And was our heart beat to our experience . The food was amazing we are vegan and they have a complete vegan menu! I had the kale salad it was very fatty and yummy. We all started with the Vegan nachos it was big and amazing !

oA0BrhPEdjPcBd3DkT9CiQ.text: One word "exquisite". This was a recommendation from a family member and it did not disappoint. The food is very fresh, explosion of flavors. I order a seafood crab & lobster combo = delicious. Also checked in and got a free house margarita which was pretty good and not too heavy on the alcohol. Will definitely come back for 2nds.

-Ootzw2qR9fku5RjZ-214A.text: Absolutely amazing nachos! Our bartender was attentive, and very friendly. We had a couple a really cold beers, chips and salsa, and then our filet mignon nachos. Everything came out very quickly, and was filling and delicious. When and if we come back to Vegas we will definitely be back to Nacho Daddy's!

sVUUs_iphLkRdHWB1nOFxg.text: Somehow strolled into this bar...when we first came in it was just for "one scorpion shot"....well as it ended up the bartender was legit and her service was on point...as it worked out we closed the bar down which included several more drinks and several more scorpions  The bartender, Brianna, had killer service and kept the drinks coming Brianna's manager (can't remember her name) was awesome too Had a lot of fun, good drinks, scorpions, and awesome service

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. If you swing by this bar, you gotta do a couple of these

wKSfHb-JuAlUqvPa7EvAeQ.text: Came in for a drink on Easter Sunday. We sat and the bar and did not order food as we just finished brunch. The drinks were strong! I have had the nachos at the other location in Henderson and was not impressed. I did like this location vibe a lot more. There is a cute outdoor seating area as well.

Cx0TzIpZDb9dv8pGy4mf5Q.text: Excellent. The nachos were perfect!!!!! They delivered to our hotel. (The D Hotel) we ordered and it was dropped off to us within 30min! It was still hot and the price was very reasonable for a delivery. They did have a  delivery $20 min.  But worth it! I hadn't had nachos that good in a while.  Washed it down with a sprite.  Thank you all for the fast late night service! I can't want to come again.

FI1b8o6K-_Ij_NhUsFduyA.text: This is my 2nd time here. I never had an omelette with chicken and kale before so I was a little skeptical. Let's just say, the plate was empty. Staff was super friendly especially Clare and Gio!!

JYDf5rOdGQ_JpEpWH7kDfg.text: If you use Yelp! Nacho Daddy has a free house margarita! Their food is great and the homemade guacamole is amazing. It's a smaller venue then the other location but you are downtown Vegas. Aerrick was our waiter and was really on the ball and friendly. If you at a chance, ask for him.

ipgFWDQdnsyzU9E5xEQmEw.text: I wasn't really interested in eating at a nacho place but my friend talked me into it but I am so glad I did! I loved everything about this place. The menu was good, the prices are alright, the customer service was superb and I loved the music and the music videos on the TVs. Also the bathroom was super clean! All the music videos were from the 80s and 90s and it brought back great memories. I even had a free margarita thanks to Yelp! I would recommend it to everybody and I will be coming back next time I come to Vegas.

XRC5b14RJvNASsn5V1rAfQ.text: I tried to look for a spot to eat & hang out in downtown Vegas this late after 10pm & found out a good Nacho place is well known for their nacho reputation & it was on the tv show they mentioned to me but I forgot. WMWxdjep7Aj3czuSMMBaiw.text: I really like that they have a great vegan selection and you can eat there until 2 a.m. last night the waitress was horrible her name was Anya V. I asked her to show me the vegan menu. When I made my decisions amd ask for the Vegan chicken fajita salad. She told me with a very shocking voice:"but you know this is not real chicken". I'm asking for a vegan menu I'm also ordering a vegan item and Iam wearing a Vegan  T-Shirt and Vegan hat. Why Anya do you have to tell me its not real chicken???.  The food was ok as usually. I wish they used gardin chicken or beyond meat chicken. I might remove this review. When I visit this place and the staff is respectful to Vegans.

7Ww0yZA2aIeFrz0BohADeQ.text: The food was fantastic, but I left my bag here (just bought a few things from Walgreens) close to closing time, and somehow it got stolen the second we left. Super shady, I highly recommend keeping your belongings close to you. I'll say nothing else.

Pp7ajXTrFsXyijFgWgKRjQ.text: I come to Vegas twice a month for work but have never eaten here until today! Me and my friends came in for Mexican brunch on Cinco and we had such a blast!!! You have to come in and see Jovanny he is the absolute best and was such an attentive server and wonderful human being!! The food was delicious and the drinks were bomb too.

6-4wJth1gGtqDtdGq6fs7w.text: Ok the place is really dingy and somewhat depressing inside! It's also a very narrow building with a very narrow walkway into the place! This wouldn't be an issue except that the bar is right there as you come in the door, and the bar chairs tend to get bumped into A LOT! The Music was ridiculously LOUD, and VULGAR! Now I'm no prude but I don't particularly care to hear the F word or the N word 800 times while I'm eating! The food however for the most part was very good! I had the street tacos, one Carnitas, one Chicken, and one Shrimp! All were delicious! I also ordered chips and salsa! The salsa was underwhelming (whole pickled jalapenos) muy no Bueno! But the chips were hot and fresh and plentiful! Service was good as well! Will try again but during the day when perhaps it is quieter!

rt_ejrl8tzN_jxVcvzYTpg.text: Came here do to the catchy name my wife kept saying and laughing about. We had some vegan nachos with filet mignon that were so good! Being someone with a sensitivity to dairy it was great to have some delicious loaded nachos and not feel sick after. Aerrrick our server was pretty much the nicest dude ever. He was to nice to be a Las Vegas server. Aerrick you are the man! Keep being rad!

IvD0JPpyXnAQq8_wVj0YUw.text: Ok place.  Sorry I expected more you the reviews.  Nachos were average. We ordered cheeseburger nacho plate. The hamburger meat tasted like Taco Bell beef - which is not a bad thing. Super light on The lettuce and tomato. No sauce on the nachos, kinda dry.  We asked for a side of salsa.  The salsa was good!  I ordered a fresh margarita and it was very tangy.  I drank about half of it.  We sat at the bar and the bartender was great.  She was very friendly and kept my water glass full.  Lots of families in the restaurant dining area.  Clean bathrooms.
