0tgnaYzY7sl6SsBnAtCYAQ.text: If you love nachos you have to try this place. There are so many options! And they are SO delicious! The enchilada nachos were amazing and the sweet chili nachos were so unique and delicious. We also had a fireball margarita which was fantastic! Nice location near Fremont and great service

W9zKO37-a6GrkdsFx7VXAg.text: My husband loves the nachos , staff was friendly and quick. Everything was delicious and when we checked in with Yelp we got a free margarita

K5k2Ixxq9KI6Do4Mi_6i7w.text: This is a fun, loud place off Fremont Street, good for watching a game, and I ate way too many chicken tinga nachos to deny they are addictive. The floor plan makes for a communal experience around the bar, and service was great. To be fair, it was hard to tell the tortilla chips were house-made (I'll take their word for it), and the open doors attracted a couple flies (which I'm willing to live with). In any event, beer options are decent. They offer flights. The beers brewed for the restaurant are just ok, nothing great, though I think the brewer is Bad Beat, which makes some good stuff. Still, they have some other options like 90 minute IPA. Fun place for a crowd.

DQhsBRT0XMGFkR8zUnc_0w.text: Great service and terrific nachos!!! When we made it to town the options were limited late on a week night so we went to Nacho Daddy and it did not disappoint! The pulled pork (I didn't try the pork but the bbq sauce was yummy) nachos were huge and the combo of flavors was perfect! The beer was cold the place was clean enough and the staff was friendly!

km6cpzzDjgg9npdbGetO5A.text: The nachos and tacos were awesome, our waitress was super nice.  It was crazy loud and fun, if a bit warm inside.  Drinks were great too, would we come back...heck yes.

4pDPGblmMEllBXF7PW6FWg.text: Hands down plenty of food served here. Margarita were refreshing. Nachos were plenty for two to share. The atmosphere was awesome. Our waiter Jovanny rocked, very attentive. We'll definitely be back.

z1IQ67MrmwxLj1YLriVlrA.text: We are at the bar, had steak nachos and the toppings were great, hardly any chips that didn't have stuff on them. The spicy marg and regular marg were great. Would def come back for the nachos (great for two people)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Front door

HYf9VC28esC4jy6yd2bOcQ.text: I wasn't as impressed this second time around, with the service or the food.   We were told by the hostess that there was a 20+ minute wait and that we could wait at the bar. But there wasn't any room at the bar. It was awkward standing by the door.   But hold up, what are all these empty tables for? There were 4-5 of them. We asked a staff member walking by. "For people at the bar waiting for their tables," she said.   What the hell? Well get them seated! Clear up the bar. Get things moving, Jesus. Unless it's taken them so long to update these people on the status of their table, that they decided to dine at the bar.   This seemed to be the case, because when we brought it to the hostess attention, we got a table a minute later. But this shouldn't have happened. It wasted a lot of our time.  As for the food, I got the Golden Nights nachos again, since they were so good the first time. What I got was a plate of dry chips covered in onions and peppers and little else. Almost no cheese and a few pieces of steak on top.   I never got a refill on my water, or extra napkins.   So disappointed in the Nacho Daddy team this time.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. They weren&#39;t wrong

SYmiuEyktGnnvbXL959onw.text: Super yummy nachos that are large enough for two people to split. The food is reasonably priced with two people splitting a nachos with two cones coming to $24.   The atmosphere is more bar than restaurant, so expect lots of noise and limited seating. The servers were attentive and friendly.

WgKNQHXjrF0eCa0I2RQzaw.text: We came into Nacho Daddy on a Saturday night, which I understand is a busy time for nearly all restaurants especially at high traffic locations, but after waiting nearly an hour to get a table. The service was not good. We had to wait at our table nearly fifteen minutes before we were even greeted by our server, and by then we all had our drink and food orders prepared but our server didn't give us the option to order so we had to wait another ten minutes... Once ordering our drinks and food we received it about 30 minutes later which in my opinion is too long for any food order let alone drink order. We were also not given utensils and had to walk up and personally ask a staff member for utensils. This location serves good food and drinks as well but if you're in a hurry I'd suggest not planning on Nacho Daddy. Considering all wait time until we received our food was nearly two hours.

vFUVRUq4oy-eBjUBcho7vw.text: Loved the atmosphere and our waiter Rico was excellent he recommended the Thai nachos and they were delicious

mYRQ3mIxKtlOT2DT3WDkaw.text: Boom; really good Mex and everyone was glad to be walking Fremont St. afterward because we all over stuffed it was so good! Mucho Gusto!

DAFRCy2sKhjdQde3_YwtoQ.text: If you don't eat red meat or poultry, nacho daddy has you covered!! I always order the veggie/chikn' fajita salad & I hate salads lol. But nacho daddy got it right! They even have non-dairy chips and queso! Oh and try the raspberry margs... they'll get you good. Best to walk downtown after to walk the food coma off!

nx4W6yCe_FdyezJLu_LOFw.text: The service I experience was beyond horrible the server Mari was unprofessional when I went up to her to ask about my reservation which was at 9 PM Saturday July 20th she told me there was going to be a 45 minute wait,  I made a reservation for the soul purpose that I didn't not want to wait when I asked her why she said "we are really busy, and at the moment reservation are not our priority and are all being pushed back"

ei4VE5q9LdHc7bBjWzztfw.text: Nacho Daddy is Nacho Average Mexican place! I'll start with the delicious freebie you get just for checking in, their House Margarita, oh man is this thing simple and delicious! I'm usually a flavored margarita type of gal but I just decided on a whim to order the house marg, so glad I did. Not only was it a very well balanced drink but I believe they make their own sweet and sour mix so it tastes even better. They're also priced regularly at $8 whereas the flavored margs run you about $11.  Food wise I ordered the Filet Mignon Nachos because I'm fancy and high class hahaha! I'm kidding, they honestly just had the best fixins on top. The waitress was so great, she wasn't a helicopter waitress but was very attentive and flexible with the orders. While in Vegas I was really on a loaded fry kick. So instead of only chips with my nachos I asked for fries and she said yes! They were absolutely delicious, I would load the tortilla chip with the fries and all the fixins and dive right into heaven on Earth! My Wife was torn between two crab and lobster dishes (the nachos or the enchiladas), if you've already seen my pictures you know she chose the enchiladas. They were great and surprisingly enough she ate a good sized portion of them. My Dad (who we brought to Vegas as our personal body guard) ordered the chicken philly with fries. He's not as food adventurous but we're working on it!   Atmosphere was great. Wasn't too crowded or too loud. It was a great place to stop in before going ziplining on Fremont! I highly recommend Nacho Daddy for drinks, food and experience!

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Philly Steak with french fries

Zwf6BAdBpObiaIgVohYFpw.text: Food was delicious! Nacho average nachos!!! Fast and caring service. Rico took care of us the whole night. Highly recommend this place if you come to downtown.

L79qrUccMyAAlq7MCmevxQ.text: So, off the beaten path! Highly recommend , well at least for breakfast. May come back for lunch. Food fresh. Mimosas , margarita great. Stinger Sauce has a great kick! Service great. Sauce is original...#GOTSTUNG. Going to try the Nacho Daddy on the blvd tomorrow.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Avocado toast

PA_WYJAqOw6226AjlY3Dwg.text: We love Nacho Daddy! The filet and the lobster nachos are my favorites! Been back with different groups several times and it has consistently been a favorite. 4 stars only because service could be a little better but they are busy and doing the best they can. If you love nachos, this is the place for you. They're also open late which is a HUGE plus!

SwHjrbm8nUiyUx3TtcWz0w.text: Jovanny always makes our time here worth while! Came to visit with friends and we loved it

ODzUZYvCn5WjSPMA19X8LA.text: Definetly some good nachos. If I'm hungry and in the area, I'm eat here, but I wouldn't go out of the way to just eat here.

RTxslZbMrYmBNwG9L-IfqA.text: My granddaughter took me here. It was alittle young and grungy for me and they drank scorpions but I still had a good time. Nachos were good. The bartender was quick. Granddaughter ordered a margarita that was pricey but good. 4 stars.

ZUjQlQYnuIGJRx9jBVWndQ.text: We felt like an Honored Guest here. Sat at bar, was greeted by the culinary director that advised us to check in on yelp for a free margarita. Thanks Man! Done and done.   Free pour, stiff margaritas... amazing nachos (We got the Cuban ones) and customer service. They care if you come back and treat you accordingly. Bummer I live out of town, I'd be here often.   Great vibe & music, too!

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu

EzkPY__eaz2882vJCehhRQ.text: I was a little let down by Nacho Daddy, to be honest.   I don't want to bash them, but for the hype I read about here on Yelp, I found the nachos to be nothing special.   If you are like me, and your favorite thing on Earth is nachos, you come to a place named this with pretty high hopes.  The nachos were "ok".    Most notably, anything with chicken was incredibly bland.    It was like shredded unseasoned chicken, and instead of ingredients being distributed throughout the plate, they were all thrown on top, leaving the entire layer underneath with absolutely nothing on them.    Nothing to turn my nose at, but definitely not the expectation I had in my head.  The scene was happening - lots of late nights bar hoppers looking for some grub to soak up the alcohol.    Loud.   Energetic.   It's good for that for sure.      Service was great.   He offered his favorites and was around to check on us.  However, in exchange for the free check in Margarita, I was told twice that the expectation is that I'll write a review.   I've never had that happen before, and it felt a little pressured.   I mean, I was going to do it anyway.   Being told to do it felt a little "donkey with a carrot in front of his nose", if you know what I mean.

P8xz9kHOGTdIG471JbbAww.text: We have had a few bad experiences here in a row and we keep coming back as my daughter brings us here, I think we are through trying after tonight.   We drive from across town four different times after poor product and sub standard service just to find the restaurant closed after last time when my daughter ran into the kitchen because there were guys with guns outside with about 100 cops chasing them around the building, and they threw her out of the kitchen.  That needs to be another review as my wife found some videos online.  Guess we'll have to stick with La Salsa....

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

n8mHbwARTqM6jcAJae_40Q.text: My husband, myself and coworkers from work came downtown to try Nacho Daddy. There is two reasonable parking garages across the street-for nearly three hours we paid $5.00.  The atmosphere is lively and fun. The employees are friendly, efficient and wonderful. The food is out of this world! Very tasty with the right amount of heat to every entree and appetizer. Their cheese sauce is so good!  As I'm writing this review, my mind is already planning for the next visit--it's that good. After consuming their Golden Knights nachos, shared with my husband..we weren't sure if we would have room for dessert-but we ordered the churros with ice cream and raspberry, chocolate, caramel syrup topped with whipped cream. It definitely was a treat. What a way to end the work week. We left with full tummies. I can't wait to return.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mural on the wall
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Golden Knights Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Golden Knights Nachos

0NGQeKCbNfRnNoubZPSFwg.text: Located in old downtown Vegas I was lured by the sign as we were looking for Mexican food it was a stretch but we thought we would give it a try.  Outside there's a hostess or greeter not sure as she was talking on her phone and as we headed in she jumped in front of us to let us know she would seat us.  We were greeted by our server who was a really nice guy.  He was very patient as we finally found things to order as we noticed it's not really a Mexican restaurant, we placed our orders a bit skeptical.  We were seated below two tvs and watched the tv above us on happy tv channel.  The videos were just that they did make you laugh and chat and help the time to pass.  When our order came we were surprised by the portions. They were not skimpy which made up for the price.  The burritos were nice size my son said the meat was a bit over seasoned but still tasty.  The nachos were really delicious.  And unlike other places the guacamole that comes with it is more than enough which was a plus for me.    My daughter had the fire shrimp and it looked amazing she verified that it taste delicious.  The house margarita taste like mix better off ordering a lemonade.  Although this isn't an authentic Mexican restaurant it does hit the spot.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Loaded Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

vVIfYmKd-2DLF4TC7M6wbg.text: Wandered in because we were hungry and have never tried before. First impression was it was super dark inside. You can barely see in front of you. Got seated by the host/waiter and decided on getting Mexican corn, filet tacos and lobster tacos. The food came out super fast and was delicious!  Main dishes come with rice and beans on the side... they were both cold.  How?!  Our tacos were super hot and fresh but the sides were cold. I don't know. Too hungry to send back so I opted to take the rest of my food home. If they could fix the temperature on the beans and rice, I would come back and give it a five star.

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster tacos

KshKsTYS3z6lDbwr61sFOw.text: ***Update*** We are regulars at this spot, and the service has taken a steady nose dive over the past 6 months. Expect to wait around for your waiter/waitress a lot.   Scorpion shots, Tamales, burritos, margaritas. All of the delectable Mexican things you want. This is easily my favorite Mexican restaurant in Vegas so far. I've been back several times. They have 3 locations, I have only been to the one near Fremont. If I had one complaint it would be that it's a little bit off the main path for Fremont, which causes it to miss out on some more fun patio experiences. But the food is great, and the margaritas are strong.

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free margarita. Thanks Yelp and Nacho Daddy!

HvnHcZuWN5btUctGfJp7Sw.text: I came to Fremont street and right off you can find this cool laid back place. Staff is very friendly. We got assisted as soon we walked in. If you are a vegan then you gotta love this place as they have an extended vegan menu page. Yelp check in gives a free margarita which I didn't use as I'm not a fan of margaritas also didn't feel like drinking. We ordered the vegan loaded nachos to share and it was a perfect size for a share. If you're extremely hungry then you'll also be able to eat this, but we wanted a snack and I was full after eating half. They were really good, not spicy just as I prefer and lots of beans. Some of the better nachos I've had! The place is loud and vibrant, the only thing absolutely disgusting is the bathroom but I think they suffer from Fremont tourists and homeless people using it, as I noticed that when I went in there.

18e3UfCKaxK1KGLQutUjNw.text: I remember liking this restaurant many years ago, over the years I've been to Nacho Daddy more than 5 but less than 10x's.    After dining on August 26th 2019, I have decided I will never return.   I felt awful after eating my super loaded vegan nachos, the ratio of vegan cheese to beans to the rest of the toppings was disproportioned.  I tried to eat my vegan nachos but the preservatives in the pickles jalapenos set my heart racing.  I felt my blood circulation decrease.  The Vegan cheese must be soy based, and it must be a GMO, cause holy guacamole did I feel awful upon ingesting the dish.   I felt my IQ drop as I ate the food and soaked In the atmosphere.  The poor taste in music annoyed me.    Regardless, I was met with super friendly service by Julian, a good peep.  The bartender, Anya maybe? Didn't bother to ask me if I enjoyed the meal, in fact no one did.  I had left behind over 1/2 of my nachos.  No one thanked me for my business, no one offered me water.  I tipped 20% because I am a server myself and am such a nice person, (says it in a Mean Girls tone.)  If you want a good time, social food, practical no fuss kind of stuff, come here.  Don't expect to get a meal of a high caliber, they definitely don't care the origins of the vegetables or meats they use. This place does not suck, you just gotta know what you're getting into, and what that is, is junk food.  To me, junk is not food.    I was super turned off by the types of take out container they provide.  They use the cheapest foam non renewable most BPA ridden containers, how awful.  #whatever  My favorite part of my experience was the free margarita with my check in.

59ALZWyxNlpSsoQniq_ABg.text: Decisions, decisions, decisions!  Jeff was on it like cheese on nachos;).   Jeff immediately noticed my friend and myself, securing us bar seats at the busy establishment and lively bar.  Bartender let us settle into our seats, welcomed us with a smile and menus:) We needed some time in digesting our menu, wonderful options for all!  Yes, even for you vegans they have many choices! Jeff was attentive, came over suggested some cocktail choices and reviewed their menu with us. He was wonderful, I mentioned I have a cilantro allergy and he assured me Nacho Daddy accommodates.  That he would personally follow up with the kitchen.  Our cocktails were quite the generous pouring and the size of the glass- OH MY! Our entrees came out in a flash!  Actually the timing was spot on, those cocktails were well balanced when the fresh and tasty food arrived;) The music and videos at the bar were well suited for the bar- bravo for the one who chose those! Portions are oh so right, as well as the quality and presentation. Atmosphere- energetic. Service- A+++ Credit to the female bartender Friday evening, and of course Jeff!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

kkLvLABu_gXcFCOQ4oaRDg.text: Omg... the shrimp tacos on taco Tuesday was only $7 for 3!!! They were sooooooooo good!!! The only reason I knocked a star off is because it was a little hot in the restaurant other than that, everything was good. My daughter and her friend enjoyed their chicken kids taco and my friend loved her fiesta nachos. I only got a picture of my food because everyone attacked their plates soon as they were put in front of them. There was a little bit of a wait but not too bad for a Tuesday night. I would come back here if I am on fremont street for sure but since parking is so crazy and fremont is usually packed with tourists, I probably won't come here as often as I would like.   Man, get the shrimp tacos! They're delicious!!!!!

ByGRO4IBSMKyF-o8hdpGpQ.text: This was a great place to go during my time in Vegas with my friends. Even though it took us FOREVER to get seated when we were the only ones in line blew my mind.  When we finally got seated, the waitress wasn't all that friendly or patient--but, because I was with my friends, I just went with the flow.   After I checked in yelp, I was afforded a free house Margarita. It was decent--not sweet enough for my liking.   I ordered the enchilada nachos with green sauce and they were AMAZING. Not spicy at all which was a plus for me since I don't like spicy foods.   I rated a 4 because of the service that was given. The food was a 5 though.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enchilada Nachos with Green Sauce House Margarita on the Rocks

Y1Nbibm6q4pyGPR1lXaxFg.text: Came to Nacho Daddy Downtown last night with my SO and friends!   The Spicy Shrimp Nachos were delicious! Spicy shrimp nachos included spicy garlic shrimp, fresh jalapenos sauteed in hot salsa & tequila, Monterey Jack cheese, white queso, diced tomatoes and cilantro on top of our house-made spinach chips. Truly enjoyed my dinner! My SO had the enchilada Nachos and she enjoyed her meal as well!  The wait time was a bit long to be seated and to eat, however it was a Saturday & busy. Make sure to keep that in mind before going on a weekend evening!  Overall experience was a good one and I'm sure I'll be making a trip back someone soon in the future!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho Daddy

f4xYAC5YxMfM8G2J8N-nmQ.text: Enchiladas were great! Dean our waiter was fantastic and kept our drinks full. My husband and daughter got nachos and they loved them. It was really busy and so leave time to wait for a table.

4m6IMZbIfojWRoqy1p-y8Q.text: A group of 6 stopped for drinks and snacks. We were seated immediately and had water and drinks ordered.  We ordered 2 kinds of nachos and they were great.  When you check in for the first time through Yelp you get a free house margarita- yummmmmm.  It's just a few steps off Fremont Street and worth the visit.

VRx1H3vj8N5zxws2P8oR-Q.text: Food was excellent and price range was good.  The nacho chips are no damn joke. Huge plate for 2 people. We was like "omg wtf we ain't gonna be able to finish that." However I did finish it, so dang good.  They are just around the corner from the D Casino on 4th, west side of the street so literally same block.  I cannot fully Express how much me.enjoyed our meal and how content we was with their service.  Also if u check in via Yelp u get free margarita. Let them know XTRNL sent u..   Also they have a vegan menu section. It's real good.  Now if u appreciate my review go over to what ever music platform u listen to ie. Spotify or Pandora and search for artist name XTRNL and play may latest song. Thank you.

TOoJssuJV_mNys096nzOMg.text: The last time I was here was over 2 years ago and the review I left wasn't pretty. I decided to give this place another shot and I'm happy I did.  On probably the last decently warm weekend of the summer, before the insane heat hits, we stopped in on a Saturday night. The wait was about 30-45 mins for two. We didn't mind and put our name down, grabbed a drink and people watched for awhile. Instead of sitting at our table, we decided to grab seating at the bar. It's a small venue and honestly, I don't care for their restaurant seating so I didn't mind giving up our table to a larger party.   The bartender passed me a menu and got to work on my margarita, which was good but had salt when I asked for no salt. A minor flaw but noted. We went with the chicken tinga nachos. Kind of skeptical at first, but I'm glad we did. They were killer! Gigantic, flavorful and did not disappoint. The smoky chipotle flavor of the chicken paired well with the richness of the cheese, beans and avocado. The pickled onion was the perfect finish-- a little crisp and tart. J and I are always down to get down, especially after a hardcore gym session, and we could not finish the last bites of these. Note that he is 205 lbs of solid muscle with an appetite to match his gains.   The bill for two of us, even when adding guac on the nachos, was $30 and some change. Daaaaaang. Probably the cheapest evening out for two of us in awhile. Much needed, since we dropped $400 at The Palm (a baller steak and seafood joint in Caesar's Palace) the night before.   I LOVE being able to positively update reviews, especially after boycotting them for years after having a crappy experience. Welcome to the 4 star gang, Nacho Daddy. Glad you guys got it together. We'll be back for more chicken tinga nachos.

Ola-LsC0Og0KRDAN0dKZyg.text: Visiting from out of town, vegan and craving awesome nachos? Well, there you go!  If not in the mood for nachos, there are quite a few vegan menu items to choose from. Portions are huge. Perfect if you are hungry. I had the vegan chicken nachos. Really worth the visit. And will have to come back next time I am in Vegas!

L2aspDyNaT4sbpKefMPudA.text: Must go for vegan food! I got A huge order of vegan nachos. Awesome vegan cheese and sour cream.    4 stars just because of how loud it is in this place (personal preference). The food was great, as was the service. Huge vegan menu to choose from. The prices were high to me, but the portions were large enough to make it seem worth it.   By historic Fremont street, cute area! I would return.

xXEFpcuePd791E2S9TdG_w.text: Jovanny is the best and cutest waitor ever! He made all of us feel so good and at home!  i hope i get him every time we come! He recommended good drinks and food specials! Thank you!

DZsVIOEQ2IKcB_TbUVC3Xg.text: I have been to this place once before and did not have a good experience the food was ok the service was crap but this time it totally made up for it. Our bartender Crystal was an absolute pleasure her spunk and personality made me want to stay there all day just to see what she could come up with next as well as Mark his attention to detail and expert customers service guaranteed that I will be back with friends. I did order the vegan nachos and o m g they were the absolute bomb I'm really excited to find a restaurant that has vegan options on their menu (more than side orders and meatless versions of their meals) thanks again for the amazing service you all deserve a rise. Be back soon  Jazzlyn

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Nachos

MDvjJs5yz5vbGvDyPKUXOA.text: Visited Nacho Daddy's again on our last day of vacation and without a surprise we were again treated with exceptional service from bartender Alex and GM Dean, we had the happy hour dinner items and some drinks and everything came out quick and was seasoned perfectly. We come to Vegas every August and will diffinetly be revisiting. I would suggest if you are in town and enjoy Mexican that you spends some time with this staff, they are top notch!!! Thank you Alex and Dean

rO6TTFJJLBmGDC5l0iQWtQ.text: I was here with a friend in December.  We had a great meal.  I had the buffalo nachos and my buddy had a veggie burrito.  We shared chips and i had soda.  Our server Christin was fantastic.  She kept filling up our drinks and chips.  She recommended my item from the happy hour menu.  She was sweet and cute and just a great personality.  Our bill was $35 with tip which I thought was not bad given the quality of food and awesome service.  If you are concerned with prices, try the happy hour menu...my nachos (which were plenty big) were only $6  I'll be back!

hpkLA8-AlgDRLZDJxLmGuA.text: Amazing food and drinks! We got the chimichanga and fajita bowl, both were amazing. The portion sizes were great, not too big, and our waiter was extremely accommodating about our dietary restrictions. You must order the endless chips and salsa, it's under three dollars and worth every penny. I've given this place a 4/5 because service was very slow. A must to eat in if you're in downtown Las Vegas!

N7nG_923zQoe2Ca5kTjMfw.text: We stumbled upon this fabulous restaurant/bar on a venture to find limes. Wow! The food was delicious and the atmosphere was perfect. I had the cheesey enchiladas and my husband had the street tacos. Giustina was wonderful! She was friendly and professional. We visit Las Vegas and stay at the Golden Nugget every year. Nacho Daddy will now be a part of that!

scCJyoS4Ro_HohuUeqFU4Q.text: It smelled like puke inside, so we asked to move outside.  We got our food and drinks pretty quickly, but then all of the staff (hostess and wait staff) disappeared for 20+ minutes.  By the time we saw someone who worked there to ask for the check (not our waiter), we had finished our food, drinks, and waters several minutes prior.  The nachos were good for bar food.  The michelada was pretty whack.  We may try another location, but we aren't in any hurry to.

b5XnKomBBquqKyOdoXNUxQ.text: Fantastic vegetarian/vegan menu with plenty of options for carnivores and omnivores. Bridge at the bar is adorable,  fun,  chatty and an excellent bartendress. I LOVE the cajun tofu tacos! Nacho Daddy's does breakfast too!

qkXsiNzRPLrixGyoSq1e1Q.text: Awesome food and service. We had margaritas, filet nachos and beef chimichanga. A nice respite from the Fremont Street Experience.

YuCl3c_2PWkxrvMzXDWJhg.text: Ventured down because the Henderson location is closed. It was pretty busy for a Monday night. Had fun! Kimmi was awesome!! Had my pork tacos fix... Atmosphere was awesome. Food was awesome. Beer was cold. And the bartenders were fun!!! Thanks downtown! Will be back

yoiwhoX-vdF2N7LFVBz-HQ.text: As nacho connoisseurs from Texas my brother and I were stoked to check this place out! Great concept because really good nachos involve some prep work! Nacho Daddy does not deliver! Ingredients do not taste fresh and are layered in a way that homogenized all the flavor.  Try not chopping everything into tiny bits.  Their menu offers very few divergent takes on the classic nacho supreme and what they do offer lacks imaginations.

xn79Fq4Byq5EiK_0NblJNg.text: G-love was amazing!! She was so sweet and took great care of us, not to mention a great tequila selection at good prices for downtown Las Vegas coming from a local!

i_pDWCXNJOH9O8i80lyXNA.text: Decided to check this place out because we thought the name was funny.  Ambiance was fine for a bar/restaurant.  The menu has great options for vegetarians and everything is coked to order. I ordered the spicy vegetarian burrito. The chef took extra care to prepare tofu perfectly! Food was really tasty and unique. Fresh guacamole was really good!  Best part was our server. I didn't catch his name but he was great! Super helpful and attentive. Suggested items for each guest (8 of us). We all loved our dishes! I'd go back just because of how he presented the menu items and the chefs attn to detail!  Great place! G

wk2x0eEQ0sdqWoI6saKgtw.text: Awesome service, shoutout to our server Jess for being so good about fielding our food allergy/cross contamination questions.

2_2yDCTgfFXWPhoQp2BLRw.text: Say what you want about "I've had better" nachos", Nacho Daddy is my default go to downtown, when I don't need to deal with whimsical bars and hipster crowd and I just want a giant plate of delicious food and a margarita.   No, I don't think all the items on their menu are spectacular, I've ordered both BBQ and Thai something nachos and they were meh. BUT, the burrito bowls never disappoint, the spicy shrimp nachos are spectacular and my friend swears by their carnitas.   The house margaritas are delicious and if you wanted to try one of those weird Coke flavors from a fancy machine- they've got that too.    Sit at the bar or in the dining room and you encounter a hilarious mix of mismatched couples on an awkward date, girls of the likes that dance in party pits fresh off their shifts, deer in the headlights tourists, younger crowd having a good time bar hopping,  and an occasional local like myself. Cause. I was downtown and so Nacho Daddy.  They are open later than a lot of other food serving place in DT (short of a casino coffee shops) and there are times of day you can actually park in front of the place, I believe it's before 10pm.   The crowd and the vibe is very all over the place, you never know if there will be a drunk girl throwing up in the bathroom or if someone will slap you on the shoulder and ask about "what's good here", but if I didn't like that, I'd live in Henderson.

z29BDEh-8byD2s8t8nbUuw.text: Enjoyed the Buffalo Nachos.  Mojo pork street tacos, just OK.  Not a bad place, but not really worth a special trip.

ahWBIFyxy-wi6hMTxGccPw.text: We stopped at nacho daddy after a long day of fun on Fremont street.    Nice atmosphere and great food.   We had the enchilada nachos which were pleasantly cripsy.  I have l tried a lot of nachos and they were one of the best I have ever had.     I would definitely go again when I am back in Vegas.

uHW9DFByHUHEBwa_HTuStw.text: This was a perfect diversion from the craziness. The food was great, service was perfect and I loved the multiple vegan options.  I would definitely go back.

ppmhBD7htv447N1SmPzXdg.text: By the reviews below it must of been a shitty day at Nacho Daddy today. (11.11.15)  We walked in, NO greeting - finally a yell across the room telling us to sit where ever we want. We sit down, NO greeting, NO intro, nothing. We ordered; Enchiladas, Mexican Burger, Guac & Chips, and Coronitas (Margarita with Corona tipped in) The Guac & Chips came out, our meal came out shortly after, we didnt get to enjoy our appetizer as an appetizer. The guac & chips were the best part of the meal. Burger & Enchiladas were alright.  Drinks were not good at all! There was no personality in the staff what so ever, the only personable staff member was the bald tattooed guy that brought us our food. The whole time we are eating we didnt get checked up on, we didnt have silverware.  I cant say that I'd come back. If the service was WAY better I'd probly give it another try and try something else on the menu since it did have potential.

H-Wk6mq3dmBteIEfZMwXxA.text: Great place to visit for late night meal.

c2fkUZn3uXzW7Vwfm2KJUA.text: Since we were in the area, my friend and I decided to eat here again. This time I tried the Chicken Enchilada Nachos. They sounded like they would be tasty from the menu description. My expectation was that the chicken would be shredded, since that's how it always is in enchiladas. Instead, there were little cubes of dried out chicken. I expected some enchilada sauce to be mixed in with the chicken, but instead the nachos were a wet, greasy mess. Enchilada sauce had been dumped over all of the chips. I ate about a quarter of the food. That was all I could stomach. I ended up having a "sour" stomach for nearly three hours after the meal.  My friend had what she always has - the Big Daddy burrito. She loves it. When it came, it was obviously smaller than what it had been in the past. She stated that they must have changed the recipe because it just didn't taste the same. In the past, they always had brought a small plate with sour cream and lettuce on it, too. She asked to speak to the manager who came over after we had completed the meal.  The manager insisted that there hadn't been any change to the recipe and that the burrito had never come with the small plate of lettuce and sour cream. She seemed uninterested in inquiring why most of my food was still on the plate. Eating here really seems to be a crap shoot.

gWwbX6j1aW9l2RBR347ifg.text: So this place is pretty awesome when Astrid or Alex is working. Otherwise its pretty much a three. Nacho Daddy your regulars demand these girls work all the time.

60h2h41DYFx5rI2UP61ehg.text: Heather Rae kicks ass, I've probably never had better service,  she was incredibly helpful and if she is ever fired, my friends and I will never be back. The food is also fantastic,  and the scenery is amazing. Get some Iration radio and I'd have to rent a cot in the back.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Best waitress evaaaaa

bGV8N7DUW5yPL2UURkYXxQ.text: Open late. GREAT bar food and excellent mixed drinks. As someone who is vegan and gluten free, it's nice to have a latenight option. The staff is always super friendly. The Vegan Nachos are really good...

PGc8E0ds2uXq2zvLaJ6yJg.text: Burger nachos and buffalo nachos!! Yum! Mango Thai basil margarita is my favorite and everyone should go there and try one! The pork burritos are delicious! The also have a vegan menu for all the vegans out there with some really yummy healthy selections! Breakfast is so yummy too! I'd recommend if you are cousin downtown Las Vegas to check out nacho daddy! The owners are amazing people as well will make sure your experience is 100%!!!

w9Tfvqh5k9eSr01yX9mN6A.text: I've been here twice and NOT disappointed! My Husband and I came here for lunch and LOVED our pulled pork nachos (my pick) and cheeseburger nachos (Husband pick). Everything tasted fresh and utterly delicious! SARAH was our server and she was over the top FANTASTIC (thank you again!). We will come back to Nacho Daddy soon and hope that she is there. =)

69-9aNsDnzOcau1CmdVVMQ.text: I have been on the vegas strip and all around fremont for vacation. This place is awesome to snack and drink. That scorpion shot is awesome. This place would kill in texas. Im from san antonio. If you ever want to expand outside nevada. Ill invest. This is a legit place to come to. Your staff was awesome as well. Bartender is quick and friendly. Our server was really cool. This will be my spot every time we come. And we come to vegas a lot!

-yF7Imjf3B_gC7jIn9zlHA.text: This place was pretty good. It's worth going for lunch or a quick dinner. It's a casual, fun place with tons of different nacho options. I got tacos and my girlfriend got nachos which were both good. The margaritas were way too sweet though, I wouldn't recommend those unless you love really sugary drinks.

aO-npPc1hPpHLWNwdKELgQ.text: Great downtown atmosphere. Had a great time there. Ordered the enchilada nachos. I thought the chicken and enchilada sauce had a good flavor to it. Great finger food for a night out drinking downtown.

G0SngUr6UDkkP-SEDTcWZQ.text: I have never had a better grilled shrimp taco or filet mignon taco in my life. This palace is really good.

koJD9-mk-ERTcGGaKUkngg.text: A friend had warned me this place was bad, but I was excited to it because I love Mexican food and try to support locally owned businesses, and really- how can you mess up nachos? Well, they did. Bland, tasteless, and wtf is that cheese syrup? It reminded me of velveeta but not as good! At the end of the meal, I was hit by a case if burning indigestion so bad, I had to sprint to the nearby Walgreens. The only reason I didn't give it one star is because my guava margarita was pretty good.

lonOgTt9j3SN7yLjWtHPaQ.text: I know things taste better when you are on vacation but two weeks later I am still thinking about the great food and beer we had here. So wish we had Nacho Daddy at home.

VlOk4uu4a3iSMtXGWWCY9g.text: Want dessert. ...try the apple nachos with ice cream cinnamon and sugar  and Carmel sause. !!! It's so good !!  Served like flour tortilla  nachos...this place is always great a place off the main street.

4OBzNSsiknUetwdmTb82Nw.text: Customer service and friendliness of staff and manager a ten. Food not so much, burrito bland and soggy. Burrito at food court across the street operated by Mexican wayy better burrito and much cheaper. Mexican corn was also a bust! Had better corn for cheaper from street vendors growing up. The chef needs to sample and test authentic Mexican establishments and rebrand. The margarita too sweet low on tequila. May come again if the joint across the street is closed... The manager is awesome though and the staff! :-)

9uynlZgtJS8EQUqnteAWeA.text: I had a friend in Vegas for the week and was excited to bring him here. I had heard mixed reviews, but was willing to try it myself. The place looked dirty and smelled like sewage. I went to the restroom to wash my hands and was greeted by cockroaches. The dirty appearance, awful smell, and roaches were plenty of reason to leave. And we did. It's unfortunate. Won't be back.

6WLWkv3i4CQy2b3DhnRWbw.text: Great food. Vegan menu fajita tofu salad is one of the best salads I've ever had.  They play some cool music videos, just hate when the hip hop crap comes on.

Y8wBbTAIPLVPsPqpe-jECQ.text: Went to eat here today and the hostesses looked at each other and said it was an hour wait yet it looked empty inside. They claimed that there was 2 parties coming that would take up all the tables. I felt very suspicious as if they were lying so I called nacho daddy and asked if there was a wait. The man said there was no wait. Then I explained the story and he said let me find out. The manager "Kelly" gets on the phone and says yes there's an hour wait because you have a minor with you. That was never said by the hostesses. The manager never said there was a big party coming in either. Not really sure why the manager would lie but never coming here again.

We had the spicy shrimp nachos and grilled corn on the cob, off the cob at happy hour and they were outstanding.  This place may be classified as a dive, but there is a very diverse crowd in the bar.  I would suggest that anyone visiting Fremont St. make this place a must see.  I will definitely visit this place again next time I am downtown.

85yhvy1T3bFHUB7kgogIfw.text: I was very disappointed with there service. The two hostess was rude to us. We ordered to go and the restaurant was very slow and about five cooks in the kitchen @11pm. One hostess act like he didn't know my husband ordered everything but when my husband started getting upset then he got his food.

yrm9XPvpMAxmLGsAkyqZbQ.text: Pretty damn good! Ceviche on point. Chicken street tacos are delicious. Good chips and salsa and margaritas. The only bad thing is the bathrooms! Try to avoid the women's bathroom! No locks on the bathroom doors and it was really gross and dirty.

Taco Tuesday here is where it's at... but then Tequila Tues took over lol. I'll be back real soon!

sBWh2eYxNabtv_g7QefZ1w.text: The service was the best! Very outgoing, easy going, and entertaining staff and place. I wish I'd taken the scorpian shot. Next time!

VVBH8tWhbVkI5yu87QbCXw.text: Brianna was an AWESOME bartender! She was super nice, talkative, friendly and recommended a tequila that was great. The filet mignon nachos were really good. Golden Monkey was a great beer and 9.5% alcohol but so smooth. We will definitely come back on our next trip.

C37Udv9gorLvGBSZESqQFg.text: Aerrick is great, attentive and has good energy! Food was ok, FYI nacho burger nacho doesn't have cheese on it, we had to get queso on the side to make it better. Ceviche only had shrimp but the taste was there. I'll probably go back but will try something else.

jr6fCYuJx-pGK2w3j5zaIw.text: So if you are going to use their check in offer of a free margarita, don't make the mistake I did. So I order the "daddy's house margarita" which apparently is NOT their house margarita. They bring you a smaller margarita in a jelly jar for the check in offer. I also made the mistake of showing the waiter at the end of our visit so he offered to bring me the mini margarita but since I already Drank two of the others it was a no thank you! So I bought an entree and two full priced margaritas for $40.  The food was good and our group had a fun time. Chicken taco was too spicy for my son but filet nachos were big and tasty.  Once I pointed out that the menu said "house" they did take some money off of ur our bill which I appreciated!  Ps they also give a military discount so thank you Daddy!

gFY5g8NPBrldT5VAJsL8UQ.text: Great food. Our server Kadene was awesome! Tamales aren't traditional but still awesome! So much food too!!

CMeUdpgIEINaJ_R5Ms6U1w.text: A really nice way to start to drink, we order the wings and the filet mignon nachos... they're really good, the churro sundae was good but it was just 2 little pieces and they tasted a little old, I was hopping for something better for the dessert

DGVfgXpR9zYHHAgjNOhj9Q.text: Briana, Kayla and Ally are fabulous. Fast service with a great attitude. Excellent recommendations on the food and everything came out hot and fresh. Fun place to come and get away from the madness of Fremont Street, but only being a block away it is a nice oasis.

nAzPYbBQsy35tkQZlqe3og.text: BEWARE: your eyes will be bigger than your stomach! The white queso appetizer was my favorite item we got, and a little goes a long way. The chicken tortilla soup almost had an enchilada-type base-I wish it came with avocado chunks. The quesadilla with chicken had the biggest, most tender chicken-I had to use a knife and fork! I wish it had a spice to it though. The boyfriend got the tostada nachos with white queso. It took all he had to try and finish them. We were STUFFED. I will come back to Nacho Daddy for sure when we come back to Vegas!

udIYH6t0z9W6DIa7aXN-Xw.text: I loved this place. I wish they had something like this in the Bay Area. Would definitely go back again when I visit Vegas.

-lHQujvhNszby_ZCIX__yw.text: Service was super slow and the place wasn't busy at all.  We left before we could order because our waiter left us unattended for so long.   We really looked forward to coming in and were really disappointed.

jtxXJDv7KGuZhxo0a0wygg.text: 2 stars is for the awesome bartender we had! Drinks were priced OK at $9 each or so....margaritas served in mason jars...ok cool. All 3 of our margaritas were WAY too sweet. I had a guava one, my friends a raspberry and peach of sorts. My friend had to ask for it to be watered down, I myself added an ish ton of lime and it was still sweet. It was a nice little relaxing place to grab a drink. We did not order food although it did look pretty darn good.

PbHU0kifj9rfXDFVMg2DeQ.text: Fresh ingredients, served hot. The Fiesta Nachos, one of the customer favorites, was crispy, flavorful, and delicious. Served in a cast iron skillet the nachos at the bottom remained crisp for each and every bite.  The service was unbelievable.  Our last night in Vegas and we decided to try this Mexican place because of the yelp reviews and was not disappointed.  Reubin the chef came out and had us taste 2 items on the menu we had not tried and my husband had wished he had ordered the Fiesta Nachos.  We couldn't believe the amount of time he spent with us talking.  Brittany our server who was new did an outstanding job.  Thanks to the both for the personal service and making our last night in Vegas memorable.  We will be back next time in Vegas!

hpTtr-Kde5JgucALsm62EA.text: Tried it for some good nacho varieties, and was not disappointed. The meat and cheese toppings were plentiful and of good quality. Didn't like the buffalo sauce on chips that one of our party ordered, but the others were good.

4OqcS8BX2CeVnvhKCXohNA.text: It's a dive bar with great food!  The place can get a little packed, as those annoying trolley pubs have this on their route and dump 20 people off trying to get shots, but it's worth the trip.  The location in Summerlin is definitely nicer, but I like the atmosphere of this place.  If you live downtown, it's a great spot.  They have vegan options on every section of the menu.  My favorite are the vegan nachos!  A real treat.  The guacamole is good to start out with and I recommend asking for the same chips that come with the vegan nachos.  You can't go wrong with the tofu fajitas either.  The portion sizes are absolutely incredible and can easily be shared.    If you're not faint at heart, you can get a tequila shot with a scorpion in it!  Not my thing really, but everyone should try it once.  There is some good merchandise for sale.  Have a scorpion shot and get a shirt that says #gotstung!!!  Like I said earlier, the place can get a little packed, so don't expect to get your food in 5 min like most tex-mex places.  It's worth the wait.

V0iotxdggI5y5LNLGBLA5g.text: Pretty much the best nachos I've ever had! Great place to stop for lunch near Fremont St.

0LD3-EAaSOQ1ejW_27RPJA.text: Good food. Great drinks. Happy team members. Great atmosphere. Clean restrooms.  Don't ignore this place. The wings are good and the queso is nice and creamy.

klGquRwfOVaeeahJPtaiMg.text: We were seated right away for lunch. Rico was a great server. The supreme nachos were a lot and delicious! Plus the free house margarita with check in is a major plus

JJUf9Vdv33ep0m3EJVenVA.text: This place is awesome. We shared 2 orders of nachos between 4 of us and the portions were huge. All the ingredients tasted super fresh and were proportioned properly. I'd definitely recommend the Barbeque chicken nachos.

DqVchNcuP1pC3yCDEl5GUA.text: Had the Nachos. Lived up to what I was told. GREAT. Music was really loud though. Hard to talk without shouting.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Checking it out.

ngXYlnHM-z0RV6wZXGrWgw.text: Not as great as the Strip location, but food is average. Love the check in offer they have for free house margaritas!  They also offer the scorpion shot for the daring. My friend and I both tried it, but the scorpion is a lot smaller than expected.

oYVZG-j_INrLQCbWd6mhKg.text: Allie made us some delicious margaritas for Cinco De Mayo! We had house margaritas with some Jalapenos in it! I had fish Tacos and my vegetarian wife had the vegetarian chicken fajita bowl. Both were great, I even liked her veggie chicken! Great service too, thanks Allie!

OxLvaJ8QNjoN_8qvkVPyaQ.text: I was not impressed by this venue.  First off we weren't greeted.  Secondly, it took a very long time before we were acknowledged by a server after we sat ourselves.  It was a slower Wednesday night.    Our table wasn't cleaned off and we had to ask.  The nachos were really nothing fantastic.  At best,  the Mexican corn was pretty good.  One star for the Mexican corn.

9etgTdZnCW0gaEt9o3rqtQ.text: Popular place, parking garage across the street. Be sure to check your text messages or they will give your table away!

I recommend asking for him whenever you visit. He was very busy but didn't break a sweat. Never showed he was overwhelmed. Remained happy and with a smile!!! Definitely stop here! The portions are HUGE!!! you will be full  thank you Jovany for being a highlight on my trip

P6N-KGZE5IKNXZFsJfm0SA.text: Freak'n Fantastic Nachos !!! We split the Supreme, Golden Knights and the Thai Sweet Chili Nachos .......OMG ......Sooooooo Good !!!! You have to check this place out if in Vegas --

uRaBle19v9b7xXKmc3iAug.text: Good service, but the food wasn't good. My parents had the filet mignon nachos and they kept biting into grissle. I had the vegan chicken chimichanga which had a bad taste! They need to work on their flavors.

iS_LvWuvWtYouoAeQZRo_A.text: It was the best nachos I ever had! And the burrito was delicious! I would recommend this spot! Definitely bomb.com!

pst7PQxMz-QR3E-Bye9XHQ.text: Taylor was awesome the food was good, drinks were delicious and the place was clean as far as I could tell. Loved the music and decor was hip & trendy. We will definitely be coming back and when we do, I'm gonna go for the famous "Scorpion shot".

sS7YhWPPy9jB5Id-RkKMqw.text: Loaded nachos (one with bacon) is delicious, but share it or get it deconstructed for a midnight snack.

I would definitely recommend one of their many, many, many nacho options as an appetizer to share. So many options. We sat at the bar and the servers were friendly and attentive. It's essentially a sports bar and grill so it has a very cool and casual atmosphere. Just remember, it's on Fremont street so parking is non-existent

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster and Crab Enchilada. Delicious!

hEqLZa0MQ8voTPc-HhlhhA.text: They have good food I love this place always have good customer service here .the nachos are excellent and there tacos.

xheERR7NbP9vtlbQ5UU2KA.text: Best nachos! BBQ pork and filet mignon nachos are a don't miss. Also peach margarita is delish!

Obi7kBF_dlEYWOArlTCVgA.text: Great place for food and drinks. Guac could use some help. Didnt taste fresh and was bland. Love the vegan menu. Love the tofu nachos. Salsa was on point. Friendly staff too. Theres a coupon inside for a free margarita. Overall a great experience, a must for veggies and vegans.

n-GVF6h6lipKpBZY_W97CQ.text: We love Nacho Daddy! They have a great variety, even for those of you who aren't in the mood for Nachos (amazing fajitas!) We've gone here for birthdays, as well as recently for St. Patrick's Day. It was packed, but the service was on it! They were constantly bringing us drinks, clearing our plates and staying attentive. Even though it was a full house, it was only a 20 minute wait.   Also, Nacho Daddy is vegan friendly! I was a little nervous showing up with my best friend, who's vegan, and another who's dairy free since it can be hard to figure out where we can all be accommodated. I had no idea there's a whole Vegan section. She ordered the vegan chicken fajitas and loved them.   I, on the other hand, am a meateater and always order the Filet Mingnon nachos to share with a friend. The portions are huge so sharing is caring.

nnU1IzilaZeCGXZEUqRG1g.text: Hosts were rude... sadly food okay.. not worth the wait. We were staying nearby and thought it might be a nice place to go. I wouldn't recommend it.. :(

ZdwWQWfObly4_4qAFfgUlw.text: This place has the best Mexican food ever. The corn and flour tortillas are made from scratch and you can taste the difference. The nachos are balanced and hearty, the crab enchiladas were great, and have the best fish taco I've ever tasted.  Our server was great.   I'm from Texas and visited California, eaten Mexican food all over, and this is still the best.   I would award a Michelin star if I could.

EVXqmWZhAar3BxJKSeu48A.text: Well after waiting 2 hours for my wife and daughter to do the zipline, we were all starving. It was around 9:30 on a Monday night. So it wasn't too busy and we got seated almost immediately. The menu is pretty big and they have a vegan menu, which is great if you are vegan.   My wife and son shared a bean and cheese nacho, which easily fed both of them. My daughter got the chicken enchiladas, rice and beans. I got the Baja seafood combo, which is a fish taco and a lobster and crab enchilada. All the food was excellent and the service was great to match.   I wish we had one of these were I lived, I be there all the time. I actually got a t-shirt also to remind me of this place.

bsxVzzgqkqNhWQnXMT2UIg.text: If you are considering giving Nacho Daddy a try, I highly recommend it. Delicious food and amazing margaritas. The signature scorpion shot is a fun addition to the Nacho Daddy experience. This establishment also boasts Vegas pride through partnering with the Vegas Golden Knights. I had the Cali Burrito and it was to die for. The pico de gallo and guacamole are incredible.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

hujSjH0iBO-SdaOO0vXDWQ.text: Great dive bar vibe. Server was outstanding. Portions were huge and delicious. Prices are cheap in my opinion. Give it a try you won't be disappointed. Plenty of vegetarian options.

When she greeted me at the door she said," excuse me, MOVE." Service was not the greatest. Would definitely recommend going to their other location on the strip.

Q6vGQN8mnwI2jN_hRAAiyg.text: Food is amazing! Nachos are a must, any of them!!! Enchilada one was good and so was the burger! Rico was our server and was suave!

CuDrN4CYwF-IiPcXRwj9Ig.text: Went with a group for some nachos and margaritas while in vegas... It took 45 minutes just to get drinks after waiting to be seated. The food was really good, and the drinks were tasty when they FINALLY arrived but I don't think I will be going back.

_q3Nu2PsrHHB_RwRNHP4iw.text: Had a great time Jio was excellent took care of us and made our night.  Food was excellent and we will be back anytime we are in town

5EX_XtkotXMxeOZ061X3dQ.text: I consider myself to be quite the nacho lover so when my friend decided to have his birthday dinner here I was over the moon with excitement. We basically filled the whole restaurant with about 15 people there for the dinner. It's a super small place. The parking can also be hard to find, but that's everywhere downtown.   I was so excited to try some of their nachos and loved the variety of options like buffalo chicken, BBQ chicken, hamburger and enchilada. I opted to go with the enchilada nachos with green sauce. Overall these bad boys were delicious! I'm glad I made the green sauce choice and the toppings were definitely not sparse. The only thing I didn't care for was how quickly the chips got soggy. I'm not a soggy chip fan so that kind of crushed my spirits.   I would definitely come back again to try some more of their nacho and entree options. Oh and don't forget to check in for a free house margarita!

We made reservations for 8, and we were seated quickly.  We ordered the Thai, Supreme, Lobster, and BBQ Nachos- pure awesome!  Rico was a fantastic & friendly waiter which helped us first timers out with ordering.. AND laughs!!!  This ended up being our favorite dining experience!!  The Margs were YUM!

The meat, beans, cheese & plethora of onions, peppers, lettuce & tomatoes on top of some of the best in house nacho chips ice ever had!  Crisp from start to finish! More than enough for 2! Rico was an awesome server even though it was quite busy! Wish we had these close to home!

r3JSFkIcJoYj9UZbA8Ynpg.text: Very good, wide variety of dishes. Excellent for a hang with friends.

RSJBuPsfvue0qFGD0NygpA.text: Nacho Daddy! I love it. Always come for the enchilada nachos (half green sauce, half red sauce) and the chicken chimichunga burrito! Reasonably priced and the waiters/waitresses are always nice! Had the boneless wings the other day and they were delicious!

rdKkrDzg5RCJxKzBhRtY0A.text: We visited here recently and enjoyed the nacho plate. The vegan cheese is delicious. Our server was terrific. The kitchen was a bit overwhelmed but she was able to handle the tables and keep everything running smoothly. Even though the food took a bit longer than expected she got us some chips to tide us over which we appreciated.  The place is warm and welcoming and the menu is diverse so both vegan and carnivores can be satisfied.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

AejIc8jleI_kYXK1Pu0HEg.text: Their margaritas are pretty good, but unless you're trying to drink nothing but juice, I do not recommend. There was legitimately no alcohol in our drinks. This wouldn't have been a problem if they weren't $15. It's also a great place if you have a lot of time to kill because you'll be waiting quite a while to be served. The nachos themselves are a nice serving size and are great for sharing. They skimp it on the meat though, so try not to go too hungry.

_So8AUMNdzP8O2q7PFB-9Q.text: I had the PLEASURE of finding this restaurant (after searching Yelp) while in town for the NASCAR race. Not much to say because I start drooling if I think about it too long. The food was amazing. The staff was awesome. The decor and atmosphere was very comfortable and entertaining.  Nacho Daddy really needs to expand to other parts of the Las Vegas Strip because it is now the only reason I would go to Fremont Street but I definitely will go again every time I am in town.

XvlhQYhgj9faXcOdXKNw4Q.text: Vegan nachos review.  I don't eat meat or beans and have a sensitivity to dairy. This totally takes the fun out of eating nachos. I'm a little (or a lot depending on how you eat) picky about my food. The nachos I ordered were not loaded with all of the fixings. The bartender was surprised when they came out. I was happy. She got my order right. Score.  So here's my review:  These were not the best vegan nachos that I have ever had but, I ate them all. In fact, I enjoyed them down to the last few bites. The nachos are more toppings then chips so eliminating th beans made them a lot smaller in portion. The chips are house made and perfectly seasoned although, a little oily. The vegan cheese was creamier than any other vegan nacho cheese that I have tried but, not as thick. I prefer my nacho cheese to be thicker. I don't like raw onions so I ordered them sans pico or the salsa. The salsa was really good and not too oniony. I didn't touch the pico de gallo. Overall, I enjoyed this greasy treat. I wish there was a little more cheese. I was in awe looking over at other people's orders. The ones with all the fixings are a sight to see and look delicious.  Now for experience. I sat at the bar. The bartender wasn't the most friendly but, she was efficient. I was not put off by her attitude but, could tell that other customers didn't quite understand her vibe. Still, she did her job and earned her 20% tip from me. So the big question is would I go back? Absolutely! This is a heaven for nacho lovers and I'd love to try the different versions when I am feeling adventurous.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan nachos. No beans. Salsa on the side.

6F5WBYA1pB1ORz71bsqFMA.text: So good! Great chips and salsa! Tuesday tacos are an awesome deal! Lots of options for my vegan friend!

EwKCMwUOnjlrGao3Ij3AMw.text: We love this place!  Whenever in Vegas, Nacho Daddy is a must.   The drinks are good, the food is good and the atmosphere is good!

jVeKjzivNof_iMvH8GHiXQ.text: First of all, I had a group of 6 coming to eat a late night meal, we looked on yelp and it said they were closing at 3am, which was perfect, we walk in around 1:45am, staff was awesome! Got us a table right away, service was fast, food was DELICIOUS!! I ordered the Tostada nachos, super tasty! portions are pretty big, definitely big enough for two people to share! Would absolutely go back, I've been to nacho daddy before but not the downtown location, and so far it's my favorite! Thank you ND!

ZwNrprv7ENRfIUH6pFjjCg.text: It's alright. Typical generic Americana mexicana. House margarita was pure mix. We got the the sloppy joe nachos and the cheeseburger nachos. The guys loved it, I was not impressed.

h0X-RMg1urS-ZVIwvaFO3A.text: Food was pretty good as always.  Nachos are good, burritos and tacos are good.  I dont think you can order something that you won't like.

The house margarita was delicious!!!!!! I hate that I didn't love this place. I hope that this isn't an everyday occurrence for them.

rAIZDE63o7ho27UTK1BYyw.text: Came to nacho daddy for my husbands bday and it was amazing! We are from tx and this place is just as good as the Tex mex from back home! Plus the drinks are awesome! I definitely recommend this place to tourists and people looking for good food! Jio was a great server!

GknoM0pLxkhD9k_x9qMhKg.text: Brief checkin... (a/k/a more once I've sat down to a meal)...  I've been to the new DTF (ha!) location twice now. Stellar service from fab staff, great drinks, and - just being honest as I've not eaten much here yet - my friends find it to be tasty food. The menu is abbreviated from the Henderson location, but the offerings are still classic Nacho Daddy with, I think, some new surprises?   I dare say I prefer this location; the layout is cozy and more conducive to socializing,  it's warmer and more welcoming, and, hey, you're downtown! Aaaand, the open garage-style windows = a form of my beloved al fresco #patiolife! 70* on a January day? Perfect!  Looking forward to checking it out more often!  PS, the music is nicely mixed and I've yet to hear (a) the same palsy on repeat, or (b) a bad song.  Poppy, alt rock, Top 100, and others mixed in. A bit of stuff for all.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Old-fashioned. Bulleit rye, an extra cherry.

g7XrJixKDVff0aKCbPF4IA.text: Me and my girlfriend went tonight she had a hard taco dinner and I had a soft taco meal.the place was jumping we felt very comfortable there the hostice was awesome and our server Alex was great.good margarita and the beer was cold.we will be back

2NnAiH_RFumiaQMpUHaYQA.text: Shot out to Rebecca our server/bartender for being great. Enjoyed some "naked" buffalo wings that were delicious, and washed them down with $4  16oz Dos Equis lager beer (happy hour 3-6 M-F) Also tried the bbq chicken mini nachos on the happy hour menu, which were great. Definitely a chill spot with good food and drinks, and on top of all that, they had the BEST playlist with 80s, 90s, and today's top hits to keep everyone happy.

v7y4CmiTVb2MmDB8XY6xxw.text: Excellent food and the best service in Downtown! Loved my margarita and the chips and guacamole was fantastic as well. I had the rib eye nachos fantastic. My wife had the lobster and crab nachos. Sister in law had the beer battered lobster tacos. We will be making Nacho Daddy's a regular stop!

gmSOAeYMyba6LGfR-YBUPQ.text: Came in for breakfast. Had the breakfast taco which was unique and delicious (queso + scrambled eggs and bacon = a winner). Great food and fantastic service.

Cc-73PMBRpA5oqTecS1KQA.text: It was a morbidly cold night on a Wednesday, with wind chill it was probably 40 degrees. Which absolutely disrespected the shit out of my unprepared Southern California clothing.   My comrade and self decided so seek shelter in a place called nacho daddy. We parked our steeds outside and approached the two far end seats of the bar "it was near empty in there". I started off as any self respecting male would. With a water on the rocks "of which I was heckled for by the bartender, but I didn't care because I was parched of my vast travels of the sema auto show." Anyway, After looking at my menu for all of 37.4 seconds I knew the tostada nachos were the meal to warm my near lifeless body. The friendly female bartender had enough of my shenanigans after I placed my order and slid me a Miller lite across the bar and said drink up. Little did I know this Miller would be the beginning of the end. As I finished my beer my comrade decided the remainder of the night would be spent with shots. "Jameson and pickle juice". After several shots "more like 7" along with everything else I had pre gamed with at a city called New York New York. Where we traded beads to a man in a type of chair with wheels and no legs in to get directions. l knew I had fucked up. The nachos were transported from the kitchen to the bar in a backhoe that somehow they made fit in such a tiny spot. I'm not a big person by any means so these nachos made my hand look like that little person from Austin powers. I didn't know how to attack this battle without making a huge mess or drawing attention to myself. I somehow managed to rig myself a harness from napkins and straws to suspend myself from the ceiling as to not make a mess on myself.   Lol now that you've probably read the majority of this review I'll take a second to actually say the bartender was attentive, friendly/assholeish "in a good way" and the food runners were awesome as well. I recommend sharing the mound of happiness they call food with the duggar family because I barely made a dent in it. I've been to this location several times, they never give me a reason to not come back. The company was better on Fremont, as opposed to the overpriced hooker sitting  next to me at the bar blowing her second hand dick smoke in my face.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Solid for two people easy.

7vv18Hl6gzZ20GG9Tnp4bA.text: After a couple days of buffet & casino food, bf and I were looking for a nearby spot for lunch that offered something a little different. Thank you, Yelpers for leading us to Nacho Daddy, right off the beaten Fremont Street Experience path.  I'm kind of wavering between 3 & 4 stars here, service was lacking, but the food was good.   The place feels a little divided, with the bar & bar dining on the other side of the wall from a more open, "brunchy" feeling dining area. We sat away from the bar but I wish we hadn't, it was much livelier over there!  The menu offers tacos, burritos, chips, guac... I honestly didn't look over it too long because we found what we wanted right away. We split the guacamole, chicken street tacos and pork burrito. Everything was very tasty and reasonably priced.  Our server was a bit inattentive, forgetting things here and there, taking awhile on the drinks, etc. We weren't in a big hurry though so it wasn't a huge deal.  Glad we stopped by!

CIyesPyX3wOGBWi0yObFAA.text: They had THE best chips and salsa!  They aren't free but it's all you can eat for 2.95.  Worth every penny.  The rest of the food was a 3-4 star.  We checked in with yelp and received a free margarita too.  Super convenient off of Fremont street.

aQ4GC48v0L0WWTl67PUPVg.text: Stopped here to watch some NFL games before LIB a few weeks back and was pleasantly surprised with the new digs. They had most of the out of town games on, so I got to watch my Jets lose by 40 to a team from Ohio (boo). Sunny day? Gotta grab a Pacifico on tap and a Daddy's Supreme Taco (carne asada, mozz, roasted salsa and cilantro). This was a bomb-a$$ taco and was really like a smedium 'rito. A thicker than normal tortilla allowed all the toppings to stay right in place, so no leaking from any end and no breakage in the middle. The lunchtime price of $8.95 didn't break the bank and the whole bill (2 beers, 1 shot, taco, chips) came out around $20. Not too bad. Will def be back!  Pro-tip: Don't ask what kind of tequilas they have unless you have a while. There are lots.

bVvVTFLmRNFIec_7JEVsdg.text: The best burritos downtown. I love how they'll changed any menu item to suit your taste. Britney was amazing

oiL-oZebA2AVgRc5WKeNwQ.text: Nothing special, food was OK, service was good, don't see myself going back honestly.

co41Z3Kb6hlgUwg_9aZjxA.text: Been here twice now.  Both times the service and food are excellent.  Ariel and Justina were awesome.  Can't bring myself to do the scorpion shot but it's available if you like.  The happy hour menu is really good.  I prefer the daddy margarita and the spicy cucumber margarita.  The chicken mini nachos or the chipotle sliders are dang good.  I've been to the summerlin location once, but we prefer the atmosphere and freemont street location.  Bathrooms are clean.  Overall a great place with great service.  Even the managers are great and take an active role in the guests.   Parking isn't the best but I uber anyway cause the margaritas are so good and I want several.

lywDQZm91gHRsnVMFakimg.text: Great food.  Margaritas were great. Fajitas were good. Can seat large groups here. Kind of loud in there but that's ok. Server was great and friendly,  neighborhood kind of sketchy but it was downtown so that's what you get.

0gT4W1qIJ8JrGlEqtL221A.text: The atmosphere is great. And so are the big plate of nachos. I would definitely come down here again and I would most definitely recommend this to anyone I come across. The customer service is awesome. Very approachable people. Keep it up!

WQrK-cruVN9E01wjPdPOCA.text: Worst service ever. Yes, we got here at a busy time but it was SUPER BOWL weekend so you think they wouldve thought about that fact ahead of time,no? We were told by Dianna that a server had called in sick and that Aerick would be out soon. We were told to have a seat outside and he would come clean the table in a minute. We sat outside for 30 min with a dirty table and no water. My cousin went in 3 times!!! Dianna finally came out to clean our table and my COUSIN went in for our water. 20 min later Aerick comes out. We order. I did the check in for the free house margarita and he acknowledged it....but I never got it. Cancel that I did but only after I reminded him AFTER we were pretty much done with our food. Food was ok, salsa was really good but that's it. Wont recommend that place to anybody, especially when theyre busy! But hey, isn't that the goal of a restaurant- to BE busy?? Huh.

( I am a local who obviously just google mexican restaurants nearby) To be honest, this place is quite an inconvenience. It is located in the center of the downtown Freemont area which basically means pay to park fees, must walk a distance from parking garage to restaurant (that pretty much looks beat down and dingy) This place is good for anyone who is already walking down the downtown Freemont area. Not, for someone to drive specifically to this place. It is not worth The hassle of just getting there. Anyways. The drinks were amazing!!! So. It has a (dingy) run down (old distressed counter tables throughout) casual late afternoon "grab drinks and appetizer" in any type of attire vibe for someone already in the area.

Service was pretty good and the Nachos and Queso were AMAZING! Nachos were a huge and the three of us weren't able to finish them.

C-kaA6H6iHaZMXNmdki8Gg.text: found this place on yelp while visiting Vegas for the week and im sooo glad that we chose to come here!  Service was great!!!  The food was sooo good!  We were very impressed! We will be back :)  This is a must try!

Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Fajita and White Peach Margharita

ZAGffrrZaoYAJSsX69NBfg.text: Loud, dirty, poor service, bad manager.   My food order was forgotten and after an inordinate amount of time the manager came to apologize and take the food order again.   At that point I decided to close the drinks bill and go elsewhere. They didn't even comp so much as one drink.   That manager needs to be fired.   Won't be spending my money at Nacho Daddy for a long time.  I am a Vegas local so I know I have choices, and I will not be choosing Nacho Daddy.

rUuXFpLIxqx7ZJfKKOkAag.text: I used to love it here, mainly because of the vegan options. We went this last week and service was awful. The bartender was training a new guy and was more interested in hitting on him than helping customers. He tried to make up for her inattention but it was disappointing. I used to make this place a priority every time I went to Vegas, but it's definitely dropped off the list.

LhAQobeHnLRTAbISVLYwzg.text: Personally, I like their food. My bf hates it, says it makes him sick, unfortunately. My rating is based on the service alone. Dear god, it's TERRIBLE. Now - I can't speak on the table service, since we sat at the bar on both our visits, but they seriously need to work on hiring better bartenders! The first visit wasn't terrible, but the second visit was just awful. We actually heard our bartender (don't know her name but she had that ratchet red color hair), asking the tall male bartender to take our order cause she didn't want to. Um, really? Once he refused, she came by to take our order. I asked if they had filtered water, she said she had no idea. Um, how about asking another bartender??? Then, I ordered the chick'n chimichanga, & my bf ordered tacos. One min later she comes back & asks again what my bf ordered. When the food arrived, they got his order right but gave me a veggie burrito. I told her, & she apologized & put the right order in. No biggie. I know people can have bad days or maybe she's new? 20 min later (after my bf finished his meal) my order comes out. Very much worth the wait, delicious; albeit annoying that we couldn't eat together. One thing I noticed though (while waiting almost an hour for my food), is that this wasn't a very busy night, there were 3 couples at the bar including my bf & myself, & the dining area wasn't that busy either. So I was really confused as to why on both of our visits, the bartenders literally went out of their way to not wait on us. There were 3 bartenders, & they spent the majority of our visit having conversations like they were on break? MAYBE if our bartender actually put all of her focus & effort into her JOB instead of goofing off with the other bartenders, she wouldn't screw up so much? I appreciate her apology, but you could tell it didn't really matter to her cause she probably does it 100x a day. Once I finished my meal, I asked for a dessert to go. And of course, once again, she screws up my order. They bring out a vegan quesadilla??? Wtf? When they tell her she screwed up, she & all the bartenders were just laughing about it. She actually came over to me & blamed it on the WAITER even though SHE put it in the system wrong, SMH. At that point, I yelled out "HEY I'll take the quesadilla for all the inconvenience?!" LOL By the time they brought out the dessert I thought for SURE she would take it off the bill, but no. LOL My bf said "this is the laziest, most careless bartender I've ever seen." I don't even think she was new, I think she was on pills tbh. All I have to say is - the next time we'll be sitting at a TABLE. I'm sure the bartenders will be happy to hear this since they CLEARLY hate their jobs. LOL
