Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan chocolate cake
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie burrito

dNyma2LEdimX3Fm8iynIXQ.text: Of all the places we ate at during our trip to Vegas, we encountered the nicest waitstaff here. We came super late around midnight and they were semi crowded but the waiters were attentive and sat us right away. They were also super friendly and helpful with the menu. Just an overall a good vibe and great dine-in experience. Thanks guys!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HExdNXAjb9dKxHYtnzXhmA.text: Came here based on yelp reviews and staying at Fremont. Service was decent, chill for 1 am. We ordered the enchilada nachos. Normally I'm all about red sauce and not a fan of green, but if you order these, get green. We did half and half and tasted both, and green side was way better.   We also ordered a michelada and a blackberry margarita. The michelada was decent (I'm half Mexican, so standards are high) but the margarita was soooooooooo sweet. I couldn't drink it to save my life. My husband ended up drinking it because "he doesn't waste liquor". Lol.  We would def come back again and try a different item. #nachosforlife

SfZfNajclndkYOVz_B4A4A.text: We ate here one night after playing on Fremont. Most of my family are vegans so we were looking for something opened late that served vegan options. The service and food were amazing, try the crispy fish tacos, lobster and crab nachos.

xm_NY-Qr3SSpYRxP2KSlgQ.text: Food was outstanding and service was awesome!  Will be back for sure!  Very friendly staff and great place to hang out!

uAACho3j-DJvaeK9Wt6iYA.text: Catchy name reeled my friends and I into this restaurant.  Just happened to be in Downtown on a sardine packed can of people kind of night. Decided to give this place a try. It's hidden a little bit off of the Downtown Vegas path. Dark on the outside a little hard to tell where to enter. We found it and were greeted and quickly seated. It was busy, so the servers were running around trying to keep everyone happy.   Got our drinks ordered, and asked our server for recommendations.  He told us to get one of Nacho choices and the 2 most expensive were their most popular ;).   Thanks to checking in with Yelp I got a free margarita, although in retrospect, I think it was virgin, because it just tasted like mix, no scent or taste of liquor.   The food arrived in the expected amount of time. I got the Enchilada (chicken) Nachos. The portion was big, more than enough for two people. All of my buddies also got big servings and soon we would all be full, and feel like adjusting our belts to a more forgiving notch.   The service was good. Like most places in Vegas the restaurant itself had dark floors that were a little sticky. The food was good and plentiful. Considering bang for the buck and without a 30 minute wait on Presidents' Day weekend we were satisfied.  If the buffet you wanted just can't be had or just looking for a quick meal, this is a good spot to fill the void.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Complimentary warm (on the thicker side) chips and chunky mild salsa.
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enchilada Nachos, tender pulled chicken, mild in taste with jalapeños make for a surprising fire in the mouth.

Nj-FgEJ3Chok8O2EZk9fEQ.text: Every time I come visit Vegas I always make an effort to eat at Nacho Daddy downtown off 4th street. I love the food, the chill atmosphere and please make sure you ask for Dean as your waiter, he's super attentive, friendly and his customer service is top notch!

gL3IUbOm0dHJcoZHPf-TOw.text: Had a reservation but waited 30 minutes just to have a hostess acknowledge the crowd at the door. We were directed to a table, but never offered menus -- had to ask after waiting another 30 minutes. Nobody ever came to take our order or bring water so we abandoned our table and left. Watched people all around us get seated and served after we arrived.  Crap staff: Nacho customer.

qOUsUWELfLnc9RBHbmUF2A.text: This place never disappoints!We came here to eat on Christmas Day it was such great service!The manger was so nice and sat us down right away!Over all delicious food and great fast customer service!

NdbDmfZEzJnw4zHkjthPoQ.text: I loved that this place had plenty of vegan options. I had the Vegan Ch'kin Nachos with the Nacho Daddy beer flight. I loved all of it! The staff is so nice . Giovanny and Perla were very polite and very helpful. I'd definitely come back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

9G3n71iS25r5O3hrFKDJ1w.text: We went to this place very late on a Friday night (I believe it was close to midnight) and we were greeted and seated right away.  Their menu is very interesting, and if you like nachos then you will love this place. I ordered their fajitas and it was pretty good.  They flame the fajitas in front of you.  I don't remember the name of our server but he made our time there very pleasant.   Their margaritas were also very tasty. I would recommend this place to anyone who is at the Fremont Street and likes Mexican food.

ecB3PkZLfdskHrEEC541fw.text: Decent service. They don't give free chips and salsa like most Mexican joints around town, but the $3 option is worth it! Large portions and strong drinks! Would definitely recommend the lobster nachos!

FveYzcd_uGOdHVSuc2fh6Q.text: The nachos are so good. The meat is delicious and the salsa really adds to it. I normally don't pay too much attention to the salsas but this one caught my attention. The portions are a good size and the margaritas are also different since they're more sour than I'm used to. I love that they have vegan options and I'm sure it's a full page of options on the menu! Makes it easy for outings with friends that have all kinds of diets.

STJ7aSe4hXnLHyaQZIYaHg.text: Food was decent, although soggy and cold. That might be because I was told I'd be waiting 15-20mins and actually ended up waiting 30mins for food that was sitting behind the pick up counter for at least half that time. (Had a to-go order.) Very loud and full of drunk/stinky people. Makes sense with the location though. You'll probably be better off going to one not on Fremont.

ee89fv9Kq7q3kzDDt19Sog.text: aight.  service was attentive but a bit slow, and the food was...aight.  the margarita was my accompaniment as i awaited my food. I was fond of the Mexican corn, which while it won't satisfy a  elote or esquite craving, it suffices for that moment. the flavors in my nacho order were just fine. the chips were a bit thin to handle the weightiness of the acoutrement. my chips kept breaking under the pressure of ground beef and veggies.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. $5 happy hour margarita

Ho7dIrwdytiFJAdWFLc5qQ.text: Great food, excellent atmosphere and very good help. We have been in a couple of times and it never disappoints!!

QQ6UV__3P_L5pNCvsKF9tw.text: The food here is exceptional, but the real reason to go is the bar.  FUN, FUN, FUN!!!!!  Where else on earth are you going to get a "Scorpion Shot?" --- Yes a real scorpion is in the bottom of the glass, and you get to keep the glass.  HAVE NO FEAR -- THE FUN IS HERE

auShdi3ITRhXuCWJv55ipA.text: Not sure if the service wasn't great because it was late at night or if they are just lacking hospitality. Half of our table of 7 ordered shots and some beers. Took 10 minutes to get them. The food was great, and didn't take long to come out. But our server basically never came back until he was dropping the check. I quickly got up to pay because there was a roach crawling behind my head on the concrete wall. I assume it was the manager I walked up to. His response when I told him about the bug was that sometimes they crawl in. As a restaurant manager myself I wouldn't have left the situation at that.. but he did. For sure won't come back to this location.

1Jobj_LUMFa4IeynDpZbVg.text: Nacho combinations were interesting and delicious but all lacked cheese. I had the classic and chicken tinga. Chicken was tender and flavorful. Really great taste. I sat at the bar and the service from the bartender was limited, the bar back was great though. I got the free margarita for checking in on YELP and it was terrible. Mostly bitters. Had to Ofer a second shot of tequila to make it drinkable. Ordered the pineapple mint margarita after that and it was the same. Mostly bitters barely a hint of artificial pineapple flavor and a couple of mint leaves for looks I guess. They were muddled and delivered no flavor. This place was on my bucket list for Vegas and I am glad I tried it but I wouldn't recommend it.

Ijvp5JhCEvvAGwAm51Qujg.text: Easily the best nacho's I've ever had at a restaurant!  First, they do not hold back on the portions they give you. I got the Filet Mignon nachos, and while the price might scare some people, it was totally worth it. Usually place load you up with crappy chips and tons of   store bought salsa, but not here. They loaded it up with tons of fresh, real home made salsa, tons of meat and fresh chips, and cheese.  The service was great as well. Our server was on top of things, checking up with us, bringing out food out quick and getting our drinks refilled before we could even ask.   You can tell that they have been doing this for a while and perfecting it along the way. I would highly recommend stopping by here if you're ever visiting downtown vegas!

2kCTEcpMsGdJ-T4IrM8mxg.text: Went for a late afternoon snack of nachos. I indulged in a spicy cucumber margarita. It was spicy yet refreshing. We had the spicy shrimp nachos with spinach tortilla chips. It was just the right amount of shrimp. We shared amongst 3 but it really is a perfect meal for 1 or snack for 2.  The wait staff was very attentive.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy shrimp nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy Cucumber Margarita

BGTLqKotrWgcHHlhnrJBaw.text: Nacho Daddy is the place to go if you're hungry on Fremont Street and are looking for a late night dine spot. Great atmosphere, great music, great customer service. My boyfriend and I sat at the bar and we were happily greeted by Ariel and later the AGM Joseph came over to check up on our drinks. We decided to be spontaneous and order a mango margarita pitcher. It was delicious and well worth the money for sure. We easily got 5-6 drinks out of our pitcher. I ordered the ceviche and my boyfriend ordered the American tacos. Both orders came out in a punctual, timely matter and was well prepared. Food was fresh and very tasteful, especially for late 1am. We left Nacho Daddy very satisfied and super happy with the great food and exceptional customer service. Highly recommend for anyone in the area!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

inenqEd9GZTeOtW046T6YA.text: First time here and I chose the chicken nacho enchiladas. The serving sizes here are definitely for two people to share. The nacho enchiladas were delicious and not too spicy. The service was fast and friendly. There is music playing and a bar in the center.

ujDWzaHbvAi1-3RZc1FUjQ.text: Worth every penny! We stopped by around 3:30pm for a late lunch/early dinner. Free house margarita with a yelp check in! We got the Vegas Knights Nachos and the Filet Mignon Nachos which were both about $20. The margs are strong and the nachos are tasty AF. Highly recommend this place next to Fremont St. for Mexican food. The staff was also very friendly with great service.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yxPzAqGJveDbdjhvUZexRg.text: Fantastic food. Great vibe. Had the tacos and nachos. I will be visiting here again when I'm in town.

HLOqEk2wDxDKoI6UaEK7YA.text: Eh... wasnt bad... wasnt great either. We all left half our food. Maybe we ordered the wrong dishes??

3B_-8Ec4Ef0LpthdoRcMXQ.text: This has got be the best place for nachos in all of Vegas.  The filet mignon are perfect with out a dry chip.  It matches great with the beer flight.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fillet mignon nachos.  The best keep secret in Vegas.
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Time for a flight.
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ffhtJtlCfLKKYTyKRHzmFw.text: We went a while back and I wasn't sure what to say about our experience. While the food was good it wasn't worth the trouble.  We came up to check in and were quoted a 50 minute wait. No biggie...from all of the great things my husband had read we figured it would be worth the wait. My husband had literally been talking about Nacho Daddy before we even got to Las Vegas.  Shortly after we checked in a flood of people also checked in. Really. So. Many. People. Multiple small and large parties. Great I thought! It's going to be AMAZING! 40 minutes goes by and I'm pretty annoyed because ALL those people were sat before us. But whatever we were quoted 50 minutes. Then 50 minutes goes by.. an hour.. so we check in again with the hostess. She informed us that she was waiting for a larger table to seat us since we needed a high chair. Okay fine. We finally get seated an hour and a half after we checked in and we were seated at two tables pushed together. One table so wobbly they had to overlap it with the other table to sort of stabilize it but it would slowly inch apart and be wobbly again. The hostess said the manager would be over to fix it. He or she never showed. I was literally seated between the two tables and couldn't even keep my plate level.  We waited a good while before a waiter and a trainee come to ask about what we'd like to drink. We order drinks and appetizers and then wait even longer to order food than we did to order drinks.  Our queso came out wrong (we asked for the toppings on the side) so it had to be remade.  The food eventually came and it was good but didn't really satisfy us after such a sour customer service experience.  Then it took forever to get a check and leave.   Overall I wouldn't go back.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Our lop sided wobbly table that the manager was supposed to come fix. He or she never even dropped by
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Husbands food
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My nachos

pbcnx77yAYMY4YVyfVmv1g.text: 5 stars because it's exactly what I wanted and executed perfectly. Plus a taco Tuesday deal that includes 2 for 1 tequila shots. Tasty street tacos the way they should be made, and the Mexican corn was delicious. Love the down to earth atmosphere.

v0qP54OdUt_HoeUx6aud4Q.text: Wanted to eat here in back in February when we were visiting Las Vegas but didn't.. went in yesterday and I'm so glad we did. Omg beyond delicious!!!! We ordered the filet mignon nachos, and the chimichangas... the food was soooo delicious and fresh omg I was so happy we ate there. We got two margaritas and for dessert we ordered the fried ice cream. My god Nacho daddy you guys rock lol. Thanks for such delicious food and great service.

VEUfwTPR-evnovP29JxRhQ.text: We where there for dinner and had a great experience! Excellent service, very good drinks, and the nachos were delicious!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Killer vibe!!! Sitting at the bar!!!

FOx1ZIk6DAHWgPmnVLHA8g.text: This place was pretty good! We got the Tostada Nachos and they were very tasty!!! My fiance doesn't like nachos but he likes the ones from this place! I also had a skinny margarita and it was really good too! You cannot go wrong with this place!   The only reason why I gave this place a 4 and not a 5 was because the hosts were extremely rude! It looked like they didn't want to be there and they gave us the impression that we were interrupting their conversation when we were trying to get a table! Besides rude hosts the food is really really good!  Edit: We were there on Saturday June 23, 2018 around 7 pm!

_TK1YReVhmG5IqAEFODA-g.text: If i could give it a zero , I would.  The food tasted decent, then we saw a cockroach the size of two quarters crawl up the wall and a second on the the floor.  We showed an employee who said "its so far up the wall, with the ladder, I can't reach up that high"  He told us it happens all the time. The second server seemed just as genuinely unaffected when we complained. We instantly stopped eating and left. So gross!

qu26BRYlc19ajCM33FvV4A.text: I'd give them zero stars in terms of customer service. Horrible horrible horrible attention to customers. We had only chips and salsa as it took so long for the bartender to even approach us to order food...she could have cared less...Evan at the bar was the only friendly person here and he could not serve us food. Too bad. Get some new staff who care. I wish I could rate the food but we couldn't even order....

JxkVg0HLi-V6FcrngFfKOw.text: Had a wonderful experience tonight at Nacho Daddy!  I showed up for Happy Hour and enjoyed a mini nacho plate along with a large platter of fish tacos with a house margarita.  The service was excellent at the bar as well.

78QuzyWlC93hqmEtzKq11A.text: The name it self says "Nacho", so I ordered the Tostada Nachos. Ground beef tasted like taco bell meat, refried beans were nothing close to freshly made, and guac looked as if it was oxidizing. Maybe I just ordered the wrong thing? Yet regardless, I don't think I'd return.

lrduURdNWnflYftKI12wnQ.text: Was visiting Vegas with my boyfriend & decided to try this place out after reading recent Yelp reviews. Yuuummmm!!  Their street tacos & nachos were so tasty!  Met a couple of new friends while watching the Stanley Cup finals back in June at the bar. Vegas is the place to have fun & especially on Fremont St!  Atmosphere is always great!

H2QmjhDAjbc3rJzHCIMhtw.text: Server was polite and nice. However, the nachos were not good. They were cold and soggy. Had higher expectations.

vwKk0nMSMm80zjGQsATzZw.text: Rick was an awesome server and Justin rocks!   Best service and nachos ever.  The filet mignon nachos were piled up high,  wings were good too.   Highly recommend this for all your nacho needs.

PyGTUw4hKwSzbusZy1fGzA.text: Mark is an AWESOME server! Full of energy and obviously loves his job. I love this place....this will be our new go to place for food & drinks on Fremont!

6u-5Y5hjUISXTPS5KMwhxA.text: We went here recently before my brother in laws wedding. I had the hamburger and garlic fries and my husband had chicken tacos. The food was pretty good and they started the meal off with chips and salsa which is always a plus. The decor was really modern and cool but the only downer was the music was super loud so you couldn't really hear anyone talking at your table. This has more of a club vibe than a restaurant.

zue5frysozsTfdfJ_y0dlA.text: Food is great and ambiance is nice. I had the street car tacos. Filet mignon and chicken! Absolutely great. Perfectly located in downtown Las Vegas and is within walking distance of Fremont street.

6NhrqdjepPBeK09Q7wkzJA.text: How disappointing all I can do is shake my head... we are huge fans of the Nacho Daddy location in Henderson they do an absolute amazing job and it's one of our favorite places. Therefore we thought going downtown it would be even better we were wrong. Let me preface this review by advising management not need contacting me to make the situation better as addressing my concerns should been done at the restaurant. Unfortunately we had Ryan as a server who tended more to the smaller brunette Hostess then his tables along with our table. We were unattended for so long when it was not even busy that we went to the bar to get a drink. Since we already had a table the bartender with the dreads assumed that I would not tip her because I was not sitting at the bar so I was giving an attitude about ordering a drink from her. Lucky for her I'm a decent human being and I understand that this is a service industry and tips need to be given as I was a bartender for four years. After convincing the bartender she can give me a separate check for the drink I went back to the table and watched Ryan from afar at the hostess stand. In the end I see there is a lack of management at the restaurants as if a manager was on the floor they would notice the lack of activity from their server. Training also needs to be established you should call the Henderson Property and see how they handle their staff then maybe you wouldn't get a review like this.

diKpAheuV8-RXil1zJf9HQ.text: If you're down on Fremont St, you know there aren't a lot of good places to eat unless it's the expensive steakhouses in the casinos. Enter Nacho Daddy. Awesome nacho entrees and Mexican fare and VERY good! We also had an appetizer of chicken wings which were really tasty and as good as most places I've been. Very friendly staff too. They also have a location near the strip.

0YeHpm8Iajb5OzN9E3cOXQ.text: This place was sooooo good. From the margs, to the queso, to my entree it was all just great. Kayla was very nice and kept us happy. :)

h_RZbNo39GoGjEE9bKinUw.text: This place is great. They serve really good coffee (for not being a cafe), and the tortilla soup is delicious!

LR6INV59nx3_TYIh6I9bbg.text: Service at the bar is awful!  Two of us sat down and got a drink and ceviche.  The drinks were ok and the ceviche was good but small.  We finished the drinks and food and wanted more drinks, but when we tried to get the bartenders attention he completely ignored us.  Sat there for over 20 minutes without anyone coming to get another drink order.  We even pushed our empty glasses and plate in his direction and still ignored us.  Politely shouted over the music and raised our hand, still ignored.  Awful awful awful service but it wasn't just to us, three groups on our side of the bar all experienced the same thing.  Maybe the bartender just wanted to keep serving the dude who he fist pumped since he got two rounds before anyone came our way.

bD7dKxXxGY5FJyDFu7UTvA.text: Never again! Burrito was too salty and just absolutely disgusting. And the nacho cheese on top did not add anything to help. However, the queso appetizer with nacho chips was off the hook. Our waitress was a total gem and really understanding of our issues with the food. Thank you for that! But I doubt I'll return to this place.

neCsDzJQFb_h_x0pMrcnlQ.text: The atmosphere is inviting. The food is very good and it didn't take long to get it and it came out very hot. Staff are fun here. Great service....ill be back again.

irMfNN4kVkJNhdmI6C06xA.text: Fantastic service by mark. He is really good with kids and gives fantastic recommendations. Nachos are all good and so are the burgers. Don't forget to try a scorpion in your shot if you are brave. If you are downtown try this place. Prices are very reasonable.

P53dnoL6D_r7dSu8LswtWA.text: Excellent waiter!  Food was outstanding. Def would recommend if you are in the mood for some good Mexican food!

IDrMlZYCBhO8nNFxh_Mxow.text: The tacos were wonderful.  Great spicy salsa.   A nice find a little off the beaten path .

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

FO5c4nrlCka2BZJ9UVF6GA.text: Decent Mexican food.  Draft cerveza and pitchers we're a decent value for our party of four. Pals had the carnitas street tacos and other two each had the breakfast burrito. They said it was delicious. I had the hamburger nacho - good too. Service was on it.

cEpjVngmnYvQM4Zm7oTq9w.text: I was seriously disappointed in this place. Out initial drink order took a bit, kinda weird since there were not that many people there to begin with, but after our first rounds of drinks our nachos came out cold as if they sat in the window for a bit. By then the place got a little busier but even other tables were still trying to put in drinks orders. Maybe something is wrong with the front of the house as well as the back of the house. Our food came out cold as well. Not good. By the time we left our we had been waiting on drinks for about 10 minutes, but the food runner was big plus since he helped refill some of our drinks. Overall, not coming back and not recommending.

teBSVlxcc7x4k1YvduVTaA.text: Stopped in here last week while staying at the South Point Hotel, an employee of mine recommended this place. I was very happy with how good it was, Mark our waiter was attentive and friendly, and Jessica the hostess got us seated in a very short amount of time. Overall incredibly friendly staff, Jessica recommended we try the scorpion shot and it was probably the weirdest thing I've ever tried. But I'm glad I did. I will definitely be stopping at this place again next time I'm back in Vegas

Dn6ucFFZAl2g_O7E_s6rVA.text: Awesome nachos!!! Will make this a regular stop when in Vegas.  Quick service and great cheesey nachos.

fF5m1uuPG_iuu3qc-MODWg.text: Simply amazing. I've tried four different nachos and not one has disappointed. My favorite one is the buffalo chicken nachos.

ZsCnxyM3RAfYfrDrEyFtpw.text: Working downtown gives me the luxury of bountiful options for happy hour.  So when a Tuesday night craving randomly arose, I decided to choose a place close to my job that offered a little bit of happy hour libations and good grub. Since they've opened, I've visited Nacho Daddy a few times. For someone who hasn't really put Mexican cuisine at the top of their list, they must be doing something right for me to continue coming back!  As successful as the Anthem location was, Nacho Daddy decided to open up shop last year in Downtown Las Vegas. This semi-hole in the wall gem of a cantina is located on 4th St., between Stewart Ave. and The Fremont Street Experience.  If you get lost, just look for the bright red and yellow neon sign accompanied with a Nacho chip man dressed in a Sombrero.  When you enter in the restaurant, you'll notice a few focal points. The first thing I noticed the partition separating the restaurant from the bar. Covered with pictures of various tequila brands, the partition really holds True to the type of restaurant this is.  There were also two garage style rolling doors offering a lot of fresh air ventilation which I appreciated on this warm evening.    Entering the full service bar, I immediately noticed the square bar top that took up almost the entire space.  Big screen TVs and projectors allowed me to watch multiple games and networks.  On my visit, Tyrone and Rick were the bartenders helping me out.  Tyrone was the one who actually took my order and stood out to me the most.  He was not only easy to talk to, but super attentive and really took the time to show me I was a valued customer.  Now that's customer service!  The partitions made me realize that margaritas were definitely in order! Call me a lush, but since this was also an important review, I thought it was only fair to try an array of flavors! So here's the deal: their margaritas run anywhere from $8-$11 depending on the flavor.  All margaritas are served in a cool mason jar and garnished with a lime wedge and salted rims. On my visit I wanted to stick to one brand of tequila, so I chose the Sauza Hornitos Plata for its spicy taste and agave origins. Here's what I got:  Blackberry Acai Margarita for $10: Acai liqueur, muddle blackberries, agave nectar and homemade sweet and sour.  This drink was a bit too tart. You can definitely taste the sweet and sour flavor with a hint of the agave but the stars of the show were the blackberry and acai.  Chunks of blackberry offered a nice textured pulp and the sweetness of the acai balanced some of the tart flavor.     White Peach Margarita for $9: White peach liqueur and puree, fresh lime juice and sweet and sour.  What I loved about this one was that it was a lot sweeter.  Sometimes sweet and sour can get a little to tart but this drink was subtle and full of flavor.  Like sitting on the banks of Georgia!  Guava Margarita for $9: Orchid guava liqueur, guava puree, fresh lime juice and sweet and sour.  This margarita was set up exactly like the white peach. Full bodied from the puree, the guava nectar really shined through.  I felt like I was on the beach in Waikiki!  Mango Thai Basil Margarita for $10: Thai basil, agave nectar, Mango Schnapps, mango puree, fresh lime juice and sweet and sour. I was pleasantly surprise about this one. On one hand you have the fragrant taste of a mango.  On the other, you're hit with a hint of the basil herb, breaking up the sweetness in an awesome kind of way.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND this eclectic drink!  After trying all of these amazing libations, I needed something to balance it out. Remember folks, Nacho Daddy serves food! Tyrone was nice enough to suggest the Taco Tuesday deal: 3 mix and match tacos for $3.33. I was at the point of no return. I had to take advantage of that and I'm sure glad I did. Like the margaritas, the tacos are well prepared, well-seasoned and ultimately well received. I got the pork taco, stuffed with cheese, the chicken taco stuffed with onions and cilantro and the breaded shrimp taco stuffed with cabbage, cheese and pico.  All were super flavorful, filled with the protein and delicious!  When it's all said and done, I will rave about this place for a long time to come. I'm a huge fan of local businesses opening downtown.  This place has truly brought their success in Anthem, to the heart of Las Vegas. Whether you're in the mood for a happy hour drink, late night libation or even a brunch brewski, make your way to this awesome place, Nacho Daddy!

UNSGi2LdwVk_Q56iud_DkQ.text: I need to compliment the management at Nacho Daddy.   My friends and I walked in to have breakfast at 9am after the Color Run. The restaurant was basically empty. We ordered about 5 minutes into arriving. The server was not ready, willing, or cordial from the moment we walked in. I ordered a coffee and my friends ordered breakfast. She said she would be able to make my coffee, but not right away. She would later just forget (thank god for the manager who came over and made it for her). After ordering, the restaurant filled up with runners from the Color Run.   As service slowed to a crawl, our food came out. Well, only some of it. And it was the wrong order. 30 minutes later, our order still was not complete. 40 minutes had passed, we gave up and we asked for our check. The server eventually got us our check but charged us twice for the food we never got. After correcting that mistake, she failed to give us back our credit card. It was time to leave to avoid more and more errors. After a morning of below average service, we left.   Here is the good part. As this was rare service from this location, I went back later to discuss it with the area manager. She was very apologetic and kind. She wanted us to return and make up for the errors from that morning. She said she would discuss the problem with the server and see if there was a systems failure during breakfast times.   I appreciated the proactive nature of the area manager. Serving can be a tough job and some days are better than others. While our experience was below average, it was corrected by a manger willing to listen and correct the errors.   Thank you Nacho Daddy for responding to customers needs!

4e4mjhQrLOMppIJv40pGHw.text: We were Downtown and decided to check this place out. I was surprised to see that they were even open on a Sunday morning. A restaurant that serves nachos and tequila open the breakfast? This definitely looks like a place for late night boozing. Attractive, young waitstaff and 90's 'nostalgia' music that I clearly remember as a full grown adult. Nothing will make you feel your age faster than nostalgia that you're too old to care about. The drinks section takes up half their menu. Bar food makes up the rest. We got the nachos because it's in the name so you'd think they'd be good. They were pricey but plentiful. This is a good place to go if you've got expendable income and you would rather blow it on a night out with friends instead of something sensible like video poker. Not my kind of thing but I'm not their audience. If you want to spend your paycheck on shots of tequila and tortilla chips then you might love it.

Again, because I work in the restaurant industry it was more of a tip than a complaint, because the next customer might not be so happy if this were to happen to them. When I went into the restroom, I overheard the server complaining about me in detail to someone else. I can't believe how incredibly rude and unprofessional this kind of behavior is and because of this I want to urge others not to go here because of how Allie acted.

I really like the medley of red onion, tomatoes, and jalapeno that was diced perfectly atop nachos that were kissed with fresh beans, cheese,  and seasoned ground beef. RAJQel6msCzyrC6zvLWuaQ.text: My review is 4 stars for the food, and 5 stars for the staff.    The food isn't bad.  They have a selection of salsas that are pretty good.  There look to be some awesome nacho platters.  I had their enchiladas one day and those were good, and tacos another day that were also pretty decent.  The fajitas both looked and smelled awesome when I saw them.  One person in my party had a burger that looked good.    The atmosphere is pretty standard for a decent sports bar.  Family area to keep the kids away, large bar area with tables.  There are quite a few great beers on tap and they also make some unique blends with the beers as well.  So far this sounds like a 3 and 1/2 to 4 star review, I know.  But this staff took care of me during a recent stay while my mom was in the hospital up the street.  I was staying the night at the hospital and these guys knew my name, knew my drink, and offered their best.  They also let me hang out by outlets a couple of days to charge up my laptop, phone, etc.  The staff here is definitely second to none.    There IS better Mexican in the area, but I haven't found an all out better bar.  It's also nice to have somewhere non smoking in Vegas to hang out in.  Go enjoy!

L-FPZ7LMb1rGaHAdjUc1uQ.text: Awesome supreme tostada nachos and enchilada combo, and I'm sure everything else is just as good. Great atmosphere around late lunch time, and definitely worth coming to for the food. Brittney was wonderful with suggestions and very attentive. If you're not feeling super hungry it's worth it just stopping in for Daddy's Margaritas and amazing house chips and salsa. Five stars.

zWyqiv9ztQNoMGi0SYYUmQ.text: When considering what downtown has to offer, Nacho Daddy isn't on my top list of restaurants. However, this spot does delivers on what it promises: decent Mexican food and great drinks in a fun atmosphere.   The restaurant is pretty small, a fully stocked bar sits across from a stage next to a separate dining room. Nacho Daddy regularly features musical performers and artists which really helps reflect what DTLV has been focusing on for the past years.  The food is similar to the Henderson location, but seemingly in smaller portions. The street tacos are delicious and the Thai chicken nachos are a great twist and a must-try dish. Splurge on the deep-fried ice cream, its worth it!  The bar gets extra points for serving up margaritas in mason jars! Though the food is pretty good I thought it was overpriced; $14 for nachos? $10 for margaritas? Meh.   Service was pretty friendly on our visit though the bartenders seemed to be slacking on the drinks. Our margaritas were too sweet and they weren't that generous with the tequila. Though I'm not opposed to future visits, they are more worthy places in DTLV.

Wo0QjQJ4W49ohqStiwOdRw.text: Came here for dinner with my wife after hearing good reviews from friends. The restaurant was very busy but we were seated immediately. Service was fast and friendly and the food was amazing. I ordered the Buffalo Chicken Nachos and my wife had the veggie burrito.  The Buffalo Chicken Nachos were absolutely out of this world. I tried my wife's burrito, but I had already tasted the nachos, so I was definitely grading on the curve at that point. My wife loved the burrito, so overall it was a win-win.  Our server was very "on top of it" during our entire meal. Checking in on us to make sure we were enjoying ourselves. We even got a table-side visit from Anthony, the manager who wanted to make sure we were having a good time.   Overall, it was a great dining experience. I left with a full, happy belly and have been dreaming of going back for more Buffalo Chicken Nachos for the last week.

We also got dessert and literally came back the next day to get another round of the vegan chocolate cake to take with us on our journey.   Great atmosphere and ambiance, playing modern music with music videos to accompany the songs.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

w8E2bA4vIvfX5TSVprEdhQ.text: Had the nachos supreme, chicken enchilada (with both the red and green sauces) and margaritas with my wife on a Saturday afternoon. There was no wait but the restaurant was definitely busy. We loved every bit of our meal, and I would definitely recommend our order, especially the daddy's margarita.   Service was attentive and polite, and the restaurant had a good vibe - definitely recommend if you find yourself in the mood for some great nachos while walking through the Fremont street experience

AWMZhdpaAkHLIfh6P7oICQ.text: Margaritas were the bomb. Had the seafood nachos and split them. Very good. Chips and salsa were tasty. Got there just before lunch time and still had to wait 20 min for a table. But at least we beat the lunch crowd and got to wait inside. Had we stayed outside in the 100 degree weather we would of probably left.

cxZXVt9yQmOjjKcsxUF1pA.text: Great food and service. Shared the lobster and crab nachos which were really good lots of meat. We also tried the shrimp fajitas which were great as well

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Grilled Shrimp Fajitas

-6G4zEG2C8mOzvb9A695ew.text: The manager. Jeff was so rude and disrepsectful he he told me to get the fuck out his restraunt he madw me feel so uncomfortable able im never going back you don't treat your cutsmoers like that you should be ashamed of yourself jeff!!!

gqUzdZMUg6mIpfFrprvDSA.text: Came in on a Friday night with a party of four. Spent over $150 and It seems like the staff cannot work well under pressure. Service was not up to standard, from both the host being confused to our server being rude. Food was okay but definitely not worth the wait since you get bad service. It's a no for me

sQinOfisSjw2xA30CoEQLQ.text: This place was pretty legit. I was looking at the pictures and I was impressed. I love the concept, and the name was just so funny. So we went. The food was really good. I got the chiliquilles. It came with eggs, tortilla chips, sauce, chicken, pico, beans and rice. And guacamole! Yay! The only thing that's missing was a crunch factor. The whole main dish plus the beans just makes the whole thing soggy, but that's the nature of this dish anyways so I'm not too mad. My boyfriend got the loco mock nachos. It was really good. Everything was really filling though. We were straight up so full after we left. And we were going to explore DTLV so we didn't want to carry take out boxes with us. So if you're going, it's good enough to take back home.   The atmosphere was great. The servers were really nice. The food came out relatively quick. The music was a little out of concept but it's fine. It looks like they have really good drinks, wish I tried some but it was 10am and I couldn't haha. This is more of a lunch/dinner place, but it is good for breakfast. I only found parking in the street right in front of the place, and there was no one so it was easy for me to park. I don't know about busy hours.  Would I come here again? Sure why not

06cztNuhKpncSW7CdlcF1A.text: Ordered the steak fajita plate with rice and beans. This place uses filet mignon and it was tender and flavorful. The tortillas complimented the meat and peppers very well.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak fajita plate with rice and beans.

z6s3ueBzrZLOuTKMIV-mGQ.text: This is a really solid spot right near Fremont Street. The food is straightforward, delicious, and decently-priced. They also have those fun margs with the inverted beers in them (10/10). Our server Rico was excellent to work with and went the extra mile by reminding us to check for a Yelp check-in coupon to save on our drinks. Super fun place.

IDjiVffVb9G8gHmG0uwzOQ.text: Cool little spot downtown Vegas!   We stopped in for lunch on a Monday. Wasn't busy at all. We were greeted & seated right away.  We ordered Nachos of course! They were served with colorful chips. The nachos were a good choice!  Our waiter was super friendly & attentive. He came back often to make sure we were good.    I enjoyed the chill laidback environment. I also enjoyed the prompt service we received. If I'm ever in the area I would for sure stop by again!   Food was reasonably priced.   Cool side note. We got to see someone take a scorpion shot while we were dining!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

P4aQSST4XriKm3BdDlRNvw.text: Who's your daddy? Whenever I'm in Vegas and craving nachos, Nacho Daddy is the spot to satisfy your craving. Not just for nachos but fajitas, tacos and more. It was on 4th street right at Fremont. Very convenient after we zip-lined and needed something to fill our belly's. The margaritas were good as well. Big portions! Honestly my friend and I could have split fajitas or nachos but we couldn't compromise so we ordered separately.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yes I love nachos too! Sign behind the bar
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and shrimp fajitas
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu

22n7aWctcG6xv_CaAF297g.text: Best place ever if you have friends that enjoy meat and others that don't (me) awesome vegan food and a great server makes for a beautiful Sunday ! Thanks @Jovany !

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PQBhcPsAHorgXJ4kIMNNKg.text: Nacho Daddy should rule the world. There should be a Nacho Daddy in every town. Make this happen, Nacho Daddy!   This place has it all! And it's obvious by the how busy is was on a Thursday at 3pm when we showed up for a late lunch. I was initially drawn in by the substantial vegan menu. Vegan queso is no joke and it is very hard to find. Like an Asian Crested Ibis, it is a rare bird. Guys... they have vegan queso! I rest my case (my case-o?).  But, don't worry, meat-eaters, they have plenty for you too! And a wide variety, I might add. My boyfriend ordered the Lobster and Crab Nachos that were served on a large sheet tray. Those bad boys were not messing around.   The margaritas were lovely. The service was nice. And I really appreciate the garage-door style window that was opened to bring in some fresh air and allow us to people-watch the passersby. I can't wait to go to Vegas again to get my Nacho on!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Loaded vegan nachos!
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crab and lobster nachos!
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cadillac margaritas!

LvsF3hq8pRF6G47vayu4jg.text: Rico was amazing!!!! Great customer service with great recommendations!!! Have to get the margaritas their Bomb

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Gvn5mHXrAE1sQd2hCGckPA.text: With a name like Nacho Daddy, you got to give it a try!  I got the California burrito, it was phenomenal.  Came with chips and salsa.  The salsa was a little spicy but good flavor!  My wife got the bbq pork nachos and it was enough food for a family!  Neither of us came close to finishing our meals( I helped on the nachos).

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Front of restaurant
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ pork nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. California burrito

3e6HPVube2ykDWN61eZl-A.text: What's better than just Nachos?? Nacho Daddy!  This place has such a colorful menu. Sloppy joe nachos, tostada nachos, burger nachos, filet mignon and so on. My choice for dinner was Enchilada Nachos.  This dish was made up of refried beans w tender and juicy chicken breast, jalapenos, sour cream,salsa(red or green) and crispy tortilla chips. Let me tell you, the green salsa had a spicy bold flavor that just seeped into every bite of this dish and made it ohhh sooo good! The serving size could easily feed 2 people but did l share???...Hell No! I cleaned that plate with ease.   A friend had the ground beef enchilada dinner with rice and beans and she had no complaints. Street tacos along with chips, salsa and hot queso were amongst other dishes at our table and all were equally delicious.  Liquor was good. Try the scorpion shot or the buttery nipple. You won't be dissapointed.   * l was so excited and perhaps a little liquored up, l forgot on both visits to take a picture of the nachos! Lol  Will l return, absolutely..l returned the very next day!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

e2DE9mbeergV3ln-Da3qjg.text: Jessica was very attentive.  We sat outside she wasn't our waitress but was on top of it.  Will return because of her.

_d6uy7pjl1iXivpHaF4TGA.text: This is definitely one of my favorite places to eat! Love the vibe when you walk in with good music, everyone having a good time, and the games on every tv! I got the Cali burrito and it was amazing! Also definitely get yourself one of their famous margaritas! You won't be disappointed.

R2DBbOlpYdN-KcOHIetz-g.text: Thai Chicken Tacos are LIT! Thanks Rico! Service was prompt and recommendations were amazing. We will be back tomorrow with friends to try the Scorpion Shot!

ecMe8vzHGjDv0zdhGTysKw.text: What do you call cheese that's not yours?? NACHO CHEESE!  Found this option via Yelp. A little divey upon first impression but sometimes that can be good. Had Monday night football on multiple televisions with sound versus playing annoying music... big plus. We stuck to just apps and were not disappointed. The naked wings were wonderful. Meaty with great flavor. The triple dip offered cheese, guacamole and salsa. So tasty. We also had the sizzling shrimp which was good but not my favorite if the meal. Friendly service and quick response even though they were pretty busy. Next time I'd probably try the fajitas cause they looked amazing coming out of the kitchen.

09iMqno8QDAkZ2aRIQdfxQ.text: Menu hack provided by our waiter, we ordered the vegan nachos but substituted the vegan cheese with regular cheese and then added chicken. This provided a ton of toppings and made for an amazing nacho plate. One of our favorite midnight dinners on the strip.

mq_BQzMrVu4mLyam9UZfHg.text: Not sure if we will be back. Ordered the lobster tail tacos but received something else when I asked aerik about it he said he didn't know. I dont know what's worse a waiter that doesn't know the menu or the fact that you just brought me anything like I wouldn't notice. Very disappointing

99K_HHI5RbmHtvBSmwQeSw.text: Street tacos are really delicious! Loved their chips and trio dip that included hot salsa, queso and guacamole, all of which tasted very fresh. We ended up there at happy hour and had margaritas for $3! Great deal and the blood orange flavor was great.

BxsVv2-CAPL09zfqJraPhg.text: Love Nacho Daddy!  HUGE plate of nachos and pitcher of margaritas!  What's not to love?  :)  It's a great place...

JjddrmJBdQ_tKc0MuF3oJQ.text: Great lunch option down around Fremont St.  The place was packed and some patrons had a long wait (+45 minutes).  A guy who was seated at the bar and getting ready to leave came up to us to let us know his seats would be opening up, so we only waited a few minutes.  Ally was our bartender and she was excellent.  She was busy, but always enthusiastic.  Our food came quickly and it was very good. My wife had the Irish Nachos and the were great.  Drink prices were reasonable, and all the drinks we had were good.

W9sLjueLb30JlhXjEOpnlg.text: Good vibes and I just received a free margarita :) good time with friends on a Saturday night,

N1apyLY_Q5o-uE0sFA5z5w.text: Great service. The bartender Anya and Joseph were great. They looked after us and made sure we had a great experience/good time. Definitely will come back and would recommend ppl to come here. Also the food was amazing.

2h54lsb8PGmAUcYmrijIQg.text: Whenever we stay on Fremont Street, this is our favorite place for Mexican food 100%. Friendly staff, amazing food! The best!

NcR3rdl3tHjmetJpt45G6Q.text: I came here for their happy hour (3pm-6pm). I wasn't a fan of their drinks. The House margarita had way too much sour mix, and the strawberry margarita was too flat. I did try their happy hour food menu and the sliders were AMAZING, and the tacos were average. The service from the bartender was EXCEPTIONAL and she's a real sweetheart.

b2IMuguXRoU8S_eym3GaqQ.text: Amazing Nachos. And I don't even like Nachos. We got the Filet Mignon nachos and street tacos. Very good, services was great, drinks were good.

a5XC8ddFWNwfIFPIamZcJA.text: Anya, Bartender is a bitch.  Ariel is her coworker and the bar's saving grace.  If we relied on Anya, we would have never received any service.  She served everyone around us.  Thank goodness for Ariel stepping in and doing an amazing job.

cpsH934MdZvHVGIxVDRj8g.text: 4/14/16 Starving from all the calories, we burnt walking; we decided to stumble into Nacho Daddy's to satisfy our hunger. One of the main reason we came here is that one of our friends is a Vegan, and they have food she could actually eat. I had a good experience with their food at Motley Brews last year, so I knew they would not disappoint.  We ordered our food, I got the enchilada plate, and it was perfect. No complaints, and what was awesome was that the staff is really fast and attentive. I will always come back here when I need a Mexican food fix on Fremont

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enchiladas! !

bnIo68ks6bV709Xz5PYCDw.text: Good happy hour deals! Make sure you ask for the happy hour menu because they didn't wanna give us one

4irxoYQpAhs9hqSBZS5CWA.text: The food was awesome, service was great, and affordable. I ordered the fiesta nachos and they were really good. Spicy salsa is no joke. Will defiantly comeback!

We_DWWXesiZ5i3BMUcNc-g.text: The food & drinks was exceptional. The service could have been better.  We waited 10 mins before anyone over to the table.  We shared: Triple Dip Grilled corn Street Tacos Filet Nachos

lEPlP7szVk6R8ySkvAfGkg.text: We had the lobster nachos not the best but the place was fun the staff is super upbeat but the food lacks fun and flavor

42buKYovCXCxn0tjvSmYWw.text: Went here last night with the kids. Cannot fault the food. Highly impressive Mexican on offer. Friendly staff, kids menu is also tops.! Had a great time and also tried the scorpion shot! Smooooth as. Would recommend this place and definitely go back.

O467ek-wxHJcA95ZY2JTmQ.text: Awesome will be back next time in Vegas service was great drink was great food was great atmosphere was good too we didn't have too wait long either

mIZORjOx92t4ahDiZhdO7A.text: After going to the Henderson location with friends I couldn't wait to take my hubby when I heard they opened one by us Downtown!! The wait wasn't long but OMG to get a waiter over was! We sat there for a good 10-15 min before anyone came to take our drink order. They sat us by the door which was freezing. There were 3 homeless people who hung outside the place and one came in to ask for money and cigarettes!! We finally moved to the bar when no one was still coming over. We got street tacos which were good and the bartender was nice. But I definitely didn't want to have my date sitting at the bar top. I give 3 stars because the food was good. We haven't been back since though.

0l8reBJ7-81xHgtycVqN9Q.text: Great $5 happy hour selections. I love the mini size nachos so you can try a variety without committing to the bigger portion during non happy hour times. Margaritas were tasty and not overly sweet.

r1tXtf4ME90ZrNF8k4hURg.text: There was a wait on a very busy Saturday night do we sat at the bar. Service was quick and the food was great!

v3qQ5QmSjBpau6tRhvCu9w.text: We have made this a staple in our choices of restaurants when we're downtown (we're Vegas locals)! Their chips, guacamole and salsa are full of flavor and give you a nice preview on how dinner is going to taste. You can't go wrong with the chimichangas! And the filet mignon street tacos will have you anticipating going back for seconds! They were so good, we went on a Friday night and then again on Saturday night for dinner. Make sure you stop by and grab a bite to eat. You won't be disappointed.

DA-d3JmgfcRq-O8wxxcKOA.text: Happy hour was nice, $5 drinks and nachos. The bbq chicken nachos had a lot of sauce and were loaded but not enough chips! Service was great.

8MPoz1ugyPGVJykQ2zSBLA.text: The nachos are actually BOMB.  Filling/Appetizing, the staff is more than accommodating!  Spent a little less than a fortune due to my effervescent ideas of hunger whilst drunk, but TOTALLY WORTH IT.  If I hadn't converted to being Vegan, I'd def go here again with all the intentions of avoiding any dietary concerns.  So tasty!  Oh-Atmosphere!  The entire location just feels like a cozy local venue with enticing joy to sit inside.  Go on then, go in and have a look for yourself!

1SF1ozQi802soRAKh0D01Q.text: The food was brought out very fast, drinks were refilled promptly, and we even got two free margaritas by checking in! I thoroughly enjoyed the food. A+

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Nachos and Grilled Wings

iiaKiQZj6qYB4DrcoO1GLA.text: Growing up in Texas we are very picky about our Mexican food. Typically it is hard to find that Tex-Mex flare west of Texas. This is a gem and a great place to start an evening on the old strip in Vegas. Great food, incredible service from Aerrick and fun atmosphere. Have to do the Scorpion shot, but can't go wrong ordering food from what I saw.

Yj0A8UeGXtH6o71pAe5Nhg.text: Best food I have ever had in Vegas!  HUGE portions on the nachos, definitely share with someone.  All three kinds of nachos we had were amazing.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

IoDRcQT_K-IbcMnkf2VTOw.text: Went to Nacho Daddy for dinner while staying downtown. It's located half a block off Fremont Street. Immediate seating was available at the bar. Service was friendly and efficient. Beer was cold, free Yelp coupon Margarita was very, very good. They make their own margarita mix which was a nice balance of sweet and sour.  Food was just ok. No free chips and salsa, have to pay for those. The crispy taco shell was not homemade, a little stale. We were charged an extra $1 for a small dish of salsa because the meal came with about 2 tablespoons of salsa. The chicken enchilada nachos were so-so, could have been better. Lots and lots of shredded chicken and enchilada sauce on chips but not much cheese or anything else. We live in the Central Valley of California where Mexican restaurants abound and our expectations are pretty high. I'd go back for a drink but can't recommend the food.

uyLdcnP2sBzFXSk0qR63Ww.text: the BEST nachos i've ever had. every single chip was fully loaded. the chips were gone and there was still a ton of filling all over the plate. the filet mignon was so juicy and tender. no fat on it. just full of flavor. this is the second time we've eaten here in 24 hours and i'd do it again if we could!!

4CAHUHUiB07ekzF0IpSsaA.text: Best nachos we have ever had!! Fillet mignon was a great pick! Decent prices for food and beer considering Vegas can be spendy.

51w1WtUlCLAkjAE9gds2vQ.text: I'm sitting here with my cousin for my birthday while he has a quick drink. The section were sitting in is completely empty. One of the waiters, probably fresh out of community college, came over to my cousin and myself and told us we couldn't sit here because we didnt have food. The section is EMPTY. The restaurant has plenty of open spots. We aren't doing anything or being disruptive. We planned on coming back here with more people in an hour to eat. The way she spoke to us was very rude and disrespectful. We won't be back here because of it. Thank you for putting a damper on my birthday Diana.

0pbQE_6CuFyNltfHtI-ECA.text: The nachos were amazing and the staff was very helpful for it being my first time! I ordered the steak nachos and they were really good!

i3MAPbgbvLAZ8tBzVKvNTw.text: Great chips! We got the trio of queso, salsa and guacamole. It was delicious! I could've just eaten that. Probably the best queso I've ever had. They make it fresh daily. So good!! The free house margarita you get with yelp check-in was not good, but hey, it was free! I will definitely go back next time I'm in Vegas.

VL85ax5XP5Rq2q4_dJaFCw.text: Fun atmosphere. Waitress was great. I loved the chips and salsa! Filet Mignon nachos were pretty good, I would try the toastada ones next time. Looks like a good place for margaritas I had a  Dr Pepper :). Featured on food network.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nacho&#39;s. Pretty good. Not a jalapeño fan so I wish I wouldn&#39;t have gotten the pico.
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ wings

CQC89jEANZNmJ7EWhiGESg.text: Our first time staying downtown and it did not disappoint. We wanted to try someplace new and unique, so we went to Nacho Daddy for dinner. Our server, MARK, made the experience unlike any other. He was energetic, friendly, and passionate about his work! When we first ordered margaritas, we asked for them blended, but they came on the rocks. Before we could take a sip, he pulled them and made sure they returned blended.  Our food (Mexican Corn on the Cob, Spicy Shrimp Nachos, and Filet Mignon Nachos) was excellent. What pushed it over the edge, however, was the option of Vegan cheese and sour cream. I am lactose intolerant, so having these options made a world of difference when enjoying nachos. Definitely coming back here next time we're in town!

lObJXYRQzh783cwJMjaOEA.text: Absolutely love nacho daddy! Where the service and food are always great! I'm so grateful for the free margaritas too! Lol I'm so ready to eat some chicken nachos!!!

0oe2akPkIoQRx8qQeL4EJQ.text: Perfect nachos and great service! Variety of nacho options that are unique and delislcious.

8QnYOI6KMhMA9LhLMLQS7A.text: Absolutely amazing margaritas (get the white peach!) with great service too. Our server Jovanny was extremely knowledgeable about the menu and drink options and we took all of his suggestions. My enchilada combination plate was absolutely delicious, and we checked in on Yelp to receive another margarita for free. Servers all checked in on our table from time to time to ensure we had everything we needed. Great spot in downtown Vegas!

pYb4s50fJjcrlWPBMWtx5g.text: Hands down my favorite place to go to in Vegas. Must try the Jalapeno Beer and the Filet Minion Nachos. Had the Corn on the cobb and that was delicious as well as their fried ice-cream. Cant wait to go back :-)

p1BDMKxx9axik9D31cs9wA.text: The scorpion shot was the strangest, but coolest thing I've ever seen. My dad took one for his birthday and it was awesome! Great service, great drinks.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shot of Jameson!
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Stocked bar!

sG3UuFxI1IvyqSpqsGSMcw.text: This place is great. The service was great. Food was so good. The chips and salsa we some of the best we have had in a long time. The place is more of an adult place, but our kids had fun. They have tv's that the kids watched and have a full kids menu and drinks. The street toco's were good. The chicken was a little dry, but the shrimp was perfect.  The fajita' s were good, the chicken was a little dry but still good. And the kids meals were big, good size for 2 young kids to share.  Will definitely go back to this place.

M4nj7zv2v2Tp8rIhyWhKaw.text: This place was hopping but we were seated quickly and waited on. The person who dropped off our menus was a bit rude, but I am not too miffed about it as they were super busy. The chips and salsa were not free, which was a bit surprising to me, as that is what I am used to, but they were only about 3-4 bucks, so I wasn't too upset. Also, the hot salad was HOT. (I know newsflash, but it was like super hot.)  We also had a free yelp coupon for a margarita. I didn't have one, but my friend did. She had the strawberry, and said it was way to sweet. She didn't finish it. The beer selection was OK. I would have liked more local beers. Our food came out quickly, and it was good. The beans and rice were not too salty, and they had a nice flavor. My tamale was delicious. I had it with the red sauce..wow, was it good. The enchilada I had with the green sauce, and I was not a fan. It was bland, and I didn't even eat half of it. If we were in the area again, I would give it another go.

AUsqOTS3CQhu-gFdY8DHrQ.text: Good place, right in the center of downtown.  Large portions, nachos were great. Gets crowded so try to make reservation.  Service was good and menu is large - all you traditional Mexican food.  I did not try the scorpion shot.   A good choice for larger group, not a romantic dinner.     I recommend, you will not be disappointed.

5LV2Xe8miVOhr9sq93PbJg.text: My boyfriend and I stumbled across this spot and it was actually really good. We ordered the chicken enchilada nachos and they were very tasty! One order was filling for two people. The margaritas are also really good! When in the mood for nachos in Vegas we will definitely be back here!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken enchilada nachos!

YqzVV3SozZXLFHbxrJTCqA.text: Excellent margaritas and customer service! Jovanny was our server and we were well taken care of.  I would definitely recommend if you are in the area!

m-PNxZ8prMnXkwNdySZnHw.text: Very good food and a positive delivery experience. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of five is because the menu indicates that the smothered burrito comes with salsa and chips and I did not receive any chips. I also wish the burrito was spicier.

V0Bmfc7YtAGl33H__4u6aQ.text: Walked in on a saturday night with a group of 12 and figured no chance. It took them only 5 minutes to set up a table. Service was outstanding and food was excellent. Everyone in our group was very happy and will go again when in Vegas.  Just wish we had one in Orange County!!!

1EUiWjl-jOH8QOs2rKSI1g.text: Had to eat here twice this month the food is not only delicious but the service by Eric and Alex was exceptional!!!

wtKqVyMB8MrvfPY_2h1BGg.text: Nacho daddy is literally my favorite place to eat. Their tacos are the best. They have everything. And the margaritas are very delish! And big.

4Uq0gj7ncAnCWBL6mv7RyA.text: The most delicious vegan chick'n tacos I have ever had!!! Our waiter Jovanny was so attentive and knowledgeable about the menu. We are just driving through, but I will for sure come back next time we come to Vegas.

pcDhNxZodGKHLLQEXIZcrA.text: Ate at Nacho Daddy once in downtown and once on the strip this trip and nachos were ahhhhhmazing!  Their vegan chicken is great!

-q5UPi4ZRuz9Bx3TjakY0Q.text: AMAZING CHIPS AND GUAC!!!!!! And the customer service was on par!!!!!!! Love this little place off the Main Street in down town it was seriously amazing I would definitely recommend to a friend!!

5B4vYUVlbALICm4uCHsbNQ.text: uhhhh YES!!!!!!!!! we got the vegan loaded nachos and the vegan chicken nachos n they were amazing!!!!!!!! esp the chicken nachos i recommend it to everyone it's so freakin good! the cheese is seriously amazing, it doesn't taste like those artificial cheeses like Daiya!!!!!! big portions too! the staff and service were really nice and accommodating and funny:)! loved it

EnQBZOq7beyv9JsVI3Nsjg.text: Excellent food and service! Had the beer battered lobster tacos and the filet mignon chimichanga.... very good! Geo (our server) was very friendly and gives excellent service.  Highly recommend!

fjjIFSEKiUPKA-fOkHG85A.text: Ordered Chicken and steak fajita servings where very good.Fajitas came hot and sizzling and tasted Great!!! Also ordered side of Queso that came with warmer to keep cheese dip hot! Chips we're light and crispy hint of salt but overall the meal was Good services was Good. But the prices of food was expensive for Mexican food.

k2Td4_ewSkOw76yXip0JtA.text: The vegan menu here is amazing. Aerrick is an awesome server! Every time I'm in Vegas, I make it a point to visit. Thanks for always providing a great experience!

4ETpC729eGYeq_kkWcihqw.text: Love! Our waitress Brittany was great! Shrimp tacos were bomb! Great atmosphere, great drinks. Had a blast! Hubby had fiesta chicken nachos which were also bomb!

HiQIAKqwm2Xs0DnHiOhooQ.text: Definitely going back my burrito was on point. The shrimp nachos were really good too!  The churro pancake!!!!!

VXHnOTVDprNhh-U1PkShdQ.text: Their nachos are so good! It's definitely a spot I eat at every time I'm in Vegas. I love the exposed brick wall, and open ceiling! My wife and I had a very positive experience. The house margaritas were great and you got one for checking in. Also nachos are the best drunk food ever!

c86CC-U73lP85nP0T5_A4A.text: Took my niece for birthday lunch. It was great! Fun atmosphere, great service and fabulous food! Will definitely go again!!

VepWoWmeLktI2TFcuYddfg.text: Went there with my family after church and noticed they had a COCKROACH on the wall. The manager, Joseph or something, said they have a cockroach issue because of the building next door and are working on it. Which is cool, but the  restaurant doors should never have been open if the issue wasn't fixed. He then went on to call my table a bunch of bullshiters.  We tried to show him the pics of the cockroach, but he refused to look or care. He said we didn't see it while eating so it shouldn't be an issue. We then went on to wait 30 mins for or check and they NEVER even tried to find or kill the COCKROACH that we saw. The food was in large portions but nothing special.  Will not be going back disgusted by the management and their upkeep. Save your money go to Denny's across the street

BjdDvlElsQ0sqXCqDiznEg.text: Do not! I repeat do not come here unless you want to waste your entire day!!! First let me start at the bar! I was greeted after 20 min then asked what I would like , she said let me check on the mixer and proceeded to take 4 other peoples order and check there ID then ask and served 3 other people she came back and asked me "what did you order?"!!!!! Then we got a table took another 25 minuets to get a server and we had to stop a server to get our order in. We talked to our neighbors and it took them 1 hr 30min to get their food. It has been 1 hour since we ordered our drinks and we just got our appetizer!  Got food, not impressed..aaaand it was another 45 min later ! (mic drop)

iK0cHb_Hx1W_2ohtVK2Psw.text: My first visit. Great staff. Very engaging. Awesome drinks. Nice variety of food. Great experience.

aKH_BVV_bxf7CBk87haI9g.text: This place was recommended to us by another bar for its tasty food. Food is great, lots of flavor, and the drinks are good too...but, the service at the bar was terrible, my girlfriend and i were ignored after our food was served. I was down for at least another round of drinks possibly more, and wanted to try the scorpion shot but not one bartender asked us or even made eye contact with me to order another...so we bailed to another bar and gave them our business...

mwvzm3bTGlZ74kWjTNXRWw.text: Amazing nachos! Must try in vegas. Service was good and the food is really good. Nice change from typical strip restaurants. Take a Lyft or uber and you will not be disappointed!!!!

mHQwsY3vcHQIt2Ygd1_nyQ.text: Great food. Perfect sized portions. Got the fajita burrito with fillet mignon, flamming steak fajitas, chicken burrito, and pork chimmichunga. All meat cooked to perfection. Also got the buffalo chicken nachos...AWESOME! Only complaint was our server, while nice, he was a bit spaced out....no cutlery after our food came until after we asked.

me9mpVXJtdBT02PkmcRrgg.text: Good food, fast and friendly service.  Nachos were great and enough for two. Nice little spot right off Fremont street.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HmRpFmzZKZb8LY_IUjjkig.text: Food was good but service was horrible. Never checked up on us. The bartender (Elise) forgot our order and made us wait 40 minutes to close our tab. Asked to speak with a manager who'd name we found out to be Chris but the only active manager available was Geo (jovanny). Evan(bar back) was great and helped as best. Geo ended up refunding our drinks, still payed for food. However as far as I'm concerned time is money. I'll never get my time back and the food isn't worth what we had to go through to get it.

oJukcEy7txNiD9VORuoNug.text: Allie has got to be the worst bartender I have ever encountered. Not only did she continuously say inappropriate things to me under her breath, she instigated confrontations with other customers. She continuously tried to close me out, even though I had not requested to be. Lost my business and anyone who I know will definitely not be going here. Food isn't even good and everything is cramped in there anyway. Enjoy your diarrhea nachos folks.

Nvp7LOQXo-JCUpmYBsK_uQ.text: I came here with a group of friends and loved the food and service from Dean! He's awesome and can't wait to come back and visit the downtown location again!

FLbQxUfHl68OeNFxBDb5gw.text: Food was delicious and service was great. Loved the lobster and crab nachos.  Enjoyed the music, too.  Will definitely go back the next time I'm in Vegas.

viyvjCOtz5mw6GGBGCdNVg.text: Great downtown location. Did the triple dip and various nachos. Not a miss in the group.  G was great! Fun bartender, great food.  WINNER!!

HUVKoiGgP8thkN8shDj1ww.text: Vegan stuff was amazing! Staff was super friendly. I'm definitely going back frequently during my stay here in Vegas.

jwyWGVxFnYA0WLCjVf5u3w.text: This place is super yummy for what it is. It 's a nacho place and a bar so don't expect fine dining but the dishes are fun, yummy & filling. We got free margaritas with the yelp check in and I ordered the sizzling shrimp appetizer which came with a lil show (it was yummy). Loved the laid back vibes of this place and the cute name!!

lHnY-NIhvelF4bFdbiUHuQ.text: First time coming to Nacho Daddy. Let's start with customer service.... the hostess was nice and friendly. She knows what she's doing. Once she seated us our server came to our table 10 minutes after to offer drinks (by now I had realized the service was not going to be the best so I started timing) 14 minutes in, our drinks came, 1 mojito(not refreshing at all as it should be) and 1 modelo ( it was warm, our server did say they currently didn't have any cold ones. If you know what you're doing as a server, you walk back to the table and mention it to your customer and maybe offer a different kind of beer before serving a hot beer). We ordered our food 40 minutes in. Again, it took a very, very long time for our food to come out.   The fajitas were pretty delicious but my order of crab and lobster enchiladas were bland, not much  flavor, definitely a rip off of $17. I ended the night by ordering a michelada, michelada was just okay. I definitely won't be back or at least to this location. Service sucks!

DpF8JKfi3y4ByXCVBLnWQw.text: OMG!!! Defiantly a must try when your in downtown Las Vegas. The serving potions are huge and they were more than accommodating on extra items requested with no extra charge.   My food was delivered using grub hub, delivery took about an hour which was the recommended wait time a hit long for a place that was no more than 10mins from where I was staying.   Still high recommended. Great food.

zU0hsaXn8RzivsN5wBheBA.text: This really a very nice little dive bar/Restaurant with nicely prepared Mexican fresh authentic food.   Prices are highly reasonable as compared to the Immediate Casino options.   Staff is friendly, and efficient!   I really think this might be the best kept Mexican food secret straight and just a few steps off of Fremont!   Say hi to Anya, she was our server this visit!   Smiles and great service!  And they also have their very own bottled Stinger Hot Sauce!   Yes, a bottle goes back to Oregon with me!   All local ingredients made as you guessed it, right here!   Glad I found it, it feels like home barsteraunt!

ptDebwOwQFt79RhKoX2Z_Q.text: First and foremost, Nacho's aren't usually my first choice of food to order at a restaurant. But, MAN OH MAN! Nacho Daddy is a game changer on so many levels.   If ever you run across Nacho Daddy, you MUST order the Crab and Lobster Nachos. It is out of this world. My friends and I came from out of town and I'm so happy this restaurant was introduced to me. I am definitely coming back for more & will definitely be trying different Nacho Daddy Specials! Yum!    I also recommend coming with a fun group of people to enjoy different plates in the menu!

3oRyKfd1lARohoeBdCa18g.text: This place was delicious! We can on a Saturday night and Fremont Street was packed, so we were told we had a 30 min wait. It turned out to be less than 10 minutes until we got a table, which was awesome.  The food was delicious. We got the four cheese nachos, the vegan spicy burrito, chicken fajitas, and fish tacos. Everything was perfect and the vegan menu is just awesome + the service was good too! We'll absolutely be back.

D1uI_aH9C5QyOstY5wF_iw.text: The food and drinks were awesome! We had the filet nachos and they were great. Rico is a 5 star server!! Highly recommend!

-fJ0fGlP_YqXFR34fqRNpg.text: Outstanding selection of delicious Nachos! I had the BBQ Pulled Pork Nachos. Very tasty!   My server, we will call her "Just G" was excellent! She made sure that I was a happy, satisfied customer.   Good value as well!  I'll be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ Pulled Pork Nachos! Yummmmmmm

tiWkvawKkjU_oifp8NyXjg.text: Great location, great service and friendly servers. The Ceviche was very good, but the filet tacos were absolutely amazing. The flavor of the steak and the way this place does the tortillas made them amazing. I honestly don't know how they made tacos that freaking good!

0oJHIMwz20qw5He6oJTg4A.text: Great hangover food and fun for groups. The I love nacho sign is great for being basic and instagramming. I love the queso that we shared for the table. The nachos were amazing but the burgers were a little rarer than we expected. Overall, we had a good experience.

rBFamb1V8jqk4XHu0_JpCQ.text: They have the best nachos I have ever had, hands down! All of the ingredients are fresh. The food just has that premium quality. The customer service here is excellent as well. I like the atmosphere as well. I shared the  Fiesta Nachos and the Spicy Shrimp Nachos with my sisters. I also ordered a Mexican Candy Margarita. The drink was just as strong as it was sweet.

Am3kufM63u_mUCsuLcn4YA.text: I ordered through UberEats & it was a bad decision. I ordered the filet mignon nacho & all I asked for was there to be no pico de gallo. There's no sour cream, guac or cilantro on my nachos. That's pretty fucked up considering how much I paid.
