Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

bILxEeRozUUdpSQ0Ma8BSg.text: The wait is long and they text you so if you're chatting with your friends instead of your phone in your face you could miss it as they don't call your name out. I ordered the Mexican not on the Cobb corn. Delicious. A little salty but over all good. And the fried fish taco. It's really big so I only ate about half of it (I wasn't that hungry though). My friends got carne nachos and ceviche. They said both were a bit spicy but good. Overall it was good food but a ridiculous wait.  ETA: Kayla was not a very good server. We waited a very long time for our check. We were looking for her and it was her social hour apparently.

PKhRK19tEkQmjsQfyecYpg.text: Came here for 1 reason and 1 reason only: SCORPION SHOTS. First off, was super easy to find with my phone gps (we were staying at the Golden Nugget) so we walked.  Came upon a bunch of people waiting outside and they were polite enough to tell us they were just hanging out and not standing in line and to go ahead. I see 2 ladies at a podium type table talking story. I ask them is there a wait to get in and they say yup. I look inside and notice there's seats at the bar since its just me & the hubby so i ask can we go to the bar and they say yeah. Im like, well they couldve told us that when i asked if there was a wait. Whatever, we go in find 2 seats and sit. There's 2 people behind the bar who are busy walking back & forth but took a good 10 min. to acknowledge that we were there. Finally, the lady asks us what we want and i order the 2 scorpion shots. It was $20 a shot which i was ok with. From reviews i read prior to coming i knew it was a bit pricey but hey anything for a IG pic, lol. The shot was fine and we even got to keep the shot glass which was nice. My 3 stars is because of the customer service. I get it, it's a bar but it never hurts to be nice to the customers.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shots

90MN42TWpaKQ5MqdFT5sDw.text: If you like delicious food and burritos that take 90 minutes then this place is your ish.   We stopped here with our friends while on Fremont and enjoyed some nachos and a ridiculously delayed burrito. Everything was tasty but the service was absolute trash. From the hostess who scoffed at the request for a group of 6 to the pathetic manager who arrived 60min too late and tried to comp a burrito trying to excuse total neglect of a table who spent over $200.  I can't honestly suggest this restaurant after what we went through; the only reason we stuck around to pay for our tab after an hour or absentee waiters was because we all have experience in the service industry. But no person amongst this staff deserves a dollar of our tips nor our empty thanks for the experience we endured.  Kudos to the kitchen staff for dishing our some tasty nachos.

e8ohisvbAHnRcmFpgFEHuw.text: The best nachos ever. This place is a must if you like nachos.  The fajitas looked great too. Also amazing margaritas

4r9JkOVP8Z5CUqq82n2gdA.text: This place is FANTASTIC. I absolutely love nachos and I must say I was very impressed with these. They had plenty of toppings and each chip was covered perfectly.   The establishment itself is very cute and nicely decorated. Its located in a side street of downtown Las Vegas so it was a bit quieter than the other places we walked by on the main Street.   We ordered the Supreme Tostada Nachos and the Fiesta Nachos. They were born equally delicious!! We also had their peach sangrai which was amazing. It had the perfect amount of alcohol where it is strong enough, but does not have the alcohol taste.   We also ordered the fried ice cream for dessert, but it was not the greatest. However it was almost closing time, so that could've been why. The ice cream crust tasted a little stale. We told our waiter and they were nice enough to replace with the churros, free of charge.   Overall we had a great experience. If you're in the area, I would definitely recommend! I wish they would open locations on the East Coast. :(

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nachos (left) and Fiesta Nachos. AMAZING

qPfx0vhnzYQFIdST9MpKnw.text: Customer Service excellent and food very good. Large groups accomodated very well - Definitely a place to eat when visiting Vegas

CHpe7i8PhNjf-bld69gCdQ.text: They have a huge vegan menu, with everything from vegan queso to enchiladas. I ordered The vegan nachos with vegan chicken on top, they were delicious and large enough to share. My fiance got the enchiladas and loved them as well. I was not expecting to find such a great place for vegan food on Fremont Street. But I sure am glad I found this place, I will definitely be going next time I'm in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Huge all vegan menu
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

lKj_iCF5dDAtOgaHoC2Fog.text: We went here 3 times during our visit to Las Vegas. Happy hour is great and the nachos are incredible.  Our only disappointment was when we went in the Saturday night.  Our waitress was not friendly at all. We had to ask 3x for water, she was not very friendly at all. Had to ask a couple times for more napkins,  and had to flag her down to get her attention to get more drinks.  She only became friendly when it was time to pay the bill and tip. I suggest sitting at the stools around the bar if you can. Our 2 great experiences were when we sat at the bar.  Both times the server was busy but friendly and telling us she would be back to us in a minute and engaging with us during our visit.  Thank you bartenders at Nacho Daddy's  !!

GuRMnAq2bh7Eham9Qe5xuw.text: Whenever I make a trip back to Las Vegas, imma have to hit up this establishment again. OMG! It's like nacho's lover paradise and their margaritas are just DAMN good!! The service was beyond attentive and the food quality was great! I ordered the "nacho average burger" & it was one of the best dishes I had in a while! I love how the seating/environment is set up and the friendliness of the staff! Overall, 10/10!! Can't wait to come back again!

jTHzbuzpUT_zVLbdGk_zYA.text: Holy nachos!  As the name implies this is a great nacho spot.  I believe it is 24 hours which is awesome because who doesn't love nachos after a Vegas night of drinking?!  Came in right after a late flight to Vegas and we were sat right away.  The nachos are huge enough to share.  I got the enchilada nachos.  If you ask you can get half/half with the sauces in case you cannot decide between red or green sauce.  I preferred the red sauce after trying both.  The vibe was look, the drinks looked huge and service was good.  I will definitely be back next time for a late night bite in Vegas.

EsIOZ9ZMZIXn1rjffoKvDA.text: Legit the best quesadilla I've ever had! And the Mexican corn was delicious too! Obviously the nachos were great too!! And we checked in on yelp for free Margaritas too!! Would def recommend this spot!

xbpig-DtjnXtppNgfxphsw.text: This place is super fun to watch football with great specials! The manager Angie was very friendly and the bartender Courtney made me a great peach margarita! I will definitely be back when these two are working!

UE_YJY9Td2G8eCVyV-7JCw.text: Oh my guava margarita!! We stopped by as we were leaving Fremont while showing some out of town friends around. Little did we know that were going to have such a pleasantly delicious experience. The margaritas were amazing. And those supreme shrimp tacos.........no words! I would drive all the way downtown just for a taco and a margarita. I have no doubt that everything else on the menu is probably amazing too! Can't wait to experience nacho daddy again!

ZewhZtRVzQdXUOgxCVPO9w.text: It takes a lot for me to complain at any restaurant and it takes even more for me to not leave a tip! Being in the restaurant business for over 10 years I value customer service... That being said thank the food gods for the the amazing Filet nachos they were simply amazing from the presentation to the very last bite I was thoroughly impressed and mad at my stomach for being full... Skip the wings tho lacked anything that would make wings good! My biggest complaint was my waitress, blond never got her name and barely had her attention the entire time! Don't ask her for anything she gives you this smile with I don't really don't wanna be here or talking to you look... I ordered a traditional margarita took a few drinks hated it but hey I ordered it I'll finish it, but as I continued to drink it I noticed that I had the dirtiest glass Ive ever drank out of... Showed my husband he said it has to be stained I took my finger and wiped the glass it was filthy it was disgusting! Did the manger care?!? Oh no she didn't... Said would you like another I said no and she never apologized she did agree it was dirty but the way she acted it was like normal... I'll never go back to that location... Not a good way to send off guest! Customer service wouldn't have gotten any stars but the nachos were bomb!!

qYu1W-eIL2TjUMX6givb4A.text: Super super super slow service. My party waited an Hour and a Half -- Not an exaggeration, we got there at 12:10 PM and did not get most of our orders until 1:40 PM. I say most of our orders as I did not get my order at all! The server/bartender just offered a lot of eye rolling and threw a lot of shade but never gave an apology, no I'm sorry, nothing but attitude. Everyone had separate checks and everyone prepaid and she made bank on the tips. I will never make that mistake again. She didn't deserve a penny! So at 1:40PM as I was getting my refund she rudely told me "I'm also going to cancel that order in the kitchen" like I was fishing for a comp'd meal! So rude, so slow, so bad, so long Nacho Daddy! Your service is in need of retooling and maybe a staff that cares.  Update: manager contacted me just to get clarification on what happened then abandoned all contact with me. Once again I was let down and nothing was done to make things right. I am no longer surprised that the service was lacking as the manager had no follow through.

fnQ-89V-gtEv_mSELq5rNg.text: Great for a full day of football. Full espresso bar for the morning game. Try the breakfast sandwich, taco or burrito. Then settle in for the afternoon with some nachos and an adult beverage of your choice.

M6tTBGwm5xqw3mdG4_QFmA.text: Right off of Fremont Street. The good is fresh and tastes amazing. Went for lunch and had the shrimp taco. The atmosphere is really laid back and comfortable. Really good would recommend it to anybody.

WyK738M3YjcNlzlQxze3eQ.text: I have been here twice now, I got the "mexi-cob w/ chicken" the first time and liked it so much I got it the second time. Tho they claim to be, they're not as vegan or vegetarian friendly as they think. So my girlfriend is very unhappy with either one of the orders of make-shift vegetarian tacos she's had, but she loves their margaritas. One thing I will say is, there's a difference in having good service and then too much service, both times I felt like I had 6 people waiting on me, I constantly had people talking to me and felt I never had second to actually enjoy my food. Also, their whole delivery system for chips and salsa is terrible. They start by asking you which salsa I want as if I knew my options, so I ask for all at once so I can decide. Then they give you a basket of chips with these tiny little, smaller then a shotglass, cups of salsa. The chip barely fits in the cup. You kinda have to pick up the cup and pour the salsa on each individual chip. It's bananas. Has this nacho daddy character never been to a  Mexican restaurant? What is he trying to prove? They all taste great but it's almost too much work to enjoy. Last but not least, this place is a coke establishment, which is always a plus for me!

S1Wal433OQkTDWODDtMEcA.text: I love hanging out downtown the casinos and the nightlife are the best in Vegas when I'm downtown and want something to eat I come here! It's off freemont and doesn't look like much but you have to try this place the food is amazing!

pETZWbhd_se_4q1j5UNkVg.text: I'm a huge huge fan of Nacho Daddy's first location down on Eastern and was beyond stoked when I saw they opened one downtown. The new location definitely lived up to my expectations. The bartenders and servers were nothing but helpful. I was a little bummed that the nacho selection was missing some of my favorites (Enchilada Nachos), but overall the food was on point and the service was perfect. The girl with the treestar tattoo rocked!.

ma6B1zBK_hy2eOVihvQ_pg.text: We liked it here!  Hubby ordered the fajita salad with steak.  Said it was delish.  My friend and I split the Supreme Tostada Nachos which were yummy.  Casual place, good food.  Would definitely recommend to friends.  Yum.

lX4cjZXsf2c_xgXArFgAeg.text: Shity service. took us over 45 mins to get our food. And asked what was taking so long his reply was a bunch of people before us ordered a bunch. As we clearly watched people come and go. I would not recommend this place to anyone. As I right this review people got there food in under 10 mins.

7kCiV4qmbJ7YzlAlAyqFPA.text: Was here last year when they were newly opened. Enjoyed it and made a point of coming back again this trip to Vegas!  Service at the bar is great!  And love the Nachos!  Sports on TV a plus!

bYRyL_mmdv0-3nCE6nrNXg.text: Worst Mexican Restaurant in Vegas.  Made me sick before I even left the restaurant. Service was not good either.

vVuvWS8ILFfiCCjIWLJRoQ.text: Went here over memorial day weekend. Had breakfast. At first was concerned they were not open. There were still tables and chairs stacked up and the place looked deserted. Took a minute to find a staff person. We ordered breakfast.The chilaquiles were terrific Our servers were very friendly. My only complaint is that the coffee was weak.

FWDkIa1vXMCBDWjQ-KwPGw.text: Brendan and Rick are superb waiters and make the experience there 10 times better. Vegan options are ridiculously good.

t4KabhTA_9JX6o-z-dLNzw.text: their all you can drink in 2 hours bloody mary bar on saturday and sunday is best deal in town and their filet burrito is the best

e4wAPWLlAFoqEzYdrnrp-Q.text: I recently visited the newly opened Nacho Daddy Downtown. I sampled the Ceviche first: Love their house made white corn nacho chips which complement the lime, lemon, orange marinated shrimp, tomatoes, onions, cucumbers, serrano chilies and avocado perfectly! Next I had the Street Tacos, three house made tacos each filled with asada steak, chicken and babacoa pulled pork, flavored with cilentro, onion and cumin. The pulled pork taco was the winner of the three, topped off with a tomatillo salsa and cotija cheese, Yummy! My friend ordered the Daddys Big Burrito with asada steak and all the trimmings, it was big enough for two people, but he rose to the challenge and devoured it all! Nacho Daddy has a great selection of domestic and imported beers, great cocktails and very special shot aptly called the Scorpion Shot, with a real scorpion in the glass, I had to have it, being a Scorpion myself! All in all a good meal in cool, relaxing surroundings. Great staff, especially Nichole, Christian and Will, who were all very accommodating and knowledgeable. Looking forward to checking out the breakfast menu and vegan section also!

r4Aswm_c0FzbHLks_ZBpmw.text: Second time here and doesn't disappoint. Friendly staff great food. Fresh chips and salsa )

hiORtDtDr8ChUAuR9DieYw.text: Dean is the True example of excellence customer service, provided a warm welcome along with great food! Definitely will return

xtEko-nUL--U-AVkTr8qRg.text: Great place. Food is amazing, margaritas refreshing and Jovanny is the best!!  No leaving Las Vegas without stopping by.

oJ-uzDdy5h2AeMFf82qFLw.text: The night manager was incredibly nice and friendly. The nachos were good the drinks were delicious. A good place to visit for a late night snack!

w9xz0pxK0ILFnnl1APtu5A.text: Giustina is on the short list of best bartenders in all of Vegas. Makes outstanding margs!! Place has some of the best chips and salsa around. Must try!

g1JLcqFjr8ZRykgm3_VEew.text: G is awesome. My family and I come here every time we come to Vegas. Margs are awesome (I would recommend getting a pitcher). Nachos and chimichanga are bomb as well!

wkARciqfqZA54aNfZWpjeg.text: Nice little spot on the side of the Fremont St Experience. When we walked up at night we where a little unsure of what to expect. Once we made it inside the Staff was really friendly and professional. Our order was delivered quick and it was good. I would visit again

vdNrL8eXQZdxdns6PNT7Ww.text: This was one of the most enjoyable breakfasts ever. The kale and chicken scramble was incredible - very unique. Good service, although the place was pretty much empty early morning. I was miffed we were charged $9.95 for the $6.95 item but let it slide because the food was so impressive and I just didn't want to deal with it.   A few days later we headed back and tried the Street Tacos which were decent and the Nacho Average Burger Nacho which didn't impress. I wish we'd have ordered something else.  I would go back solely for those breakfast scrambles.

caFlSoDgKtgpFhJEvUgSMA.text: Very cramped space, the staff was friendly and prompt but the food was very basic and generic. Wasn't very impressed overall.

WpCFCbYHTW402XLC02d2mw.text: Atmosphere is solid. Decent bar. I'm a beer nerd so tap list could use improvement. The food was great! Tacos were really good. Nachos were un-orthodox (with BBQ sauce) but good as well. Meat was tasty on both items (pork and steak). Def come back!

HzvKK7w-cxuEDRCuTkX3hA.text: Worst service ever! Food took a long time to come out. Waitress was very slow and rude. First and last visit here.

hxTZ53-o4yl_CFHR-PJdlQ.text: Great Food - Great Service! We will definitely be back... adding Nacho Daddy to our list of Vegas favorites! Try the Spicy Thai Nachos... YUMMY!

Iw-nJjPXHEUbOTaSNCz4aQ.text: I have not been back since my last two visits that were unsuccessful but I need to update that the manager read my review and sent me a $50 gift card!!!!! I have no reason to not give them another shot!!! ESP since I work downtown .... Thank u and I look forward to a cheat meal day and go buck wild with my friends in there ....

VRTAvw3CUF53ptyNyJ_17g.text: Wow and wow. Just off the strip and amazing in every way. Fresh and filling. Not your $6.99 all you can eat but that isn't what we were looking for. Huge flavor and cleaner than anything we have seen in Vegas to date. This place will be a tradition for our family. Great find in every way.

RaiLnwTNal3zuhRqEbxxyw.text: Me and my family went in earlier to have dinner and I have never felt so comfortable in a restaurant like today, the server who took care of our table I believe the name was Jose kept coming back making sure we were OK and the manager Debbie was very friendly came up to our table asking us how we were and how was out food I got the enchiladas, those were the best enchiladas I have ever ate we will differently be returning and telling all our friends about nacho daddy... Thank you for such great service...  April D

D2gyw1f1nNzNiHHx9Tpnfg.text: They claim world famous nachos......I haven't been around the world, but these are the best machines I've ever Eaten.  Perfect ratio of toppings to chips. Perfect crispy chip. If ur tipsy and hungry stop reading other reviews now, order of the nacho menu and thank me later.

PKzpv3kEWzk7TJ66O3jPFw.text: Meh.  I'd like to give an impassioned thumbs up or thumbs down but it's really middle of the road. I enjoyed the Henderson location, and being a downtown denizen, I expected to love this location, which I do....sometimes. I say meh because this place is literally hit or miss. I've had times when I can barely touch the food they give me, and three times when I'm scarfing it down like Gabriel Iglesias on taco Tuesday. This applies to both food and the drinks. There are some bartenders that if I see working I immediately know that I need to stick to my cervezas since they can't mess that up. Overall it's not bad, but it's not great. It's just workable, I'd just like consistency. The Henderson location has always been pretty good, I've heard good things about summerlin, and I liked nacho daddy when they had a booth at LIB. Fingers crossed that this place gets where it needs to be

l5LvJ3-toV3uPpAko9Ugjw.text: We had a coupon for a free appetizers and decided to check out the location on  Fremont & 4th. the cleanliness of the restaurant leaves a little to be desired however they make some of the best tacos in Vegas. the supreme nachos were very very good also. the happy hour menu is very reasonably priced

3UpJkT48molYGW1K2gjACg.text: So good!!! Loved the burger nachos and fiesta nachos best! Enchilada nachos are really spicy! Great service! A fun place for munchies while you're partying on Fremont

lrde96v8zdrGHmS3f4j3Ig.text: The food here is great. I got the buffalo chicken nachos and they were amazing. And the service was great. Alex took care of us, and she was very friendly. She recommended the nachos, and they were great.  Definitely will come back here again.

8LkPsol5hygLjjfyq3eoZA.text: Nacho Daddy is a good spot if you're downtown and craving some Mexican fare. We came on a busy Sunday night, football and Life is Beautiful festival happening, and we were greeted quickly.  Our server really made the experience 4 star, always checking on us and fast service! Thanks Mark M. :)  The food, I'd give 3.5 stars. It's was fresh, but lacked a little on taste. I got the enchiladas, and the green sauce was barely present. I like my enchiladas pretty saucy.  But they had enough sour cream and sides to keep it from being too dry.  The Daddy's Margarita was pretty tasty though.  There are better places for Mexican food in town. But if you're looking to satisfy your appetite for a good price Downtown, Nacho Daddy didn't disappoint.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken enchiladas, forgot to take the pic before I took a bite

4hVrzO-p4qH5M6VRVhIo1Q.text: Epic fail....speciality is nachos??? Maybe tequila and over priced at that.  100% filet nachos are not filet...skirt steak steak at best.  No cheese and the salsa tastes like prego pasta sauce.  This place is cool for a beer or tequila but nachos yeah right!

vHgKpWV0AvKC-ZDx-ORqTA.text: Service was something to be desired. Sat for about 20 minutes before even seeing a waitress. Food was good. Had the filet nachos. Once food was served it took another 5 minutes to get silverware. Which was fine for us nacho eaters. But some others couldn't start. Drinks are good too

nl4-P_HlLsT8wny-ZnQ1sA.text: Back at Nacho Daddy again. As always the service is as great as the food. Jovanny and Ariel are always giving great service.

hKZF_CLl5X0-CewkhjEJaQ.text: Best. Place. Ever. I can't even explain how great their food was!! The hostess was rude, but you get over that quickly after you taste the food.

BkkmvJHEo1fy4WJ1W-pxBQ.text: Is it too "cheesy" to say this is "nacho" typical place?!? I take my nacho eating very seriously: OK....All cliches and dorky phrases aside, I'm impressed with the creatively thought out twists to simple food.  The good:   *Super cozy atmosphere reminiscent of local Seattle pubs I'm used to. Cute decor includes separate bar and dining areas. Small retail items such as t-shirts for sale a smart idea for tourists. Funky coffee bar a nice touch.  *Music, diverse crowd, diverse menu and awesome cocktails make me want to camp out during Happy Hour and people watch.  *Everything I have tried is pretty good. I suggest splitting everything so you and your group can try more items.  *Vegan menu amazing!  *Restrooms are clean...a rarity in Fremont.  The bad:   -Any expert nacho maker will tell you to put some toppings on bottom. We were disappointed no meat or beans under first layer. If I'm gonna pay $17 for nachos "placement" is important! lol...I'm a snob I know.  -Meat can be a bit dry, maybe if stored in its own juices it would lock in flavor.  -Parking only on street at meter's.  - Small and dimly lit. If you need personal space then don't come here at night.  My questions:   Would I brave the scorpion cocktails or the Thai or dessert nachos? Not sure but they look cool.   Was the rancho sauce really homemade? It was awesome and waiter said yes but I wonder...?  My answers:  1)Put the queso on the nachos instead of plain cheese.  2) Get there before noon for lunch.  3) Don't be in a rush.  4) Expect to walk a ways if street parking is full.  I most certainly will be back.

ZLr2RCoLFWaorB6bruFL1g.text: Nacho Daddy has always been great to me. The food is sooo amazing!!! The staff are always friendly  and are willing to help out with any questions you have on the menu. I love this place can't wait to visit again soon!!!

XtbgtNpkop8WE4z2HAGHDg.text: Them scorpion shots tho!!! The food was flavorful and the drinks were made just right plus we had some great mixed drinks our Server Kayla was very informative and gave us the best advice on what to eat!

xvPw22uBbM9bt_Wi1R9MvQ.text: This place rocks!!   Such friendly service and amazing food.  They have vegan options as well!   Their margaritas are HUGE and delicious. Will definitely make this place a stop every time we are in Vegas!

ks1rDLcwh8vpp3eM7tO-Iw.text: This place is infested with cockroaches!!! Do not eat here I'm honestly surprised the health department hasn't shut it down yet. On cinco de Mayo after our group of 8 finished our meals there were two massive cockroaches one crawling on the wall directly behind us and One on the floor right next to us.   One of the employees stomped it to death right infront of everyone!! On top of this the over weight female manager was extreamly rude and also threatened us to call security. I'll be contacting the health department with the pictures and videos of the massive cockroach outbreak

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho daddy&#39;s roaches

4DNYHxixleJX4pA3v8UFGg.text: This place totally deserves 5 stars! The food here is great. The all day breakfast and a vegan section on the menu is what really drew me in. The dip trio and vegan chick'n tacos were fire! Service is great and the bartender Ariel is super cool and hot af.

dYyH5HAbfEghWMpimZj2uw.text: It was our  last night in Vegas and we were looking for a place to have dinner on the strip. So I used my Yelp app to find this restaurant and noticed that it was on the Food Network. This place has a great atmosphere good for watching sporting events they have huge TV screens. A great drink selection and even food and appetizers. They're known for their shots that have a scorpion on the bottom of the glass I didn't try that because I was too scared. I'm giving five stars for the food not really for the service that could have been better. Maybe it was kind of busy but our server hard we came to our table and if you have to request something it took a long time. If you use your check in on yelp you get a free house Margarita so don't forget to check in. This is a good place if you want to get some Mexican food. Have a few drinks and watch the game. I wish they had one of these in Hawaii maybe one day they will ,they also have a really good happy hour if you go to the nacho daddy near downtown the prices are actually cheaper just the tip. So next time in Vegas check them out.

ef7zZsrF7droHhlMdeFZFg.text: One of my favorite restaurants in the valley. Primarily because they have vegan options. It's not some plain ole vegan options either it's flavorful and filling. The spicy vegan burrito is bomb! Plus they have good drink specials on taco Tuesdays which is the cherry on top. Good place to go with friends for a good time, good music, friendly staff an overall good time. Hell yeah nacho daddy

4MUZWP-ycXhAHnkxBzWSAQ.text: Fremont Nacho Daddy's after Shotzilla Zipline. We loved the Vegan options! Chicken Chimichanga, Chicken Quesadilla were the best. The Chicken Nachos was our least favorite. Over an hour wait for the restaurant.

8ihy0GbtwNNQeSP3O5eWJQ.text: Fair prices.  Full vegan menu!  Nice sized drink menu.  I have been to this location twice, both times I ordered from the vegan menu and was happy with my selections.

DI9x0dshh56W-a3q158ZwA.text: This place is amazing! I will be coming here every time I come to Vegas. Jovanny and Talia were a great help and we were lucky to have them. They answered every question we had with a smile on their faces. I had a great experience!

IXN7nHjR40I3QnnXWEussQ.text: I been checking out places in the area trying to explore and decided to come here!!!!  BLAHHHHH!!!!!!  The food is so blah there is like no flavor taste like some stuff the microwaved it wasn't appealing at all  hard beans that come from a can and hard rice not very tasty...   The only good thing was they made I call it "red beer" I can NEVER remember the name    Other then that smh I probally wouldn't come back if I wanted microwaved food I would've stayed home

Ygp5L4R62YJNTIHgGbszGg.text: Came to this place specifically for the scorpion shots. And of course. They were OUT OF SCORPIONS. I was so disappointed that we traveled all the way downtown just to be told we couldn't get what I wanted. Oh well, we ordered food anyway.  The food itself was pretty good. My cheesy nachos had delicious queso, though it was lacking the amount of jalapenos we would have liked. We asked for a side of them extra. But, our server/bartender forgot and we had to ask again 15 minutes later.  My boyfriend also ordered one of the burritos. He really liked it, and it was a generous size. He gobbled it all down. I didn't try it myself, but I trust his judgement.  We also had to ask for refills for our water, which was challenging because she spent most of her time talking to a couple and group on opposite sides of the bar.  I'm pretty set on trying these scorpion shots. But next time I will call first.  EDIT:  Just added another star to this review because I was immediately contacted by the restaurant owner to apologize for my experience. I was offered a comp and to be contacted when scorpions come in. I'm very impressed. And I am hoping very much that I can give them another try when I come back to Vegas next year! :)  EDIT AGAIN: Bartender just contacted me to apologize to me too. Seriously, this place is wowing me with their customer service. I just have to give another star. I'm going to be back next year and will definitely come here.

dHQzIDJXpBD3i-951iepDA.text: Killer margaritas and great food! G is hands down the best bar tender in Vegas! Get a pitcher of the Cadillac margaritas you won't be disappointed.

seqdT7PGcclt8ohwTW7LFw.text: Excellent vegan menu!! The best Chik'n I've tried. Highly recommend the Vegan Chik'n nachos or the Vegan Spicy Burrito.

QQBXvVtQMplnKzlLT9MOCw.text: I guess I'm going off book. Went here for the YELP reviews and left scratching my head. Sat at the bar and the service was fine. Ordered a beer and a wine and the server told us the 2 most popular nachos and we decided on the Fiesta Nachos. Served up super quick and looked like the pictures. Certainly a lot for the money! Piled high and evenly covering the chips so you never ate a chip without topping. That being said, it was absolutely forgettable. Almost flavorless for me. We kept eating because we still had our drinks. I would say we left over half of it there. It's mostly a 20-30 year old crowd, so maybe that's part of the 4 stars. If your namesake is your signature dish, I thought it would be unforgettable. Wish I had taken advantage of the "check-in margarita," though. Not in a hurry to go back.  Although I appreciate the response from this establishment, I do wish it weren't such a "canned" one. All the comments to reviews has the exact same last paragraph.

pNESZ6rEr2rHHsv2XcPhug.text: I was impressed!  I didn't think a restaurant just off Fremont could be so good.  I had the Thai chicken nachos and they were a bit spicy but I like spicy.  If you don't, you probably shouldn't order them.  The cucumber and jalapeno margarita was excellent and not at all spicy.  Other friends with me liked their food a lot as well.  They are large portion sizes.  The Fiesta chicken nachos are crazy big.  Waitress was great and made spot on recommendations.  It was a wonderful cap to a nice partial day spent hiking.

They need to work on their margaritas.

6hsNjRrEL447DZYbRGTo5Q.text: I love this restaurant. It is one of our go to restaurants while in Vegas... the vegan nachos are so good!

Fek1q5X273Iy_0WjzNeMrw.text: Service was exceptional. Ariel our bartender and Christina went above and beyond to take great care of us. Joseph, the AGM, made it a point to check to see how we were doing. The margarita and avocado tacos were delicious. Everything said, I'm definitely coming back to this location.

0mlyI-L-rXLl9Hs7Hf4Nmg.text: One of the nicest place to visit when around 2 blocks in this area. Ordered thai nachos which I must say was hesitant to order but our server told we won't be disappointed and he was totally right. I enjoyed the nachos so much..it was different and such a great combination (mouth-watering just thinking about it). Fish tacos was good too..I cannot remember what fish it was but I loved it. No complains at all about the food or the service. Got couple of margaritas too...(thanks to yelp checkin got them for free) however found them a little bit sweet. After finishing it half I reached a point where I felt I am having sugar syrup so a bit disappointed with the drink but food made it up for it.

tUTx4NLMQ8nRYBgBCmDJAA.text: Loved this place! We were a little worried when we saw how empty it was at around 930pm. It's a smidge off Freemont (couple hundred feet). We ordered a bucket of beer. I had the Chilaquiles and my husband had the quesadilla! Both were fantastic! I have been searching for a place that had delicious Chilaquiles and this place definitely made the cut! Highly recommend this place!!! Would love to go back for bottomless mimosas and more Chilaquiles!!!   Atmosphere: two thumbs up Service: two thumbs up Food: all thumbs up

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Had a few bite! Couldn&#39;t wait!

8GdLWzAx9WPce40fCwq4sw.text: I'm not quite sure how this place earned a 4/5, as it it very mediocre. Service was on the slow side. We got the wrong drinks. And the drinks themselves aren't particularly special - they don't seem to put any effort into presentation. Also their "World's Best Nachos" are no where near that good. We got the BBQ Pork Nachos to share. The BBQ sauce was strongly on the vinegar side, not very sweet at all. And it really needed more queso to balance that out. Bummer. There's too much awesome Mexican food in this city to ever choose this place.

s7IAGDmZ1roCSDILhzNGHw.text: Happy hour consists of good food and drinks at a good price, what's not to love! My boyfriend and I came in and ordered off just the happy hour menu. We had the BBQ chicken mini nachos and the chimichangas. The nachos were actually pretty damn good. I love all things BBQ chicken! The chimichangas were good and the sauce was great. Free marg with yelp check in! Unfortunately my margarita tasted like lemonade..but it was nothing a couple shots of tequila couldn't fix.   My boyfriend and I left here happy, full, and buzzed  they also deliver to your room if you are staying at the D downtown. We ordered delivery a few days later when we were too tired and hungover to get up.

YqGnPm7H2BYc6ZQdSWGZZA.text: My husband took me here last night with our little boy for the first time. I thought it was just a bar but no. It was a restaurant as well. The hostess was very kind and sweet. When we walked in the lights were dimmed, making it feel cozy. Our server was very courteous. Atmosphere felt very kool. Customers around us looked like they were all enjoying their time. When our food arrived, they asked if they can lit our fajitas on fire, ("sure") oh man my son got a kick out of that lol. The chicken and beef fajitas had flavor. I even loved how it had a little bit of that charred flavor too. So i knew it was freshly cooked. The margarita was made perfectly. Not too tart but just right. I explained to the waiter how it was our first time and that we loooved our experience. Since we're locals, I think we found our new hang out spot. Thanks Nacho Daddy

9TFeKc7rzs2Szm_EDuTaCw.text: The beverages are cold, the staff is friendly and inviting. Must say the food is reasonably priced for Vegas and for sure a place to visit again.

MZl2VG5VK8RVJMxKSEAirA.text: Rico recommended the Thai Chicken nachos and they were so good! Try them if you already love spicy Thai wings. No picture because we crushed them but they come on green tortilla chips with the queso. YUM! The classic margarita is a sure bet too. Delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita was bomb!

6_sawVsKjyvEtm2zfUNC-g.text: It was late and we needed a place to eat. Being that it was Vegas I assumed there would be a lot of places that were open. I wanted to eat at a restaurant not fast food. I couldn't find a place! This was the closest place that was still open. We sat at the bar and were greeted quickly. The service was good. We ordered the filet mignon nachos. They were mostly nachos and no filet. It was disappointing. The side of Mexican street corn was good but small. My michelada was ok. Kind of spicy with a slight sweet taste. The food wasn't anything to write home about. Nothing about it stood out to me.

J0WdQdZ0Ute4b5U9e6HoJQ.text: Excellent food and outstanding service from the minute we walked in the door. This place has some of the best Nachos you will ever eat.. I swear by them! Be sure to ask for Rico. He is freaking awesome and made us feel right at home all the way from NC. Thanks for a great experience!! Oh I highly recommend the Chicken Tia Nachos. Enjoy!

Ou8J41wtLqjUI2eDPs9LIg.text: I went through get a table. Wait was an hour.  I asked if my party of 4 could sit at the bar and the hostess replied very sarcastically.  " Yeah if you can find a seat.". So I found a big table that was in the area of the bar and looked like the bar seating.  About five minutes later a short Hispanic girl with glasses very very rudely asked if we  had been seated there and I replied no but we were told  that we could sit here in the bar area if we could find a seat and she very very rudely replied " no this is not the bar" and very condescending tone said "you will all have to get up and leave". Very very horrible Service.  She was very disrespectful and I will most likely never come here again.  Even though.. I love nachos! It ruined my St Patrick's day!  Would've a zero star.

Hz8TIbUkjdHZtvNux5THsg.text: This place is great for what it is. A late night munching spot for people on Fremont. They don't have the best Mexican food. They don't have the best cutlery. They are the best at what they are known for: a great place to eat when you've been drinking on Fremont.   I recommend the Thai Nachos. They were delicious. They have spinach and corn chips. Both were great chips! Living in Houston, that is important. I recommend going there before or after you've gotten drunk. Those chips are good and you can absorb some of that alcohol with some food. The Triple dip was very popular, and you can't go wrong with that, plus a drink, before engaging into the nights activities.

N6kS1hyya1WBKolHDbdaNw.text: I usually get a breakfast burrito delivered but decided to pop inside for lunch this time. I was greeted by a rude server who didn't care. Ordered some street tacos and I have to say they were the blandest tacos I've ever had. Not impressed and not going back in future due to this negative experience

kr1Mh5JN6S-PiiW4Dg3Zwg.text: Sorry as this review is a little on the late side. We must of driven by Nacho Daddy a million of times from Downtown Fremont Street to the strip and never even thought about stopping in until one morning when we were looking for something to eat and turned to Yelp for suggestions.  At that time they were running a promotion for a free house margarita when you check in and bam that caught our eyes.  In a city where liquor prices are up there and to get a free margarita just for checking in???  We had to at least check in and get our free margarita. We found street parking right there on 4th Street.   We walk in and this place looks like a legit Mexican biker bar straight out of the movies and we liked it. After getting seated we were looking through the menu and our waitress came to take our orders so we showed her our check in for margarita and she smiled like she never saw that before and told us that it will take a little while as they are short handed at the bar. Short handed was right.  Our waitress was also the bartender, server and bus person. So yes our drinks took awhile. But when they came, it came in these huge glasses so we thought that no way they could taste good but one sip and we knew it was worth the wait. It was one of the bigger and best tasting margaritas we ever tasted. While they don't have that promotion when you check in, you can go to their Yelp page and you can click the 1 free margarita to be sent to your phone.  Yes sometimes you have to work for what you want and trust me, it's worth the effort to get it. Hey it's free and good and huge.  On to the food. My nephew got the Breakfast Burrito ($10.95). You have a choice of sausage or bacon. Of course scrambled eggs, melted cheese, hash browns and ranchero sauce. It came with it's own house made chips and salsa.  He couldn't contain himself as he dug into this behemoth of a burrito. I asked him how did he like it?  All he could do was nod his head and give and give a thumbs up.   My better half got their Steak Omelet ($13.95 +$2 for egg white) and was happy to hear that they could make it with all egg whites for an extra charge. The steak was a nicely marinated, with pico de Gallo and melted jack and cheddar cheese. It was came with salsa and hash browns.   For myself and yes I shared, I got their Supreme Tostada Nachos ($17.50). A big pile of nachos that came with seasoned ground beef, they got every cheese in the house and sprinkled it all on.  Refried beans, jalapenos, sour cream, guacamole, lettuce, you name it and it was on there.   It was only 9:45 am and we were stuffed and pre-gamed all in one sitting.  Great chill atmosphere, good service considering they were short handed, great food and drinks.  Nacho Daddy, we will come back and conquer your delicious food and drinks and we will say who's your daddy!  Their hours: Sunday - Wednesday 8am - 2am Thursday - Saturday  8am - 3am

5Fo9i2lGWCIWO2CN2Ic0og.text: Good food n service, but come on, how can chips, cheese and toppings be worth $12+?  Been there a few times with a group and most felt the same.

a8drDpbmBscpawn3wnJ9EA.text: First time in about a year.  Last time was great.  This time... Not so much. Butchered my order, got sour cream on my girlfriends shirt. Waitress only cared that she keyed in the order correctly, and it was the kitchens fault. No apology, no real concern, No real service either. Only positive was waitress had big, bouncy boobs on display. In the end, Even they weren't enough to save the dining experience.

2dnjIHowZiWVFI893Ln8og.text: Came in last night based off recommendations from friends. Decided to sit at the bar as I typically do. It was jamming when I showed up. So much that the bar was nearly full. I squeezed in and buckled up for the experience. I was told I couldn't go wrong w/ anything on the menu. As I looked over the menu, I wasn't approached the first 5 minutes of being seated. I blamed it on perhaps it was busy. However the bartender that finally did eventually took my order after flagging him down had passed by me about 10-15 times. I rarely have to ever flag down a bartender, they are typically on top of who just sat down. Not this bartender. I thought maybe he might be new.   I provided my drink order as did my colleague. The bartender was ready to leave to go make the drinks w/o asking if we were ready to order. So before we let him go, since it took so long for him to acknowledge us, we let him know we were ready to place our food order too.   About probably 10 minutes later our drinks arrived from our bartender. He slid my drink to my colleague and hers to me. We figured it was clear who's drink was who's but obviously not, especially since he took the order. We shrugged it off as a simple mistake and it wasn't him being lazy.   About another 10 minutes and our food was out. My colleague had been here before and she talked up these vegan avocado tacos. While I stayed basic and got some boneless wings. I had to flag down our bartender again to get utensils and napkins, which is typically provided right after you order at the bar. I got about 8 wings which were fine. Nothing great or bad about them. My colleague was right about the vegan avocado tacos. As we scarfed down our food we saw our bartender walk in front us numerous times again w/o even checking on us to see if we needed anything or to see if the food was okay. The food runner had brought out some food for another customer, but didn't know who ordered it. When he asked the bartender, the one that took the order, he seemed to have no clue. Luckily the customer saw her food and claimed it.   We began to assume that the bartender was actually a bar back w/ some of the side work he was doing. However outside of him there was only one other bartender. Even when that other bartender came to our side of the bar, he didn't see if we needed anything. Even when our glasses were empty and our plates cleaned, no one took them from us for quite some time. Not even a touch base to see if we wanted another margarita. We eventually flagged down a bartender to get our check.  This place is probably great if you've been drinking and need to soak up the alcohol or a good place to pad it before you start drinking. From the service standpoint, I probably wouldn't sit at the bar again. I tend to have better service at the bar anywhere else than at a table solo or w/ one other person. Not here though.

y0SgOiXMDc-h2GTwy4u3CQ.text: I had no idea of all the vegan options! This is a great touch to the menu! Food is and always delicious! Server can be more attentive though. I had to go to the bar for a straw after asking the server a couple of times.

tAuQ8M8089eU9OQH1g4_MQ.text: I wasn't sure what to expect walking in here since I am not a bar person and the look of the place seem suited to the bar crowd. However, I was pleasantly surprised as the food blew my mind, several vegan options available made this place worth the trip, would go back when I am in Vegas

23Esxs61tdCvugSrz5FzUA.text: This was our first meal after arriving at our hotel. Thanks Yelpers for the great reviews 100% accurate! Drinks and food were amazing and the waitress and the rest of the team really seemed to be having fun which just enhanced the experience. I had the chimichurri steak nachos and the wife had the fajita steak nachos. The fajita nachos were some of the best nachos I've ever had BUT that chimichurri steak may have been one of the BEST things I've ever eaten in life!!!! Loved it!! Definitely eating here again before we leave! -Orlando

q1obBmVWuH6uuW2oaQLvsg.text: This establishment was clean and the food was phenomenal!!! Even though it was downtown, the wait was not long at all and the customer service was AMAZING. We usually have issues with restaurants on the strip and in downtown with the staff being irritated and or "done for the night" but this was the total opposite which was extremely rewarding. I cannot wait to visit again.   The lobster nachos were AMAZING and so were the appetizers. Amazing place.

yLzJ4reO4_jM7XYkDqS4Hg.text: We had a party of 7 on a Saturday night. We had to wait for a table but it was SO worth the wait. We got drinks at the bar and walked around until it was ready. (Great location for shopping to kill time) we ordered all different kinds of nachos and shared them family style. We had the Supreme Tostada Nacho, Lobster & Crab Nacho and the Thai Chicken Nacho. ALL WERE BANGIN. My favorite was the supreme but I'd eat any and all of them again. We also got the triple dip appetizer to share. The white queso is so fracking delicious I can't even handle it. We over loaded on chips and cheese and it's exactly what our drunk faces needed. I also tried the lobster and crab enchiladas. Everything I had was amazing. Go try this place!
