6iEcItXOnrMzqXK2OqfO_w.text: Great food. Great drinks. Great atmosphere! Variety of different Mexican entrees, all delicious.  Service could have been a little quicker, but they were really busy.

Yzx9h6auyua-53I922mgFQ.text: I don't know how Nacho Daddy can call itself a nacho establishment. I think Nacho Disappointment would be a better name.   I was able to get a free house margarita from a Yelp check-in which was a nice plus.  I consider myself a Nacho Connoisseur and have been to many Nacho establishments. I had made the long trek from Los Angeles to Las Vegas in pursuit of the best nachos in the entire cosmos. I did not know that I would defile my tastebuds with the "Fiesta Nachos".  The most quintessential part of the Nacho is the chips. There was a severe lack of chips with my "Nachos". It felt more like a burrito bowl with a small number of chips sprinkled in. How could a place that boasts "Gourmet Nachos" not respect the topping to chip ratio?  The toppings contained some flavor. It wasn't bad, but it wasn't up to my Nacho standards. There was a clear emphasis on the quantity of toppings rather than the overall quality.  I would not recommend Nacho Daddy to even my worst of enemies. I would look elsewhere for your Nachos needs.

a9FVJmmZ2q7GiXapS7Vj3A.text: I cannot attest to any of the regular menu as we walked here and made a to go order just for cake, but I can say the vegan chocolate cake is legit. I cannot provide a decent photo either, because I ate it out of a to go container walking down Fremont street. It was warm, with raspberry sauce on top. The cake is layered and I believe the layers go: cake, creamy chocolate chip frosting, cake, frosting, smooshed up Oreo cookie frosting goodness, cake, sauce. I would walk there again for sure!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Vvlzl6zMoz1jCERjGFWPGg.text: We love nachos so we had to stop by. My companion got the Vegas nachos with filet minion, sauteed mushrooms and onions. He ate the whole giant plate by himself. I got the triple dip. I loved the quest and guacamole, but the salsa was subpar. We got a margarita for checking in and it was perfect. Not too sweet and not too tart.

0pFOOSGDYJUp-l82j5x_7Q.text: Great place, great food, cool staff!! Ask for Jason, he rocks!! He's there Tuesday's and Thursday's. If he's not there, ask for his brother Kevin. Either way it will be a great dining experience!! Angie the manager is awesome too!! And if you need a good laugh, Kalli can tell you a good story :)

ZGWDiMoTa2Pd1ZSOxbBKIA.text: We had Luis as our server and he was super awesome, funny and nice. Food was quick, and hot! Awesome place for happy hour just off the Old Strip. $5 happy hour margs, etc. LUIS IS AWESOME! We came back because of him. Had the bartender make my sister a surprise shot for her 30th, 5 stars no doubt ;)

ynjgE2J5tgInQlzrF34WTg.text: Stopped in because walking by I saw they had a couple of great craft beer IPA's on tap...ordered one and sat at the bar. My bartender was Bridget, and she made me feel like a regular in no time. She was friendly, fast and played a great host. In a visit that was going to be one beer stretched into three. Like I said, great host. When I tabbed out I learned that if I brought the receipt in during the morning, I got a free breakfast. WHAT??? I love this place. Of course I ordered a couple bloody marys with it...so it was a win/win for everyone. The breakfast was a great skillet with eggs, potatoes, cheese and chourizo...pretty awesome. I'll be back next time in town.

ZSAw9jJ4vW7Qvbo7MsiLGA.text: Mark was a great waiter and we enjoyed our meal. Margaritas were great and would come here again. Sloppy joe nachos were a little too sweet but were good. I had enchiladas and they were tasty.

eyw-paU6Kf-ubCQRcHoRkg.text: Sloppy Jose Nachos $13.52 plus tip very good and somehow I ate them all - a little more cheese and less beef might have been even better

PXOTYUxOYEwB5aFNdYWHzw.text: Lobster tacos are amazing.  Great service and friendly atmosphere.  A must when downtown.

IZreq5Yyk4awpQklv87L1g.text: Service here was very very good. So friendly!  Their spicy cucumber margarita is awesome. Their queso is addicting; their fish tacos are fresh and flavorful. We also had a seafood enchilada and a pork tamale, which were solid too. Nice, laid back atmosphere.

9tyKQ1wsp_LcISxV2QHZzw.text: Vegan burrito and bowl are essentials. Love their salsa here. Good place to grab food and a drink with groups, they have something for everyone. I do feel like they could improve on their service. Seems they always forget about me here and it is hard to flag the server down.

ZFLHVwGvhvo0qx8yppXmrw.text: Stumbled upon this place first thing after arriving to Las Vegas. They exceeded my expectations. My husbands breakfast sandwich was so good. My oatmeal was pretty good. Great price. The ambiance was alright.  The music was weird.

xxShTKQfsx7grCM_TeqpPg.text: Great place for some nachos. A bit of a novelty to have a restaurant for just nachos. They have other Mexican food but I wasn't able to try that at our table. The nachos were good because the chips seemed to be freshly made. They have a variety of different toppings and it's worth a visit.

3inqmddIL9X8Dl2A9IEDVQ.text: Came here on the Pub Crawl and came back after for the food. I had the cucumber, jalapeno margarita-so good! Food was really good as well, but it took FOR-EV-ER to get it (at LEAST 30 mins). Server was OK, not overly friendly.

0_v3dGNIZZNHuYDPlQs2zQ.text: Spicy shrimp nachos... Amazing! Great service! Gustina was our bartender, awesome menu and tequila knowledge! We will be back every time we visit Vegas!

amjgKpqAxbyS2Ngw4vR6WA.text: Great place to eat! Nachos where good. Great atmosphere and service. Loved the choice of food on the menu. The Margaritas where slamming. All around good experience.

oBC0sCXWFmbNPxoN3VJyrA.text: Theeee best nachos I've ever had! Got the filet mignon nachos with added spicy shrimp... also if you use yelp they really do give you the free house margarita which is 895 and you can put that towards any other margarita you would want if you don't want the house margarita.....my husband got the chimichanga which is pretty good he added spicy shrimp to it as well....all in all great food great drinks worth the money

6NSgTqdoRczyJ1qQNlptgg.text: This location has been open for a couple months, but this was the first time we were able to go for lunch. This restaurant has the fancy Ferrari designed Coca Cola machine so I indulged in a Cherry Coke. We decided to share an order of nachos, tostada style, and an order of grilled mahi mahi tacos. The tacos turned out to be one in the case of the fish option, but our server insisted it would be enough food. Our server and the others seemed very young and not supervised, but were all very smiley and all kept busy even though the restaurant was quiet.  The food came out very quickly and was really good! The taco was my preference, I will totally order it again. A fresh flour tortilla, slightly crisper and loaded with two small tender mahi filets, cabbage, chipotle cream, salsa cruda. It was so delicious I almost couldn't stop eating at the halfway mark! The nachos were very good as well, loaded with seasoned beef, refried beans, Pico de gallo, queso and shredded cheeses, sour cream, guacamole, lettuce, fried jalapenos.  I highly recommend this place for quick lunch or late bar bites. Really accessible menu for picky groups. I'll have to try a burger next time for sure.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tostada style nachos, mahi mahi taco, cherry coke from the Ferrari machine

Mi_O7WcU3VpYvKWB5BPnLg.text: Best burger I have had in years! Thought mango chutney sounded weird but try it! Nachos were ok, but rather pricey for just ok. Both the ladies I went with really liked the margaritas. I don't drink, but I thought I would add that.

5Tk3h97j64qlNj9xwvpTSg.text: Great great nachos! They are huge, definitely able to share with someone. Great vegan options and the waiters are pretty nice. The filet mignon nachos had a lot of meat, which was pleasing. Great stuff!

xj-MMqNG-6ZkciDXSCCaHg.text: Stop 2 on the Holiday Progressive dinner tour: *stop one below at Double Helix*   Criteria for the Progressive Dinner was 6 people 3 "couples" - 3 different restaurants/bars in 3 different areas of Vegas. Total bill for all 3 not to exceed 600.00 total or 200.00/couple.   All 6 of us have been to & loved the Henderson location so when Nacho Daddy opened in the DTLV it was our 1st choice to go to for dinner.   We arrived still a bit sated and slightly tipsy from our last stop. *not to worry we who live in Vegas make sure not to drink & drive*   When we arrived *slightly late but we called* they had our table all ready & waiting. Our server was Chris who was amazing at keeping our glasses full.  We started with a round of Lambics - just to clear the palate.  Followed by a pitcher of perfect Margaritas. Normally not the best idea because for some reason in other places we've found that the pitcher method loses some of the quality of the actual cocktail. Not in the case of the Big Daddy's. consistent tot he last drop.   For food - we decided on 3 different types of nachos  Florentine: Chicken Spinach & asiago cheese.  very light & different from the nachos we've had previously. Excellent choice for a vegetarian as they will make them - the chicken. By far my personal favorite. Kind of like a nice spinach dip with the chips already in.   Thai Chicken:  not my personal favorite but everyone else loved them. Basically it was a nice pad thai on nacho chips and very SPICY. it was very flavorful but I was enthralled with the Florentine.  Fiesta Chicken Nachos: Closest to what is expected in a traditional American nachos amped up with the addition of the diablo sauce. One of the "boys" tried to lick the plate.   Speaking of "boys" the urinal block is hysterical. yes I looked.   We each had an order of corn on the cob & shared 2 bowls of the queso dip.   Food:  consistent with the Henderson location.  Service: Exceptional. Chris gets 5 ***** (for vegas, someone that attentive to a large party is very unusual)  Fat Friendly:  All seats were armless so no hip issues. also spaced far enough apart that we didn't have to sit back to back with our neighbor. Maybe because it was a Tuesday night in off season, but there was ample room. Doubt that would be the case during Life is Beautiful or EDC.  Ambiance: much more cosy & conducive to conversation than the Henderson location.   Total bill including tip: $206.00   It was a great choice & w've been back since and still consistent with the food & the services!

vaeOAp_KAoFj-Wd3bysAyw.text: Yum!!! Tasty place ordered filet minion nachos, chicken quesadilla. Food came out fast on cute skillet dishes and was really good. Got a free margarita with checkin. Ordered the frozen strawberry margarita one of the best ice hard. Tasted like a strawberry starbursts. Great service too. Wish we would have had time to order dessert. We were in a huge rush to to the zip lining.

Vnh28gAVDH2qgUdteN-Kbw.text: Food here was good. Street tacos of steak were delicious. Guac and chips were plentiful.  Naked wings were tasty. All our orders were half orders, with anticipation of ordering more food. The half orders filled us up. Big selection of tequila, including top shelf. Had the Spicy Cucumber Margarita, then had another.  Third time here. All food and drinks consistent. Give it a try.

Ry8wpvVby5Wo-B6vzO6pvg.text: Came in for breakfast with some friends after a 5k downtown. Waited 25 minutes for our food. Watched 2 tables who came in after us get their food before we did. When our food finally came out, our nachos looked liked it was sitting under a heater for 10 minutes. Buddy ordered his eggs scrambled, but his eggs came over easy. Another friend ordered 2 shrimp tacos, but only got one. Complete utter mess of a dining experience.

Nwpwi2EfiATzyLEh56n2fg.text: We saw the billboard on the highway for the Henderson location, but it took us 2 months to stop. I wish we had stopped sooner. What a great lunch meal. Prices are reasonable (except $2.95 for a pop). Good service, and lots to eat.

Y2eBBJFYsiv5mvCqhnEH1w.text: I have been here a few times and the food is amazing. I personally enjoy their Mexican street corn and their chicken tacos. My server was Kayla this most recent time and I enjoyed how she treated my family and I. She was very helpful when it came to the menu and outgoing and definitely stood out from any other server I have had, she even got us to try their margaritas this visit. I'll be back soon! :-)

M5jG0SZ3BibL9yKa9qnXdA.text: I needed something good and healthy to eat along with a great drink. I found both at Nacho Daddy. I will always make this my #1 stop when I'm in Vegas. My server "G" was excellent. Perfect ending to a great week

y9TbhY8ZCc-ZnB0oYoRqpg.text: Kind of a weird place but their chicken quesadilla was pretty good. Wings are good but if you can't handle your lips burning get wing sauce on side and use minimally. Drinks a little pricey.

vGZjfsIoGNdBgPZRVzWZng.text: We are return costumers- this time we brought along 6 friends- they haven't stop raving about how delicious the breakfast style nachos were...Bingo! Love that Nacho Daddy is local and within a short walk of many of the downtown hotels.  Really, if folks are looking for a quick -in and out type meal- may not be your place- this place allows you the time to enjoy your meal and mostly the company you are with,  This is what we dig about Nacho Daddy-   This time we jumped into the Photo booth- breakfast and photo booth - great combination! starts your day off right-- we will return..  Only bummer about our visit this time- Bartender wasn't in yet.. just missed my morning Bloody Mary...

sQf9xvCy9IjBvg0dy4FWoA.text: Great selection for vegans. I had the Kale Salad, it was tasty and refreshing!  The roasted corn is fresh and straight off the cobb. I also got the guacamole; it is fresh and simple. It's amazing how many people can mess up guacamole and Nacho Daddy did it right. It's chunky with hand chopped onions and tomatoes. Honestly it could have used more cilantro!  My husband got the Spicy Tofu Burrito, look out taste buds!  I didn't even try it because I can't do spicy but he said it was great but not for the weak belly!  Overall the experience was good, the chips were light and fresh but almost too salty. I will eat here again!

zIkDs3RWPRlAjdFM86g3QQ.text: Having been to the Henderson location a few times I guess I expected better at their vegas location. Service was very slow but friendly. Took a loooong time to be served. I had the steak supreme tacos, I rate them as a 2 star taco. The meat had a very strange texture. The rice was nasty and the retried beans were runny and tasted flat.

WzFOkbECFoyWAXZSMJpAvg.text: What a great place.  We were looking for something to eat in Vegas on Freemont Street and spotted this place.    From the moment we walked in to the moment we left, we felt wanted.  Like somebody (namely our waiter, Jon and Brandon) really cared about us.  The food was delicious and plentiful.  Our friends had the Fajitas and there was plenty of food for the two of them and they had some left over. My husband and I each had a different type of Burrito and they were fabulous.     We were thrilled with this find!! We will definitely be back on our next trip to Vegas.

NRpsmVA6HhaYbNlzV7ouxg.text: My family and I were down here and they staff made us feel like family. Our server always came to check on us make sure everything was all good and to keep refilling our drinks. The food was amazing ! The chicken and shrimp fajitas were gone before we could even take a breathe. The street tacos and mexi cobb salad were also delicious ! Definitely going back !

BBZiiYNPilWNMDMZrbpitw.text: I had high expectations coming here because I heard about them on the morning blend. I was highly satisfied with the food and service. We got the nachos as an appetizer it was a perfect Mexican American blend of taste! The burger my boyfriend got was good as well as my enchiladas,  although I preferred the red sauce over the green, it had more flavor. Overall great place. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to get full!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Big Daddy Burger
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enchiladas

YZy53OjNluDI8O806A2jnA.text: This place was amazing! Wanted something different than the normal tourist fair. This was a  very refreshing experience. Our waitress Eva was very happy helpful and playful. She made our experience here great. The food was huge! Not what we expected. We came on a taco Tuesday there were 3 of us 2 guys who are big eaters and myself and there was food left over from our supreme tostada nachos and 10 for $10 tacos which were not your typical skimpy tacos Tuesday tacos.  Will be coming here every time we come to Vegas.

nAMJQmPQCBF_2gGkN8Dx1g.text: Great drinks, delicious food (especially homemade nachos), and excellent service. Jessie and Miles were so friendly and accommodating. Would come back just for the service alone.

Ds1_OUQxspkfIxT-1NfYOA.text: Is it just me or is this place a little odd?  We went in here today for lunch and the place is really small.  My friend thought they would bring us chips and salsa but no, it was $3.50 when the menu said it would be $2.95 so that is my first problem with this place!!  Then I ordered the Vegan guacamole and mango salsa tacos.  I am sorry to say they were very unpleasant.  I am not sure if it is not "mango season" or what the deal is, but the "guacamole" was a misnomer--it was not full of guacamole like you might expect because there were no animal products-it just seemed like an afterthought.  My second problem with this place is that a diet soda is $2.95.  Come on, seriously?  you serve it in a little plastic cup.  Nothing fancy.  I will not be back here.  Save your money for the other businesses popping up downtown.

DDjaLI_BB2rhM_owV3ZavQ.text: I like the location, the food and the atmosphere. The bartenders are friendly and they let me plug in my computer to the socket on the inside of their bar area ... but the internet definitely didn't work with my mac. The internet issue is why I took off one star.

_qEMZMcF8C_tNRGzwnnY7Q.text: This was my second time here and I completely love this spot . Ambience is very casual trendy- you can watch any of the sports game on the television which is a good plus . Staff very friendly , always engage on making my experience better each time I'm there . Let's talk about the food . The quality of their meat , fish is top notch . Menu has variety of options . Not your standard Mexican restaurant I would say . My favorite is the street tacos ( Delish) , the naked chicken wings ( not fried or battered ) actually made with a dry rub and grilled , the lobster dishes on the menu are to die for and did I mention they have a nacho caramel apple pie ? So freaking amazing ! They also have a healthy meal option too and vegan ! I would highly recommend this place for food .

_E8EUvmImKH47nixCc73nA.text: Seated immediately and the layout is nice. The bar area is larger then most places on Fremont. I ordered the chicken fried steak and egg nachos.  Those things were amazing. The chips were fresh with a crusty outside but smooth interior. The gravy was thick and had the perfect consistency.

O-tnGkfz0giSencxf5kYuQ.text: I went here a couple of weeks ago for lunch. We dined at the down town location. Cute name. Clearly marketing to the tourists as there is a bar that opens to the street. Medium sized dining area. What put me off almost immediately is when I went to the website lunch specials were listed. However, when I went there the waitress new nothing about it and asked the manager, the manager then came over and explained that the lunch specials were only for the Henderson location and not downtown. I will own up that it was my mistake upon review of the website again when you download the menu it states Henderson menu and when you scroll down to the very bottom then there is a cover sheet stating Las Vegas menu that does not list lunch specials. Nonetheless, this left a bad taste in my mouth.   As to the food, a bit pricey in my opinion for what you get. I will admit that I am a nacho snob - I love nachos and if I am going to splurge they better be darn good. I like traditional nachos piled high with gooey cheese (love the nachos at Big Dog's) and avant-garde nachos such as the asian nachos at Grand Luxe. The nachos sounded good, we ordered the cheeseburger nachos and bbq pulled pork nachos. The queso sauce was smooth and creamy and the pulled pork was sweet although not great bbq but I didn't expect that from here.  Cheeseburger nachos, well, were like a cheeseburger with lettuce, tomatoes, ground beef etc. They were approximately $10 each. They were good but again nothing phenomenal and for the price not a whole lot there. I was full but had I been any hungrier would not have been. And I am pretty sure other people in the group were not full. There were three plates of nachos shared among four people.   They had one of those new help yourself Coke machines with the different flavors. Overall I have mixed feelings about the Coke machine. You have to get your own drink which I am okay with but if there is anyone standing at the drink machine you may be in for a long wait as they ponder their drink selection.  Anyway, cute idea but I won't be coming back.

OnNuzbJFAo1CxjK3HFXiCg.text: Yummy food, we shared nachos and a burger. The service was good, friendly staff. Although they advertise the best margaritas in Vegas, they were out of the stuff to make them.

hezOTVZBDfAMvJu6sQ1hMw.text: Great selection of Mexican beer on draught, also an impressive selection of tequilas, the street tacos were so tasty I keep going back for more, also the bartenders super friendly and personable.  All and all a great place to hang out and have some great eats!

KTMc7tzLzLQVQ9E-OCxKLg.text: The bartender made an excellent Moscow mule, and the nachos were bomb. Would definitely go back.

58Ifo--oZ7yleCYJPE8f-g.text: Highly recommend! The margaritas are to die for! Food and service is great too! Fun and friendly staff! Will definitely be back again and again!

Cd7R32sS2ar68brzyNUHKw.text: The only reason this place is getting two stars is for their service.  My boss wanted to order from here last week and their menu was not working online.  I called and asked if they could fax it and their fax machine was also not working.  They had someone deliver a menu to my office (they don't even deliver food).  That's a good start!  Or so I thought. Not sure if everyone is drunk when they review this place or what but the food was horrible.  No one in my office was satisfied with their food.  I ordered the Supreme Tostada Nacho and it ended up missing half of the things that are listed as being on it (fried jalapenos, avocado lime salsita, cilantro, etc).  It was some bland beef, bland fake cheese and a little real cheese on top of greasy chips.  Not sure how they can pride themselves on their nachos when I could get better ones from Taco Bell.   Another co-worker got steak street tacos - she said they were bland and nothing to write home about.  The wings were also not very tasty.   So much for a new lunch spot downtown for us....

QnDwgpfUCgnPbo6CC6_eog.text: CHECK YOUR RECEIPT BEFORE YOU PAY!  Classic tale of how bad service can ruin your entire experience.  I frequent the Nacho Daddy in the Henderson area, to the point where the servers pretty much know what I am having so I was eager to try the downtown location. I went in on a Saturday afternoon. The menu is completely different than the Henderson location, but they have an awesome happy hour and everything tasted good. I was with a party of four, and we decided to split our checks. I offered to pay for our appetizer, and didn't think too much when my check came in a little higher. When I got home later that night and cleaned by bag, I realized that I was charged for than double price for my entree. I called the next morning hoping that the problem could be corrected via phone. I was told that I had to physically go downtown, which is a hassle from Aliante. I asked for gas for the inconvenience. Anthony, the manager, proceeded to call me a liar among other things.. just completely unprofessional.  I was later allowed to come collect the difference. The server confirmed her mistake. The assistant manager was just as rude as Anthony, and not once did anyone offer an apology.   I can say with great confidence, that I will never step foot in another Nacho Daddy. If you're in Henderson, check out Zabas or Chipotle nearby. Downtown there are plenty of substitutes that won't try to rip you off.

j6uwSxwyqOEDi0z1M737kQ.text: Came here to see a friend play music, sat down and waited a while for a menu and  when a waitress finally came over it didn't seem like she wanted to be there. The 6 dollar taco was good but not 6 dollars good and The nachos where nothing to brag about And after 4 beers two tacos and a average portion of nachos my bill was over 60 dollars! I'm pretty sure I just got robbed. I'll go back to see the bands but I'll bring my own food next time.

zsE9gamOS6iaAe6c-b50uA.text: Terrible.    Nachos had cheese wiz.   Salad were salty.   Salsa was salty.  Margherita was quite good though.  Maybe if I drank more the food would have been better.     Gross.

PJ7P_KqhxHAHTV1L4MGIBg.text: Love hanging out in Nacho Daddy. Staff is great and love it when you just chill with a laptop and soak up the vibe. The Street Tacos are my favorite dish and never disappoint. Bonus points for Urinal Games in the Mensroom.

UBkp-7SchpsG_v-t3TN6Fg.text: Absolutely the worst service. 3 bartenders and couldn't be bothered to make eye contact or barely take an order.

DEFB5DDitO1kYbI3JcGlyw.text: Excellent service, Great Food. I had the Ground Beef Quesadilla , the food came out quick, it was hot and the service from Courtney the Bartender was excellent.

Xv3EmQgzCh6jbgbwL-aQRQ.text: Came here two weeks ago and was beyond disappointed. Sat in the main dining room and was immediately greeted and put in a drink order. 15 minutes later no one had been back to our table and I could see our drinks sitting on the bar. Came in on 4/4 and sat at the bar. Our bartender  courtney with het red hair was awesome! Super attentive and made awesome drinks. Completely changed my mind about this location. Definitely would come back if she was at the bar.

j1lBKGMdaJb0pwI7era2_Q.text: We walked in intending to spend whatever we wanted. It was late at night.. 11:30 PM. We walked into the bar with a group of 5 and the girl behind the bar (for a place that is open until 3AM) was acting like a rude you-know-what. I have been a faithful customer at Nacho Daddy for years and this was really disappointing. Because of this bartender alone, I and my friends will not attend this establishment. She worked at least from 11:30 to midnight tonight (11/25) pm, because someone in our group had to use the restroom, this bartender felt the need to attack us as we walked in the door. We will explain to our friends that this bartender alone is the reason that no one should feel welcome to this establishment. After an attempted explanation of our friend going to the bathroom, we were attacked and criticized for using the establishment for that reason and immediately left.  We will recommend to our friends and relatives that the location in Henderson is the more welcome location in town.

tvS5BKcTDWNsn8kDLfDI4A.text: I really enjoyed my meal here! Enchiladas were great. They have good drink specials too. Service is just so-so. But I've learned in Vegas to never expect good service.

xCcGgPL2KVj2FVbjFq_IUg.text: Just left nacho daddy Downtown we walked in and were told I had to go outside to finish my beer I paid 7 dollars for I was the only one who had not finished there drink of the four of us.   Did you really think we would not order another drink and spend at least one hundred dollars on food and beverage.   Instead you kicked us out and we are at town square at millers ale house.   Your loss pretty sure no one cares

YxMeMy86bOSsVwCSMwzKog.text: Food was great, drinks were great and service amazing. Kudos to Griffen, coolest server I've ever had

GDJh2uWaMr7Y8SxeE34TsA.text: The service was slow, our food took forever to come out and when it did it was cold and the the cheese on our nachos were hard and gross. It took forever for them to refill our drinks and it was not even busy, we were like the third table out of four eating.. I have hard such great things about this place but I didn't experience any of that today. I don't think we will ever be going back to this place again..

n9K7AlrOmwok2l8cqQefuw.text: Really disappointed! We went to eat on a Wednesday  about 3pm, the place was practically  empty & it took 15 minutes just to get our menues. The waitress was very rude & unfriendly.  After we ordered it took about 30-40 minutes for our food & the place was empty! Food was below average, my kids & I didn't like it, needless to say we won't be going back.

_qo5ximyb6IccJDGzAtlPg.text: poor service and food is nothing great. only nachos is good here. bar vibe so not really intended for kids. located in downtown

TWa2KwHNcZu8a21wbX5fIA.text: Loved nacho daddy great nachos so many different kinds. Also did a Scorpion shot This is a must do.

b-F6-DJaRFeBhC77Tsc0Ww.text: Horrible service!  I'm a patient man, but seriously! It's seems that out servers were more interested in drinking with each other and having social time then making sure we had drinks and food.  Then getting napkins was like pulling teeth.  We asked for forks 4 times ! It's wasn't until the food came that the food runner brought us some. He should have been out server.  The food is good and it's sad that service sucks!  So many places downtown up and coming and this could be a great place if they get their act together.  Tables should be attended all the time and when you have a large party ordering shots , drinks and food you would think they would want the business.  Very disappointed !

SBHItQAc_ziNHlgacdY4HQ.text: Terrible thought by coming in here with such a diverse atmosphere that I would be welcomed but instead was embarrassed and humiliated and not allowed to have a drink and was cut off but the rest of my party was yes u guessed allowed to party when it came time to pay the lady had no problem taking my money since I was the one hosting and paying but would not serve me! Never again and I don't recommend it to anyone!

fruKGBqctjuRvSOoqSljmg.text: They have a lot of vegetarian and vegan options and the margaritas are pretty good. They're a little on the pricey side but I enjoy going there. The staff has improved recently and the weird choice of music videos is amusing.

8HKR9dXpA_0hLWFczqDKhQ.text: I came into Nacho Daddy Downtown and ate there Chicken Thai nachos that Jonathan highly recommended. They were just as delicious as he had explained. Awesome twit on nachos, fun atmosphere, TVs everywhere accommodating every sports fan, a cool scorpion shot, wonderful staff knowledge of the menu and specials. Great drinks, a must got to when visiting.

_gGh4A-Ym9_bGtsiHj_y7g.text: Awesome!  Fun environment and great atmosphere for everyone.  Even better when you are ready for a large Margarita.  The services and food was over the top!  Please try the Fried Ice cream!

4bcIzw5t9_npe2kxr1kg2g.text: Yuuummmm. Typically, I enjoy going to little hole in the wall Mexican restaurants and tacos stands... This is the only non-authentic Mexican place I've ever been to that could hold it's own (when it comes to tacos at least). Their street tacos were so tasty!  Atmosphere was a little off though... Just one bartender/waitress serving half of the people in the restaurant.

rP8MlXJqHJ_2jqFYB5YyWA.text: My whole family and I look forward to coming to this restaurant every time we are in Vegas! I order the normal quesadilla and honestly, it is the best quesadilla I have ever had! Yeah I know... A quesadilla... How could it be that amazing? Oh trust me it is! Also, order the scorpion shot!

fzN347zke-0DkzvVpJE_RA.text: DISAPPOINTED!!! Tried the seasoned ground beef burrito. $1.50 extra for sour cream. Tasted like a 7-Eleven microwave burrito. It was 60% refried beans, 20% rice, 15% beef, 5% sour cream. $12 wasted!!!!  1 star because you can't give ZERO!!!!!

N_Co5dqIpOz401qEp2KlDQ.text: Tried to call in this place for delivery to my hotel room, asked to pay for it over the phone and was placed on hold for about 10 mins until another person answered not knowing what was going on, so I was placed on hold again for another 10 mins. The last person answered again, I said I wanted to talk to the manager, places on hold again for another few minutes. The manager answered, I spoke with her about how ridiculous it is to have to wait that long to try to pay for my food over the phone...the order vanished, however she knew it was supposed to be a bbq chicken nacho and a chicken fiesta nacho. She was basically having to retake the order, "the computers are down" I was told. I ended up just canceling the order because the amount of time it took for me to be on the phone, I could have walked down to Fremont street and eaten something by the time the order and delivery would have even happened. The only reason why I'm giving it a 2-star rating is because the manager offered me a gift card if I should decide to order with them again.  I can't even base my review of their food, it is purely all based off of customer service. ALL I WANTED TO DO WAS TO PAY FOR IT OVER THE PHONE...WHO SERIOUSLY DELIVERS WITHOUT ASKING FOR UPFRONT PAYMENT OR ASKING IF IT'S CASH???? Oh wait, they do.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The screen-shot of the time I was on the phone holding...and that didn&#39;t include the time talked with the manager.

KsEb2dPsEv-N8XOBj0yKbg.text: I went to Vegas for my birthday. We were stumbling around Fremont street and decided the name was cute/catchy so we'd give it a dry. My sister got the regular nachos for 7.50, she was SO HAPPY. I'm lactose intolerant so I didn't get to give them a try but APPARENTLY they are some of the best nachos she's ever had - I'll trust her opinion. :) We also ordered chips & guac. I loved the guac, it had a great flavor. We also ended with a margarita. They were very large and fairly strong! Three of us ended up sharing it.   If you're strolling around on Fremont, stop in. It's priced well and I mean how can you go wrong?!

muTP09eDz4KM9GpyX-TzmA.text: So came back for a second chance .....cause I always do...we all have a bad night. .....got their special for the night and was almost non edible. Tuesday Nacho Extreme or something.  Again staff was great but whoever is working the menu and recipes should be fired.  Corporate gone amuck.... there's nothing here but really good folks trying to make a bad restaurant good. Sry.

jHdUDlA8yZMYAGSR2oqILQ.text: First time here. Food was excellent! Nachos are awesome!! Giovanny was the best sever we've ever had! Excellent customer service! Definitely be back for food and service!!

ifQ3yRlZ2vBm2u4OsQkRMQ.text: We stopped in on a Friday afternoon. There weren't any tables available so we sat at the bar. I was shocked by the drink selection. Very good options. The nachos stay crunchy. They don't get soggy at all. It's a nice twist on nachos. My husband and I shared one but we could have had our own. The bartenders are very patient and nice. I would definitely recommend it if you're just looking for a quick easy meal.

v2LfzJ1HvdahhlHbbUS5ZA.text: Randomly came upon this place while walking the Fremont Street experience! We ordered a skinny Margarita and a blueberry margarita and they were both really good! Great prices especially for the area. I got huevos rancheros which was really yummy and my bf got pulled pork street tacos which he really enjoyed! Great attentive and friendly servers/bartenders! Will recommend this place for sure : )

JyzP_O8rZ7UO5FwXZsdb0g.text: The Nachos are awesome! Really cool environment to kick back, chill, and get your grub and drink on. Can't wait to come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Drink time!

alejDyKofXQGFXFtAderAg.text: Vegan nachos were amazing! So were the pitchers of margaritas! Nice atmosphere, great service.

Stj7erSY3kFJGeRZ9yXpdQ.text: The best servers... I always enjoy the games with a few good drinks a plate of bomb @$$ nachos. When u come to Vegas u have to come through the Fremont Street Experience and come see the wonderful crew at Nacho Daddy!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Our wonderful server Christina. Lovely lady and bestest server ever
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Party nachos. 4 types 1 plates... Super fly bomb

W9d4U_30pV4DP0_rCSfR9g.text: The portions size for the nachos was pretty good. I got the supreme chicken nachos and my dude got the enchiladas nachos. We had a few bite, not bad food just seemed seemed to be a bit flavorless to me. We only got the nachos, we sat at the bar. Didn't Didn't have much to say about it. Decor was nice.  Not bad not great

c4avc8AL5Pp7ixXPYMBcZQ.text: The hostess was terrible. She sat us and then didn't tell anyone so we had no service for the first 10 minutes. Finally moved to bar and got service. Food was outstanding. The shrimp tacos and triple dipper was amazing! Once you get past the hostess, the experience improves!

xWSZnFS1VT3xbRSg4TRYyQ.text: Had the tortilla soup it was yummy, service was fast. House Margarita too sweet n didn't taste an ounce of tequila. Meh!

6k-Wkle8Od1-VSrl5JGDmw.text: Great place just off of Fremont it's like an oasis in the middle of crazyville great food and staff close to all of the hotels downtown and priced right

FcvYNIx1jqqd5vaqVVrWxA.text: Awesome place, great service and AMAZING FOOD!!!! If you come try the kiwi Margarita it's to die for.

W9HWEvbWRhXZ3p3aaVBmEQ.text: Wanting to try this place for awhile. Well I'm so glad we did.  Showed up on a Sat around noon. "Greeted" by a hostess that was outside. Never said hello.... just " how many?" Okay.... here we go.... Well.. I'm happy to say.... our server Tait was amazing. Nicest welcome.. asked if we had been before. Told him no... and then he ran through the menu for us.  Ordered Margaritas. When I checked out Yelp... get a free house Margarita! Yes please!  Husband ordered the blood orange margarita.  Both delicious!  We ordered the Filet Nachos! Oh they were heavenly! Enough for the 2 of us to share!  Service was great! So attentive!  Will we be back? Oh heck yeah!!  A must if you are heading to  Fremont Street!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

fzuRftrd79ksf9aRax2c9Q.text: Our server Rico was so much fun! The triple dip was fresh, the margaritas were perfect and it's right off of Fremont so the atmosphere blended with the surroundings! I'll be back to this location in the future.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Triple dip

NWwKci9qtGRsDvz0ctcPgg.text: Pros:   The nachos really are good. We ordered the 'fiesta' and the 'nacho burger nacho.' Even though we enjoyed both, I would highly suggest the second. It was our favorite.   Cons:   The service was slooowwww. When the nachos arrived, we wanted to add an additional salsa but our waitress didn't return until we were nearly finished. Then the bill took even longer to arrive. It didn't ruin the experience but it was frustrating.   I ordered a normal margarita on the rocks and it was terrible. So sour that it made me sick. I didn't finish it which was discouraging since they're so expensive.   Next time- nachos and a side of salsa to go =)

OUm56JPa-AmFFstlk-4cOA.text: We went there Saturday morning around 11:00 for brunch and bottomless mimosas with our friends.  Bottomless mimosas are a must during brunch. For the 2 hours we were there we only received 2 mimosas... in small champagne glasses. They had one bartender.. not sure if they were overwhelmed or what but we were one of the first tables to sit down. Our server seemed to make it clear that our table wasn't an urgency for him to have to wait on.   Needless to say we won't be going there again. There are much better places for brunch.

pxOoV9zHRyJWDWKSS2O2Fw.text: Life is Beautiful Nacho Daddy's location has great energy and food- Thank you Nacho Daddy for making my vegan nachos memorable-

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

rfUy0C4DcrZKemQL6TWzJA.text: The Corn off the Cob is off the chain!! Perfect balance of flavors. Don't miss this easily over-looked appetizer!!! Must order!  Go for the nachos supreme and stay for the battered lobster tacos with the amazing mango salsa!   Bummer we didn't order the sizzling fajitas that we saw flaming at the table across from us. If they taste as good as they smell, oh my!!  Happy with my fillet minion taco, perfectly cooked steak with the heat of the house made red sauce.  If margaritas are your thing go for the Daddy's Marg. It features house made sweet and sour. It's the freshest I've ever had. To kick it up with spice and classic Mexican flavors do yourself a favor and get the Mexican Candy Margarita. It's got a kick to it, with fresh jalapenos, tapatio, and rimmed with Mexican seasoning salt. YUM!  Thank you to our server Sabrina for taking great care of us! Food came out fast, especially for a Saturday night. Drinks were always full, we always had everything we needed. The whole team here has a good vibe!   Good music and TVs with sports too. This place has it all. Do yourself a flavor favor and get off the strip for this local gem

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

hTF0wUf5C14V-WoBMjlJuQ.text: Came here for late night eats to share nachos. It's a bit dark, and they have a scorpion tank in the front too!  Service was just okay. Our waitress seemed to keep getting bumped by someone else, and there'd be a lack of things we needed like forks and plates.  Three of us shared the Thai chicken nachos, and it was just enough. The pickled jalapenos are unbelievably spicy! But love the homemade spinach tortilla chips and white queso, and then the sweetness from the other sauces.

satpsYwyF19N3VPt4nt-dg.text: My friend and I stopped in while on vacation in Vegas. We ordered a pitcher of the Nacho Daddy margaritas (most popular margarita) and a nacho trio (salsa, guacamole,  and queso ). The pitcher of margaritas was weak and didn't even get a buzz (the pitcher cost was over $35, and still no buzz...boo!) The nacho trio was good. I like that they have queso blanco and it had a nice flavor. The service was mediocre. My server wasn't very attentive once he realized we only wanted drinks and a snack (bill was still over $50).

eo0U3a-9hIqIQPhw2dsleA.text: Bar staff (Allie) was amazing.  So, honestly I was suprised for what I assumed would be a tourist location. Nachos were spot on.  Drinks are well made and bar staff was very attentive. Wish I had one near me.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bar.

OKQ3KR0zbW5a9YIVpRxgMQ.text: I have been obsessed with Nacho Daddy ever since I've been in Vegas.  Every time family comes to visit, we make it a point to spend at least one night here.  And they have THE best margaritas.  We are usually forced to sit at the bar unless we want to wait long amounts of time for a table.  No reservations on weekends.  You can still order food at the bar so if you are feeling hungry right then and there just sacrifice the extra space.  Seating seems to be very limited considering the amount of people that spend time on Fremont St.    The female bartenders I've had tend to ignore the women and wait for their male counterparts to take over.  On more than one occasion, I've had to place my order with a waiter who isn't even supposed to be tending the bar b/c the female bartender was too focused on flirting with the male customers lol.   It's annoying but not enough to stop me from going to the ND closest to me.  The food is always delicious and there is more than enough to go around.  We always end up splitting ours.  Besides being ignored at the bar, the employees are super sweet and accommodating.

foiZsnDfXEf0uQk9s_nD-w.text: The service was good. Rico our server was funny & friendly. The House Margarita is actually really good here. The Enchilada Nachos with Green Sauce were bomb! The grilled fish tacos are delicious too.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled fish tacos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s House Margarita
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Another view of the fantastic Enchilada Nachos

uiyV_DqnIxJxpWFf5EzBpw.text: His place is the BEST. Justin and Alie r the best at the bar. The food is soooo good. This is on Fremont street and is the place to be at. Everyone come on down here. Joseph was so nice as well. Great staff sorry let me day amazing STAFF.  You cannot come to Vegas without stopping by a Nacho Daddy. Love my Nacho Daddy family  Coming back and bringing friends.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Beautiful, lol
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sea food nachos yummy
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nachos yummy

_NXivkHwIPQ2pXqo-HVaYw.text: This is a great place to eat and drink with a group.  The nachoes are massive. It's for sure enough to feed 3-4 people. I like that they make their own chips and that they're not overly salty. Everything is pretty reasonably priced as well. We also tried the steak and shrimp fajitas. Those were well seasoned and not over cooked.  Get your cameras ready bc they pour tequila over and light it on fire beside your table.  The margaritas and micheladas were good as well.  Our waiter was funny and attentive.  I'd come back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Big plate of nachos with crema on the side

zxlvYClJlIsVaJSubX0IGg.text: Writing this review specifically for the purpose of giving props to Wes, the bartender. Dude hustles the entire time, waiting on everyone at the bar. Food is decent. Service from Wes is exceptional. Also, Mexican corn is legit.

0eUel6xSWyNnAx__4ExUbw.text: This is right on the corner of Fremont Street and is the perfect place for bar food and drinks. We were greeted and seated within 20 minutes. The portions here are pretty large, so the three of us shared a Filet Mignon Nacho and the Boneless Chicken appetizer.  The Filet Mignon nachos are bomb, with fresh guacamole on top. The filet mignon was delicious but I think we ate the meat too fast so we ended up with just the other toppings. If you check-in, you can get a free house margarita. I read reviews and learned you could upgrade it, so I got a White Peach Margarita- whoop!  Overall, the service here is fantastic. The servers are so friendly and attentive. The only thing to note is this is more of a bar food place, not an actual meal.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. White Peach Margarita- Huge!
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Nachos.

rEekMzIfdQ8R_qeiNqj-HA.text: The best nachos ever!! Can't do Vegas without nacho daddy. What a treat to go to a place where they know how to make perfect nachos it's my favorite cheat meal! If you're going to eat like that: it better be worth it. And nacho daddy Alwayx delivers the best. Great job! Thank you for the amazing free margarita with check in. Customer for life!

z2saWPv377PuEs8S4eQEnQ.text: Our first time to try this place...not too far from the hotel that we stayed in downtown LV. We ordered Ceviche & Flaming Fajitas...they were soooo good!   This place is a must if you're craving some ceviche, Fajitas or tacos. Service was awesome as well. Also, they have other locations in the LV if you don't like to go to downtown.   We will definitely come back when in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Rice, beans, guacamole that comes with the fajitas
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ceviche
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Flaming Fajitas

53A-7_4SLR7uYxO3JF3e6w.text: Nachos were delicious. Beer flight was great as well. I would go again if I am in the area for sure. The building was smaller than expected but that is not a big deal.

UsE6bnOTzhvNfoJicDcK8g.text: In summary food is awesome service at the bar is horrible!!  Went there three times in a week while on holiday hoping for better service each time.   First time:  bartender forgets my drink twice, yeah it's busy. Finally get my food burrito is missing the chip side...I ask and am looked at like a jerk, not my fault the menu states it. 10 minutes later I get it.   Second time:   No flour tortillas = no burrito, no chimichanga, no quesadilla. At least the enchiladas were good   Third time:  order, seems slow it's only about 4:30. Get my food and then wait nearly 10 minutes to get a fork so I can actually eat...I still had to ask for napkins.

q41wtwiV9VOGH_6z8pKrMg.text: I sat at the bar and received excellent service from the bartenders on a Sunday afternoon. They were attentive and friendly even with a packed bar. I ordered the street tacos - 2 lobster and crab and 1 crispy avocado. I'm a huge avocado fan but never had it fried before. I was skeptical but holy cow. I may have liked it a little more than the lobster and crab. Don't get me wrong thou. Both tacos were delicious, I've just never had anything like the fried avocado. If I were to do it over again, I'd probably get 2 crispy avocado and 1 lobster & crab. I'm also a big seafood fan too.   The only part that was less than ideal was the women's bathroom situation. There was a long line, messy and I believe the stalls ran out of toilet paper.  I originally went in to use the bathroom and ended up just washing my hands, wiping them on my jeans and proceeded back to the bar.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My bite into the fried avocado taco. yumm.
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 2 lobster and crab street tacos 1 fried avocado street taco

dm6n-jeSWYfk_1SPv6t2Dw.text: Love coming here when I come into town from LA. However this time the hostess was rude. They were not seating outside because of the wind. Fine, I get it. But she was very uncaring with any questions we asked. As if we were bothering her evening.  We had to wait 45 minutes to be seated. No biggie. It was busy. About half an hour in I see a few tables unoccupied, I ask the hostess if we can put the table together to fit us. She says "you have 7 more minutes". I'm over her. But I love these nachos. But you need to replace that rude person in the front. If she doesn't want to be here, get another. Professionalism is everything. Oh yeah, so is customer service. ;)   Try it...love it...Yelp it.

LkHyMYDZgChEkMfXQLP_kg.text: Wow I seriously wish we had one of these in Houston! I am so obsessed with nachos so this place is like heaven to me. So many different combinations and options for nachos. They even had lots of vegan options for my best friend! Make sure you do the yelp check in for a free house marg didn't realize it until I already ordered one of the specialty margs but they take 8.95 off of any marg you order if you don't get the house. Got the tostado nacho which has a little bit of spice to it I liked it. Highly recommend this place ended up going back to the location in planet Hollywood the next day before we left because we split the nachos the night before and wish we got our own so ended up ordering our own the next time still wasn't able to finish it lol

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Qt1ffNEV6Fk_-oVAW7_vSg.text: OMG... the food here is delicious!!  We got the Burger Nacho and Lobster and Crab enchiladas.  The tortilla chips to topping ratio on the nachos was 1:1. Most places give you more chips than topping but not this place! The enchiladas had tons of crab meat. We also got the house margaritas. Ariel is the best bartender!

TbaGsQhC4Tzu7UVcF11Vqw.text: I love Nacho Daddy but this location is not as good as the one on the strip. This place was so crowded and they did not have the staff to support it. They had 1 bartender for the entire restaurant, so we waited 10 or more minutes before they acknowledged our precense at the bar. Super slow service because of that. The food was still good. The margaritas didn't taste as good as the ones on the strip. The margaritas here were a lot sweeter. Another note is that the bathrooms were really dirty at this location. I would come back to Nacho Daddy, but probably not this location

cIJjnvmfRzQDPYPqnnqtpQ.text: If there was a 10 stars I would rate Daddy's Nachos 10 stars. Dean is the best waiter ever. He is so approachable and friendly. He made us feel welcomed. The food we ordered was really good, in Hawaiian it's ONO! We will for sure be back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s Margaritas
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bbq nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enchiladas

gQkeswR45gvEZDNhxs38Ug.text: Come for the nachos but leave because of the terrible service. I've been here three times. The food is great but prepare to wait for no real reason while your waiter leisurely  chats with their colleagues. This place seems to really hate its patrons. You might be told that the wait is 45 minutes but half of the tables are empty with only dirty dishes on them. If you have a high tolerance for terrible service then I'd totally recommend any of the nachos. They are the bomb.

hlyrrLWNCaU6PWfBwTWakA.text: Food was good, service was very slow. We unfortunately were seated near the kitchen, and the waiters were fighting and using profanity when they'd exit in and out of the kitchen. I'd order to go next time the staff just didn't same happy or liked there jobs. But again food good music great. Service no much

nlDEftcwr6ErVi0xfftX5Q.text: So disappointed. Ordered Vegan Nachos and they forgot the vegan chick'n. My friend ordered a steak burrito and it was all beans, barely any meat and nearly any rice. I like chipotle better-better portions on burrito and honestly for the price, nachos daddy is NOT worth it.

ypoY-WSdQL7vjVZ6oUvLOA.text: Came here on a Sunday afternoon. The place was fairly full and we had to sit on the patio to avoid a wait.   I ordered my drink (white peach margarita) and waited quite awhile for my server to come back. The host was super nice and apologized for dropping the ball. They offered us complimentary drinks for the whole party.   We ordered our food, but it was a lengthy wait. When we finally got our food it was average. The Queso dip was the best thing we had. The nachos and tacos were average at best. Nachos didn't have enough cheese. Chicken on the nachos were on the dry side. We got the beer battered fish tacos. They were alright, nothing special.   Overall giving the place a 3 stars. Long wait for food but nice servers plus comp drinks for the wait. Average food.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fish Tacos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Queso Dip

3nVS0uekwewlnnRZ7jKZ8Q.text: Best actual Mexican in Vegas. The smell of the place itself makes me drool... highly recommend the guac and House margarita. Rico and the team were beyond attentive.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BaGqxL7bA_YqTiG5ZRtzZw.text: Always a favorite stop when we visit Las Vegas. Jovanny the bartender was great, the beer is cold and the music is fun and puts you in the mood for nachos. Food is great, so many good choices, toughest part is deciding what to have. I suggest coming for happy hour and getting smaller versions of their nachos, so you can have a variety.

SVscJkRgXN9ya3UN-dHV6A.text: The food, service and drinks were absolutely INCREDIBLE. I was lucky enough to have Rico as a waiter, he was VERY kind, funny and attentive. The food arrived in a timely matter, the margaritas were delicious. On a Saturday night, we only had to wait roughly 10 minutes. Incredible experience all around.

KvagKJpDPQITbHhh-nJ22A.text: Food and service was really good. Ordered the Vegan chimichanga and was cooked to perfection. The drinks were also on point. Overall a great experience and customer service.

nXuAaoybHTAFRcSqy12kWA.text: Popped by in a Sunday afternoon and loved every experience. Hostess was prompt and happy to help. We sat at the bar and was served by Wes. Best bar service since we have been in Vegas. We watched as the bartenders efficiently and effectively served the bar and dining room quickly.   A must if you are visiting downtown Vegas. I had the Irish nachos, which was the special of the month.  My hubs had the Thai nachos, recommended by Wes, and both were great choices that we would order again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Irish nachos and the Thai nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. House margarita

O26qYFnpRKm50CNSatCoQQ.text: We are from the Dallas, TX area and love Mexican food. We were getting "hangry" and needed food. Found NACHODADDY and was pleasantly surprised at how amazing it was! Tried the "TRIPLE DIP" and FILET MIGNON NACHOS. Everybite was to die for!  Had a small issue with rude hostess and manager handled like a champ!  Kudos and FIVE STARS!

9LSahDhh7siL81ZJyyYNRA.text: Went to Nacho Daddy on Saturday night and the food and service did not let down. Mark our waiter, was super helpful and had great suggestions. The spicy cucumber margarita is a must! It has the right hint of spice and the coolness from the cucumbers  will refresh your taste buds. We ordered the supreme tostada nachos which was so freaking good! These nachos are a must buy if you are looking for some tasty deliciousness. I would highly recommend this restaurant.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Pit_acSiYEoEyxZqG8kHZw.text: On a busy holiday weekend, we were still promptly seated. Dean, our waiter was extremely friendly. Food was fabulous. Lots of Vegan options to choose from. We will be back for sure! Thanks Nacho Daddy!

e46YqPY6V5HH-kXxQL3cMA.text: This place is super overhyped here.  I came based on the reviews I saw and maybe i just choose the wrong dish and wrong night.    I had the pork tacos, i couldnt finish them they just werent flavorful at all and the pork has really meh.  I finished the rice and beans instead.  That was okay but its hard to mess those two up.  Service was mediocre at best.  Rarely checked up on me after I ordered, never came by to see if the food was any good, and quite frankly saw alot of employees standing or sitting at the bar.  (Maybe they were off but they were in their nacho gear)  Margarita was strong as some also wrote.

B6eU9wEsjEQGsDBKVi2iUg.text: 3.5 stars!   Don't confuse huge portion sizes with great food! I came here with a large group before Life is Beautiful festival in downtown Vegas and we were seated within 10 minutes, which was awesome. The service was great and pretty quick, considering our party size. The chips and salsa were good and paired beautifully with my Yelp check-in margarita :)  We got a few different kinds of nachos, and although they were good, I definitely don't think they were worth the price. There wasn't a lot of steak on them and the toppings weren't very layered so the eating experience went downhill after eating the first chips. All in all, though, there was a lot of food so I wasn't too upset about it.   I probably would come back for drinks, and order something besides nachos because the rest of the menu looked delicioso!   Also, they have a photo booth inside which is always a plus for me!

8wnrmNn3DNA3Z9uOQ7hTGQ.text: Came here during Happy Hour and got a couple of appetizers before having to go to our tour at the Neon Museum. It was pretty empty and service was fairly fast.   We shared the following: Tortilla Soup  Chicharrones Grilled Mexican Corn On The Cob   I also asked for Mexican Rice on the side and they were able to accommodate me.   The tortilla soup was perfect for my stomach as I was feeling a bit sick. Paired with the rice, it made for a very filling meal. I especially liked the chicken in the soup, along with the crunchy tortilla strips. My tablemates enjoyed the chicharrones and corn as well.   I regret not getting any Nachos as their name clearly states Nacho Daddy - but I look forward to coming back and ordering some of their more well-known Mexican dishes on the menu.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tortilla Soup $5.95
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled Mexican Corn On The Cob $5
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Happy Hour Deals

Nv99x6Do0ufTLe1Me1hihg.text: Margaritas were perfect and the food was delicious! Also my friend who is vegan raved about the selection and how good the food was, we went two times during our trip!

95waFtxFApFeoqzsBrw61g.text: The best Nachos I have had in my life.  The tacos and tequila specials are great.    Dinner consisted of: Fiesta nachos 3 steak tacos

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos-  I&#39;ve been to a lot of places. These are the best nachos ever!

mzfAc2lO0KlZ23uzOLf8yg.text: This place is awesome! We came here at 11pm on a Friday and they got us in quick. Amy was awesome! Tasty margaritas and nachos.

tEiqHZAoDqqkrop4bt1VJA.text: I was starving on a recent trip to Vegas and needed something vegan whilst cruising around Fremont. Obviously they're known for their nachos but I'm a sucker for a burrito and the vegan burrito didn't disappoint. The margarita was amazing too! Also really enjoyed the vibe and laid back atmosphere. Nice place with quality food. I would go back here next time I'm in sin city.

uWSURBBfODaIjYJTBg7zeA.text: Every time I come to visit Vegas I always stop by at nacho daddy one way or another. The margaritas are my favorite as well as the supreme nachos. Even when they're busy they have amazing service. Never had an issue with cleanliness, even when it's packed it's clean which is amazing. Never had a bad experience, next time I come back around the area I'll be back again !

C17CDk4mTiaHjHQv79FUeQ.text: I'm a bit of a nacho snob and the Moco Loco breakfast nachos were amazing. It was a bit different than I'm used to, with the eggs and the brown gravy (I know! -- brown gravy on nachos -- WHAT?!) but it worked so well with the queso and ground beef.   We sat at the bar (that's where the best service is anywhere) and the bartender was fast. She recommended the skinny marg when I told her I wanted something less sweet. The skinny was great -- just sweet enough with no fake sweeteners.   Cool place on the inside. Perfectly located downtown.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Moco Loco breakfast nachos- delicious!

iosurRRnh6pUhM_4JSV08Q.text: I grew up in the area, so it is often challenging to get stoked on something when visiting home. But these nachos and loaded fries were pretty dern good. Mark, our waiter, was also a helpful and classy young man. Kept my Glass wicked full of OJ.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

lbnDWATI0KNYbtNy52WYaw.text: Bring a big appetite if you plan on eating Nachos! Overall BBQ pork nachos were good. I could of done without all the BBQ sauce that was poured on top. Good service, would return.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

K-sPcfUaOjvPJ1pI9H8D5w.text: Nacho Daddy has delicious nachos!! We should have just ordered more of those! The enchiladas were just okay and the fajitas were good. They had messed up something on our order and brought us a free pitcher of margaritas. Plus they had a free house margarita if you checked in on yelp!

J0Cn94QENxUTJcwjA2CI7g.text: Still my favorite bar/restaurant downton! Bar and waitstaff always have smiles on their faces and the food is always good! My favorite is the Spicy Shrimp Nachos! Try it! Sometimes I just stop in to say hi and talk to one of the lovely bartenders tonight it was Ariel's turn to deal me! As always she put a smile on my face! (Pro tip: The restroom is to the right of the t-shirts....NOT Up the ramp!)

fxTfGAqVUut4OeRpp-43zA.text: It was a block off Fremont street we decided to try it. Was $200 for four people round of drinks and 4 apps. Food was good a bit pricey.

WCAt4igmyQO-D41_Qv3rjg.text: It going to lie, I was surprised that our food was as good as it was. I didn't expect much from a restaurant right off of Fremont Street. I was gratefully surprised. I have the green cheesy enchiladas, very good. The best dish was probably my friend's filet mignon nachos... delicious!  Also good was my husbands spicy shrimp nachos. Good late night food.  Our waitress was also great!

pzdI_ABG8w40AeQPB7H1Zw.text: Waited for over 25 minutes even when tables where open. Food was basic bar food. Nothing fancy.

uw1-8WWfkCUnAjGOz5FPtA.text: I've tried the strip location and thought it was awesome but this location is even better! The pork soft tacos were perfect with cheese, salsa, onion, and cilantro and the flour shells were thicker than your average taco shells which made them tastier and easier to eat. They come with a large serving of rice and beans. You'll leave here full for sure. Check this place out if you're downtown.
