Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. House Marg
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpions getting ready for drinks

GFZzkYGj-bjmOga02dFv0w.text: I made a mistake coming here. The nachos where good and I over ate, I  cant move now. I'm laying down and the world wont stop spinning from all the margaritas

sQZ1tipxZT0ExaPhuImzRA.text: Last night I went to Nacho Daddy to meet a group of about 15 friends. A few minutes after the party sat down, a waitress walked up to my friend and told her she was 86'd. Then looked at all of us and told us we ALL have to go. I just moved from CA and it was my first time there. Smh. I doubt my friend was really banned and if she was then that I should've been allowed to stay. A manager should've handled that.

cPe1MrI3Cu5XrgWlh9z4kQ.text: The wait was a little longer than I expected but the food was delicious I had the lobster and Crab Nachos and they were soooo good! I checked in on yelp and got a free house margarita. Our waiter was Jonathan and he was good and fast! Defiantly coming back, just not on a weekend.

8dccK4JCOkWZq1c5Tu-Jyg.text: First time here at Nacho Daddy today and it by far has the best nachos I have ever had with a huge selection! We came with a big party of 10 and the food and margaritas were delicious! Our server was Sabrina she was very sweet and helpful with good food recommendations! We will be back to see her again before we leave for some more Nachos and drinks!

Zj93s41obKxNxGqA2xKgGw.text: service was beyond amazing. rico and julian specifically were the greatest part.  i'm a vegan. their vegan menu is large, varied, has a dessert option!! i can't say enough good things.   thanks a million. the two girls working the front door (that can't be an easy job!) and the two men mentioned above, the vegan menu, and the DELICIOUS food made my night!

raMe_jRV90_mSS2W1ZSv4A.text: Went in after midnight on a Thursday. Staff was so friendly and helpful. Food was AMAZING! The dip trio is a must. Nachos were perfect. Will definitely be back!

pKatGszyijI2Gax2OFINgg.text: Awesome nachos! We got the filet mignon nachos and lobster nachos. A great combination to share. Big helpings of quality food make the $ worth it. Loud but good music. Cool and prompt service.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster crab
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon

WrMhy5SvIAmrgMmUM3pUEw.text: This place is bomb !! As a native Texan , we love our queso !!! This place was amazing!! Can't wait to come back on an empty stomach so I can order those sizzling shrimp tacos! Yum !!

gJlAp3bLb5NyQ5zFBI_Wog.text: Convenient but not what I imagine when I think of good Mexican food. Great service and no wait times just super average food

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free shot glass with scorpion shot
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shot

v6XtbIsYqadzKT3h1a_SlA.text: I wish I could have liked this place. My boyfriend and I are both vegan so we were extremely excited that they had vegan options. We ordered the spicy burrito and the loaded nachos. They really weren't that good. Coming from LA we have a ton of vegan nachos and burritos that are a lot better and cheaper: Not only did we not enjoy the food but we are both still sick from the food.  Our friend ordered the pulled pork nachos and he also had numerous bathroom runs. Not sure what is in their food but it definitely didn't sit well with us.   Vegans- there are a lot of other  vegan options that are also much cheaper! Chipotle tastes better than this.

dG62SaCH8mC_sIG1zMLOPA.text: Been wanting to come here for a long time, ordered the combo which came with a crab and lobster enchilada, a fish taco, rice and beans. Everything was very tasty but the salsa on the fish taco was really spicy but good. I also ordered the bottomless chips and salsa, I loved that the chips were hot, nice and crispy. You can also choose 2 different  salsas I had medium and mild and they weren't spicy at all. The blueberry margarita was delicious I wish I would've seen the check in for a free house margarita but it's ok maybe next time.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I scraped the mango salsa off the taco, it was too spicy but had a good taste.
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chips, mild salsa and medium salsa

xgF3jd1ySpWhH5hkFPubjw.text: We stopped by Nacho Daddy for a late night meal and drinks. My wife and I ordered the Thai Nachos and a couple margaritas.   The Nachos were great. If you love Nachos, they got Nachos here. Lots and lots of Nachos to choose from. Not only were the combinations unique, they were super tasty! The cheese sauce was simply divine. Not even close to the jarred crap you find in the super market. The flavors blended together nicely. It also was nice that you got a heaping portion of these tasty treats.  Speaking of tasty treats, the margaritas were very good too. Once again, nothing was just plain and simple. I had a Sriracha Blood Orange Margarita and my wife opted to try the Pomegranate Margarita. Full of good liquor and juices.   I almost got the courage to try their famous scorpion shot, but then I chickened out. Oh well, next time =)

H8dKGZEatvTZMoNQdw24OQ.text: The best nachos. Atmosphere like a sports bar which is not my favorite but it worked here. Wonderful service. Ordered enchilada nachos and quesadillas. They were Fantastic! Hope Nacho Daddy expands to the Midwest.

naJhj-Uf-koyj0A-bSUuYw.text: Nacho lover!!! Do stop here!!!! I'm a big fan of nachos and I was so happy to see a page dedicated to nachos! I visited this location twice while in Vegas. The margaritas were delicious. I wish this company had locations in California. Service was good. I would go back just for the nachos. Tried the enchilada and supreme nachos.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme and Enchilada Nachos. More then enough to feed 4. Lots of chicken in the Enchilada Nachos.
Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Nachos recommend for a party of 2 or more.

04j90fZl2wOwmA3Uz6aYcQ.text: Nothing fancy here, but good food right off Fremont Street.  Huge nachos, friendly staff combined with decent prices (for Las Vegas) gets a thumbs up from me.

zECmL0zXws4VLyVXcZthnA.text: Nacho is an awesome downtown spot, the nachos are amazing but it's all about the Grilled Wings, just make sure to get them well done. Ariel always provides exceptional service and goes above and beyond every time, and makes delicious drinks... Test her cocktail knowledge!

Pmiv_mjtAZDv4TKQRbcJrQ.text: Great service, great food, fun experience!! We had shrimp tacos and 4 cheese nachos were fantastic!! Pitcher of margaritas were good as well

5P7_VPUkHIXtxSD9LBZdLg.text: Awesome vegan menu (nachos, quesadilla, burrito, tacos, quest dip, guacamole and more) and super friendly staff! Plus the bar has a good selection of beers on draft.

lmSBJKfboLtv8lSw90qcJw.text: Who knew nachos could be so amped up? They do not skimp out on anything! They give you so much cheese, every layer and chip was basically drenched in their oh so creamy/well-seasoned cheese.

Q2dn-E_hxzcih3rssdOOIQ.text: Great food.   Margaritas were really good.   Great value,  especially during happy hour.   Check in with Yelp and got free margarita at that visit.

B4bBt51nQAsNRTpa15-zZg.text: The food was super incredible! i got the vegan nachos that were super good & had super large portions! the food runner Lou ee was so so good & was such a great staff member! He was very accommodating and helped our friends out when they came late.... came for the food but stayed for the service!! i cannot emphasize how fantastic he was and I will be back again!!

5UqCzVF293zCh3NQVhiK6w.text: Dude.... love this place! Good food not too expensive and fun drinks! Like the tequila with the scorpion  We had enchiladas and quesadillas . Two drinks. Bill was very good for the area!

vHwbyVZJXCTzqJ-86oJe7w.text: So my man has been telling me about this place for a while now. Some thing about scorpion shots...  Tonight we found ourselves out and about downtown for our friends birthday, and inevitably end up here to do this "Scorpion Shot."  I asked our server Aerrick what the spirit was in this shot, he replied "what ever you like" - well I tequila. The other 4 had Mezcal.  The whole time Aerrick was super awesome, he was friendly and didn't seem annoyed by our obnoxious birthday boy. He frequently fist bumped and was most definitely attentive.   Our waters came first, as expected. Beers and margaritas to follow - and just after the food order we had our shots delivered. 5 shots down & A few entrees later we receive our bill.   All of the Mezcal shots were $20 and rang in as "scorpion" something. And then there was mine. "Don Julio 70" FOR $29.  $29? Are you kidding? I drink 1942 at Goldspike for $25. Let me tell you that it isn't the price point that has me bothered, it's the fact that our server failed to mention the bump or that Don Julio 70 was all he had. I would've swapped it for Mezcal.   I work in the industry and this is completely unacceptable. Lesson learned for this place - ASK PRICE POINTS AND CHECK RECEIPTS.   Maybe this was just a button error, and maybe I should have said something... But after almost an hour with a bunch of drunks I was just ready to go.

AVNxuM2OEPc1P1rkVh1jLw.text: Omg best place ever!!! Amazing food!!! And the drinks are freaking delicious!!! Can yall move to texas!??!

sBeCuEqmJju6PNhnT-oVLw.text: Dean was awesome and very helpful! I'll definetly be back!! everything was very fresh and delicious! even brought our dog on the patio! thanks dean!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

uuuyRGUeuhgZUaVOfREdpg.text: Ok these street tacos are BOMB. 3 for $5 if u get chicken or pork or 3 for $7 if u get shrimp or steak. I got pork & they were amazing!!!!  Yum!

Pl37LTegLQC7aBemkw0UHw.text: Very rude staff especially the bartenders. You might be treated you okay based on your appearance but over all the service is subpar. Go here if you like but all it is is some mediocre nachos, loud music and lousy staff.

j7rcS5sBlzAEZ9ilbsqiMA.text: I would give zero stars if I could.  Eric was our server and it was the worst service I've ever had in my life.  He took 30 minutes to get us chips and salsa.  He gave 2 people in our party the wrong order.  One of which took 30 extra minutes to get the right order, so by the time she got her food we were all finished.  He never came around to fill waters or get second drink orders which we all wanted.  He added people's bills together.  It was so bad I didn't leave a tip at all which I've never done because I was a server for many years and know how difficult the job can be.the food was jus ok not nearly good enough to make up for it.  We tried to make a complaint to the manager but she was too busy eating at the bar.

fAZCj9LyQt3WIAE0CVwvCg.text: Watched Super Bowl last Sunday.  Absolutely great time.  Good fun crowd, excellent service.  Elicia was super, making room for our party of Mark's team.  Will definitely do a repeat next year.

OFJOqRxbtb0quh4nbduGEA.text: My biggest gripe here is the service. They need to get it together regardless of whether they're having a bad day or not. Literally everyone working walked around without a smile on their face. I'm not expecting a welcome choir when I come in, but at least look like you wanna do your job. Our server was Debbie, I joined my party late and had to wait five minutes before leaving my table and going to the counter to get a menu. And then I waited another three minutes at the counter while two employees looked at me and kept moving. I stopped someone and asked if I place my order there or if my server does it for me, and as if my question inconvenienced him, he said my server would do it. Then Debbie comes to the table and without saying "hi, welcome to Nacho Daddy" or "hey, how's it going" or even "hi", she says "what can I get for you?" She REALLY made me wanna pay 15 dollars for two tacos. She brought me water but didn't bring me a place setting. It'd be one thing if it was busy, but she had two other tables. And then when we asked someone else for the check, because 4 out of the 6 people had been done with their food for a while, the guy said, in a hurried tone, "she's gonna get it, she's doing something right now." Even if Debbie was legitimately busy, there still wouldn't be an excuse for the wait time of things & her attitude on top of that added to the not-so-great experience.  I don't know how my group was acting before I showed up, but even if they were some what of a hassle because they took too long to order, or couldn't decide or were constantly talking over each other, you're still in the service industry and your job is to put up with it and you deal with it every day, so buck up and deal with it. We all do things we don't wanna do.

eiiTr_6koPPX6JE3OLSgaA.text: This place has the best everything's!!!! I have tasted the nacho average burger nacho  the BBQ nacho their margaritas and 2 different burgers and everything is always fresh and great tasting I definitely recommend this place a million percent!!!

i2sst9RF7zifnCR1Yu8bKg.text: I would give 0 stars if I could. After planning our vacation for months we were most excited to visit Nacho Daddy, as we had seen it on the Food Network. Everything started out fine, but after ordering our margaritas and food we waited. This wouldn't be a problem but we were 1 of 2 tables in the restaurant. I happened to look over at the bar and saw the bar tender standing there. Then I saw our drinks sitting there. Our waiter passed our drinks at least 4 times that I saw and never brought them to our table. We also ordered 3 street tacos as an appetizer, I;m not sure how long those were sitting there, but it was a huge let down. Obviously, we left and felt bad about not paying for our water glasses. As we were walking out, the waiter had the nerve to say, "thanks for coming in". Thank's for not serving us. Upon complaining we were offered to come back, but we are on vacation and have everything planned out. You lost that chance when you treated us like dirt. It sucks that we have planned on eating at this place for months and we were treated so bad. Save your money and go somewhere that wants you there.

NqDtdxnINAyNa-CBR784BQ.text: Good, fun place to hang out.  Good bar drinks, and their street tacos were very good, any variety, we had them all.  A bit disappointed with their nachos though.  Some of the chips were soggy when first delivered to table, and not enouth spice to make them stand out, but otherwise tasty.  Good service and very friendly staff.

Nlyr8lEZoWc_qsGPa_j4yQ.text: Don't waste you time or money.  Nachos came out cold after 20 minutes.  I mean cold to the touch.  Really?! They did replace the dish and that was nice.  Frankly I don't want to waste my Vegas time for mediocre food.

8vRHagZGo79HLRE6NRa-ug.text: Was in town on business with my wife in tow, looked around Freemont St area for a vegan-friendly establishment.  SO GLAD we found Nacho Daddy!  Food and service was outstanding!  And that they actually have a vegan section on the menu so we didn't have to interogate the server or manager to confirm what wew were being served was suitable was AWESMOME!  I would HIGH:Y recommend this place to anyone (not just fellow vegans!) looking for a nice, low key, unpretentious mexican restaurant with great grub!

I40PXwR5lq7WkuTiENYc1g.text: I don't even know where to begin. We came in on Sunday around 11am. I was accompanied by 5 others. There might have been 8-9 other people in the whole place. I was so excited to try this place because I had watched it on the Food Network channel. MAN what a disappointment! We were greeted 5 mins after we came in by a very rude bartender. I kick my self for not asking her name.. She took our drink order which consisted of beer and 2 shots or tequila.. Then she was gone.. 15 mins later she came back and brought the tequila.. My husband asked where his beer was and she said I'm getting it.. Another 15 mins went by and this time another bartender came on shift and I asked for our bill.. I said all we had was tequila.. She said well it looks like you also had beers.. I said you are right we ordered the beers but were never served them.. So we got the check for our 2 shots of tequila, paid and left.. I honestly was very excited to try this place and I am extremely upset with the service and will never be back.. We should have listened to the hotel staff whom warned us about Nacho Daddy..

9Z4pWwlU1foPLTD_Dj12sg.text: The carne asada nachos were great. The "daddy" margarita was really damn good. Would've given 4 stars if the service was faster. Gotta buzz going and in need of some food, this place will do the job.

0ciONJrDDLbyHENViHQHhA.text: We went on a Monday afternoon so it wasn't too crowded. The Bar was busy but there was only two tables in the dining area. We were seated and served quickly, the waitress was quick, efficient and friendly. The place was good for kids because it was separated from the bar area by a wall, I am not sure how kid frinedly it would be at night with a full bar.  My 7 year old got the kids nachos, my wife got the pork tacos and I got the supreme tostada nachos. We all loved our food it was delicious. The pork taco's were the best we had ever had, the kids nachos were tasty and the cheese sauce it really good. The supreme nachos were excellent and slightly hot due to the fried jalapenos. The only complaint would be that the supreme nachos were a little smaller than I expected. My wife ordered a Mango Thai Basil Margarita and she said it was tasty and she enjoyed it. We all shared a Churro sundae and it was so good. We couldn't finish it all but we tried. It comes with chocolate, caramel and raspberry sauce with 4 churros. We had a great late lunch and it was well worth the trip to Fremont. We will definitely be back again!

w8bnNEySTiZpmqhiZr-CJg.text: we tried the nachos and filet mignon street tacos , they are so good.. except the tortilla for tacos is hard. the service is good and fast.

A0dZ0uhHUwMbq_RSJ_DAeg.text: I had the vegan Cajun street tacos, and I do believe that was the best damn meal I had in all of Vegas! Huge portion size for a great price, and it was sooo flavorful. Awesome food, friendly staff and quick service. Couldn't ask for more.

osAyxSnb5g_Mp38UUpkjUw.text: Service was terrible. Bartender walked by me 4 or 5 times before acknowledging that I was there and then offered a very half hearted apology. She also did not try to remedy the situation by trying to improve the service during the rest of the visit. I ordered my food and asked if they could change one of the TVs to the game on ESPN instead of music videos they said they would then did not. Food was average at best, unlikely that I'll be back anytime soon

A3Lzn42-Yt64H5toBy14Lw.text: My wife and I stopped in for happy hour.. And were blown away, from the moment we walked through the door we felt like locals.  Our waitress was over the top amazing...we had the chicken burrito and a salad... Both were equally amazing! I can't recommend this place enough, we will definitely be back.

pxuRgeTnX6-PkWeEd2llxw.text: My husband and I came to downtown for our 1 year anniversary. Id heard great things about this place and told my husband I wanted to try it. We came in today around 2 in the afternoon, it wasn't too busy and we sat at the bar. I don't know the bartenders name but she was a young woman with red hair passed by us multiple times not taking our order. One time to ask for ids then walked away. A few times after that finally asked what we wanted and when my husband ordered a dos Equis she said sorry it's frozen and walked away. Another 5-10 min passed by and she didn't come back to us until we started walking out of the restaurant pretty annoyed that we had been there for 25 min and didn't even get a drink order in. The service is terrible. I can't comment on the food or drinks due to the fact we never got to order anything.

QDJCydHnRj71xohhQ9KUiQ.text: this place is ok i had bbq chicken nachos the sauce was really good but the nacho cheese sauce was not good and thats a deal breaker for me i love cheese i dont think i would go back at all wasnt the place for me .

ZJGXBp9qEDg7GpR5fTgB0Q.text: Off a side street from the craziness of Fremont, this place is a treat! We didn't eat full on meals because we just wanted something light and a drink but the food we got was great. I got chips and salsa (some of the best I've ever had) and my bf got one of the spicy nachos (I forget what it was called exactly). My bf ate almost the entire plate of nachos by himself, that's how good he thought it was! He even wanted to go back the next day. Only complaint is our server was slow to get to us and it wasn't really busy at all. However she was very lovely after that! Great place, I'd definitely return!

9RGCOzrwlI5ix5X5ZM3HQQ.text: It is really unfortunate that this place isn't better than it is for the location. With all of the excellent food offerings in the downtown Las Vegas area, it is extremely important to put ones best foot forward on the food scene. There were several strikes for this restaurant in my opinion, the first being that as soon as my family was seated, we were ignored for at least 15 minutes. With the menu having been studied for at least that long, we were ready to order. The waiter breezed up, took my drink order for ONE BEER and left without getting the food order. The waiter breezed up with the beer, took the food order of filet mignon nachos and an order of shrimp ceviche. The sad nachos arrived to the table with very little cheese, drowned is a terrible sauce, low presence of steak, and sad looking guacamole. The chips were fresh. The ceviche was a no. All around...a no. No flavor, nothing, period! The avocado was fresh. Oh yeah, I wanted another beer, no one ever came back to the table. Once done with dinner, we waited, and waited, and waited for the bill. Finally it shows up and guess how much 1 beer, 1 plate of nachos, and 1 ceviche appetizer cost...OVER FIFTY DOLLARS! Are you kidding me!?! That's even unreasonable for Vegas! We weren't on the main strip. Not even on the Fremont Street strip. I do not recommend this place AT ALL.

4fPMo8QxZ_SUMFHRe8lx-Q.text: I live about a block or two from this location and love coming here for their happy hour. It's on their website for Monday - Saturday from 3-6 pm. I bring some friends with me today and then we wait for 10 minutes for a single waiter or waitress to come get out drink order. When she finally comes to the table we ask for the Happy Hour menu and she informs us that they stopped doing happy hour on weekends. When I told her that it is still on the website her response was "oh well."  Sad to say, but Nacho Daddy has lost my business for not honoring their own advertising and consistent poor service.

dPtk-9GCeYuhifN7tB9nuA.text: I've only been to this location twice and kimmi has been there both times and she's always great! Very fun environment and the food is good too! Will definitely be back to see her!

QAkpLtUz9yvSzHgxlw5ONg.text: Horrible service, horrible food! Not ever going back! Go else where. Thought it could be good thought wrong.

qBII8XX2b04ZG9okSbFwaA.text: Good food, good service, cool theme I ordered the nacho portions are good size if your buzzing lol

Rf_70Dbwo2o1QSGA5fgTwA.text: Great place to eat on Fremont area Best food all week. Sorry that we didn't find it sooner , guacamole and pico are fresh and. GREAT. The best waitress EVER. KAYLA!!!!!

qnVUy2BrAZM1aA2r6cFpsg.text: We read several places that their margaritas are the best in town- and they are!!! I just had the regular margarita (usually I try different flavors) and it really was the best ever!!!! My boyfriend did 2 of the scorpion shots- they have a real scorpion in them! Super cool to impress your friends!!!

rVezkGcxukPFdmak8p1Fcg.text: Brought a big group of friends (about) to celebrate a special occasion at happy hour. I thought they would be happy that I brought in business, but service was marginal.  This is the second time I've received poor service, so not planning to go back and neither are my 20 friends. Too bad because this place has a lot of potential to be a fun launch point for a night on Fremont East.

QqltF7eScC7OhGtyajXAZQ.text: Bar area dining review: The cucumber jalapeno margarita easy ice, is a keeper! I ordered the chicken taco combo, sans rice, all beans. Even though my plate arrived with rice, I was quickly presented with a side of refrieds in an iron dish. My daughter's bean cheese wet burrito was a good size, served with chips. Also ordered chips & salsa, yumminess. Good food, good portions. Service was great, thanks ladies! Enjoyable.

vEpTFG5YeFphgWW62usl6w.text: I'm addicted to this place! The Daddy's Supreme Chicken Tacos are to die for, every mouthful makes me say mmmmm.  One thing I didn't expect at a place called Nacho Daddy, was the best wings in town!! I LOVE them, they're huge and meaty, with lots of extremely tasty sauce on them. Seriously, try them!  Another favorite of mine is the chips and salsa. So very fresh, obviously made to order. Plus, they're bottomless! Can't beat that!!  Literally every thing I've had here is amazing. The only thing that gets iffy is the service. Last time I waited about fifteen minutes before I even got to order a drink, and they weren't that busy. But, I'll deal with it to get the amazing food!

eoOTI1zYLRUt0A4dMjR2vQ.text: Unbelievable food here. If you love Mexican, this place is the ultimate in delicious!  Try the queso dip.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ymDL_ACBfCyzrw3243fm8w.text: erica is super sweet and awesome! I love how down to earth she is and her service is amazing!! i loved her! the food was great and the atmosphere is super relaxed. will definitely be coming back:)

rUYzdzDrEjuciDcGjfCI2Q.text: We'll start off with the negative...you don't put sour cream on a tamal. But the stars don't drop for that!! The service was great, free Margarita for yelp check in, nice!!  We had the shrimp ceviche appetizer, crab and lobster  nachos and of course the pork tamal.  Everything  tasted great, we're thinking about coming back tomorrow...if we're brave, we'll do the scorpion shot!! Cheers mate!!

ZV_nL-brHAcV8TTWaTWoaA.text: My group was hanging out on Fremont Street and people were hangry. So hangry in fact, that after attempting to find a place to accommodate 10 people, most of the group headed back to the hotel.  That left 4 of us to get something to stuff our faces with. We went with Nacho Daddy which turned out to be an awesome decision.  It was not crowded at all on a Monday night, so we were sat quickly and placed our appetizer and drink order. We went with the pulled pork BBQ nachos, which turned out to be phenomenal. The pork was good (not the best I've had but this ain't dixieland), but the sauce and queso made this spectacular. Their BBQ sauce was very tangy, with just enough sweet and a little kick at the back end. The white queso was interestingly underneath the pile of chips and toppings but it works well as it keeps the slimy chip situation to a minimum.  Our margaritas took a while to obtain but were good. Mine was the house rita, which was a tad sweet but mixed strong enough and with fresh lime juice.  Everyone at the table ordered various iterations of Gringo and Street Tacos. I personally got the steak filet ones which were great. I would have preferred shredded cheese to queso, but it turned out ok. Others in my party were really impressed with the shredded pork tacos. Refried beans were on point as well. The Spanish rice was unimpressive, it was a bit overcooked but had the right flavor.  The only reason I gave this only 4 stars was because the bar was a little too slow in getting drinks out. Our server was awesome! We were given great recommendations and he took a few pictures of our group since we learned he's a serious photographer!  Should we find ourselves hangry or even hungry on Fremont Street again, this place will be in the short list for sure!

lTk3PyxwL1Qrcwhcllb19w.text: Best food on my trip to Vegas. Waiter Mikey was the best waiter I seen in a while. Good food good service.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States

L3gSVYLMzE0D8HQWZRJL8A.text: Been here only for take out came and actually set down with a friend and i must say LAWRENCE is absolutely awesome he is incredibly sweet and very attentive food was fresh and out with minimum wait ever sit in the bar area ask for him!!!

7mXLpmadgNSWg1DB_lqhIQ.text: I came here because the nachos looked yummy on the pics but when we received our order the nachos came in a smaller portion than it looks on the pics. The nachos were ok nothing great. I also didn't like how they only had ground beef not real steak. The price was $17 for basic nachos. The food wasn't horrible but definitely not worth the price. If you are in Vegas everything is over priced so it was ok wished they had better meat selection

eP4tOPpDM4WLSwXjQ1aDQA.text: We had the shrimp nachos and they were good. We shared one plate and it was plenty. Had a couple cocktails as well. I had their boozy horchata and it was good.

yOw7UF07k9dZo7FPRz24yw.text: Mark has been SO good to us. We are here for a bachelorette dinner and he was so upbeat and loves us even though we are sort of a drunk mess. He treated us so well and is having a TON of fun being our server! We love Mark! Also, the food and margaritas are top notch. Come to this location!

wmMaja3pdiQ_70hR-bHhyw.text: Nacho daddy don't know how to make no nacho I got the nacho lobster & crab nacho didn't have enough cheese. All my little bit of cheese was stuck burnt on the tray. I also got filet mignon nachos they also didn't have alot of cheese I also order cheese & jalapeno nacho they we're the only ones where you could actually see the cheese. Then we ordered the churro for dessert & they were to hard.

ct5227hJnfb0JnvWyyjjyg.text: Been to ND several times and it never seems to disappoint!!!  Best Margaritas around. And don't forget to try the Filet Mignon Nachos.....you won't regret it. Aeerick took care if us today and was a stud.  His personality, sense or humor and enthusiasm is what makes us want to keep coming back for more.  He made our stay well worth it!!!!  Can't wait for our next trip to Vegas just so we can stop by our favorite Mexican Joint. Thanks ND!!!

mWScwQWUMaIiI0wtooJ78Q.text: Very cute place! I'm in town for my 22nd birthday and needed a good place close to Fremont street, and found myself at Nacho Daddy! Love the enthusiastic atmosphere, the look of the place, and the food and drinks were great! #beenthere #stungthat

veK1MMuFKMJWnYv_YbX_Uw.text: This was my 2nd time visiting since I moved to Vegas this last month. The food was great both times but the service sucked the second time. The server didn't refill our waters and brought the check before we could order more drinks. If he is my server again ill6surely request another. I can't  even remember his name (if he told us) but I remember the face!

tTX91K0-cdIRDd9QlQwsAg.text: This place was awesome. Great service and the nachos were amazing. Also, if you're a fan of seafood, their ceviche appetizer is great. Definitely recommend. And a super cool atmosphere, the music choices alone were so fun and created a great time.

8HIWHsOh74RiN9Zy2wWSQQ.text: They give you a lot of food on the nachos but they are too salty and the meat didn't have good flavor. The service is excellent and it is clean.  If your in the area and want a ton of food this could be your place.

TvSffgA9mmSn5b4q5lFRoA.text: Best restaurant in Fremont st. Service is good and the food is better. I got the fiesta Nachos and the 3 dip app. Both delicious.

uNmFbV5rfWAZWYfKWqekFg.text: Amazing experience and food. We got wings and fajitas plus drinks. The server, Kayla, was so attentive but not overwhelming. Ambiance was great too.

XY2vo-Zg8r7PjKcTpwEkjQ.text: Good drinks, good food. Ordered the filet nachos and a jack and coke and filled me up. Nice atmosphere. Will definitely come back.

TG_aoB-nvFzUTnFkppfLKg.text: First let me say we were seated at the bar as we were told there was atleast a 10-15 min wait for a table even though half the tables were empty and clean. OK whatever that's fine. We ordered the steak fajita nachos (the ones with filet mignon), the flavor was on point. Wish the peppers and onions were more chip or bite size and the steak was tough and my husband was actually digging to find any. We also ordered a chicken quesadilla, wish there was more cheese and chicken and there was melted cheese that was cooked to crisp on the outside? Not sure why unless to add crunch but all it did was make it taste like burnt cheese. Would possibly go back again, but prices were a bit high for what we were served which was a bit disappointing. The bartender seemed nice at first, but even sitting right there didn't check in on us except for " y'all are good right?" Once.

bHGCl1Hvzg55gaOUo8VMTg.text: I was beginning to think there was no Tex-Mex in Vegas. So happy I was wrong.  One thing I would change: frozen drinks should be served in chilled glasses. My margarita was delicious but the glass was hot to the touch (like it was fresh from the dishwasher) and my frozen margarita reverted back to a regular margarita pretty quickly. All good, though. We'll be back.

ScsruQ2CU0qVZDnqIMfu5g.text: Love this place!! I'm a tourist wanting to try all the good vegan spots there is! I loved the cozy feel there is here! Ordered a michelada (pretty good) and vegan nachos!! I've tried plenty of "vegan chicken" but this is on the list of top 5! The portion is big enough to share if you want something to chat and share. If you're wanting more then def get a portion for yourself. All over delicious!

xZ6Yj0y1SMa6U6Aj_Y-zXg.text: Enjoyed some GREAT nachos and crazy scorpion shots. Highly recommend to anyone looking for unique and delicious nachos or a crazy shot to take. Buffalo chicken nachos were fantastic as well as the chicken Thai nachos.

NWkPvfjAseFOv7PRBgoeSw.text: Food was ok. Drinks ok. Service ok. As a breakfast joint, there are much better.   Came in on a Sunday morning for breakfast. One of their signature drinks is french press coffee. Hot water was broke, so no coffee. You'd think they would boil some on the stove next to the refried beans. Not that much culinary creativity in Vegas.   Had a bloody Mary that was fine. Checked into Yelp and got a coupon for a free house margarita. There's a reason it's free. Lemonade would have been better.   Smoked wings were tasty, but rubbery. They need to fry them after they are smoked to crisp them up. Breakfast slider, tacos and enchilada rancheros were good.   Glad I came, might try the nachos if I come back.

CiubpSbnf-EwfLgxcfUAsg.text: Generally I try and stay away from rating somewhere without going more than once however... I won't be in Vegas for awhile. Nacho daddy fell short to say the least... the wait was long... clearly they were under staffed for a Sunday game day. And be it that a HUGE music festival was down the way they should've been more prepared. You pour cheese on chips... we shouldn't have waited 1hr and 10mins for our food. I'm sure the margarita I ordered made my stomach hurt therefore I couldn't even eat my food. And the party next to use was just as upset.   The waiter was okay but he seemed MAD that I even spoke up about the experience. You guys can do better. But I won't be back.

OJbQ1mJMzzyIDf-0LO0LJg.text: The food here is amazing, the drinks are pretty good as well. This is a little hidden place in old Vegas strip off of 4th street. Our server Jose was awesome! Got our drinks order as soon as we sat down, that that started the night. Between my friends and I we split a couple of different dishes. We got a chimichanga, supreme nachos, quesadilla and a corn on a cob. Everything tasted delicious, it is the best drunk food. Don't forget to check in on yelp for a free house margarita and the drink is STRONG for being free. Music is on point and the environment is a cute little dive bar feel.   Must try this place when you're in the area! Definitely the best nacho place I've had in a while!  Service: 10/10 Food: 10/10 Drinks: 10/10 Price: 10/10

ErTiJ9y3e8c8Vc0Sk1UEwg.text: Awsome Dean was Awsome good food and margaritas.our waiter was very knowledgable on his food choices .Great Time

Q4ajSmZWWuE3cLA2yU7KJA.text: We came in on a Saturday night so we expected to have a long wait.  But a 30 minute wait wasn't bad.  This place is loud and cramped!  We didn't mind the noise but feeling cramped is never a good thing.   Going through the menu, there were a lot of dishes we wanted to try.  They have a large a menu so we needed extra time to order.  In the meantime, we ordered a Daddy's Margarita and a White Peach Margarita to help us decide.  Both were really good and plentiful.  I loved that it wasn't watered down and you can clearly taste the alcohol.   We finally decided on the menu. For starters we ordered the ceviche.  This was pretty good. Not too salty and ingredients tasted fresh (minus the shrimp).  What I didn't like was that the ceviche to chips ratio was way off. Too much chips, not enough ceviche.  It seemed you had to stack 3 chips together to get the ratio right.  For our main dishes we ordered the Cajun Nachos and the Baja Seafood Combo.  These portions are huge!  The Cajun Nachos could have easily been split between 2 average eaters.  This nacho dish has shrimps, andouille sausage, and cajun spices. And let me tell you, Nacho Daddy didn't skimp on the shrimps and sausage.  This dish literally overflowed with them. This dish ended up being too rich. It was hard to finish this because the spices became overwhelming.  But I think that if this was shared, it probably wouldn't have been that rich.  Another thing I didn't like was the shrimps were the frozen kind.  They did little to mask that.   The Baja Seafood Combo  definitely a better choice between the 2.  This dish consist of fish tacos and lobster/crab enchiladas with rice.  This too was rich in flavor but better balanced.  I would definitely order this again.    Our server did a good job managing the packed house.  The only complaint I have was that he forgot to put my credit card back with the receipt.  We walked out thinking that one of us grabbed it.  It took him a while to find it but eventually did.

IisBGxbOOsvGWU2yoxeGKA.text: I came here for brunch last weekend during my March Madness trip.  The reviews were quite positive and I was impressed by their expansive menu, so we stopped by.  When we arrived, the restaurant was occupied, but definitely not full or too busy.  Our server was friendly, but extremely slow.    We ordered the $20 bottomless mimosas and stayed eating our brunch and watching some basketball for probably about 2 hours.  In the span of the 2 hours of being there, we only got 3 mimosas.  Every time the server checked on us, we asked for another refill and it would take an extremely long time to get another glass.  The mimosas were probably 3/4 orange juice, 1/4 champagne.  I would say go for the beer and margaritas (which I guess should have been obvious, but I can't pass up mimosas after being hungover).  The beers came out in huge mugs and I believe were only $8 or $10.    My friends that ordered traditional breakfast items said the food tasted oily.  My vegan chick'n nachos were pretty good, though the fake chicken was hard to chew.  My boyfriend loved the shrimp nachos he ordered.  So the overall take from the table was that the food quality was okay.  It's a good spot to hang out, albeit a bit dark, but not a bad spot to catch a game with some beers and nachos.  Just don't expect fast refills.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy Downtown - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Large Dos Equis Beer

aRcGMp4kKoe1aSLijznQzA.text: MEHk no MEHstake! Nacho Daddy's kitchen deserves the gold MEHdal for their MEHzmerizing Tex-MEHx dishes! Focusing on the MEH quality of the MEHnu, however, is missing the point-- Nacho Daddy is not about Michelin Stars, it's about FUN! So leave your foodie-badge at home, get some friends together, get yourselves sloshed, and scarf down the nachos for a killer good time in Downtown Vegas!  3   S T A R S  * NACHOS + BOOZE CAN'T LOSE :::: The Nachos -- The perfect BOOZE FODDER! Nacho-greatest example of gourmet Tex-Mex, but PHENOMENALLY SATISFYING when you're 2 beers and 2 shots deep, and about to take a video of your poor homie chewing up and swallowing a dead scorpion on a dare. Please be courteous and vomit outside!  * PARTY PALAZZO 'Palazzo' means PALACE in Italian, as in watch your PALs get drunk off their ASSes! This is VEGAS BABY, so get STUFFED & get TRASHED, and this is a great place to do both! Rush in with your new crew of friends you just made Downtown & go 18-Dummy off their grande Tequila selection (60 varieties) while deep-throating MORE NACHOS (gross)! Watch the game on one monitor, or hilariously tacky old 70's and 80's music videos on the other, in between scorpion-shots and INSTAGRAM-selfies!  * THANKS FOR THE MEHmories I will never in my life forget this meal. I walked into a big, fun space for lunch, was waited on by a super-cool server named Elicia, devoured one  disappointing MEH dish after the next, and finished with an unforgettably bad Las Vegas decision--the Scorpion Shot! My life on this planet has been made slightly more significant by this wacky bit of suffering.  2   M I N U S E S  - MEHlancholy MEHnu Don't walk in by yourself as a foodie because you'll feel like a fool :) Let's find out why... :::: Carnitas Tacos -- Utterly Bland. If you've ever experienced eye-fluttering ecstasy from expertly crafted tender-juicy-crispy-salty carnitas tacos then DO NOT order them here. It'll MEHk you sad. :::: Battered Fish Taco -- Decent. Best thing I ordered. Great texture, good flavors. ... So then I tried to redeem the meal with what I thought would be a guaranteed winner, but it was even more MEH! :::: MEHxican Roasted Corn -- Like a disappointing Tinder date. She seemed so hot until we MEHt. Too little mayo, too little cotija cheese, no chili powder, no lime, and the corn was wet roughage--not sweet enough. Complete fail.  - SCORPION SHOT: MASOCHISTS ONLY! Probably the go-to hazing ritual of UNLV fraternities. On par with eating a rotten shrimp head from the bottom of a Panda Express dumpster. Chewing into the guts of the scorpion, realizing that its half-decayed organs were all over my teeth, and then washing it down with a shot of tequila was a 5-second NIGHTMARE. I almost threw up my entire lunch. So why did I do it? The server picked up on the gray glow of my meal disappointment and hit me with a brilliant up-sell. "You know what you should try that's pretty good?" she said with a wink, "The Scorpion Shot! Come on, you have to do it, you're in Vegas!" She smiled pointing to a black t-shirt they sold with '#GOTSTUNG' printed on it.  "Awesome!" was my innocent reply.

bLTfXs20hGy3ipnNTMLrTw.text: Great place for dinner! I had the Lobster and crab nachos along with a Daddy Mule. Only complaint is, service was slow at midnight. Even though they weren't particularly full. Overall, it was a good experience at a place that has reasonably priced food and drinks.

jvhBr3lH-VhOins0kKRRNg.text: We come here every time we visit Las Vegas- usually on Sundays for breakfast. The all day breakfast is awesome and the service is always great. I love the name, too. The skinny margarita is very good paired with the chicken and kale scramble!

Er6-0s1ssWRqD95t4IXVLA.text: I've been hearing great things about Nacho Daddy, and finally decided to try it while I was downtown with my Mom for the day, and we were not disappointed! We came in around 12 pm and it was pretty quiet, but it definitely seemed like it had the potential to be more of a fun, party sort of place later at night. We were just there for a quick lunch, so quiet suited us just fine. Our server Bella was very sweet and friendly. We ordered the chicken enchilada nachos and got the check in offer for a free margarita. The nachos were seriously the bomb.com if you're a huge wuss like me and hate spicy food, order these without the jalapenos, they were honestly the best nachos I've ever eaten. It was a huge portion, enough to easily fill 2 adults. The topping were spread evenly and very generously, not one naked chip. And speaking of the chips, they were the perfect thickness which sounds weird, but it's very important for a good plate of nachos. They need to be thin enough that it's not a chore to bite through, but thick enough to hold all of those delicious toppings, and these hit the nail on the head. I honestly left satisfied with every aspect of our experience. I will definitely be back!

yqtnInLm6PbD7Z5EYpIFLA.text: Honestly, I just stopped here at like 130am with a buddy because we were hungry and this was one of the only places still serving food. The bartender was friendly, and the portions of nachos are huge. Those were good, but do not order the wings. The sauce is served on the side, and the wings are pretty charred, making them taste somewhat burned on the outside. My buddy got fajitas which came with a second plate of all the fixings, and all that was good too. For late night I would recommend. For earlier in the day/evening I would probably keep looking.... unless you REALLY like nachos.

EXmWmFvO9gboHxYAuSYE1A.text: I'm going to start off with the rating. Most reviews give it 3.5/5. As much as it pains me I have to agree with the rating. The saving grace in this restaurant is the incredible food. It was our first time there so we have no clue to wait for a hostess or just sit where we please. It has the potential to be a very hip hangout if they didn't shove their merchandise down your throat. After we found a table in the small eatery we finally got to order, our choices were the beer battered lobster tacos and the fajita cheese steak. The lobster taco was on point. I was surprised that even smothered in sauce the lobster stayed crispy and delicious. Covered in fresh avocado, corn and lettuce it comes with beans and cheesy rice.   The fajita cheese steak is tasty but very greasy ( those with sensitive stomachs eat at your own risk) the bread was soaked with queso so it was difficult to eat. It only comes with fries but they were amazing in my book. I love a good pile of crispy fries. I would have liked to try the drinks and shots but unfortunately most are over priced. They have huge portion sizes but you end up paying for it.   As for the service it was not great. The waitress acted like she hated her job and didn't want to be there. Not to mention alot of things were left unclean and dusty. Like I said earlier I agree with the 3.5 rating. Perhaps in the future I can change my review. Love, Bug

b9cb2uc7bdCm963vsbtByQ.text: My wife and I ate here yesterday for lunch and had an ok meal.  We started off with the BBQ Nachos, which were very tasty.    We then had the shrimp tacos and soft pork tacos.  The shrimp tacos were pretty good, although I think the totilla should be changed to the flour one.  The pork tacos were a little on the salty side.  I thought about sending them back but decided to eat them anyway.  In hindsight, I probably should've returned them.  The maragaritas are really good.

VaVD1N9wS1y0cNnkG68xPg.text: Just wandered here from the Fremont Street Experience...name sounded familiar. Oh My! It was taco Tuesday as well as 2 for 1 tequila. The food was excellent,  as a leaving patron informed us. We  sat at the bar...Sarah was awesome. Don't let the empty patio fool you. Awesome food! Super fresh!

yqukVtngY5kSo3-XyBwdOQ.text: I was iffy about this place. The reviews were either hit or miss. I came here a few weeks ago. You have the option of sitting at the bar or at one of the tables of your choice (inside and outsude).   It was lunch time when I stopped in and the noise level was medium to low. The server was friendly and very attentive. I had the ceviche which needed just a tad bit more citrus, it was served with freshly made chips.   I also had the street tacos and y'all must try the fish tacos! They are Devine! I also tried the Banana bread beer. I enjoyed myself and you will too!
